False Appearance.name: False Appearance
False Appearance.description: While the [[lookup @name lowercase]] remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from an inanimate statue.

Faultless Tracker.name: Faultless Tracker
Faultless Tracker.description: The creature that caused the [[lookup @name lowercase]] to animate becomes its quarry. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] knows the direction and distance to its quarry as long the quarry remains within Drakkenheim or until the [[lookup @name lowercase]] is destroyed.

Rejuvenation.name: Rejuvenation
Rejuvenation.description: If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] is destroyed, it reforms with all of its Hit Points in 1 hour unless a @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplDisintegra]{Disintegrate} spell is cast on its remains.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes one [[/item .xSBZX1FfBpnaeNml]] attack and one [[/item .MYvmkUBJOrsQEqXa]] attack.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]].

Delerium Dust.name: Delerium Dust
Delerium Dust.description: Wisdom Saving Throw: DC 13, each creature in a 30-foot Emanation originating from the [[lookup @name lowercase]]. Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target has the &reference[Addled] condition (save ends).

Delerium Dust.name: Delerium Dust
Delerium Dust.description: You are &reference[addled apply=false]. You can repeat your saving throw against this effect at the end of each of your turns, ending the effect on a success.

Hypnotic Flutter.name: Hypnotic Flutter
Hypnotic Flutter.description: Intelligence Saving Throw: DC 13, each creature in a 60-foot Emanation of the [[lookup @name lowercase]] that can see it ([[lookup @name lowercase]] automatically succeed). Failure: The target has the &reference[Slowed] condition (save ends). If the target is already Slowed, it instead has the &reference[Immobilized] condition (save ends). If the target is already Immobilized, it also has the &reference[Incapacitated] condition (save ends both).

Hypnotic Flutter: Slowed.name: Hypnotic Flutter: Slowed
Hypnotic Flutter: Slowed.description: You are &reference[slowed apply=false]. You can repeat your saving throw against this effect at the end of each of your turns, ending the effect on a success.

Hypnotic Flutter: Immobilized.name: Hypnotic Flutter: Immobilized
Hypnotic Flutter: Immobilized.description: You are &reference[immobilized apply=false]. You can repeat your saving throw against this effect at the end of each of your turns, ending the effect on a success.

Hypnotic Flutter: Immobilized & Incapaci.name: Hypnotic Flutter: Immobilized & Incapacitated
Hypnotic Flutter: Immobilized & Incapaci.description: You are &reference[immobilized apply=false] and &reference[incapacitated apply=false]. You can repeat your saving throw against this effect at the end of each of your turns, ending the effect on a success.

Proboscis.name: Proboscis
Proboscis.description:
[[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]]. If the target has the &reference[Incapacitated apply=false] condition, its Intelligence score is reduced by [[/r 1d4]] until it finishes a Short or Long Rest. The target dies if this effect reduces its Intelligence score to 0.

Foundry Note

This attack has several different Active Effects to apply to a target when reducing their Intelligence score. Use the "Intelligence Drain" activity to roll the d4 and apply the correct variant of the Active Effect.

Intelligence Drain (-1).name: Intelligence Drain (-1)
Intelligence Drain (-1).description: You Intelligence score has been reduced by 1 until you finish a Short or Long Rest. You die if this effect reduces your Intelligence score to 0.

Intelligence Drain (-2).name: Intelligence Drain (-2)
Intelligence Drain (-2).description: You Intelligence score has been reduced by 2 until you finish a Short or Long Rest. You die if this effect reduces your Intelligence score to 0.

Intelligence Drain (-3).name: Intelligence Drain (-3)
Intelligence Drain (-3).description: You Intelligence score has been reduced by 3 until you finish a Short or Long Rest. You die if this effect reduces your Intelligence score to 0.

Intelligence Drain (-4).name: Intelligence Drain (-4)
Intelligence Drain (-4).description: You Intelligence score has been reduced by 4 until you finish a Short or Long Rest. You die if this effect reduces your Intelligence score to 0.

Blood Scent.name: Blood Scent
Blood Scent.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has Advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks to Search for creatures who are not Constructs or Undead. It can automatically detect any creature that isn't a Construct or Undead within 10 feet of it.

Soulbinding Mace.name: Soulbinding Mace
Soulbinding Mace.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]]. Charisma Saving Throw: DC 13. Failure: The target has the &reference[Jinxed] condition (1d6; save ends).

Jinxed (1d6).name: Jinxed (1d6)
Jinxed (1d6).description: You subtract 1d6 to your attack rolls and saving throws. You can repeat your saving throw against this effect at the end of each of your turns, ending the effect on a success.

Abyssal Pull.name: Abyssal Pull
Abyssal Pull.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]], and the target is pulled 15 feet toward the [[lookup @name lowercase]].

Unyielding.name: Unyielding
Unyielding.description: Trigger: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] is subjected to an effect that would move it, cause it to have the &reference[Prone] condition, or both. Failure: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] is neither moved nor has the &reference[Prone] condition.

utility.condition: When the ghoul lord is subjected to an effect that would move it, cause it to have the Prone condition, or both.

Shield Slam.name: Shield Slam
Shield Slam.description: Strength Saving Throw: DC 14, one creature within 5 feet of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]. Failure: The target is pushed 10 feet away from the [[lookup @name lowercase]] and has the &reference[Prone] condition.

Shield.name: Shield
Shield.description: You gain the Armor Class benefit of a Shield only if you have training with it.

Psychic Barrage.name: Psychic Barrage
Psychic Barrage.description: Intelligence Saving Throw: DC 17, up to three creatures the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within 60 feet. Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target has the &reference[Jinxed] condition (1d8; save ends). Success: Half damage only.

Jinxed (1d8).name: Jinxed (1d8)
Jinxed (1d8).description: You subtract 1d8 to your attack rolls and saving throws. You can repeat your saving throw against this effect at the end of each of your turns, ending the effect on a success.

Thought Shield.name: Thought Shield
Thought Shield.description: Trigger: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] or a creature it can see fails a saving throw or is hit by an attack. Response: The target rolls 1d6 and adds the result to its AC or saving throw, potentially turning a hit into a miss or a failure into a success.

utility.condition: When the host or a creature it can see fails a saving throw or is hit by an attack.

Detect Thoughts.name: 侦测思想
Detect Thoughts.description:
你激活下述效应之一。直到法术结束为止，你可以在你随后的回合用一个魔法动作以激活下述任意效应之一。

感知思想。 你感知距你 30 尺内，知晓语言或能够心灵感应的思想的存在。你并不会阅读这些思想，但你知道这里存在一名有理智的生物。

此法术会被 1 尺厚的岩石、泥土或木头，1 寸厚的金属，或薄薄一层铅阻隔。

阅读思想。 选择一名距你 30 尺内的可见生物，或一名距你 30 尺内被感知思想侦测到的生物。你了解到此时目标最关心的事情。如果目标不知晓任何语言也不会心灵感应，则你不能得到任何信息。

在你的下一回合，用一个魔法动作，你可以尝试深入目标的心灵。如果你选择这么做，目标进行一次感知豁免。豁免失败，则你了解到他的逻辑推理、情绪状态以及他头脑中的一些大事（比如忧虑、挚爱和仇恨的事物）。豁免成功，法术终止。无论哪种情况，目标都会知道你正在窥探其心灵，且直到你的注意力从它的心灵上移开为止，目标均可以在其回合内使用动作进行一次 [[/check ability=int skill=arc dc=@attributes.spelldc]] 检定，对抗你的法术豁免DC，目标胜出对抗时，法术终止。

Invisible Mage Hand.name: Invisible Mage Hand
Invisible Mage Hand.description:
A spectral, floating hand appears at a point you choose within range. The hand lasts for the duration. The hand vanishes if it is ever more than 30 feet away from you or if you cast this spell again.

When you cast the spell, you can use the hand to manipulate an object, open an unlocked door or container, stow or retrieve an item from an open container, or pour the contents out of a vial.

As a Magic action on your later turns, you can control the hand thus again. As part of that action, you can move the hand up to 30 feet.

The hand can't attack, activate magic items, or carry more than 10 pounds.

Levitate.name: Levitate
Levitate.description:
One creature or loose object of your choice that you can see within range rises vertically up to 20 feet and remains suspended there for the duration. The spell can levitate an object that weighs up to 500 pounds. An unwilling creature that succeeds on a Constitution saving throw is unaffected.

The target can move only by pushing or pulling against a fixed object or surface within reach (such as a wall or a ceiling), which allows it to move as if it were climbing. You can change the target's altitude by up to 20 feet in either direction on your turn. If you are the target, you can move up or down as part of your move. Otherwise, you can take a Magic action to move the target, which must remain within the spell's range.

When the spell ends, the target floats gently to the ground if it is still aloft.

Levitating.name: Levitating
Levitating.description: The target can move only by pushing or pulling against a fixed object or surface within reach (such as a wall or a ceiling), which allows it to move as if it were climbing.

Suggestion.name: Suggestion
Suggestion.description:
You suggest a course of activity—described in no more than 25 words—to one creature you can see within range that can hear and understand you. The suggestion must sound achievable and not involve anything that would obviously deal damage to the target or its allies. For example, you could say, "Fetch the key to the cult's treasure vault, and give the key to me." Or you could say, "Stop fighting, leave this library peacefully, and don't return."

The target must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or have the Charmed condition for the duration or until you or your allies deal damage to the target. The Charmed target pursues the suggestion to the best of its ability. The suggested activity can continue for the entire duration, but if the suggested activity can be completed in a shorter time, the spell ends for the target upon completing it.

Pursuing Suggestion.name: Pursuing Suggestion
Pursuing Suggestion.description: The Charmed target pursues the suggestion to the best of its ability. The suggested activity can continue for the entire duration, but if the suggested activity can be completed in a shorter time, the spell ends for the target upon completing it.

Dominate Person.name: Dominate Person
Dominate Person.description:
One Humanoid you can see within range must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or have the &Reference[Charmed apply=false] condition for the duration. The target has Advantage on the save if you or your allies are fighting it. Whenever the target takes damage, it repeats the save, ending the spell on itself on a success.

You have a telepathic link with the Charmed target while the two of you are on the same plane of existence. On your turn, you can use this link to issue commands to the target (no action required), such as "Attack that creature," "Move over there," or "Fetch that object." The target does its best to obey on its turn. If it completes an order and doesn't receive further direction from you, it acts and moves as it likes, focusing on protecting itself.

You can command the target to take a Reaction but must take your own Reaction to do so.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. Your Concentration can last longer with a spell slot of level 6 (up to 10 minutes), 7 (up to 1 hour), or 8+ (up to 8 hours).

Dominated.name: Dominated
Dominated.description: Whenever the &Reference[charmed apply=false] target takes damage, it repeats the [[/save ability=wis]] save, ending the spell on itself on a success.

Bile Blast.name: Bile Blast
Bile Blast.description: Constitution Saving Throw: DC 14, each creature in a 10-foot cone. Failure: 9 (2d8) Acid damage and are Burning (2d8 Acid). Success: Half damage only.

Burning (2d8 Acid).name: Burning (2d8 Acid)
Burning (2d8 Acid).description:
You are &reference[burning apply=false] from being covered in acid.

  • At the end of each of your turns, you take [[/damage average acid 2d8]] damage.

  • The condition ends if you or another creature within 5 feet of you spends an action to scrape off the acid or if some other effect removes it.

Hurl Fetid Flesh.name: Hurl Fetid Flesh
Hurl Fetid Flesh.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] rips off a chunk of its mutated flesh and hurls it at a point it can see within 120 feet. Constitution Saving Throw: DC 14, each creature within a 10-foot-radius Sphere centered on that point. Failure: [[/damage average]] damage. Success: Half damage.

Regeneration.name: Regeneration
Regeneration.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] regains 10 Hit Points at the start of each of its turns. If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] takes Cold damage, this trait doesn’t function at the start of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s next turn. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] dies only if it starts its turn with 0 Hit Points and doesn’t regenerate.

Sulfurous Belch.name: Sulfurous Belch
Sulfurous Belch.description: Constitution Saving Throw: DC 16, each creature in a 20-foot-radius Sphere centered on the [[lookup @name lowercase]]. Failure: [[/damage average]] damage and has the &reference[Blinded] condition until it or another creature within 5 of it uses an action to clean the ash from their eyes. Success: Half damage only.

Sulfurous Belch.name: Sulfurous Belch
Sulfurous Belch.description: You are &reference[blinded apply=false] by ash. You or another creature within 5 feet of you can take an action to clean the ash from your eyes, ending this effect.

Fiery Claw.name: Fiery Claw
Fiery Claw.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]], and the target has the &reference[Burning] condition (4d6 Fire).

Burning (4d6 Fire).name: Burning (4d6 Fire)
Burning (4d6 Fire).description:
You are &reference[burning apply=false] from being covered in fire.

  • At the end of each of your turns, you take [[/damage average fire 4d6]] damage.

  • The condition ends if you or another creature within 5 feet of you spends an action to douse the fire or if some other effect removes it such as submerging yourself in water.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes two [[/item L6LrxugIqsZwHWWK]] attacks and one [[/item xP4fqsRza5T8J5ZO]] attack. It can replace its Volcanic Bite attack with [[/item 2u5tmAsFzpJM9wQc]], if available.

Order Over Chaos.name: Order Over Chaos
Order Over Chaos.description: Whenever the [[lookup @name lowercase]] is present when a roll is made on the Arcane Anomaly, Drakkenheim Madness, or Mutations table, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes an additional roll on the table and chooses which result applies.

Wing Blast.name: Wing Blast
Wing Blast.description: Strength Saving Throw: DC 25, each creature in a 30-foot Cone. Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target is pushed up to 20 feet away from the [[lookup @name lowercase]]. Success: Half damage only.

Aberrant Traits.name: Aberrant Traits
Aberrant Traits.description:
Given the contamination and delerium present within the Space Between Worlds, all creatures who dwell there are the product of contamination and unaffected by the normal dangers of delerium. As an aberrant, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] has the following traits:

  • Fully Contaminated. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] is immune to &reference[drakkenheimContamination] and has Advantage on saving throws against contaminated spells. This creature may cast contaminated spells even though it does not gain Contamination levels.

  • Delerium Healing. As an action, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can touch a delerium shard to regain 10 (3d6) Hit Points. Once the [[lookup @name lowercase]] has used a delerium shard in this way, the shard can't be used in this manner again for 24 hours.

  • Alien Intellect. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] is immune to any effect that would sense its emotions or read its thoughts, as well as any divination spell that it refuses. Wisdom (Insight) checks made to ascertain the [[lookup @name lowercase]]s intentions or sincerity have Disadvantage.

affects.special: a delerium shard

Haze Aura.name: Haze Aura
Haze Aura.description: A creature that starts its turn within 30 feet of the [[lookup @name lowercase]] takes [[/damage average]] damage.

Epic Boss.name: Epic Boss
Epic Boss.description:
This creature is an Epic Boss, a unique foe designed to pose a solo threat to an entire adventuring party. As such, it has additional game rules that sets it apart from normal creatures:

The [[lookup @name lowercase]] always takes their turn on Initiative count 20. On their turn, they can use their movement and interaction as normal. However, they do not take an action or Bonus Action on their turn unless forced to do so by a spell or other effect. Instead, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] takes one of the following Epic Actions at the end of each player character's turn.

All this creature's actions are Epic Actions.

  • @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.2AbJFoacX0UZf45m.Item.LeSn0uTS2Q0scq1L]{Bite}

  • @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.2AbJFoacX0UZf45m.Item.7HcFiFw1UjAORwqS]{Claw}

  • @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.2AbJFoacX0UZf45m.Item.hGgkBTrkpTy5Fnpj]{Tail}

  • @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.2AbJFoacX0UZf45m.Item.QlLejsiksoqmGsng]{Mindfire}

  • @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.2AbJFoacX0UZf45m.Item.5WKziAPYyTeFapj7]{Wing Blast}

  • @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.2AbJFoacX0UZf45m.Item.qLv8mfNHpJkIiPjZ]{Terrifying Roar}

  • @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.2AbJFoacX0UZf45m.Item.A6en4nt8LWprbsHk]{Breathe Deep}

  • @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.2AbJFoacX0UZf45m.Item.fCSUpTgTabF0uutq]{Breath Weapon}

  • @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.2AbJFoacX0UZf45m.Item.UvBVX28gdwyd2HVa]{Spellcasting}

  • @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.2AbJFoacX0UZf45m.Item.4hmVOYn3DPbkA8rK]{Epic Resistance}

Epic Boss.name: Epic Boss
Epic Boss.description:
This creature is an Epic Boss, a unique foe designed to pose a solo threat to an entire adventuring party. As such, it has additional game rules that sets it apart from normal creatures.

The creature always takes their turn on Initiative count 20. On their turn, they can use their movement and interaction as normal. However, they do not take an action or Bonus Action on their turn unless forced to do so by a spell or other effect. Instead, the creature takes one of the Epic Actions they have available.

Epic Resistance.name: Epic Resistance
Epic Resistance.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] chooses one condition, spell, or other effect currently affecting them and rolls [[/r 1d20]]. On an 11 or higher, the effect ends on them. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can use this Epic Action even if they would otherwise be unable to take actions, their actions are being controlled by another creature, or if a spell or effect alters their game statistics.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]], and if the target is a Huge or smaller creature, it has the &reference[Grappled apply=false] condition (escape DC 26). While Grappled, the target has the &reference[Restrained] condition.

Grappled by Bite.name: Grappled by Bite
Grappled by Bite.description: You are &reference[grappled apply=false] (escape DC 26). While grappled in this way, you are also &reference[restrained apply=false].

Tail.name: Tail
Tail.description: Strength Saving Throw: DC 26, one creature within 20 feet of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]. Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and if the target is a Huge or smaller creature, it has the &reference[Prone] condition.

Mindfire.name: Mindfire
Mindfire.description: Wisdom Saving Throw: DC 25, one creature the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within 120 feet. Failure: The target takes [[/damage average]] damage and has the &reference[Burning] condition (2d8 Psychic). Success: Half damage only.

Burning (2d8 Psychic).name: Burning (2d8 Psychic)
Burning (2d8 Psychic).description:
You are &reference[burning apply=false] from being covered in psychic fire.

  • At the end of each of your turns, you take [[/damage average psychic 2d8]] damage.

  • The condition ends if you or another creature within 5 feet of you spends an action to douse the psychic flames or if some other effect removes it.

Spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
Spellcasting.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts one of the spells it knows, requiring no Material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 22, +14 to spell attacks).

Breathe Deep.name: Breathe Deep
Breathe Deep.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s Breath Weapon recharges. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can only use this Epic Action if it's the first Epic Action it has taken this round.

Terrifying Roar.name: Terrifying Roar
Terrifying Roar.description: Wisdom Saving Throw: DC 25, each creature in a 120-foot Emanation originating from the [[lookup @name lowercase]] that can hear it. Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target has the &reference[Frightened] condition (save ends).

Terrifying Roar.name: Terrifying Roar
Terrifying Roar.description: You are &reference[frightened apply=false]. You can repeat your saving throw against this effect at the end of each of your turns, ending the effect on a success.

Breath Weapon.name: Breath Weapon
Breath Weapon.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can only use this Epic Action if it’s the last Epic Action it takes this round. It chooses one of the following effects:

  • Octarine Breath. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] breathes a 120-foot cone of prismatic rays. Each ray is a different color and has a different power and purpose. Choose one ability score, then choose Cold, Fire, Lightning, Necrotic, Psychic, or Radiant damage. Each target must succeed on a DC 25 saving throw using the chosen ability score; it takes [[/damage 30d6 average]] damage of the chosen type on a failed saving throw, or half as much on a successful one.

  • Mutation Breath. Constitution Saving Throw: DC 25, each creature in a 120-foot Cone. Failure: [[/damage average activity=SwA8rsAJ8l7kUJtv]] damage, and the target gains one &reference[drakkenheimContamination] level. Instead of rolling to determine if it gains a mutation, the target automatically gains a mutation. Success: Half damage only.

  • Madness Breath. Intelligence Saving Throw: DC 25, each creature in a 120-foot Cone. Failure: [[/damage average activity=XP1bjOnPtpgalyG6]] damage, and the target has the &reference[Dazed] condition (save ends). Failure by 5 or More: [[/damage average 24d10 psychic]] damage, and the target instead has the &reference[Incapacitated] condition (save ends). Success: Half damage only.

  • Wild Magic Breath. Dexterity Saving Throw: DC 25, each creature in a 120-foot long, 5-foot wide Line. Failure: [[/damage average activity=e6BCIDaJZTBLpmP5]] damage, and the target triggers an Arcane Anomaly centered on itself. Success: Half damage only.

Madness Breath: Dazed.name: Madness Breath: Dazed
Madness Breath: Dazed.description: You are &reference[dazed apply=false]. You can repeat your saving throw against this effect at the end of each of your turns, ending the effect on a success.

Madness Breath: Incapacitated.name: Madness Breath: Incapacitated
Madness Breath: Incapacitated.description: You are &reference[incapacitated apply=false]. You can repeat your saving throw against this effect at the end of each of your turns, ending the effect on a success.

Draconic Rebuke.name: Draconic Rebuke
Draconic Rebuke.description: Trigger: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] becomes &reference[Bloodied]. It can use this Reaction even if it has the &reference[Incapacitated] condition or is otherwise unable to take Reactions. Response: All conditions and spells on the dragon immediately end unless it chooses to be affected by them, and it can move up to its Fly Speed without provoking Opportunity Attacks and ignoring &reference[DifficultTerrain]. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] recharges and immediately uses its [[/item qLv8mfNHpJkIiPjZ]].

utility.condition: When the dragon becomes bloodied.

Dimension Door.name: Dimension Door
Dimension Door.description:
You teleport to a location within range. You arrive at exactly the spot desired. It can be a place you can see, one you can visualize, or one you can describe by stating distance and direction, such as "200 feet straight downward" or "300 feet upward to the northwest at a 45-degree angle."

You can also teleport one willing creature. The creature must be within 5 feet of you when you teleport, and it teleports to a space within 5 feet of your destination space.

If you, the other creature, or both would arrive in a space occupied by a creature or completely filled by one or more objects, you and any creature traveling with you each take 4d6 Force damage, and the teleportation fails.

Telekinesis.name: 心灵遥控
Telekinesis.description:
You gain the ability to move or manipulate creatures or objects by thought. When you cast the spell and as a Magic action on your later turns before the spell ends, you can exert your will on one creature or object that you can see within range, causing the appropriate effect below. You can affect the same target round after round or choose a new one at any time. If you switch targets, the prior target is no longer affected by the spell.

Creature. You can try to move a Huge or smaller creature. The target must succeed on a Strength saving throw, or you move it up to 30 feet in any direction within the spell's range. Until the end of your next turn, the creature has the &Reference[Restrained] condition, and if you lift it into the air, it is suspended there. It falls at the end of your next turn unless you use this option on it again and it fails the save.

Object. You can try to move a Huge or smaller object. If the object isn't being worn or carried, you automatically move it up to 30 feet in any direction within the spell's range.

If the object is worn or carried by a creature, that creature must succeed on a Strength saving throw, or you pull the object away and move it up to 30 feet in any direction within the spell's range.

You can exert fine control on objects with your telekinetic grip, such as manipulating a simple tool, opening a door or a container, stowing or retrieving an item from an open container, or pouring the contents from a vial.

Contact Other Plane.name: Contact Other Plane
Contact Other Plane.description:
You mentally contact a demigod, the spirit of a long-dead sage, or some other knowledgeable entity from another plane. Contacting this otherworldly intelligence can break your mind. When you cast this spell, make a DC 15 Intelligence saving throw. On a successful save, you can ask the entity up to five questions. You must ask your questions before the spell ends. The DM answers each question with one word, such as "yes," "no," "maybe," "never," "irrelevant," or "unclear" (if the entity doesn't know the answer to the question). If a one-word answer would be misleading, the DM might instead offer a short phrase as an answer.

On a failed save, you take 6d6 Psychic damage and have the &Reference[Incapacitated] condition until you finish a Long Rest. A @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplGreaterRes]{Greater Restoration} spell cast on you ends this effect.

Dispel Magic.name: 解除魔法
Dispel Magic.description:
在施法距离内指定一名生物、一个物件或一处魔法效应。所有影响该目标的三环或更低环阶法术即告终止。每个影响目标的四环或更高环阶法术都需要以你的施法属性进行一次属性检定（DC 10 + 目标法术环阶），检定成功时目标法术终止。

升环施法： 你直接终止影响目标的小于等于该施法环阶的法术效应。

Scrying.name: 探知术
Scrying.description:
你能看见和听见一个和你处于同一存在位面上的生物。目标生物必须进行一次感知豁免；该豁免的调整值与你对目标的了解程度有关（见下文），也与你和目标之间的物理联系程度有关。目标不知道它进行此豁免在对抗什么，只是会感觉不自在。

你对目标的了解有… 豁免调整值
二手信息（你曾经听说过目标） +5
直接信息（你曾经见过目标） +0
熟悉（你对目标很了解） −5
你持有目标的… 豁免调整值
肖像或其他图像 −2
衣物或其他物品 −4
身体部位如头发或指甲 −10

如果对方豁免成功，则目标不受该法术影响，并且在 24 小时内你不能尝试探知同一个目标。

如果对方豁免失败，则你在目标身边 10 尺内创造出一个隐形的传感器。通过传感器，你可以身临其境地看见和听见周围的环境。传感器会跟随目标移动，并在法术持续时间内始终保持在目标 10 尺之内。在能够看到传感器的生物眼中，你的传感器是一个拳头大小的光球。

除生物之外，你也可以选择一个你以前见过的地点作为该法术的目标。这种情况下，传感器会出现在目标地点且不会移动。

materials.value: 一个至少价值 1000GP 的法器，例如水晶球、银镜、圣水盆

affects.special: 与你处于同一位面的生物，或某个你曾见过的地点的生物
目标身边 10 尺内

Self Plane Shift.name: Self Plane Shift
Self Plane Shift.description:
You and up to eight willing creatures who link hands in a circle are transported to a different plane of existence. You can specify a target destination in general terms, such as the City of Brass on the Elemental Plane of Fire or the palace of Dispater on the second level of the Nine Hells, and you appear in or near that destination, as determined by the DM.

Alternatively, if you know the sigil sequence of a teleportation circle on another plane of existence, this spell can take you to that circle. If the teleportation circle is too small to hold all the creatures you transported, they appear in the closest unoccupied spaces next to the circle.

materials.value: a forked, metal rod worth 250+ GP and attuned to a plane of existence

Wish.name: 祈愿术
Wish.description:
祈愿术是凡间生物所能施展的最强大法术。你只需要大声说出自己的愿望就能改变现实世界本身。

法术最基础的用法是用来模仿任意一个八环或更低环阶的法术。如果你以此种方式使用该法术，你不需要满足目标法术所需的任何前提条件（包括有价值的材料成分）就可以让该法术生效。

作为另一种方式，你也可以选择让法术创造下列效应之一：

创造物件。你创造出一个价值不超过 25000GP 的物件，令其出现在地面上你能看见的一处未占据空间中。该物件不能是魔法物品，其在任意方向上的长度都不能超过 300 尺。

即刻治疗。你让你自己和至多二十个你可见的生物恢复全部生命值，并且终止它们身上一切在@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplGreaterRes]{高等复原术}中列举过的所有效应。

伤害抗性。你让至多十个你能看见的生物获得你所指定的一种伤害类型的抗性。此抗性是永久存在的。

免疫法术。你让最多十个你能看见的生物免疫于某道法术或某种其他魔法效应，持续 8 小时。

突来学识。你将你的一个专长替换为符合条件的另一个专长。你失去旧专长带来的全部好处，并获得新专长的好处。你无法取代作为你其他专长或特性先决条件的专长。

重新掷骰。你改变一件刚刚发生的事件。重掷前一轮（包括你的上一个回合）到现在期间的任意一次掷骰，并让现实随着你的新掷骰结果改变。例如，祈愿术以撤销队友的失败豁免或敌人的重击。你可以迫使重新进行的掷骰具有优势或劣势 ，并且可以选择是使用重投后的结果还是使用原来的结果。

重塑现实。你可能会许愿一些没有包含在上述效应中的东西。为了做到这样的效果，请尽可能准确地向地下城主描述你的愿望。在这种情况下，地下城主有极高的自由来裁决究竟会发生什么。不过愿望越大，出错的概率就越大。法术可能会直接失败，也可能部分的达成你想要的结果，还有可能因表述愿望时措辞不当而遭到意想不到的结果。例如，许愿让一个坏人死去可能会让你穿越到多年后该人已死的一个时间段，使你相当于离开了游戏一样。此外，许愿获取一件传说中的魔法物品或神器可能会立即将你传送到该物品当前的持有者身边。如果你许的愿望太过庞大，其效应影响到了社群、区域或是世界，你可能会引来强大的敌人。如果你的愿望会影响神，这名神的神仆会立刻干涉，阻止它或是鼓励你以一种特殊的方式许愿。如果你的愿望将会撤销多元宇宙本身，或是威胁到了印记城，或是以某种方式影响到了痛苦女士，你的心灵中就会浮现出一段她的影像：她摇了摇自己的脑袋，然后你的愿望失效了。

除了模仿其他法术外，施展该法术以达成的任何其他目的都会使你的身躯承受极大的负担，令你变得无比虚弱。承受负担后，直到你完成长休之前，你每次施展法术时都将受到一定伤害（伤害数值取决于你施展的法术的环阶，每环阶 1d10 点的暗蚀伤害），此伤害无法被任何方式减免。此外，你的力量属性值将变为 3，持续 2d4 日。这段时间内，你每花一整日休息（不从事轻度活动以外的行为），恢复需要的日数就减少 2 日。最后，承受负担时，你将有 [[/r 1d3cs1]]{33%} 的概率永远也无法再次施放祈愿术。

Wish Stress.name: Wish Stress
Wish Stress.description: Each time you cast a spell until you finish a Long Rest, you take [[/damage 1d10 type=necrotic]] damage per level of that spell. This damage can’t be reduced or prevented in any way. In addition, your Strength score becomes 3 for [[/r 2d4]] days.

Contaminating Presence.name: Contaminating Presence
Contaminating Presence.description: A creature that starts its turn within 120 feet of the [[lookup @name]] is subjected to the following effect. Constitution Saving Throw: DC 20. Failure: The target gains a Contamination level. Failure or Success: [[/damage average]] damage.

Immutable Form.name: Immutable Form
Immutable Form.description: The [[lookup @name]] has Immunity to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

Malignancy.name: Malignancy
Malignancy.description: The [[lookup @name]] can't be teleported or travel to another plane against its will.

Rejuvenation.name: Rejuvenation
Rejuvenation.description: If the [[lookup @name]] is destroyed in the Mortal World, it reappears [[/r 1d10]] days later with all of its Hit Points unless its roots in the Space Between Worlds are also destroyed.

Ultimate Corruption.name: Ultimate Corruption
Ultimate Corruption.description: Necrotic damage dealt by the [[lookup @name]] ignores Resistance and treats Immunity as Resistance instead.

Fling.name: Fling
Fling.description: One Large or smaller object held or creature &reference[Grappled apply=false] by the [[lookup @name]] is thrown up to 60 feet, landing with the &refernce[Prone] condition. If the target strikes a solid surface, it takes [[/damage average]] damage. If the target is thrown at another creature, that creature must succeed on a [[/save]] saving throw or take the same damage and have the Prone condition.

affects.special: A creature grappled by the Amalgamation

Mind-Breaking Whispers.name: Mind-Breaking Whispers
Mind-Breaking Whispers.description: Intelligence Saving Throw: DC 25, one creature within 120 feet of the [[lookup @name]]. Failure: The target becomes insane until it finishes a Long Rest. While insane, the target can't take actions, understand other creatures, read, or speak anything but gibberish. A @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplGreaterRes]{Greater Restoration} or @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplHeal000000]{Heal} spell ends the effect early. Failure or Success: [[/damage average]] damage.

Insanity.name: Insanity
Insanity.description:
You have gone insane. Until you finish a Long Rest, you can't take actions, understand other creatures, read, or speak anything but gibberish.

A @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplGreaterRes]{Greater Restoration} or @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplHeal000000]{Heal} spell ends this effect early.

Forced Mutation.name: Forced Mutation
Forced Mutation.description: Each creature within 120 feet of the [[lookup @name]] with one or more Contamination levels takes [[/damage average]] damage and gains a randomly determined mutation.

Piper at the Gate.name: Piper at the Gate
Piper at the Gate.description: A @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.CuSUJc5NnYVVaU0K]{Pyknic Maunder} appears in an unoccupied space within 30 feet of the [[lookup @name]], acting after the [[lookup @name]] on Initiative count 20 and under the [[lookup @name]]'s direct control. The [[lookup @name]] can have up to ten Pyknic Maunders under its control at a time.

Epic Boss.name: Epic Boss
Epic Boss.description:
This creature is an Epic Boss, a unique foe designed to pose a solo threat to an entire adventuring party. As such, it has additional game rules that sets it apart from normal creatures:

The [[lookup @name]] always takes its turn on Initiative count 20. On its turn, the [[lookup @name]] can use its movement and interaction as normal. However, it does not take an action or Bonus Action on its turn unless forced to do so by a spell or other effect. Instead, the [[lookup @name]] takes one of the following Epic Actions at the end of each player character’s turn:

All this creature's actions are Epic Actions.

  • @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.2Msb23l9F9GpB7hy.Item.cF1kS518WmXs8Nrm]{Bite}

  • @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.2Msb23l9F9GpB7hy.Item.ZhM0kT3pzfJePm8m]{Tentacle}

  • @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.2Msb23l9F9GpB7hy.Item.qEoDtzugJE0aa4QL]{Fling}

  • @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.2Msb23l9F9GpB7hy.Item.oO3QYiQuiPEUPvPr]{Mind-Breaking Whispers}

  • @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.2Msb23l9F9GpB7hy.Item.MTE3NX82dJ0Lrd4U]{Forced Mutation}

  • @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.2Msb23l9F9GpB7hy.Item.IZyfs8Gl605KvI24]{Piper at the Gate}

  • @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.2Msb23l9F9GpB7hy.Item.QTduz9sU8acJdnoq]{Epic Resistance}

Epic Resistance.name: Epic Resistance
Epic Resistance.description: [[lookup @name]] chooses one condition, spell, or other effect currently affecting her and rolls [[/r 1d20]]. On an 11 or higher, the effect ends on her. [[lookup @name]] can use this Epic Action even if she would otherwise be unable to take actions, her actions are being controlled by another creature, or if a spell or effect alters her game statistics.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description:
[[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]]. If the target is a Large or smaller creature &reference[Grappled apply=false] by the [[lookup @name]], the grapple ends and the target is swallowed. While swallowed, the target has the &reference[Blinded] and &reference[Restrained] conditions, has &reference[TotalCover] from effects originating from outside the [[lookup @name]], and takes [[/damage average activity=RkKX3DzZ97Tr79Md]] damage and gains a Contamination level at the start of each of the [[lookup @name]]'s turns.

If the [[lookup @name]] takes 50+ damage in a single turn from a creature inside it, it must succeed on a [[/save activity=nvPCqXss7YBWUbNu]] saving throw at the end of that turn or regurgitate all swallowed creatures, which land in spaces within 10 feet of the [[lookup @name]] and have the &reference[Prone] condition. If the [[lookup @name]] dies, a swallowed creature no longer has the Restrained condition and can escape the corpse using 15 feet of its movement, exiting with the &reference[Prone] condition.

Regurgitate Save.name: Regurgitate Save
Regurgitate Save.condition: When the Amalgamation takes 50+ damage in a single turn from a creature inside it.

Swallowed.name: Swallowed
Swallowed.description:
You have been swallowed by the Amalgamation. While swallowed, you are &reference[blinded apply=false], &reference[restrained apply=fale], and have &reference[totalcover] from effects originating from outside the Amalgamation.

At the start of each of the Amalgamation's turns, you take [[/damage 12d6 necrotic average]] damage and gain a Contamination level.

Tentacle.name: Tentacle
Tentacle.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]], and the target has the &reference[Grappled] condition (escape DC 25). While Grappled, the target has the &reference[Restrained] condition. The [[lookup @name]] has twelve tentacles, each of which can grapple one target.

Grappled by Tentacle.name: Grappled by Tentacle
Grappled by Tentacle.description: You are &reference[grappled apply=false] (escape DC 25). While Grappled, you are also &reference[restrained apply=false].

Blessed Weapons.name: Blessed Weapons
Blessed Weapons.description: When the [[lookup @name lowercase]] hits with any weapon, the weapon unleashes holy fire, causing the target to have the &reference[Burning] condition (4d6 Radiant; included in the attacks below).

Grasping Ghost.name: Grasping Ghost
Grasping Ghost.description: Strength Saving Throw: DC 15, one creature the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within 60 feet. Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target is moved 30 feet in a horizontal direction of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s choice. At the end of this movement, the target has the &reference[Immobilized] condition until the end of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s next turn. Success: Half damage only.

Expel Evil.name: Expel Evil
Expel Evil.description: Wisdom Saving Throw: DC 15, each Celestial, Fey, Fiend, and Undead that can see and hear the [[lookup @name lowercase]]. Failure: The target has the &reference[Frightened] and &reference[Incapacitated] conditions and must move as far from the [[lookup @name lowercase]] as it can on its turns. The effect lasts for 1 minute or until the target takes damage, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] has the &reference[Incapacitated apply=false] condition, or the [[lookup @name lowercase]] dies.

affects.special: Each Celestial, Fey, Fiend, and Undead that can hear the exorcist.

Last Rites.name: Last Rites
Last Rites.description: Wisdom Saving Throw: DC 15, one creature the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within 60 feet that isn't a Celestial or Construct (Fiends and Undead have Disadvantage). Failure: [[/damage average]] damage. If the target is a Fiend or Undead, it instead takes [[/damage 64 radiant]] damage and is turned to ash if the effect reduces it to 0 Hit Points. Success: Half damage.

affects.special: A creature that isn't a Celestial or Constuct.

Negate Spell.name: Negate Spell
Negate Spell.description: Trigger: A creature the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within 60 feet is casting a spell. Response: If the spell is level 3 or lower, the spell fails, but any spell slots or charges aren't wasted.

utility.condition: When a creature the exorcist can see within 60 feet is casting a spell.

Spiritual Healing.name: Spiritual Healing
Spiritual Healing.description: One creature the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see regains 35 (10d6) Hit Points. Once a creature benefits from Spiritual Healing, it can't do so again until it finishes a Short or Long Rest.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes two attacks. It can replace one attack with a use of [[/item hGqujnT0H2Dffaxf]].

Radiant Sword.name: Radiant Sword
Radiant Sword.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]], and the target has the &reference[Burning] condition (4d6 Radiant).

Burning (4d6 Radiant).name: Burning (4d6 Radiant)
Burning (4d6 Radiant).description:
You are &reference[burning apply=false] from being covered in holy fire.

  • At the end of each of your turns, you take [[/damage average radiant 4d6]] damage.

  • The condition ends if you or another creature within 5 feet of you spends an action to douse the fire or if some other effect removes it such as submerging yourself in water.

Blessed Crossbow.name: Blessed Crossbow
Blessed Crossbow.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]], and the target has the &reference[Burning] condition (4d6 Radiant).

Burning (4d6 Radiant).name: Burning (4d6 Radiant)
Burning (4d6 Radiant).description:
You are &reference[burning apply=false] from being covered in holy fire.

  • At the end of each of your turns, you take [[/damage average radiant 4d6]] damage.

  • The condition ends if you or another creature within 5 feet of you spends an action to douse the fire or if some other effect removes it such as submerging yourself in water.

Uncanny Dodge.name: Uncanny Dodge
Uncanny Dodge.description: Trigger: A creature [[lookup @name]] can see deals damage to him with an attack. Response: [[lookup @name]] halves the damage he takes from that attack.

utility.condition: When a creature Blackjack Mel can see deals damage to him with an attack.

Evasion.name: Evasion
Evasion.description: If [[lookup @name]] is subjected to an effect that allows him to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half damage, he instead takes no damage if he succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if he fails, provided he doesn't have the &reference[Incapacitated apply=false] condition.

Cunning Action.name: Cunning Action
Cunning Action.description: [[lookup @name]] takes the Dash, Disengage, or Hide action.

Potion of Invisibility.name: Potion of Invisibility
Potion of Invisibility.description:
Potion, Rare

This potion's container looks empty but feels as though it holds liquid. When you drink the potion, you have the &Reference[Invisible apply=false] condition for 1 hour. The effect ends early if you make an attack roll, deal damage, or cast a spell.

Mass of Tails.name: Mass of Tails
Mass of Tails.description: Ranged attacks against the [[lookup @name]] from further than 60 feet away have Disadvantage.

Verminous Aura.name: Verminous Aura
Verminous Aura.description: The [[lookup @name]] is surrounded by a 60-foot radius of vermin, pouring out of it and spilling over into the area as they claw and gnash. The area is &reference[DifficultTerrain] and a creature that starts its turn in the area takes [[/damage average]] damage.

Flail of Skulls.name: Flail of Skulls
Flail of Skulls.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]], and the target has the &reference[Burning] condition (3d6 Acid).

Burning (3d6 Acid).name: Burning (3d6 Acid)
Burning (3d6 Acid).description:
You are &reference[burning apply=false] from being covered in acid.

  • At the end of each of your turns, you take [[/damage average acid 3d6]] damage.

  • The condition ends if you or another creature within 5 feet of you spends an action to scrape off the acid or if some other effect removes it.

Great Feeding.name: Great Feeding
Great Feeding.description: Constitution Saving Throw: DC 26, each creature within 60 feet of the [[lookup @name]]. Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target has the &reference[Sickened] condition (save ends). Success: Half damage only. Failure or Success: The [[lookup @name]] regains Hit Points equal to the total damage dealt to all targets.

Great Feeding.name: Great Feeding
Great Feeding.description: You are &reference[sickened apply=false]. You can repeat your saving throw against this effect at the end of each of your turns, ending the effect on a success.

Rodent Rifts.name: Rodent Rifts
Rodent Rifts.description: The [[lookup @name]] teleports to an unoccupied space within 120 feet. Each creature within 15 feet of the [[lookup @name]] when it arrives is subjected to the following effect. Strength Saving Throw: DC 26. Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target is pushed 10 feet away from the [[lookup @name]].

Warp Bolt.name: Warp Bolt
Warp Bolt.description: Constitution Saving Throw: DC 22, one creature the [[lookup @name]] can see within 120 feet. Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target suffers a &reference[drakkenheimContamination] level.

Infernal Chittering.name: Infernal Chittering
Infernal Chittering.description: Intelligence Saving Throw: DC 26, one creature the [[lookup @name]] can see within 60 feet that can hear the [[lookup @name]]. Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target has the Weakened condition (save ends).

Infernal Chittering.name: Infernal Chittering
Infernal Chittering.description: You are &reference[weakened apply=false]. You can repeat your saving throw against this effect at the end of each of your turns, ending the effect on a success.

Epic Boss.name: Epic Boss
Epic Boss.description:
This creature is an Epic Boss, a unique foe designed to pose a solo threat to an entire adventuring party. As such, it has additional game rules that sets it apart from normal creatures:

The [[lookup @name]] always takes their turn on Initiative count 20. On their turn, they can use their movement and interaction as normal. However, they do not take an action or Bonus Action on their turn unless forced to do so by a spell or other effect. Instead, the [[lookup @name]] takes one of the following Epic Actions at the end of each player character's turn.

All this creature's actions are Epic Actions.

  • @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.32bLDrk0tZkvAt5w.Item.ev0rR0PuEdPuAR3X]{Flail of Skulls}

  • @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.32bLDrk0tZkvAt5w.Item.DfGFEfN7CjIvbZPo]{Great Feeding}

  • @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.32bLDrk0tZkvAt5w.Item.7uTvzgG64SRM5hW0]{Rodent Rifts}

  • @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.32bLDrk0tZkvAt5w.Item.KSRvfFz8kigWHgzW]{Warp Bolt}

  • @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.32bLDrk0tZkvAt5w.Item.ugChi2RqzXRPzDd4]{Infernal Chittering}

  • @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.32bLDrk0tZkvAt5w.Item.ubEGU64T3qRvGRGn]{Epic Resistance}

Epic Boss.name: Epic Boss
Epic Boss.description:
This creature is an Epic Boss, a unique foe designed to pose a solo threat to an entire adventuring party. As such, it has additional game rules that sets it apart from normal creatures.

The creature always takes their turn on Initiative count 20. On their turn, they can use their movement and interaction as normal. However, they do not take an action or Bonus Action on their turn unless forced to do so by a spell or other effect. Instead, the creature takes one of the Epic Actions they have available.

Epic Resistance.name: Epic Resistance
Epic Resistance.description: The [[lookup @name]] chooses one condition, spell, or other effect currently affecting them and rolls [[/r 1d20]]. On an 11 or higher, the effect ends on them. The [[lookup @name]] can use this Epic Action even if they would otherwise be unable to take actions, their actions are being controlled by another creature, or if a spell or effect alters their game statistics.

Cacophonous Chorus.name: Cacophonous Chorus
Cacophonous Chorus.description: The cacophonous chimera creates a 30-foot Emanation of noise. A creature that starts its turn in the Emanation that can hear it takes [[/damage average]] damage.

Keen Sight and Smell.name: Keen Sight and Smell
Keen Sight and Smell.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has Advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight or smell.

Aerial Maneuver.name: Aerial Maneuver
Aerial Maneuver.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] flies up to its Speed without provoking Opportunity Attacks.

Cacophony.name: Cacophony
Cacophony.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s three heads sing a discordant song. The effect of the song varies based on which of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s head is taking the lead. Each time the [[lookup @name lowercase]] uses this Epic Action, it can't use the same effect it chose last round.

  • Bewildering Chitter (Ratling). Intelligence Saving Throw: DC 17, each creature in a 300-foot Emanation originating from the [[lookup @name lowercase]] that can hear it. Failure: [[/damage average activity=uTTRGhmckAlajFS4]] damage, and the target has the &reference[Bewildered] condition (save ends).

  • Chilling Howl (Garmyr). Wisdom Saving Throw: DC 17, each creature in a 300-foot Emanation originating from the [[lookup @name lowercase]] that can hear it. Failure: [[/damage average activity=MEqHpjHbfAiaq9gT]] damage, and the target has the &reference[Immobilized] condition (save ends).

  • Staggering Screech (Harpy). Charisma Saving Throw: DC 17, each creature in a 300-foot Emanation originating from the [[lookup @name lowercase]] that can hear it. Failure: [[/damage average activity=rGDE6tQPzwkQ6RJ1]] damage, and the target has the &reference[Staggered] condition (save ends).

affects.special: Creatures that can hear the cacophonous chimera.
Creatures that can hear the cacophonous chimera.
Creatures that can hear the cacophonous chimera.

Bewildering Chittering.name: Bewildering Chittering
Bewildering Chittering.description: You are &reference[bewildered apply=false]. You can repeat your saving throw against this effect at the end of each of your turns, ending the effect on a success.

Chilling Howl.name: Chilling Howl
Chilling Howl.description: You are &reference[immobilized apply=false]. You can repeat your saving throw against this effect at the end of each of your turns, ending the effect on a success.

Staggering Screech.name: Staggering Screech
Staggering Screech.description: You are &reference[staggered apply=false]. You can repeat your saving throw against this effect at the end of each of your turns, ending the effect on a success.

Wing Blast.name: Wing Blast
Wing Blast.description: Strength Saving Throw: DC 17, each creature within 15 feet of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]. Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target is pushed 10 feet away from the [[lookup @name lowercase]]. Success: Half damage only.

Crescendo of Chaos.name: Crescendo of Chaos
Crescendo of Chaos.description:
Trigger: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] becomes &reference[Bloodied]. It can take this Reaction even if it has the &reference[Incapacitated apply=false] condition or is otherwise unable to take Reactions. Response: All conditions and spells on the [[lookup @name lowercase]] immediately end unless it chooses to be affected by them, and it can move up to its Speed without provoking Opportunity Attacks and ignoring &reference[DifficultTerrain].

It then unleashes a blast of thunderous power. Creatures within 300 feet of it who can hear it are subjected to the following effect. Wisdom Saving Throw: DC 17. Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target has the &reference[Prone] condition and can't stand until the end of its next turn.

save.condition: When the cacophonous chimera becomes Bloodied.

Epic Boss.name: Epic Boss
Epic Boss.description:
This creature is an Epic Boss, a unique foe designed to pose a solo threat to an entire adventuring party. As such, it has additional game rules that sets it apart from normal creatures:

[[lookup @name]] always takes their turn on Initiative count 20. On their turn, they can use their movement and interaction as normal. However, they does not take an action or Bonus Action on their turn unless forced to do so by a spell or other effect. Instead, [[lookup @name]] takes one of the following Epic Actions at the end of each player character's turn.

All this creature's actions are Epic Actions.

  • @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.3GyiTiyeMxJ8rXM5.Item.JIxMSHrqwtBQwOIo]{Claws & Talons}

  • @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.3GyiTiyeMxJ8rXM5.Item.YQnK52PJiLktKm1I]{Contaminated Bite}

  • @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.3GyiTiyeMxJ8rXM5.Item.HbXwjydKuD75GSJB]{Lamprey Tail}

  • @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.3GyiTiyeMxJ8rXM5.Item.dgFVt6xVKSDAilKo]{Aerial Maneuver}

  • @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.3GyiTiyeMxJ8rXM5.Item.dPfvfCw6VoZkhnFd]{Cacophony}

  • @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.3GyiTiyeMxJ8rXM5.Item.tMjHPhtkIE0KT4eQ]{Wing Blast}

  • @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.3GyiTiyeMxJ8rXM5.Item.X0PPVA4jnYvm5llj]{Epic Resistance}

Epic Resistance.name: Epic Resistance
Epic Resistance.description: [[lookup @name]] chooses one condition, spell, or other effect currently affecting them and rolls [[/r 1d20]]. On an 11 or higher, the effect ends on them. [[lookup @name]] can use this Epic Action even if they would otherwise be unable to take actions, their actions are being controlled by another creature, or if a spell or effect alters their game statistics.

Claws & Talons.name: Claws & Talons
Claws & Talons.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]], and if the target is Large or smaller, it has the &reference[prone] condition.

Contaminated Bite.name: Contaminated Bite
Contaminated Bite.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]]. Constitution Saving Throw: DC 17. Failure: The target gains a Contamination level.

Lamprey Tail.name: Lamprey Tail
Lamprey Tail.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]], and the target has the &reference[bleeding] condition (2d4).

Bleeding (2d4).name: Bleeding (2d4)
Bleeding (2d4).description:
You're losing blood to an open wound.

  • Ongoing Damage: At the end of each of your turns, you lose [[/r 2d4]] Hit Points.

  • Regaining Hit Points: This condition ends if you regain any Hit Points.

  • Medical Treatment: You or another creature within 5 feet of you can spend an action and use a Healer's Kit to staunch the bleeding (no check required), ending the condition.

Pack Tactics.name: Pack Tactics
Pack Tactics.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has Advantage on attack rolls against a creature if at least one of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally doesn't have the &reference[Incapacitated apply=false] condition.

Feast.name: Feast
Feast.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes a [[/item D3gu7jLXSPZicGq7]] attack against a &reference[Bloodied] target.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]].

Spear.name: Spear
Spear.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]] or [[/damage 1d8 + 3 piercing average]] damage if wielded with two hands to make a melee attack.

Contingency.name: Contingency
Contingency.description: Trigger: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] would become &reference[Incapacitated apply=false] from a spell. Response: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplDispelMagi] (level 5 version) targeting itself.

6dUjMBVeEC87WKB6.condition: When the mage would become Incapacitated from a spell.

Misty Step.name: Misty Step
Misty Step.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplMistyStep0]{Misty Step} using Intelligence as their spellcasting ability.

EciEiCH7TENaKoyp.name: Misty Step
EciEiCH7TENaKoyp.description: Briefly surrounded by silvery mist, you teleport up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space you can see.

Dispel Magic.name: 解除魔法
Dispel Magic.description:
在施法距离内指定一名生物、一个物件或一处魔法效应。所有影响该目标的三环或更低环阶法术即告终止。每个影响目标的四环或更高环阶法术都需要以你的施法属性进行一次属性检定（DC 10 + 目标法术环阶），检定成功时目标法术终止。

升环施法： 你直接终止影响目标的小于等于该施法环阶的法术效应。

Academy Rings.name: Academy Rings
Academy Rings.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can cast a spell they know without expending a use of it.

Detect Magic.name: Detect Magic
Detect Magic.description:
For the duration, you sense the presence of magical effects within 30 feet of yourself. If you sense such effects, you can take the Magic action to see a faint aura around any visible creature or object in the area that bears the magic, and if an effect was created by a spell, you learn the spell's school of magic.

The spell is blocked by 1 foot of stone, dirt, or wood; 1 inch of metal; or a thin sheet of lead.

Find Familiar.name: Find Familiar
Find Familiar.description:
You gain the service of a familiar, a spirit that takes an animal form you choose: Bat, Cat, Frog, Hawk, Lizard, Octopus, Owl, Rat, Raven, Spider, Weasel, or another Beast that has a Challenge Rating of 0. Appearing in an unoccupied space within range, the familiar has the statistics of the chosen form (see appendix B), though it is a Celestial, Fey, or Fiend (your choice) instead of a Beast. Your familiar acts independently of you, but it obeys your commands.

Telepathic Connection. While your familiar is within 100 feet of you, you can communicate with it telepathically. Additionally, as a Bonus Action, you can see through the familiar's eyes and hear what it hears until the start of your next turn, gaining the benefits of any special senses it has.

Finally, when you cast a spell with a range of touch, your familiar can deliver the touch. Your familiar must be within 100 feet of you, and it must take a Reaction to deliver the touch when you cast the spell.

Combat. The familiar is an ally to you and your allies. It rolls its own Initiative and acts on its own turn. A familiar can't attack, but it can take other actions as normal.

Disappearance of the Familiar. When the familiar drops to 0 Hit Points, it disappears. It reappears after you cast this spell again. As a Magic action, you can temporarily dismiss the familiar to a pocket dimension. Alternatively, you can dismiss it forever. As a Magic action while it is temporarily dismissed, you can cause it to reappear in an unoccupied space within 30 feet of you. Whenever the familiar drops to 0 Hit Points or disappears into the pocket dimension, it leaves behind in its space anything it was wearing or carrying.

One Familiar Only. You can't have more than one familiar at a time. If you cast this spell while you have a familiar, you instead cause it to adopt a new eligible form.

materials.value: burning incense worth 10+ GP, which the spell consumes

Light.name: Light
Light.description:
You touch one Large or smaller object that isn't being worn or carried by someone else. Until the spell ends, the object sheds Bright Light in a 20-foot radius and Dim Light for an additional 20 feet. The light can be colored as you like.

Covering the object with something opaque blocks the light. The spell ends if you cast it again.

Mage Armor.name: Mage Armor
Mage Armor.description: You touch a willing creature who isn't wearing armor. Until the spell ends, the target's base AC becomes 13 plus its Dexterity modifier. The spell ends early if the target dons armor.

Mage Armor.name: Mage Armor
Mage Armor.description: The target's base AC becomes 13 + its Dexterity modifier.

Mage Hand.name: 法师之手
Mage Hand.description:
A spectral, floating hand appears at a point you choose within range. The hand lasts for the duration. The hand vanishes if it is ever more than 30 feet away from you or if you cast this spell again.

When you cast the spell, you can use the hand to manipulate an object, open an unlocked door or container, stow or retrieve an item from an open container, or pour the contents out of a vial.

As a Magic action on your later turns, you can control the hand thus again. As part of that action, you can move the hand up to 30 feet.

The hand can't attack, activate magic items, or carry more than 10 pounds.

Prestidigitation.name: 魔法伎俩
Prestidigitation.description:
你在施法距离内创造一个魔法效应。从下述效应中选择一项。如果你多次施展该法术，则可以同时维持至多三个不同的非即时效应。

感官效应。 你创造一个立即生效的，无害的感官效应，比如一束火花，一阵风，微弱音乐或古怪的臭味。

玩火。你立即点亮或熄灭一根蜡烛、一根火把或一处小篝火。

清洁或弄脏。 你立即清洁或弄脏一个不大于 1 立方尺的物件。

次级感官。 你使一个不大于 1 立方尺的无生命物质变冷、变暖或对其调味，持续 1 小时。

魔法印记。 你在一个物件或一个表面上创造一块色斑，一个小印记，或者一个徽记，持续 1 小时。

次级造物。 你创造出一个非魔法小饰品或一张虚幻图像，其大小不能超过你的手掌大小，它会持续存在至下个你的回合结束为止。一个小饰品不能造成伤害，也不值钱。

Cone of Cold.name: Cone of Cold
Cone of Cold.description:
You unleash a blast of cold air. Each creature in a 60-foot Cone originating from you makes a Constitution saving throw, taking 8d8 Cold damage on a failed save or half as much damage on a successful one. A creature killed by this spell becomes a frozen statue until it thaws.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. The damage increases by 1d8 for each spell slot level above 5.

materials.value: a small crystal or glass cone

Dimension Door.name: Dimension Door
Dimension Door.description:
You teleport to a location within range. You arrive at exactly the spot desired. It can be a place you can see, one you can visualize, or one you can describe by stating distance and direction, such as "200 feet straight downward" or "300 feet upward to the northwest at a 45-degree angle."

You can also teleport one willing creature. The creature must be within 5 feet of you when you teleport, and it teleports to a space within 5 feet of your destination space.

If you, the other creature, or both would arrive in a space occupied by a creature or completely filled by one or more objects, you and any creature traveling with you each take 4d6 Force damage, and the teleportation fails.

CLZVcVj8orYgTM5s.name: Dispel Magic
CLZVcVj8orYgTM5s.description:
Choose one creature, object, or magical effect within range. Any ongoing spell of level 3 or lower on the target ends. For each ongoing spell of level 4 or higher on the target, make an ability check using your spellcasting ability (DC 10 plus that spell's level). On a successful check, the spell ends.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. You automatically end a spell on the target if the spell's level is equal to or less than the level of the spell slot you use.

Fireball.name: Fireball
Fireball.description:
A bright streak flashes from you to a point you choose within range and then blossoms with a low roar into a fiery explosion. Each creature in a 20-foot-radius Sphere centered on that point makes a Dexterity saving throw, taking 8d6 Fire damage on a failed save or half as much damage on a successful one.

Flammable objects in the area that aren't being worn or carried start burning.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. The damage increases by 1d6 for each spell slot level above 3.

materials.value: a ball of bat guano and sulfur

Greater Invisibility.name: Greater Invisibility
Greater Invisibility.description: A creature you touch has the Invisible condition until the spell ends.

Hold Monster.name: Hold Monster
Hold Monster.description:
Choose a creature that you can see within range. The target must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or have the Paralyzed condition for the duration. At the end of each of its turns, the target repeats the save, ending the spell on itself on a success.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. You can target one additional creature for each spell slot level above 5.

Paralyzed.name: Paralyzed
Paralyzed.description: At the end of each of its turns, the target repeats the [[/save ability=wis]] save, ending the spell on itself on a success.

Sending.name: 短讯术
Sending.description:
你向你所遇到过的或某人遇到过且向你描述的一个生物发送一小段二十五个词以内的信息。该生物将在心中听到你的信息，它可以认出你是发讯人（如果他认识你），还可以用同样的方式立即回复一条讯息。法术会让目标能够理解你短讯的信息。

你的传讯可以跨越任意长的距离，甚至能跨越位面。但如果目标和你不在同一个存在位面，则短讯术有 5% 的概率无法到达。如果法术没有到达，你会知晓。

在收到你的信息后，一个生物能够阻塞你在 8 小时内以这个法术对他发信的能力。如果你在这段时间内试图送出另一条信息，你会得知你的短讯被阻塞，并且法术失败。

Chain Lightning.name: Chain Lightning
Chain Lightning.description:
You launch a lightning bolt toward a target you can see within range. Three bolts then leap from that target to as many as three other targets of your choice, each of which must be within 30 feet of the first target. A target can be a creature or an object and can be targeted by only one of the bolts.

Each target makes a Dexterity saving throw, taking 10d8 Lightning damage on a failed save or half as much damage on a successful one.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. One additional bolt leaps from the first target to another target for each spell slot level above 6.

affects.special: secondary targets must be within 30 feet of initial target

Maze.name: Maze
Maze.description:
You banish a creature that you can see within range into a labyrinthine demiplane. The target remains there for the duration or until it escapes the maze.

The target can take a Study action to try to escape. When it does so, it makes a DC 20 Intelligence (Investigation) check. If it succeeds, it escapes, and the spell ends.

When the spell ends, the target reappears in the space it left or, if that space is occupied, in the nearest unoccupied space.

Banished.name: Banished
Banished.description: The target can take a Study action to try to escape. When it does so, it makes a [[/check ability=int skill=inv dc=20]] check. If it succeeds, it escapes, and the spell ends.

Prismatic Spray.name: Prismatic Spray
Prismatic Spray.description:
Eight rays of light flash from you in a 60-foot Cone. Each creature in the Cone makes a Dexterity saving throw. For each target, roll 1d8 to determine which color ray affects it, consulting the Prismatic Rays table.

@Embed[Compendium.dnd5e.tables24.RollTable.phbPrismaticRays rollable=true caption=false]{Prismatic Rays}

Petrifying (Indigo).name: Petrifying (Indigo)
Petrifying (Indigo).description: The target has the &Reference[Restrained apply=false] condition and makes a [[/save ability=con format=long]] at the end of each of its turns. If it successfully saves three times, the condition ends. If it fails three times, it has the &Reference[Petrified] condition until it is freed by an effect like the @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplGreaterRes]{Greater Restoration} spell. The successes and failures needn’t be consecutive; keep track of both until the target collects three of a kind.

Teleporting (Violet).name: Teleporting (Violet)
Teleporting (Violet).description: The target has the &Reference[Blinded apply=false] condition and makes a [[/save ability=wis format=long]] at the start of your next turn. On a successful save, the condition ends. On a failed save, the condition ends, and the creature teleports to another plane of existence (DM’s choice).

Teleport.name: Teleport
Teleport.description:
This spell instantly transports you and up to eight willing creatures that you can see within range, or a single object that you can see within range, to a destination you select. If you target an object, it must be Large or smaller, and it can't be held or carried by an unwilling creature.

The destination you choose must be known to you, and it must be on the same plane of existence as you. Your familiarity with the destination determines whether you arrive there successfully. The DM rolls [[/gmr 1d100]] and consults the Teleportation Outcome table and the explanations after it.

@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.tables24.RollTable.phbsplTeleportMi]{Teleportation Outcome}
FamiliarityMishapSimilar AreaOff TargetOn Target
Permanent circle———01–00
Linked object———01–00
Very familiar01–0506–1314–2425–00
Seen casually01–3334–4344–5354–00
Viewed once or described01–4344–5354–7374–00
False destination01–5051–00——

Familiarity. Here are the meanings of the terms in the table's Familiarity column:

  • "Permanent circle" means a permanent teleportation circle whose sigil sequence you know.
  • "Linked object" means you possess an object taken from the desired destination within the last six months, such as a book from a wizard's library.
  • "Very familiar" is a place you have visited often, a place you have carefully studied, or a place you can see when you cast the spell.
  • "Seen casually" is a place you have seen more than once but with which you aren't very familiar.
  • "Viewed once or described" is a place you have seen once, possibly using magic, or a place you know through someone else's description, perhaps from a map.
  • "False destination" is a place that doesn't exist. Perhaps you tried to scry an enemy's sanctum but instead viewed an illusion, or you are attempting to teleport to a location that no longer exists.

Mishap. The spell's unpredictable magic results in a difficult journey. Each teleporting creature (or the target object) takes [[/damage 3d10 type=force]] damage, and the DM rerolls on the table to see where you wind up (multiple mishaps can occur, dealing damage each time).

Similar Area. You and your group (or the target object) appear in a different area that's visually or thematically similar to the target area. You appear in the closest similar place. If you are heading for your home laboratory, for example, you might appear in another person's laboratory in the same city.

Off Target. You and your group (or the target object) appear [[/r 2d12]] miles away from the destination in a random direction. Roll [[/r 1d8]] for the direction: 1, east; 2, southeast; 3, south; 4, southwest; 5, west; 6, northwest; 7, north; or 8, northeast.

On Target. You and your group (or the target object) appear where you intended.

affects.special: you and up to eight creatures or one object

Time Stop.name: 时间停止
Time Stop.description:
你短暂地停止其他所有人的时间流。你一次性进行 1d4 + 1 个回合，在此期间，时间对于其他生物而言是静止的，但你可以像正常一样移动和使用动作。

在此期间，若你的一个动作或任何你创造出来的效应影响到除你之外的任何生物，或影响到其他生物着装或携带的物件时，法术将终止。此外，如果你在施法后移动到了距施法时位置 1000 尺以外的地方，则法术也将终止。

affects.special: 除自身外的所有生物

Wall of Force.name: Wall of Force
Wall of Force.description:
An Invisible wall of force springs into existence at a point you choose within range. The wall appears in any orientation you choose, as a horizontal or vertical barrier or at an angle. It can be free floating or resting on a solid surface. You can form it into a hemispherical dome or a globe with a radius of up to 10 feet, or you can shape a flat surface made up of ten 10-foot-by-10-foot panels. Each panel must be contiguous with another panel. In any form, the wall is 1/4 inch thick and lasts for the duration. If the wall cuts through a creature's space when it appears, the creature is pushed to one side of the wall (you choose which side).

Nothing can physically pass through the wall. It is immune to all damage and can't be dispelled by @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplDispelMagi]{Dispel Magic}. A @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplDisintegra]{Disintegrate} spell destroys the wall instantly, however. The wall also extends into the Ethereal Plane and blocks ethereal travel through the wall.

Mage Armor.name: Mage Armor
Mage Armor.description: The target's base AC becomes 13 + its Dexterity modifier.

Amphibious.name: Amphibious
Amphibious.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can breathe air and water.

False Appearance.name: False Appearance
False Appearance.description: While the [[lookup @name lowercase]] remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from an inanimate bronze statue.

Faultless Tracker.name: Faultless Tracker
Faultless Tracker.description: The creatures that caused the [[lookup @name lowercase]] to animate become its quarries. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] knows the direction and distance to its quarries as long the quarries remain within Drakkenheim or until the [[lookup @name lowercase]] is destroyed.

Immutable Form.name: Immutable Form
Immutable Form.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

Magic Resistance.name: Magic Resistance
Magic Resistance.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Rejuvenation.name: Rejuvenation
Rejuvenation.description: If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] is destroyed, it reforms with all of its Hit Points in 1 hour unless a @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplDisintegra] spell is cast on its remains.

Breath Weapons.name: Breath Weapons
Breath Weapons.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] uses one of the following breath weapons.

  • Lightning Breath. Dexterity Saving Throw: DC 15, each creature in a 60-foot long, 5-foot wide Line. Failure: [[/damage average]] damage. Success: Half damage.

  • Repulsion Breath. Strength Saving Throw: DC 15, each creature in a 30-foot Cone. Failure: The target is pushed up to 40 feet away from the [[lookup @name lowercase]].

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes one [[/item .ILOF4lbStT3h3PiJ]] attack and two [[/item .ikLXHNEyYxEc3Av3]] attacks.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]].

Talons.name: Talons
Talons.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]]. Constitution Saving Throw: DC 15. Failure: The target has the Shocked condition until the end of the digipede's next turn.

Shocked.name: Shocked
Shocked.description: You are &reference[shocked apply=false] until the end of the digipede's next turn.

Eye Beam.name: Eye Beam
Eye Beam.description: Dexterity Saving Throw: DC 15, each creature in a 60-foot long, 5-foot wide Line. Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target has the &reference[Slowed] condition. At the end of each of its turns, the target repeats the save, ending the effect on itself on a success. Second Failure: The target has the &reference[Immobilized] condition. Third Failure: The target has the &reference[Paralyzed] condition. Success: Half damage only.

Delerium Bomb.name: Delerium Bomb
Delerium Bomb.description: Dexterity Saving Throw: DC 15, each creature in a 10-foot radius Sphere centered on a point the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within 60 feet. Failure: [[/damage average]] damage. Failure or Success: An Arcane Anomaly occurs in the area.

Covering Fire.name: Covering Fire
Covering Fire.description: Trigger: A creature reduces an ally the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see to 0 Hit Points. Response: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes a ranged attack against that creature.

utility.condition: When a creature reduces an ally the ratling can see to 0 hit points.

Ratling Cunning.name: Ratling Cunning
Ratling Cunning.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] takes the Dash, Disengage, or Hide action.

Pack Tactics.name: Pack Tactics
Pack Tactics.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has Advantage on attack rolls against a creature if at least one of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally doesn't have the &reference[Incapacitated apply=false] condition.

Keen Smell.name: Keen Smell
Keen Smell.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]].

Repeating Crossbow.name: Repeating Crossbow
Repeating Crossbow.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]] (the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s choice each time it attacks).

Academy Rings.name: Academy Rings
Academy Rings.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can cast a spell they know without expending a use of it.

Misty Step.name: Misty Step
Misty Step.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplMistyStep0]{Misty Step} using Intelligence as their spellcasting ability.

Fireball.name: Fireball
Fireball.description:
A bright streak flashes from you to a point you choose within range and then blossoms with a low roar into a fiery explosion. Each creature in a 20-foot-radius Sphere centered on that point makes a Dexterity saving throw, taking 8d6 Fire damage on a failed save or half as much damage on a successful one.

Flammable objects in the area that aren't being worn or carried start burning.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. The damage increases by 1d6 for each spell slot level above 3.

materials.value: a ball of bat guano and sulfur

Slow.name: Slow
Slow.description:
You alter time around up to six creatures of your choice in a 40-foot Cube within range. Each target must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or be affected by this spell for the duration.

An affected target's Speed is halved, it takes a −2 penalty to AC and Dexterity saving throws, and it can't take Reactions. On its turns, it can take either an action or a Bonus Action, not both, and it can make only one attack if it takes the Attack action. If it casts a spell with a Somatic component, there is a [[/r 1d100cs<=25#Slowed spell cast success]]{25 percent} chance the spell fails as a result of the target making the spell's gestures too slowly.

An affected target repeats the save at the end of each of its turns, ending the spell on itself on a success.

Foundry Note

The inline roll above will return 1 if it succeeded or 0 if it failed.

Slowed.name: Slowed
Slowed.description:
An affected target’s Speed is halved, it takes a −2 penalty to AC and Dexterity saving throws, and it can’t take Reactions. On its turns, it can take either an action or a Bonus Action, not both, and it can make only one attack if it takes the Attack action. If it casts a spell with a Somatic component, there is a [[/r 1d100cs>25#Slowed spell cast success]]{25 percent} chance the spell fails as a result of the target making the spell’s gestures too slowly.

An affected target repeats the [[/save ability=wis]] save at the end of each of its turns, ending the spell on itself on a success.

Dispel Magic.name: 解除魔法
Dispel Magic.description:
在施法距离内指定一名生物、一个物件或一处魔法效应。所有影响该目标的三环或更低环阶法术即告终止。每个影响目标的四环或更高环阶法术都需要以你的施法属性进行一次属性检定（DC 10 + 目标法术环阶），检定成功时目标法术终止。

升环施法： 你直接终止影响目标的小于等于该施法环阶的法术效应。

Invisibility.name: Invisibility
Invisibility.description:
A creature you touch has the &Reference[invisible apply=false] condition until the spell ends. The spell ends early immediately after the target makes an attack roll, deals damage, or casts a spell.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. You can target one additional creature for each spell slot level above 2.

Invisible.name: 隐形
Invisible.description: 如果你进行攻击检定、造成伤害或施展法术，则该法术提前终止。

Detect Magic.name: Detect Magic
Detect Magic.description:
For the duration, you sense the presence of magical effects within 30 feet of yourself. If you sense such effects, you can take the Magic action to see a faint aura around any visible creature or object in the area that bears the magic, and if an effect was created by a spell, you learn the spell's school of magic.

The spell is blocked by 1 foot of stone, dirt, or wood; 1 inch of metal; or a thin sheet of lead.

Mage Armor.name: Mage Armor
Mage Armor.description: You touch a willing creature who isn't wearing armor. Until the spell ends, the target's base AC becomes 13 plus its Dexterity modifier. The spell ends early if the target dons armor.

Mage Armor.name: Mage Armor
