Mage Armor.description: The target's base AC becomes 13 + its Dexterity modifier.

Minor Illusion.name: Minor Illusion
Minor Illusion.description:
You create a sound or an image of an object within range that lasts for the duration. See the descriptions below for the effects of each. The illusion ends if you cast this spell again.

If a creature takes a Study action to examine the sound or image, the creature can determine that it is an illusion with a successful [[/check ability=int skill=inv dc=@attributes.spell.dc]] check against your spell save DC. If a creature discerns the illusion for what it is, the illusion becomes faint to the creature.

Sound. If you create a sound, its volume can range from a whisper to a scream. It can be your voice, someone else's voice, a lion's roar, a beating of drums, or any other sound you choose. The sound continues unabated throughout the duration, or you can make discrete sounds at different times before the spell ends.

Image. If you create an image of an object—such as a chair, muddy footprints, or a small chest—it must be no larger than a 5-foot Cube. The image can't create sound, light, smell, or any other sensory effect. Physical interaction with the image reveals it to be an illusion, since things can pass through it.

Prestidigitation.name: 魔法伎俩
Prestidigitation.description:
你在施法距离内创造一个魔法效应。从下述效应中选择一项。如果你多次施展该法术，则可以同时维持至多三个不同的非即时效应。

感官效应。 你创造一个立即生效的，无害的感官效应，比如一束火花，一阵风，微弱音乐或古怪的臭味。

玩火。你立即点亮或熄灭一根蜡烛、一根火把或一处小篝火。

清洁或弄脏。 你立即清洁或弄脏一个不大于 1 立方尺的物件。

次级感官。 你使一个不大于 1 立方尺的无生命物质变冷、变暖或对其调味，持续 1 小时。

魔法印记。 你在一个物件或一个表面上创造一块色斑，一个小印记，或者一个徽记，持续 1 小时。

次级造物。 你创造出一个非魔法小饰品或一张虚幻图像，其大小不能超过你的手掌大小，它会持续存在至下个你的回合结束为止。一个小饰品不能造成伤害，也不值钱。

fMtARIFyhlyJk9u8.name: Misty Step
fMtARIFyhlyJk9u8.description: Briefly surrounded by silvery mist, you teleport up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space you can see.

Mage Armor.name: Mage Armor
Mage Armor.description: The target's base AC becomes 13 + its Dexterity modifier.

Beyond Space and Time.name: Beyond Space and Time
Beyond Space and Time.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] always acts on Initiative count 20. Additionally, it can’t be moved, teleported, or sent to another plane of existence against its will.

Gravitational Pull.name: Gravitational Pull
Gravitational Pull.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] exerts its own force of gravity in a 100-foot Emanation. A creature that starts its turn in the Emanation falls towards the [[lookup @name lowercase]], taking falling damage as appropriate if it collides with the planetoid. A creature can make a [[/save]] saving throw to grab onto a fixed object it can reach, avoiding the fall on a success.

Immutable Form.name: Immutable Form
Immutable Form.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

Magic Resistance.name: Magic Resistance
Magic Resistance.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes four attacks, only one of which can be an [[/item .fKMeL14el7nes3Pk]] attack.

Unfathomable Knowledge.name: Unfathomable Knowledge
Unfathomable Knowledge.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]], and the target has the &reference[Addled] and &reference[Weakened] conditions until the end of its next turn.

Unfathomable Knowledge.name: Unfathomable Knowledge
Unfathomable Knowledge.description: You are &reference[addled apply=false] and &reference[weakened apply=false] until the end of your next turn.

Crashing Comet.name: Crashing Comet
Crashing Comet.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]], and the target has the &reference[Burning] condition (3d8 Fire).

Burning (3d8 Fire).name: Burning (3d8 Fire)
Burning (3d8 Fire).description:
You are &reference[burning apply=false] from being covered in fire.

  • At the end of each of your turns, you take [[/damage average fire 3d8]] damage.

  • The condition ends if you or another creature within 5 feet of you spends an action to douse the fire or if some other effect removes it such as submerging yourself in water.

All-Knowing Magic.name: All-Knowing Magic
All-Knowing Magic.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts any spell of level 5 or lower, using Intelligence as its spellcasting ability (spell save DC 22, +14 to spell attacks).

Aberrant Traits.name: Aberrant Traits
Aberrant Traits.description:
Given the contamination and delerium present within the Space Between Worlds, all creatures who dwell there are the product of contamination and unaffected by the normal dangers of delerium. As an aberrant, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] has the following traits:

  • Fully Contaminated. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] is immune to &reference[drakkenheimContamination] and has Advantage on saving throws against contaminated spells. This creature may cast contaminated spells even though it does not gain Contamination levels.

  • Delerium Healing. As an action, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can touch a delerium shard to regain 10 (3d6) Hit Points. Once the [[lookup @name lowercase]] has used a delerium shard in this way, the shard can't be used in this manner again for 24 hours.

  • Alien Intellect. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] is immune to any effect that would sense its emotions or read its thoughts, as well as any divination spell that it refuses. Wisdom (Insight) checks made to ascertain the [[lookup @name lowercase]]s intentions or sincerity have Disadvantage.

affects.special: a delerium shard

Eldritch Blood.name: Eldritch Blood
Eldritch Blood.description: A creature that deals Piercing or Slashing damage to the [[lookup @name lowercase]] while within 5 feet of it takes [[/damage average]] damage.

damage.condition: When a creature deals piercing or slashing damage to the Lurker on the Threshold while within 5 feet of it.

affects.special: A creature within 5 feet of the Lurker on the Threshold.

Magic Resistance.name: Magic Resistance
Magic Resistance.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Aberrant Traits.name: Aberrant Traits
Aberrant Traits.description:
Given the contamination and delerium present within the Space Between Worlds, all creatures who dwell there are the product of contamination and unaffected by the normal dangers of delerium. As an aberrant, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] has the following traits:

  • Fully Contaminated. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] is immune to &reference[drakkenheimContamination] and has Advantage on saving throws against contaminated spells. This creature may cast contaminated spells even though it does not gain Contamination levels.

  • Delerium Healing. As an action, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can touch a delerium shard to regain 10 (3d6) Hit Points. Once the [[lookup @name lowercase]] has used a delerium shard in this way, the shard can't be used in this manner again for 24 hours.

  • Alien Intellect. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] is immune to any effect that would sense its emotions or read its thoughts, as well as any divination spell that it refuses. Wisdom (Insight) checks made to ascertain the [[lookup @name lowercase]]s intentions or sincerity have Disadvantage.

affects.special: a delerium shard

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes three [[/item .xDmiqzZAfQ8kPaJV]] attacks. It can replace each Tendril attack with a use of [[/item .uJbPITfPGAfA9fvW]].

Tendril.name: Tendril
Tendril.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]], and if the target is a Huge or smaller creature, it has the &reference[Grappled] condition (escape DC 16). While Grappled, the target has the &reference[Restrained] condition. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has ten tendrils, each of which can grapple one creature.

Grappled by Tendril.name: Grappled by Tendril
Grappled by Tendril.description: You are &reference[grappled apply=false] (escape DC 16). While grappled in this way, you are also &reference[restrained apply=false].

Cosmic Rays.name: Cosmic Rays
Cosmic Rays.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] randomly shoots one of the following magical rays at a target it can see within 120 feet (roll 1d4; reroll if the [[lookup @name lowercase]] has already used that ray this turn):

  1. Disintegrating Ray. Dexterity Saving Throw: DC 16. Failure: [[/damage average activity=DZ5XrD2qyZjv3SmH]] damage. If this damage reduces the target to 0 Hit Points, it disintegrates into dust.

  2. Memory Lapse Ray. Intelligence Saving Throw: DC 16. Failure: The target’s memories become distant for 1 minute. While its memories are distant, the target can’t take the Magic action, use class features, or understand language, and has Disadvantage on ability checks. At the end of each of its turns, the target repeats the save, ending the effect on itself on a success.

  3. Contaminating Ray. Constitution Saving Throw: DC 16. Failure: [[/damage average activity=icTaEajBXYRV0Zmi]] damage, and the target gains one Contamination level. Success: Half damage only.

  4. Existential Dread Ray. On the target’s next turn, each time it takes an action other than the Dodge action, moves more than 5 feet, or takes a Bonus Action, it takes [[/damage average activity=S6EUUxSeNTTVK3g2]] damage.

Memory Lapse.name: Memory Lapse
Memory Lapse.description:
Your memories have become distant. For the next minute, you can't take the Magic action, use class features, or understand languages, and have Disadvantage on ability checks.

You can repeat your saving throw against this effect at the end of each of your turns, ending the effect on a success.

Existential Dread.name: Existential Dread
Existential Dread.description: During your next turn, each time you take an action other than the Dodge action, move more than 5 feet, or take a Bonus Action, you take [[/damage average psychic 4d6]] damage.

Medical Treatment.name: Medical Treatment
Medical Treatment.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] touches another creature. The target regains 20 (4d8 + 2) Hit Points, and the [[lookup @name lowercase]] ends one disease or condition affecting the target, choosing from the &reference[Blinded apply=false], &reference[Deafened apply=false], &reference[Paralyzed apply=false], and &reference[Poisoned apply=false] conditions.

Adrenaline Boost.name: Adrenaline Boost
Adrenaline Boost.description: One ally within 5 feet of the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can use its Reaction to move up to its Speed and make an attack.

Aid.name: Aid
Aid.description:
Choose up to three creatures within range. Each target's Hit Point maximum and current Hit Points increase by 5 for the duration.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. Each target's Hit Points increase by 5 for each spell slot level above 2.

Foundry Note

The default Heal activity is configured with multiple Active Effects representing the temporary maximum Hit Points provided by this spell.

Users should apply the appropriate Active Effect for the spell slot level used in the casting of this spell.

Level 2: +5 Max HP.name: Level 2: +5 Max HP
Level 2: +5 Max HP.description: The target's Hit Point maximum is increased for the duration.

Level 3: +10 Max HP.name: Level 3: +10 Max HP
Level 3: +10 Max HP.description: The target's Hit Point maximum is increased for the duration.

Level 4: +15 Max HP.name: Level 4: +15 Max HP
Level 4: +15 Max HP.description: The target's Hit Point maximum is increased for the duration.

Level 5: +20 Max HP.name: Level 5: +20 Max HP
Level 5: +20 Max HP.description: The target's Hit Point maximum is increased for the duration.

Level 6: +25 Max HP.name: Level 6: +25 Max HP
Level 6: +25 Max HP.description: The target's Hit Point maximum is increased for the duration.

Level 7: +30 Max HP.name: Level 7: +30 Max HP
Level 7: +30 Max HP.description: The target's Hit Point maximum is increased for the duration.

Level 8: +35 Max HP.name: Level 8: +35 Max HP
Level 8: +35 Max HP.description: The target's Hit Point maximum is increased for the duration.

Level 9: +40 Max HP.name: Level 9: +40 Max HP
Level 9: +40 Max HP.description: The target's Hit Point maximum is increased for the duration.

Lesser Restoration.name: Lesser Restoration
Lesser Restoration.description: You touch a creature and end one condition on it: &Reference[blinded], &Reference[deafened], &Reference[paralyzed], or &Reference[poisoned].

Protection from Poison.name: Protection from Poison
Protection from Poison.description: You touch a creature and end the &Reference[poisoned] condition on it. For the duration, the target has Advantage on saving throws to avoid or end the Poisoned condition, and it has Resistance to Poison damage.

Poison Protection.name: Poison Protection
Poison Protection.description: For the duration, the target has Advantage on saving throws to avoid or end the Poisoned condition, and it has Resistance to Poison damage.

Purge Contamination.name: Purge Contamination
Purge Contamination.description: You apply alchemical fluids or holy water to a Contaminated Humanoid creature while reciting an exacting magical chant which expels eldritch contaminants from its body. When you finish casting the spell, all &reference[drakkenheimContamination] levels and mutations are removed from the creature. It then gains 1 level of &reference[Exhaustion] for each Contamination level removed with this spell.

materials.value: 100 gp of alchemical fluids or holy water, which the spell consumes

affects.special: A contaminated creature.

Hand Crossbow.name: Hand Crossbow
Hand Crossbow.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended activity=CJjRI7JX8tziGFSo]]. Constitution Saving Throw: DC 12. Failure: [[/damage average activity=D2gzT1cjVTNGuPZS]] damage. Success: Half damage.

Bolts.name: Bolts
Bolts.description:
Storage: @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.equipment24.Item.phbagCaseCrossbo]{Case}

@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.equipment24.Item.phbagAmmunitionV]{Ammunition} is required by a weapon that has the Ammunition property. A weapon's description specifies the type of ammunition used by the weapon. The Ammunition table lists the different types and the amount you get when you buy them. The table also lists the item that is typically used to store each type; storage must be bought separately.

False Appearance.name: False Appearance
False Appearance.description: While the [[lookup @name lowercase]] remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from an ordinary humanoid skull.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]].

Disparaging Remarks.name: Disparaging Remarks
Disparaging Remarks.description: Wisdom Saving Throw: DC 12, one creature the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within 10 feet. Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target has Disadvantage on the next attack roll it makes before the end of its next turn.

Guiding Words.name: Guiding Words
Guiding Words.description: Trigger: A creature the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within 10 feet makes an ability check. Response: The target can roll 1d4 and add the result to that check.

utility.condition: A creature the skull can see within 10 feet makes an ability check.

Detect Magic.name: Detect Magic
Detect Magic.description:
For the duration, you sense the presence of magical effects within 30 feet of yourself. If you sense such effects, you can take the Magic action to see a faint aura around any visible creature or object in the area that bears the magic, and if an effect was created by a spell, you learn the spell's school of magic.

The spell is blocked by 1 foot of stone, dirt, or wood; 1 inch of metal; or a thin sheet of lead.

Mage Hand.name: 法师之手
Mage Hand.description:
A spectral, floating hand appears at a point you choose within range. The hand lasts for the duration. The hand vanishes if it is ever more than 30 feet away from you or if you cast this spell again.

When you cast the spell, you can use the hand to manipulate an object, open an unlocked door or container, stow or retrieve an item from an open container, or pour the contents out of a vial.

As a Magic action on your later turns, you can control the hand thus again. As part of that action, you can move the hand up to 30 feet.

The hand can't attack, activate magic items, or carry more than 10 pounds.

Minor Illusion.name: Minor Illusion
Minor Illusion.description:
You create a sound or an image of an object within range that lasts for the duration. See the descriptions below for the effects of each. The illusion ends if you cast this spell again.

If a creature takes a Study action to examine the sound or image, the creature can determine that it is an illusion with a successful [[/check ability=int skill=inv dc=@attributes.spell.dc]] check against your spell save DC. If a creature discerns the illusion for what it is, the illusion becomes faint to the creature.

Sound. If you create a sound, its volume can range from a whisper to a scream. It can be your voice, someone else's voice, a lion's roar, a beating of drums, or any other sound you choose. The sound continues unabated throughout the duration, or you can make discrete sounds at different times before the spell ends.

Image. If you create an image of an object—such as a chair, muddy footprints, or a small chest—it must be no larger than a 5-foot Cube. The image can't create sound, light, smell, or any other sensory effect. Physical interaction with the image reveals it to be an illusion, since things can pass through it.

Prestidigitation.name: 魔法伎俩
Prestidigitation.description:
你在施法距离内创造一个魔法效应。从下述效应中选择一项。如果你多次施展该法术，则可以同时维持至多三个不同的非即时效应。

感官效应。 你创造一个立即生效的，无害的感官效应，比如一束火花，一阵风，微弱音乐或古怪的臭味。

玩火。你立即点亮或熄灭一根蜡烛、一根火把或一处小篝火。

清洁或弄脏。 你立即清洁或弄脏一个不大于 1 立方尺的物件。

次级感官。 你使一个不大于 1 立方尺的无生命物质变冷、变暖或对其调味，持续 1 小时。

魔法印记。 你在一个物件或一个表面上创造一块色斑，一个小印记，或者一个徽记，持续 1 小时。

次级造物。 你创造出一个非魔法小饰品或一张虚幻图像，其大小不能超过你的手掌大小，它会持续存在至下个你的回合结束为止。一个小饰品不能造成伤害，也不值钱。

Burning Hands.name: Burning Hands
Burning Hands.description:
A thin sheet of flames shoots forth from you. Each creature in a 15-foot Cone makes a Dexterity saving throw, taking 3d6 Fire damage on a failed save or half as much damage on a successful one.

Flammable objects in the Cone that aren't being worn or carried start burning.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. The damage increases by 1d6 for each spell slot level above 1.

Find Familiar.name: Find Familiar
Find Familiar.description:
You gain the service of a familiar, a spirit that takes an animal form you choose: Bat, Cat, Frog, Hawk, Lizard, Octopus, Owl, Rat, Raven, Spider, Weasel, or another Beast that has a Challenge Rating of 0. Appearing in an unoccupied space within range, the familiar has the statistics of the chosen form (see appendix B), though it is a Celestial, Fey, or Fiend (your choice) instead of a Beast. Your familiar acts independently of you, but it obeys your commands.

Telepathic Connection. While your familiar is within 100 feet of you, you can communicate with it telepathically. Additionally, as a Bonus Action, you can see through the familiar's eyes and hear what it hears until the start of your next turn, gaining the benefits of any special senses it has.

Finally, when you cast a spell with a range of touch, your familiar can deliver the touch. Your familiar must be within 100 feet of you, and it must take a Reaction to deliver the touch when you cast the spell.

Combat. The familiar is an ally to you and your allies. It rolls its own Initiative and acts on its own turn. A familiar can't attack, but it can take other actions as normal.

Disappearance of the Familiar. When the familiar drops to 0 Hit Points, it disappears. It reappears after you cast this spell again. As a Magic action, you can temporarily dismiss the familiar to a pocket dimension. Alternatively, you can dismiss it forever. As a Magic action while it is temporarily dismissed, you can cause it to reappear in an unoccupied space within 30 feet of you. Whenever the familiar drops to 0 Hit Points or disappears into the pocket dimension, it leaves behind in its space anything it was wearing or carrying.

One Familiar Only. You can't have more than one familiar at a time. If you cast this spell while you have a familiar, you instead cause it to adopt a new eligible form.

materials.value: burning incense worth 10+ GP, which the spell consumes

Magic Missile.name: Magic Missile
Magic Missile.description:
You create three glowing darts of magical force. Each dart strikes a creature of your choice that you can see within range. A dart deals 1d4 + 1 Force damage to its target. The darts all strike simultaneously, and you can direct them to hit one creature or several.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. The spell creates one more dart for each spell slot level above 1.

[[2 + @item.level]]{Level [[lookup @item.level]] darts}

Hypnotize.name: Hypnotize
Hypnotize.description: Wisdom Saving Throw: DC 16, each creature of the [[lookup @name lowercase]] choice in a 30-foot Emanation originating from the [[lookup @name lowercase]]. Failure: The target has the &reference[Incapacitated] condition (save ends). While Incapacitated, the target has the &reference[Immobilized] condition.

Hypnotized.name: Hypnotized
Hypnotized.description: You are &reference[incapacitated apply=false]. While incapacitated in this way, you are also &reference[immobilized apply=false]. You can repeat your saving throw against this effect at the end of each of your turns, ending the effect on a success.

Mental Possession.name: Mental Possession
Mental Possession.description:
Intelligence Saving Throw: DC 16, one creature the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within 5 feet. Success: The target is immune to this [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s [[lookup @item.name]] for 24 hours. Failure: The target is possessed by the [[lookup @name lowercase]]; the [[lookup @name lowercase]] disappears, and the target has the &reference[Incapacitated] condition and loses control of its body. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] now controls the body, but the target retains awareness. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can't be targeted by any attack, spell, or other effect, except ones that specifically target Undead. The [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s game statistics are the same, except it uses the possessed target's Speed, as well as the target's Strength, Dexterity, and Constitution modifiers.

The possession lasts until the body drops to 0 Hit Points or the [[lookup @name lowercase]] leaves as a Bonus Action. Whenever the target takes damage, it repeats the save, ending the possession on a success. When the possession ends, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] appears in an unoccupied space within 5 feet of the target, and the target is immune to this [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s [[lookup @item.name]] for 24 hours.

Teleport.name: Teleport

Aberrant Traits.name: Aberrant Traits
Aberrant Traits.description:
Given the contamination and delerium present within the Space Between Worlds, all creatures who dwell there are the product of contamination and unaffected by the normal dangers of delerium. As an aberrant, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] has the following traits:

  • Fully Contaminated. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] is immune to &reference[drakkenheimContamination] and has Advantage on saving throws against contaminated spells. This creature may cast contaminated spells even though it does not gain Contamination levels.

  • Delerium Healing. As an action, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can touch a delerium shard to regain 10 (3d6) Hit Points. Once the [[lookup @name lowercase]] has used a delerium shard in this way, the shard can't be used in this manner again for 24 hours.

  • Alien Intellect. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] is immune to any effect that would sense its emotions or read its thoughts, as well as any divination spell that it refuses. Wisdom (Insight) checks made to ascertain the [[lookup @name lowercase]]s intentions or sincerity have Disadvantage.

[[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]], and the beam leaps to another target. For each additional creature the beam hits, its damage increases by 5 (1d10).

Foundry Note

This attack can be scaled with the number of creatures hit by the beam, increasing the amount of damage it does with each use.

Failure or Success: The Sphere's area is filled with magical &reference[Darkness] for 1 minute or until the [[lookup @name lowercase]] uses [[lookup @item.name]] again. A creature that ends its turn in the area takes [[/damage average activity=1Crj7rHAstBHyf1X]] damage.

Force Barrier.name: Force Barrier
Force Barrier.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] creates a shimmering octarine 10-foot-by-10-foot wall of force centered on a point within 150 feet. The wall lasts for 1 minute or until the [[lookup @name lowercase]] has the &reference[Incapacitated apply=false] condition or dies. The wall appears in any orientation it chooses, and can be free floating or resting on a solid surface. If the wall cuts through a creature's space when it appears, the creature is pushed to one side of the wall (the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s choice).

Nothing can physically pass through the wall. It is immune to all damage and can't be dispelled by @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplDispelMagi]{Dispel Magic}. A @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplDisintegra]{Disintegrate} spell destroys the wall instantly, however. The wall also extends into the Ethereal Plane, blocking ethereal travel through the wall.

Epic Boss.description:
This creature is an Epic Boss, a unique foe designed to pose a solo threat to an entire adventuring party. As such, it has additional game rules that sets it apart from normal creatures:

The [[lookup @name lowercase]] always takes their turn on Initiative count 20. On their turn, they can use their movement and interaction as normal. However, they do not take an action or Bonus Action on their turn unless forced to do so by a spell or other effect. Instead, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] takes one of the following Epic Actions at the end of each player character's turn.

Octarine energy ripples through the body of [[lookup @name]] from its tail up to its head. [[lookup @name]]'s Eradication Beam recharges, and it chooses the direction it will face to unleash its Eradication Beam.

[[lookup @name]] can only use this Epic Action if it's the first Epic Action it has taken this round. After using this Epic Action, The World Ender can't use Bite, Bellowing Roar, or Devour until the start of the next round.

Eradication Beam.description:
[[lookup @name]] can only use this Epic Action if it's the last Epic Action it takes this round. Constitution Saving Throw: DC 27, each creature and object in a 1000-foot long, 20-foot wide Line. Failure: [[/damage average]] damage. Success: Half damage. Failure or Success: A creature is disintegrated along with anything it is wearing or carrying if this damage leaves it with 0 Hit Points, and can't be revived except by a @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplWish000000]{Wish} spell.

The Eradication Beam destroys any @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplWallofForc]{Wall of Force}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplForcecage0]{Forcecage}, or @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplPrismaticW]{Prismatic Wall} spell within its area. It also damages unattended magic items in its area, including artifacts.

[[lookup @name]] can't take this Epic Action if it has used its [[/item yVPWrGp1FujBruzk]] Epic Action this round. [[lookup @name]] makes a Bite attack against a Large or smaller creature it has &reference[Grappled apply=false]. If the attack hits, the target takes the Bite's damage, the target is swallowed, and the grapple ends. While swallowed, the creature has the &reference[Blinded] and &reference[Restrained] conditions, it has &reference[TotalCover] against effects originating from outside [[lookup @name]], and it takes [[/damage average]] damage and gains a Contamination level at the start of each of [[lookup @name]]'s turns.

If [[lookup @name]] takes 60 damage or more on a single turn from a creature inside it, [[lookup @name]] must succeed on a [[/save]] saving throw at the end of that turn or regurgitate all swallowed creatures, which land in unoccupied spaces within 10 feet of [[lookup @name]] with the &reference[Prone] condition. If [[lookup @name]] dies, a swallowed creature no longer has the Restrained condition and can escape from the corpse by using 30 feet of movement, exiting with the &reference[Prone] condition.

If the World Ender dies, you are longer have the Restrained condition and can escape from the corpse by using 30 feet of movement, exiting with the Prone condition.

At the start of each of its turns, the target is subjected to the following effect. Constitution Saving Throw: DC 14. Failure: 13 (2d12) Necrotic damage. Success: Half damage. After three successes, the disease ends. Failure or Success: A Lesser Restoration spell ends the disease early.

Infection.name: Infection
Infection.description:
You have been infected with a disease. While diseased, you must make a [[/save con 14]] saving throw at the start of each of your turns, taking [[/damage 2d12 necrotic average]] damage on a failed save or half as much on a success.

After three successes, the disease ends. A @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplLesserRest] spell ends the disease early.

Metastasize.name: Metastasize
Metastasize.description: Constitution Saving Throw: DC 14, one creature within 15 feet that is infected with a disease. Failure: The target has one of the following conditions (the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s choice): &reference[Addled], &reference[Clumsy], or &reference[Enfeebled] (save ends). The condition immediately ends and is replace by a new condition if the [[lookup @name lowercase]] uses Metastasize on the target again. Failure or Success: [[/damage average]] damage.

Metastasized Disease: Addled.name: Metastasized Disease: Addled
Metastasized Disease: Addled.description:
You are &reference[addled apply=false]. You can repeat your saving throw against this effect at the end of each of your turns, ending the effect on a success.

This condition immediately ends and is replace by a new condition if the ratling pathogenist uses Metastasize on you again.

Metastasized Disease: Clumsy.name: Metastasized Disease: Clumsy
Metastasized Disease: Clumsy.description:
You are &reference[clumsy apply=false]. You can repeat your saving throw against this effect at the end of each of your turns, ending the effect on a success.

This condition immediately ends and is replace by a new condition if the ratling pathogenist uses Metastasize on you again.

Metastasized Disease: Enfeebled.name: Metastasized Disease: Enfeebled
Metastasized Disease: Enfeebled.description:
You are &reference[enfeebled apply=false]. You can repeat your saving throw against this effect at the end of each of your turns, ending the effect on a success.

This condition immediately ends and is replace by a new condition if the ratling pathogenist uses Metastasize on you again.

Rampant Sickness.name: Rampant Sickness
Rampant Sickness.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] spreads its Infection from an infected target to another creature adjacent to that target.

Infection.name: Infection
Infection.description:
You have been infected with a disease. While diseased, you must make a [[/save con 14]] saving throw at the start of each of your turns, taking [[/damage 2d12 necrotic average]] damage on a failed save or half as much on a success.

After three successes, the disease ends. A @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplLesserRest] spell ends the disease early.

Keen Smell.name: Keen Smell
Keen Smell.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

Aura of Righteousness.name: Aura of Righteousness
Aura of Righteousness.description: [[lookup @name]] projects a 30-foot Emanation of radiant power. Allies in the Emanation have Advantage on saving throws. A Hostile creature that starts its turn in the Emanation takes [[/damage average]] damage.

Charge.name: Charge
Charge.description: [[lookup @name]] moves up to his Speed toward a Hostile creature he can see. He gains Advantage on the next weapon attack he makes this round.

Call the Sacred Flame.name: Call the Sacred Flame
Call the Sacred Flame.description: Dexterity Saving Throw: DC 17, each creature in a 10-foot-radius, 40-foot-high Cylinder centered on a point within 60 feet of [[lookup @name]]. Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target has the &reference[Blinded] condition (save ends).

Shield.name: Shield
Shield.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]]. The target has the &reference[Dazed] condition until the end of its next turn. Hit or Miss: After being thrown, the shield returns to [[lookup @name]]''s hand.

Holy Avenger Longsword.name: Holy Avenger Longsword
Holy Avenger Longsword.description:
[[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]], and the target suffers one of the following effects of [[lookup @name]]'s choice.

  • Divine Smite. Wisdom Saving Throw: DC 17. Failure: [[/damage average activity=ddUklhaHCittFidY]] damage. Success: Half damage.

  • Searing Smite. Dexterity Saving Throw: DC 17. Failure: [[/damage average activity=MMukidgbIfod1GLJ]] damage, and the target has the &reference[Burning] condition (4d6 Fire). Success: Half damage only.

  • Thunderous Smite. Strength Saving Throw: DC 17. Failure: [[/damage average activity=1UH6OxKHDPK4m0mW]] damage, and the target is pushed up to 10 feet away from [[lookup @name]] and has the &reference[Prone] condition. Success: Half damage only.

Burning (4d6 Fire).name: Burning (4d6 Fire)
Burning (4d6 Fire).description:
You are &reference[burning apply=false] from being covered in fire.

  • At the end of each of your turns, you take [[/damage average fire 4d6]] damage.

  • The condition ends if you or another creature within 5 feet of you spends an action to douse the fire or if some other effect removes it such as submerging yourself in water.

Epic Boss.name: Epic Boss
Epic Boss.description:
This creature is an Epic Boss, a unique foe designed to pose a solo threat to an entire adventuring party. As such, it has additional game rules that sets it apart from normal creatures:

[[lookup @name]] always takes their turn on Initiative count 20. On their turn, they can use their movement and interaction as normal. However, they does not take an action or Bonus Action on their turn unless forced to do so by a spell or other effect. Instead, [[lookup @name]] takes one of the following Epic Actions at the end of each player character's turn.

All this creature's actions are Epic Actions.

  • @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.AYTv1RTdQRXU67jr.Item.KeAlVFqzQvtIh3oq]{Holy Avenger Longsword}

  • @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.AYTv1RTdQRXU67jr.Item.8ol37yYAdqzVejBS]{Shield}

  • @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.AYTv1RTdQRXU67jr.Item.abFDV7BK1dDQNymO]{Charge}

  • @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.AYTv1RTdQRXU67jr.Item.TtXgtMVSqZNhHqel]{Call the Sacred Flame}

  • @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.AYTv1RTdQRXU67jr.Item.jyw0zrq2XaAilbAi]{Epic Resistance}

Epic Resistance.name: Epic Resistance
Epic Resistance.description: [[lookup @name]] chooses one condition, spell, or other effect currently affecting them and rolls [[/r 1d20]]. On an 11 or higher, the effect ends on them. [[lookup @name]] can use this Epic Action even if they would otherwise be unable to take actions, their actions are being controlled by another creature, or if a spell or effect alters their game statistics.

aOR0rFT9G6cwlXJk.name: Shield
aOR0rFT9G6cwlXJk.description: You gain the Armor Class benefit of a Shield only if you have training with it.

Sanctified by Falling Fire.name: Sanctified by Falling Fire
Sanctified by Falling Fire.description: When [[lookup @name]] dies, his soul is pulled into the delerium crystal embedded in his chest.

Light.name: Light
Light.description:
You touch one Large or smaller object that isn't being worn or carried by someone else. Until the spell ends, the object sheds Bright Light in a 20-foot radius and Dim Light for an additional 20 feet. The light can be colored as you like.

Covering the object with something opaque blocks the light. The spell ends if you cast it again.

Mage Armor.name: Mage Armor
Mage Armor.description: You touch a willing creature who isn't wearing armor. Until the spell ends, the target's base AC becomes 13 plus its Dexterity modifier. The spell ends early if the target dons armor.

Mage Armor.name: Mage Armor
Mage Armor.description: The target's base AC becomes 13 + its Dexterity modifier.

Thaumaturgy.name: Thaumaturgy
Thaumaturgy.description:
You manifest a minor wonder within range. You create one of the effects below within range. If you cast this spell multiple times, you can have up to three of its 1-minute effects active at a time.

Altered Eyes. You alter the appearance of your eyes for 1 minute.

Booming Voice. Your voice booms up to three times as loud as normal for 1 minute. For the duration, you have Advantage on [[/check ability=cha skill=itm]] checks.

Fire Play. You cause flames to flicker, brighten, dim, or change color for 1 minute.

Invisible Hand. You instantaneously cause an unlocked door or window to fly open or slam shut.

Phantom Sound. You create an instantaneous sound that originates from a point of your choice within range, such as a rumble of thunder, the cry of a raven, or ominous whispers.

Tremors. You cause harmless tremors in the ground for 1 minute.

Bless.name: Bless
Bless.description:
You bless up to three creatures within range. Whenever a target makes an attack roll or a saving throw before the spell ends, the target adds 1d4 to the attack roll or save.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. You can target one additional creature for each spell slot level above 1.

Blessed.name: Blessed
Blessed.description: Whenever a target makes an attack roll or a saving throw before the spell ends, the target adds 1d4 to the attack roll or save.

Dispel Magic.name: 解除魔法
Dispel Magic.description:
在施法距离内指定一名生物、一个物件或一处魔法效应。所有影响该目标的三环或更低环阶法术即告终止。每个影响目标的四环或更高环阶法术都需要以你的施法属性进行一次属性检定（DC 10 + 目标法术环阶），检定成功时目标法术终止。

升环施法： 你直接终止影响目标的小于等于该施法环阶的法术效应。

Fireball.name: Fireball
Fireball.description:
A bright streak flashes from you to a point you choose within range and then blossoms with a low roar into a fiery explosion. Each creature in a 20-foot-radius Sphere centered on that point makes a Dexterity saving throw, taking 8d6 Fire damage on a failed save or half as much damage on a successful one.

Flammable objects in the area that aren't being worn or carried start burning.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. The damage increases by 1d6 for each spell slot level above 3.

materials.value: a ball of bat guano and sulfur

Aid.name: Aid
Aid.description:
Choose up to three creatures within range. Each target's Hit Point maximum and current Hit Points increase by 5 for the duration.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. Each target's Hit Points increase by 5 for each spell slot level above 2.

Foundry Note

The default Heal activity is configured with multiple Active Effects representing the temporary maximum Hit Points provided by this spell.

Users should apply the appropriate Active Effect for the spell slot level used in the casting of this spell.

Level 5: +20 Max HP.name: Level 5: +20 Max HP
Level 5: +20 Max HP.description: The target's Hit Point maximum is increased for the duration.

Spirit Guardians.name: Spirit Guardians
Spirit Guardians.description:
Protective spirits flit around you in a 15-foot Emanation for the duration. If you are good or neutral, their spectral form appears angelic or fey (your choice). If you are evil, they appear fiendish.

When you cast this spell, you can designate creatures to be unaffected by it. Any other creature's Speed is halved in the Emanation, and whenever the Emanation enters a creature's space and whenever a creature enters the Emanation or ends its turn there, the creature must make a Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the creature takes 3d8 Radiant damage (if you are good or neutral) or 3d8 Necrotic damage (if you are evil). On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage. A creature makes this save only once per turn.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. The damage increases by 1d8 for each spell slot level above 3.

Half Speed.name: Half Speed
Half Speed.description: The creature's speed is halved while within the Emanation.

Quarterstaff.name: Quarterstaff
Quarterstaff.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]], or [[/damage twoHanded average]] if wielded in two hands.

Mage Armor.name: Mage Armor
Mage Armor.description: The target's base AC becomes 13 + its Dexterity modifier.

Regeneration.name: Regeneration
Regeneration.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] regains 10 Hit Points at the start of each of its turns. If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] takes Fire damage, this trait doesn’t function at the start of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s next turn. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] dies only if it starts its turn with 0 Hit Points and doesn’t regenerate.

Forest Sense.name: Forest Sense
Forest Sense.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can pinpoint the location of creatures and moving objects within 120 feet of it as long as both it and the anything it is detecting is in a natural forested area.

Shroud of Leaves.name: Shroud of Leaves
Shroud of Leaves.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] is covered head to toe in a shroud of thick leaves. While it has this shroud it is immune to all damage except Fire damage. If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] takes any Fire damage, the leaves all burn away revealing the gnarled oak wood body of the troll and it loses this trait.

Foundry Note

For the purposes of Damage Application and reminders, this feature has an Active Effect you can apply to the [[lookup @name]] in order to grant them their damage immunity. Delete the Active Effect when using Leaf Burst as needed.

Shroud of Leaves.name: Shroud of Leaves
Shroud of Leaves.description: The troll is covered head to toe in a shroud of thick leaves. While it has this shroud it is immune to all damage except Fire damage. If the troll takes any Fire damage, the leaves all burn away revealing the gnarled oak wood body of the troll and it loses this trait.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes two [[/item GqUhw9MBjW7x11mY]] attacks and one [[/item UD3jnyHBIEfWIPvA]] attack.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]], and if the target is a creature, the target has the &reference[Bleeding] condition (2d8) as thick splinters pierce and remain in the creature’s flesh.

Bleeding (2d8).name: Bleeding (2d8)
Bleeding (2d8).description:
You're losing blood to an open wound.

  • Ongoing Damage: At the end of each of your turns, you lose [[/r 2d8]] Hit Points.

  • Regaining Hit Points: This condition ends if you regain any Hit Points.

  • Medical Treatment: You or another creature within 5 feet of you can spend an action and use a Healer's Kit to staunch the bleeding (no check required), ending the condition.

Abundant Growth.name: Abundant Growth
Abundant Growth.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] regains its @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.Ao56dfPQdmJJVDzy.Item.HNHfcDltVMmqybaL]{Shroud of Leaves} trait.

Leaf Burst.name: Leaf Burst
Leaf Burst.description: As long as the [[lookup @name lowercase]] has its @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.Ao56dfPQdmJJVDzy.Item.HNHfcDltVMmqybaL]{Shroud of Leaves}, it can shed its Shroud of Leaves in a burst, losing the trait in the process. Dexterity Saving Throw: DC 16, each creature within 15 feet of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]. Failure: [[/damage average]] damage and has the &reference[Blinded] condition until the end of their next turn.

Leaf Burst.name: Leaf Burst
Leaf Burst.description: You are &reference[blinded apply=false] until the end of your next turn.

Aggressive.name: Aggressive
Aggressive.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] moves up to its Speed toward a Hostile creature it can see.

Pack Tactics.name: Pack Tactics
Pack Tactics.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has Advantage on attack rolls against a creature if at least one of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally doesn't have the &reference[Incapacitated apply=false] condition.

Pluck.name: Pluck
Pluck.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] doesn't need to spend extra movement to drag a Medium or smaller creature &reference[Grappled apply=false] by it.

Chorus.name: Chorus
Chorus.description: Trigger: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] is within the area of another [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s song. Response: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] joins in on the song, choosing a creature within 30 feet. The target has Disadvantage on its next saving throw against the song.

utility.condition: The harpy is within the area of another harpy's song.

Hazewind Harpy Chorus.name: Hazewind Harpy Chorus
Hazewind Harpy Chorus.description: You have Disadvantage on your next saving throw against the hazewind harpy's song.

Aerial Maneuver.name: Aerial Maneuver
Aerial Maneuver.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] takes the Dash or Disengage action.

Shield.name: Shield
Shield.description: You gain the Armor Class benefit of a Shield only if you have training with it.

Grasping Talons.name: Grasping Talons
Grasping Talons.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]], and if the target is Medium or smaller, it has the &reference[Grappled] condition (escape DC 15). Until the grapple ends, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can’t use its Grasping Talons on another target.

Spiritual Maul.name: Spiritual Maul
Spiritual Maul.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]]. On hit, the target is pushed 10 feet away from the [[lookup @name lowercase]].

Unholy Light.name: Unholy Light
Unholy Light.description: Dexterity Saving Throw: DC 16, each creature in a 10-foot radius, 40-foot high Cylinder centered on a point the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within 120 feet. Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target has the &reference[Staggered] condition until the end of its next turn. Success: Half damage only.

Unholy Light.name: Unholy Light
Unholy Light.description: You are &reference[staggered apply=false] until the end of your next turn.

Blood Rebuke.name: Blood Rebuke
Blood Rebuke.description: Trigger: A creature the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within 60 feet of it deals damage to it. Response: Constitution Saving Throw: DC 17. Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target has the &reference[Bleeding] condition (4d4). Success: Half damage only.

save.condition: When a creature within 60 feet of the dark confessor deals damage to it.

Bleeding (4d4).name: Bleeding (4d4)
Bleeding (4d4).description:
You're losing blood to an open wound.

  • Ongoing Damage: At the end of each of your turns, you lose [[/r 4d4]] Hit Points.

  • Regaining Hit Points: This condition ends if you regain any Hit Points.

  • Medical Treatment: You or another creature within 5 feet of you can spend an action and use a Healer's Kit to staunch the bleeding (no check required), ending the condition.

Spider Climb.name: Spider Climb
Spider Climb.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

Vampire Weaknesses.name: Vampire Weaknesses
Vampire Weaknesses.description:
As a vampire, this creature has the following weaknesses:

  • Forbiddance. The vampire can't enter a residence without an invitation from one of the occupants.

  • Harmed by Running Water. The vampire takes [[/damage activity=TXfKdpwrbcIMoY3l]] damage when it ends its turn in running water.

  • Stake to the Heart. If a Piercing weapon made of wood is driven into the vampire's heart while the vampire is Incapacitated in its resting place, the vampire is Paralyzed until the stake is removed.

  • Sunlight Hypersensitivity. The vampire takes [[/damage activity=agngcqt5cICRvCaw]] damage when it starts its turn in sunlight. While in sunlight, it has Disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks.

Running Water.name: Running Water
Running Water.condition: If the vampire ends their turn in running water.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes three attacks. It can replace one attack with a use of [[/item AFbbADuVKsH7G1rA]], [[/item OAiS0gbaZEYKbCMv]], or Spellcasting.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: Constitution Saving Throw: DC 16, one creature within 5 feet that is willing or has the &reference[Grappled apply=false], &reference[Incapacitated apply=false], or &reference[Restrained apply=false] condition. Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the [[lookup @name lowercase]] regains Hit Points equal to the Necrotic damage dealt.

affects.special: A creature that is willing or has the Grappled, Incapacitated, or Restrained condition.

Claws.name: Claws
Claws.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]], and if the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it has the &reference[Grappled] condition (escape DC 15).

Guidance.name: 神导术
Guidance.description: You touch a willing creature and choose a skill. Until the spell ends, the creature adds 1d4 to any ability check using the chosen skill.

Thaumaturgy.name: Thaumaturgy
Thaumaturgy.description:
You manifest a minor wonder within range. You create one of the effects below within range. If you cast this spell multiple times, you can have up to three of its 1-minute effects active at a time.

Altered Eyes. You alter the appearance of your eyes for 1 minute.

Booming Voice. Your voice booms up to three times as loud as normal for 1 minute. For the duration, you have Advantage on [[/check ability=cha skill=itm]] checks.

Fire Play. You cause flames to flicker, brighten, dim, or change color for 1 minute.

Invisible Hand. You instantaneously cause an unlocked door or window to fly open or slam shut.

Phantom Sound. You create an instantaneous sound that originates from a point of your choice within range, such as a rumble of thunder, the cry of a raven, or ominous whispers.

Tremors. You cause harmless tremors in the ground for 1 minute.

Bane.name: Bane
Bane.description:
Up to three creatures of your choice that you can see within range must each make a Charisma saving throw. Whenever a target that fails this save makes an attack roll or a saving throw before the spell ends, the target must subtract 1d4 from the attack roll or save.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. You can target one additional creature for each spell slot level above 1.

Bane.name: Bane
Bane.description: Whenever a target makes an attack roll or a saving throw before the spell ends, the target must subtract 1d4 from the attack roll or save.

Darkness.name: Darkness
Darkness.description:
For the duration, magical &Reference[darkness] spreads from a point within range and fills a 15-foot-radius Sphere. Darkvision can't see through it, and nonmagical light can't illuminate it.

Alternatively, you cast the spell on an object that isn't being worn or carried, causing the Darkness to fill a 15-foot Emanation originating from that object. Covering that object with something opaque, such as a bowl or helm, blocks the Darkness.

If any of this spell's area overlaps with an area of Bright Light or Dim Light created by a spell of level 2 or lower, that other spell is dispelled.

materials.value: bat fur and a piece of coal

Disguise Self.name: Disguise Self
Disguise Self.description:
You make yourself—including your clothing, armor, weapons, and other belongings on your person—look different until the spell ends. You can seem 1 foot shorter or taller and can appear heavier or lighter. You must adopt a form that has the same basic arrangement of limbs as you have. Otherwise, the extent of the illusion is up to you.

The changes wrought by this spell fail to hold up to physical inspection. For example, if you use this spell to add a hat to your outfit, objects pass through the hat, and anyone who touches it would feel nothing.

To discern that you are disguised, a creature must take the Study action to inspect your appearance and succeed on an [[/check ability=int skill=inv dc=@attributes.spell.dc]] check against your spell save DC.

Disguised.name: Disguised
Disguised.description: To discern that you are disguised, a creature must take the Study action to inspect your appearance and succeed on an [[/check ability=int skill=inv]] check against your spell save DC.

Dispel Magic.name: 解除魔法
Dispel Magic.description:
在施法距离内指定一名生物、一个物件或一处魔法效应。所有影响该目标的三环或更低环阶法术即告终止。每个影响目标的四环或更高环阶法术都需要以你的施法属性进行一次属性检定（DC 10 + 目标法术环阶），检定成功时目标法术终止。

升环施法： 你直接终止影响目标的小于等于该施法环阶的法术效应。

Spirit Guardians.name: Spirit Guardians
Spirit Guardians.description:
Protective spirits flit around you in a 15-foot Emanation for the duration. If you are good or neutral, their spectral form appears angelic or fey (your choice). If you are evil, they appear fiendish.

When you cast this spell, you can designate creatures to be unaffected by it. Any other creature's Speed is halved in the Emanation, and whenever the Emanation enters a creature's space and whenever a creature enters the Emanation or ends its turn there, the creature must make a Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the creature takes 3d8 Radiant damage (if you are good or neutral) or 3d8 Necrotic damage (if you are evil). On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage. A creature makes this save only once per turn.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. The damage increases by 1d8 for each spell slot level above 3.

Half Speed.name: Half Speed
Half Speed.description: The creature's speed is halved while within the Emanation.

Regeneration.name: Regeneration
Regeneration.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] regains 10 Hit Points at the start of its turn if it has at least 1 Hit Point and isn't in sunlight or running water. If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] takes Radiant damage or damage from holy water, this trait doesn't function at the start of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s next turn.

Siege Monster.name: Siege Monster
Siege Monster.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] deals double damage to objects and structures.

Wrecking Ball.name: Wrecking Ball
Wrecking Ball.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]]. Strength Saving Throw: DC 20. Failure: The target has the &reference[Dazed] condition (save ends) and the &reference[Prone] condition.

Wrecking Ball Daze.name: Wrecking Ball Daze
Wrecking Ball Daze.description: You are &reference[dazed apply=false]. You can repeat your saving throw against this effect at the end of each of your turns, ending the effect on a success.

Destructive Rampage.name: Destructive Rampage
Destructive Rampage.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] moves up to its Speed in a straight line, moving through the space of any Medium or smaller creature on its path. The first time its enters each creature's space during this move, it can make a Drill or Wrecking Ball attack against that creature.

affects.special: Creatures whose space it enters for the first time during it's rampage.

Overdrive Engine.name: Overdrive Engine
Overdrive Engine.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] Destructive Rampage recharges, and it gains Immunity to all damage and conditions until the end of its next turn. For the duration, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] automatically succeeds on all saving throws and Strength, Dexterity, and Constitution-based ability checks and has Advantage on attack rolls. It can't be forced to move or affected by spells of level 8 or lower unless it chooses to be. Features and effects that ignore Resistances and Immunities, such as a Vorpal Weapon, don't function against the [[lookup @name lowercase]] unless those effects are caused by a level 9 spell or an artifact.

At the end of its next turn, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] dies and explodes. Dexterity Saving Throw: DC 20, each creature in a 20-foot Emanation originating from the [[lookup @name lowercase]] when it dies. Failure: [[/damage average]] damage. Success: Half damage.

Overdrive Engine.name: Overdrive Engine
Overdrive Engine.description:
The reautomata’s Destructive Rampage recharges, and it gains Immunity to all damage and conditions until the end of its next turn. For the duration, the reautomata automatically succeeds on all saving throws and Strength, Dexterity, and Constitution-based ability checks and has Advantage on attack rolls.

It can’t be forced to move or affected by spells of level 8 or lower unless it chooses to be. Features and effects that ignore Resistances and Immunities, such as a Vorpal Weapon, don’t function against the reautomata unless those effects are caused by a level 9 spell or an artifact.

At the end of its next turn, the reautomata dies and explodes. Each creature within a 20-foot Emanation originating from the reautomata whenit dies must make a [[/save 20 dex]] saving throw or take [[/damage 8d4 acid & 8d8 necrotic average]] damage on a failed save or half as much on a success.

Ascendant Transformation.name: Ascendant Transformation
Ascendant Transformation.description: When [[lookup @name]] drops to 0 Hit Points, his body explodes in a shower of gore and he reappears in an unoccupied space within 10 feet as @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.IdQoSYp5mPlkTb93]{Ascendant Vladimir von Drakken}. His Initiative doesn't change.

Bloodthirsty.name: Bloodthirsty
Bloodthirsty.description: [[lookup @name]] has Advantage on attack rolls against a target with the &reference[Bloodied] or &reference[Bleeding apply=false] condition.

Spider Climb.name: Spider Climb
Spider Climb.description: [[lookup @name]] can climb difficult surfaces, including along ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

Dominate.name: Dominate
Dominate.description: Wisdom Saving Throw: DC 20, one creature [[lookup @name]] can see within 120 feet. Failure: The target has the &reference[Charmed] condition until the end of its next turn. While Charmed, the target obeys [[lookup @name]] commands and can't take Reactions. Failure by 5 or More: The Charmed condition lasts 24 hours or until [[lookup @name]] is reduced to 0 Hit Points. Each time the target takes damage, it repeats the save, ending the effect on itself on a success. Success: The target has Disadvantage on its next attack roll against [[lookup @name]].

Dominated.name: Dominated
Dominated.description: You are &reference[charmed apply=false] until the end of your next turn. While charmed in this way, you obey Vladimir von Drakken's commands and can't take Reactions.

Extended Domination.name: Extended Domination
Extended Domination.description: You are &reference[charmed apply=false] for the next 24 hours. While charmed in this way, you obey Vladimir von Drakken's commands and can't take Reactions. Each time you take damage, you can repeat your saving throw against this effect, ending it on a success.

Wing Blast.name: Wing Blast
Wing Blast.description: Strength Saving Throw: DC 20, each creature in a 15-foot Emanation originating from [[lookup @name]]. Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target is pushed 10 feet away from [[lookup @name]] and has the &reference[Prone] condition. Failure or Success: Before or after using this Epic Action, [[lookup @name]] can move up to half his Fly Speed without provoking Opportunity Attacks.

Shape-Shift.name: Shape-Shift
Shape-Shift.description:
[[lookup @name]] shape-shifts into a Tiny @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.actors24.Actor.mmBat00000000000]{Bat} (Speed 5 ft., Fly Speed 30 ft.) or a Medium cloud of mist (Speed 5 ft., Fly Speed 20 ft. [hover]), or he returns to his vampire form. Anything he is wearing transforms with him.

While in bat or mist form, [[lookup @name]] can't speak. His game statistics, other than his size and Speed, are unchanged, but he can't use Epic Actions other than Shape-Shift and Epic Resistance. While in mist form, Vladimir von Drakken can't speak or manipulate objects, and loses his Aura of Dread. He is weightless and can enter an enemy's space and stop there. If air can pass through a space, the mist can do so, but it can't pass through liquid. He has Resistance to all damage.

Spell-Reflecting Strike.name: Spell-Reflecting Strike
Spell-Reflecting Strike.description: Trigger: [[lookup @name]] makes a successful saving throw against a spell, or a spell attack misses him. Response: [[lookup @name]] can choose another creature (including the spellcaster) he can see within 120 feet of him. The spell targets the chosen creature instead of [[lookup @name]]. If the spell forces a saving throw, the chosen creature makes its own save. If the spell was an attack, the attack roll is rerolled against the chosen creature.

utility.condition: When Vladimir von Drakken makes a succesful saving throw against a spell, or a spell attack misses him.

Aura of Dread.name: Aura of Dread
Aura of Dread.description: A creature that starts its turn within 30 feet of [[lookup @name]] takes [[/damage average]] damage.

Regeneration.name: Regeneration
Regeneration.description: [[lookup @name]] regains 30 Hit Points at the start of his turn if he has at least 1 Hit Point remaining.

heal.condition: If Vladimir von Drakken has at least 1 hit point.

Epic Boss.name: Epic Boss
Epic Boss.description:
This creature is an Epic Boss, a unique foe designed to pose a solo threat to an entire adventuring party. As such, it has additional game rules that sets it apart from normal creatures:

[[lookup @name]] always takes their turn on Initiative count 20. On their turn, they can use their movement and interaction as normal. However, they does not take an action or Bonus Action on their turn unless forced to do so by a spell or other effect. Instead, [[lookup @name]] takes one of the following Epic Actions at the end of each player character's turn.

All this creature's actions are Epic Actions.

  • @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.Cu1QeAtFRf90XGFr.Item.ZouowPTuKiB8fUJJ]{Bloodmourne}

  • @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.Cu1QeAtFRf90XGFr.Item.QFW9SCUMoPql58Mz]{Claws}

  • @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.Cu1QeAtFRf90XGFr.Item.LJYg8j8GqZeb2iuE]{Bite}

  • @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.Cu1QeAtFRf90XGFr.Item.7rGy9ngNLfwzOfbw]{Dominate}

  • @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.Cu1QeAtFRf90XGFr.Item.CWdyvsyLaUAkPaKZ]{Wing Blast}

  • @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.Cu1QeAtFRf90XGFr.Item.SE2uaxCrWUcu7Gfa]{Shadow Step}

  • @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.Cu1QeAtFRf90XGFr.Item.7l6cj1k437W6fzuj]{Shape-Shift}

  • @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.Cu1QeAtFRf90XGFr.Item.Vc1IL6PyfD74GoLE]{Epic Resistance}

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: Constitution Saving Throw: DC 20, one creature within 5 feet that is willing or has the &reference[Grappled apply=false], &reference[Incapacitated apply=false], or &reference[Restrained apply=false] condition. Failure: [[/damage average]] damage and the target has the &reference[weakened] condition (DC 20 Constitution save ends). [[lookup @name]] regains Hit Points equal to the Necrotic damage dealt. A Humanoid killed by this damage rises on its next turn as a @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.actors24.Actor.mmVampireSpawn00]{Vampire Spawn} under [[lookup @name]]'s control.

Claws.name: Claws
Claws.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]], and if the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it has the &reference[grappled] condition (escape DC 20).

Epic Resistance.name: Epic Resistance
Epic Resistance.description: [[lookup @name]] chooses one condition, spell, or other effect currently affecting them and rolls [[/r 1d20]]. On an 11 or higher, the effect ends on them. [[lookup @name]] can use this Epic Action even if they would otherwise be unable to take actions, their actions are being controlled by another creature, or if a spell or effect alters their game statistics.

Shadow Step.name: Shadow Step
Shadow Step.description: [[lookup @name]] teleports to an unoccupied space he can see within 60 feet that is in Dim Light or Darkness. He has Advantage on the next melee attack he makes before the end of this round.

Bloodmourne.name: Bloodmourne
Bloodmourne.description:
[[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]], and the target has the &reference[bleeding] condition (4d4). In addition, [[lookup @name]] can apply one of the following martial maneuvers to the target:

  • Advance. [[lookup @name]] pushes the target 15 feet, then moves up to 15 feet to an unoccupied space within 5 feet of the target without provoking Opportunity Attacks.

  • Hamstring. The target has the &reference[Immobilized] condition until the end of its next turn.

  • Overpower. The target has the &reference[Staggered] condition until the end of its next turn.

Bleeding (4d4).name: Bleeding (4d4)
Bleeding (4d4).description:
You're losing blood to an open wound.

  • Ongoing Damage: At the end of each of your turns, you lose [[/r 4d4]] Hit Points.

  • Regaining Hit Points: This condition ends if you regain any Hit Points.

  • Medical Treatment: You or another creature within 5 feet of you can spend an action and use a Healer's Kit to staunch the bleeding (no check required), ending the condition.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes one [[/item .fDD9Xu0Tkt5gO9t8]] or [[/item .gFWzCRyeezm0MPrd]] attack against each creature within its reach. Alternatively, it makes two Eye Beam attacks.

Grasp.name: Grasp
Grasp.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]], and if the target is Medium or smaller, it has the &reference[Grappled] condition (escape DC 13). The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has countless hands and can grapple any number of creatures.

Babble.name: Babble
Babble.description: Wisdom Saving Throw: DC 10, each creature in a 30-foot Emanation originating from the [[lookup @name lowercase]] that can hear it. Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target has the &reference[Dazed] condition until the start of its next turn.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: Melee Attack Roll: +6, reach 5 ft., one creature &reference[Grappled apply=false] by the [[lookup @name lowercase]]. [[/damage extended]]. A &reference[Dazed apply=false] target that is Grappled by the [[lookup @name lowercase]] is &reference[Helpless apply=false] against this attack.

Magical Chaos.name: Magical Chaos
Magical Chaos.description: When the [[lookup @name lowercase]] or a creature within 30 feet of it is targeted by a spell, roll a 1d6. On a 4–5, an Arcane Anomaly triggers on the caster. On a 6, the spell fails and an Arcane Anomaly triggers on the caster.

Check for Arcane Anomaly.name: Check for Arcane Anomaly
Check for Arcane Anomaly.condition: When the void pirate herald or a creature within 30 feet of it is targeted by a spell.

Void Blast.name: Void Blast
Void Blast.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]], and the target is knocked 10 feet away from the [[lookup @name lowercase]].

Summon Elemental.name: Summon Elemental
Summon Elemental.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] magically summons an @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.qIZue3KpXIICDfaV], @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.wOzaGFPwrhIiko6U], @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.kcddqmgbTmYqPBL2], or @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.ifYqW78hHqg7G3dh]. The elemental appears in an unoccupied space within 60 feet of the [[lookup @name lowercase]], whom it obeys. It takes its turn immediately after the [[lookup @name lowercase]]. It lasts for 1 hour, until it or the [[lookup @name lowercase]] dies, or the [[lookup @name lowercase]] dismisses it as a Bonus Action.

From Another World.name: From Another World
From Another World.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] doesn’t have the standard Aberrant Traits other creatures in the Space Between Worlds have.

Mage Armor.name: Mage Armor
Mage Armor.description: You touch a willing creature who isn't wearing armor. Until the spell ends, the target's base AC becomes 13 plus its Dexterity modifier. The spell ends early if the target dons armor.

Mage Armor.name: Mage Armor
Mage Armor.description: The target's base AC becomes 13 + its Dexterity modifier.

Mage Hand.name: 法师之手
Mage Hand.description:
A spectral, floating hand appears at a point you choose within range. The hand lasts for the duration. The hand vanishes if it is ever more than 30 feet away from you or if you cast this spell again.

When you cast the spell, you can use the hand to manipulate an object, open an unlocked door or container, stow or retrieve an item from an open container, or pour the contents out of a vial.

As a Magic action on your later turns, you can control the hand thus again. As part of that action, you can move the hand up to 30 feet.

The hand can't attack, activate magic items, or carry more than 10 pounds.

Prestidigitation.name: 魔法伎俩
Prestidigitation.description:
你在施法距离内创造一个魔法效应。从下述效应中选择一项。如果你多次施展该法术，则可以同时维持至多三个不同的非即时效应。

感官效应。 你创造一个立即生效的，无害的感官效应，比如一束火花，一阵风，微弱音乐或古怪的臭味。

玩火。你立即点亮或熄灭一根蜡烛、一根火把或一处小篝火。

清洁或弄脏。 你立即清洁或弄脏一个不大于 1 立方尺的物件。

次级感官。 你使一个不大于 1 立方尺的无生命物质变冷、变暖或对其调味，持续 1 小时。

魔法印记。 你在一个物件或一个表面上创造一块色斑，一个小印记，或者一个徽记，持续 1 小时。

次级造物。 你创造出一个非魔法小饰品或一张虚幻图像，其大小不能超过你的手掌大小，它会持续存在至下个你的回合结束为止。一个小饰品不能造成伤害，也不值钱。

Chromatic Orb.name: Chromatic Orb
Chromatic Orb.description:
You hurl an orb of energy at a target within range. Choose Acid, Cold, Fire, Lightning, Poison, or Thunder for the type of orb you create, and then make a ranged spell attack against the target. On a hit, the target takes 3d8 damage of the chosen type.

If you roll the same number on two or more of the d8s, the orb leaps to a different target of your choice within 30 feet of the target. Make an attack roll against the new target, and make a new damage roll. The orb can't leap again unless you cast the spell with a level 2+ spell slot. [[@item.level]]{Number of leaps}

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. The damage increases by 1d8 for each spell slot level above 1. The orb can leap a maximum number of times equal to the level of the slot expended, and a creature can be targeted only once by each casting of this spell.

Faerie Fire.name: Faerie Fire
Faerie Fire.description:
Objects in a 20-foot Cube within range are outlined in blue, green, or violet light (your choice). Each creature in the Cube is also outlined if it fails a Dexterity saving throw. For the duration, objects and affected creatures shed &Reference[dimlight] in a 10-foot radius and can't benefit from the Invisible condition.

Attack rolls against an affected creature or object have Advantage if the attacker can see it.

Outlined.name: Outlined
Outlined.description:
For the duration, objects and affected creatures shed &Reference[dimlight] in a 10-foot radius and can’t benefit from the Invisible condition.

Attack rolls against an affected creature or object have Advantage if the attacker can see it.

Heat Metal.name: Heat Metal
Heat Metal.description:
Choose a manufactured metal object, such as a metal weapon or a suit of Heavy or Medium metal armor, that you can see within range. You cause the object to glow red-hot. Any creature in physical contact with the object takes 2d8 Fire damage when you cast the spell. Until the spell ends, you can take a Bonus Action on each of your later turns to deal this damage again if the object is within range.

If a creature is holding or wearing the object and takes the damage from it, the creature must succeed on a Constitution saving throw or drop the object if it can. If it doesn't drop the object, it has Disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks until the start of your next turn.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. The damage increases by 1d8 for each spell slot level above 2.

materials.value: a piece of iron and a flame

Heated Metal.name: Heated Metal
Heated Metal.description: If a creature is holding or wearing the object and takes the damage from it, The creature must succeed on a [[/save ability=con format=long]] or drop the object if it can. If it doesn’t drop the object, it has Disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks until the start of your next turn.

Arcane Eye.name: Arcane Eye
Arcane Eye.description:
You create an Invisible, invulnerable eye within range that hovers for the duration. You mentally receive visual information from the eye, which can see in every direction. It also has Darkvision with a range of 30 feet.

As a Bonus Action, you can move the eye up to 30 feet in any direction. A solid barrier blocks the eye's movement, but the eye can pass through an opening as small as 1 inch in diameter.

Black Tentacles.name: Black Tentacles
Black Tentacles.description:
Squirming, ebony tentacles fill a 20-foot square on ground that you can see within range. For the duration, these tentacles turn the ground in that area into &Reference[DifficultTerrain].

Each creature in that area makes a Strength saving throw. On a failed save, it takes 3d6 Bludgeoning damage, and it has the &Reference[Restrained apply=false] condition until the spell ends. A creature also makes that save if it enters the area or ends it turn there. A creature makes that save only once per turn.

A Restrained creature can take an action to make a [[/check ability=str skill=ath dc=@attributes.spell.dc]] check against your spell save DC, ending the condition on itself on a success.

Restrained.name: Restrained
Restrained.description: A &Reference[Restrained apply=false] creature can take an action to make a [[/check ability=str skill=ath dc=@attributes.spell.dc]] check against your spell save DC, ending the condition on itself on a success.

Fly.name: Fly
Fly.description:
You touch a willing creature. For the duration, the target gains a Fly Speed of 60 feet and can hover. When the spell ends, the target falls if it is still aloft unless it can stop the fall.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. You can target one additional creature for each spell slot level above 3.

Mage Armor.name: Mage Armor
Mage Armor.description: The target's base AC becomes 13 + its Dexterity modifier.

Quick Ascent.name: Quick Ascent
Quick Ascent.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] moves up to 30 feet in a straight line in any direction, provided it ends its turn adjacent to a solid surface.

Longbow.name: Longbow
Longbow.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]], and the target has the &reference[slowed] condition until the end of [[lookup @name]]'s next turn.

Slowing Shot.name: Slowing Shot
Slowing Shot.description: You are &reference[slowed apply=false] until the end of the hooded lantern scout's next turn.

Quarry.name: Quarry
Quarry.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplHuntersMar]{Hunter's Mark}, using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability.

Hunter's Mark.name: Hunter's Mark
Hunter's Mark.description:
You magically mark one creature you can see within range as your quarry. Until the spell ends, you deal an extra 1d6 Force damage to the target whenever you hit it with an attack roll. You also have Advantage on any [[/check ability=wis skill=prc]] or [[/check ability=wis skill=sur]] check you make to find it.

If the target drops to 0 Hit Points before this spell ends, you can take a Bonus Action to move the mark to a new creature you can see within range.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. Your Concentration can last longer with a spell slot of level 3–4 (up to 8 hours) or 5+ (up to 24 hours).

Arrows.name: Arrows
Arrows.description:
Storage: @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.equipment24.Item.phbagQuiver00000]{Quiver}

@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.equipment24.Item.phbagAmmunitionV]{Ammunition} is required by a weapon that has the Ammunition property. A weapon's description specifies the type of ammunition used by the weapon. The Ammunition table lists the different types and the amount you get when you buy them. The table also lists the item that is typically used to store each type; storage must be bought separately.

Cure Wounds.name: Cure Wounds
Cure Wounds.description:
A creature you touch regains a number of Hit Points equal to 2d8 plus your spellcasting ability modifier.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. The healing increases by 2d8 for each spell slot level above 1.

Fog Cloud.name: Fog Cloud
Fog Cloud.description:
You create a 20-foot-radius Sphere of fog centered on a point within range. The Sphere is &Reference[heavilyobscured]. It lasts for the duration or until a strong wind (such as one created by @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplGustofWind]{Gust of Wind}) disperses it.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. The fog's radius increases by 20 feet for each spell slot level above 1.

Pass without Trace.name: Pass without Trace
Pass without Trace.description: You radiate a concealing aura in a 30-foot Emanation for the duration. While in the aura, you and each creature you choose have a +10 bonus to [[/check ability=dex skill=ste]] checks and leave no tracks.

Concealed.name: Concealed
Concealed.description: While in the aura, you and each creature you choose have a +10 bonus to [[/check ability=dex skill=ste]] checks and leave no tracks.

Holy Aura.name: Holy Aura
Holy Aura.description:
[[lookup @name]] projects a 60-foot Emanation of holy power. At the start of each of her turns, she can choose the aura's effect, which applies to creatures of her choice in the Emanation:

  • Divine Grace. Creatures in the Emanation that target [[lookup @name]] with an attack or a harmful spell must first make a [[/save activity=WXusjD7wGst0PBCp]] saving throw. On a failure, the creature must choose a new target or lose the attack or spell. This effect doesn't protect [[lookup @name]] from area effects, such as the explosion of a Fireball. If [[lookup @name]] makes an attack, casts a spell that affects an enemy, or deals damage to another creature, this trait ends until the start of her next turn.

  • Pacifying Presence. A creature that starts its turn in the Emanation has the &reference[Weakened] condition until the start of its next turn.

  • Wrathful Flame. A creature that starts its turn in the Emanation takes [[/damage average]] damage.

Foundry Note

The "Change Aura Effect" activity has three active effects you can apply to [[lookup @name]] in order to keep track of the current effect of her Holy Aura.

Holy Aura: Pacifying Presence.name: Holy Aura: Pacifying Presence
Holy Aura: Pacifying Presence.description: You are &reference[weakened apply=false] until the start of your next turn.

Holy Aura: Divine Grace.name: Holy Aura: Divine Grace
Holy Aura: Divine Grace.description:
Lucretia Mathias projects a 60-foot Emanation of holy power. Creatures in the Emanation that target Lucretia Mathias with an attack or a harmful spell must first make a [[/save 20 wis]] saving throw. On a failure, the creature must choose a new target or lose the attack or spell.
