You create a twisting pattern of colors in a 30-foot Cube within range. The pattern appears for a moment and vanishes. Each creature in the area who can see the pattern must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or have the &Reference[charmed apply=false] condition for the duration. While Charmed, the creature has the &Reference[incapacitated apply=false] condition and a Speed of 0.

The spell ends for an affected creature if it takes any damage or if someone else uses an action to shake the creature out of its stupor.

Hypnotized.name: Hypnotized
Hypnotized.description:
While &Reference[charmed apply=false], the creature has the &Reference[incapacitated apply=false] condition and a Speed of 0.

The spell ends for an affected creature if it takes any damage or if someone else uses an action to shake the creature out of its stupor.

Vampiric Touch.name: Vampiric Touch
Vampiric Touch.description:
The touch of your shadow-wreathed hand can siphon life force from others to heal your wounds. Make a melee spell attack against one creature within reach. On a hit, the target takes 3d6 Necrotic damage, and you regain Hit Points equal to half the amount of Necrotic damage dealt.

Until the spell ends, you can make the attack again on each of your turns as a Magic action, targeting the same creature or a different one.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. The damage increases by 1d6 for each spell slot level above 3.

Regeneration.name: Regeneration
Regeneration.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] regains 10 Hit Points at the start of its turn if it has at least 1 Hit Point and isn't in sunlight or running water. If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] takes Radiant damage or damage from holy water, this trait doesn't function at the start of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s next turn.

Mage Armor.name: Mage Armor
Mage Armor.description: The target's base AC becomes 13 + its Dexterity modifier.

Flash of Light.name: Flash of Light
Flash of Light.description: Trigger: A creature the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see makes an attack roll. Response: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] imposes Disadvantage on the attack roll.

utility.condition: When a creature the sanctified soul can see makes an attack roll.

Quarterstaff.name: Quarterstaff
Quarterstaff.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]], or [[/damage twoHanded average]] if wielded in two hands.

Sanctified by Falling Fire.name: Sanctified by Falling Fire
Sanctified by Falling Fire.description: When the [[lookup @name lowercase]] dies, its soul is pulled into the delerium crystal embedded in its chest.

Faerie Fire.name: Faerie Fire
Faerie Fire.description:
Objects in a 20-foot Cube within range are outlined in blue, green, or violet light (your choice). Each creature in the Cube is also outlined if it fails a Dexterity saving throw. For the duration, objects and affected creatures shed &Reference[dimlight] in a 10-foot radius and can't benefit from the Invisible condition.

Attack rolls against an affected creature or object have Advantage if the attacker can see it.

Outlined.name: Outlined
Outlined.description:
For the duration, objects and affected creatures shed &Reference[dimlight] in a 10-foot radius and can’t benefit from the Invisible condition.

Attack rolls against an affected creature or object have Advantage if the attacker can see it.

Flame Strike.name: Flame Strike
Flame Strike.description:
A vertical column of brilliant fire roars down from above. Each creature in a 10-foot-radius, 40-foot-high Cylinder centered on a point within range makes a Dexterity saving throw, taking 5d6 Fire damage and 5d6 Radiant damage on a failed save or half as much damage on a successful one.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. The Fire damage and the Radiant damage increase by 1d6 for each spell slot level above 5.

Wall of Fire.name: 火墙术
Wall of Fire.description:
You create a wall of fire on a solid surface within range. You can make the wall up to 60 feet long, 20 feet high, and 1 foot thick, or a ringed wall up to 20 feet in diameter, 20 feet high, and 1 foot thick. The wall is opaque and lasts for the duration.

When the wall appears, each creature in its area makes a Dexterity saving throw, taking 5d8 Fire damage on a failed save or half as much damage on a successful one.

One side of the wall, selected by you when you cast this spell, deals 5d8 Fire damage to each creature that ends its turn within 10 feet of that side or inside the wall. A creature takes the same damage when it enters the wall for the first time on a turn or ends its turn there. The other side of the wall deals no damage.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. The damage increases by 1d8 for each spell slot level above 4.

Light.name: Light
Light.description:
You touch one Large or smaller object that isn't being worn or carried by someone else. Until the spell ends, the object sheds Bright Light in a 20-foot radius and Dim Light for an additional 20 feet. The light can be colored as you like.

Covering the object with something opaque blocks the light. The spell ends if you cast it again.

Thaumaturgy.name: Thaumaturgy
Thaumaturgy.description:
You manifest a minor wonder within range. You create one of the effects below within range. If you cast this spell multiple times, you can have up to three of its 1-minute effects active at a time.

Altered Eyes. You alter the appearance of your eyes for 1 minute.

Booming Voice. Your voice booms up to three times as loud as normal for 1 minute. For the duration, you have Advantage on [[/check ability=cha skill=itm]] checks.

Fire Play. You cause flames to flicker, brighten, dim, or change color for 1 minute.

Invisible Hand. You instantaneously cause an unlocked door or window to fly open or slam shut.

Phantom Sound. You create an instantaneous sound that originates from a point of your choice within range, such as a rumble of thunder, the cry of a raven, or ominous whispers.

Tremors. You cause harmless tremors in the ground for 1 minute.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]].

Reborn Transformation.name: Reborn Transformation
Reborn Transformation.description: When he finishes a Long Rest, [[lookup @name]] reverts to his @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.Cu1QeAtFRf90XGFr]{Reborn Vladimir von Drakken} form.

Soul Rending.name: Soul Rending
Soul Rending.description: Constitution Saving Throw: DC 23, each creature in a 60-foot Cone. Failure: [[/damage average]] damage. Failure by 5 or More: Double damage. Success: Half damage.

Blood Rage.name: Blood Rage
Blood Rage.description: Trigger: [[lookup @name]] becomes &reference[Bloodied]. He can use this Reaction even if he has the &reference[Incapacitated apply=false] condition or is otherwise unable to take Reactions. Response: All conditions and spells on [[lookup @name]] end unless he chooses to be affected by them, and he can move up to his Fly Speed without provoking Opportunity Attacks and ignoring Difficult Terrain. [[lookup @name]] recharges and immediately uses [[/item MV9WWQ1GRO9r71AS]].

utility.condition: Vladimir von Drakken becomes Bloodied.

Aura of Dread.name: Aura of Dread
Aura of Dread.description: A creature that starts its turn within 30 feet of [[lookup @name]] takes [[/damage average]] damage.

Regeneration.name: Regeneration
Regeneration.description: [[lookup @name]] regains 30 Hit Points at the start of his turn if he has at least 1 Hit Point remaining.

heal.condition: If Vladimir von Drakken has at least 1 hit point.

Rejuvenation.name: Rejuvenation
Rejuvenation.description: If [[lookup @name]] is reduced to 0 Hit Points or dies, he drops to 1 Hit Point instead unless he is killed by a creature with the blood of House von Drakken within them.

Spider Climb.name: Spider Climb
Spider Climb.description: [[lookup @name]] can climb difficult surfaces, including along ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

Epic Boss.name: Epic Boss
Epic Boss.description:
This creature is an Epic Boss, a unique foe designed to pose a solo threat to an entire adventuring party. As such, it has additional game rules that sets it apart from normal creatures:

[[lookup @name]] always takes their turn on Initiative count 20. On their turn, they can use their movement and interaction as normal. However, they does not take an action or Bonus Action on their turn unless forced to do so by a spell or other effect. Instead, [[lookup @name]] takes one of the following Epic Actions at the end of each player character's turn.

All this creature's actions are Epic Actions.

  • @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.IdQoSYp5mPlkTb93.Item.NetoeRBaq7D4XHYn]{Bloodmourne}

  • @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.IdQoSYp5mPlkTb93.Item.sDkvYHzEM1jRmPLz]{Claws}

  • @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.IdQoSYp5mPlkTb93.Item.nkFCP8cGN3DnM7Mb]{Bite}

  • @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.IdQoSYp5mPlkTb93.Item.MV9WWQ1GRO9r71AS]{Soul Rending}

  • @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.IdQoSYp5mPlkTb93.Item.GKDqkJiujP5sCjKz]{Terrifying Glare}

  • @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.IdQoSYp5mPlkTb93.Item.4sgLpSvEzvOFWfAX]{Wing Blast}

  • @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.IdQoSYp5mPlkTb93.Item.8wYwnZW8BFUC0ITe]{Aerial Maneuver}

  • @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.IdQoSYp5mPlkTb93.Item.0Gc6YQoZ1be5ibsj]{Epic Resistance}

Epic Resistance.name: Epic Resistance
Epic Resistance.description: [[lookup @name]] chooses one condition, spell, or other effect currently affecting them and rolls [[/r 1d20]]. On an 11 or higher, the effect ends on them. [[lookup @name]] can use this Epic Action even if they would otherwise be unable to take actions, their actions are being controlled by another creature, or if a spell or effect alters their game statistics.

Aerial Maneuver.name: Aerial Maneuver
Aerial Maneuver.description: [[lookup @name]] flies up to his Speed without provoking Opportunity Attacks.

Terrifying Glare.name: Terrifying Glare
Terrifying Glare.description: Wisdom Saving Throw: DC 23, one creature [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within 120 feet. Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target has the &reference[Frightened] condition until the end of its next turn. Failure by 5 or More: While Frightened, the target has the &reference[Paralyzed] condition.

Terrifying Glare.name: Terrifying Glare
Terrifying Glare.description: You are &reference[frightened apply=false] until the end of your next turn.

Paralyzing Glare.name: Paralyzing Glare
Paralyzing Glare.description: You are &reference[frightened apply=false] and &reference[paralyzed apply=false] until the end of your next turn.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: Constitution Saving Throw: DC 23, one creature within 5 feet that is willing or has the &reference[Grappled apply=false], &reference[Incapacitated apply=false], or &reference[Restrained apply=false] condition. Failure: [[/damage average]] damage and the target has the &reference[weakened] condition. [[lookup @name]] regains Hit Points equal to the Necrotic damage dealt. A Humanoid killed by this damage rises on its next turn as a @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.actors24.Actor.mmVampireSpawn00]{Vampire Spawn} under [[lookup @name]]'s control.

Weakening Bite.name: Weakening Bite
Weakening Bite.description: You are &reference[weakened apply=false]. You can repeat your saving throw against this effect at the end of each of your turns, ending the effect on a success.

Claws.name: Claws
Claws.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]], and if the target is a Large or smaller creature, it has the &reference[grappled] condition (escape DC 23).

Wing Blast.name: Wing Blast
Wing Blast.description: Strength Saving Throw: DC 23, each creature in a 15-foot Emanation originating from [[lookup @name]]. Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target is pushed 10 feet away from [[lookup @name]] and has the &reference[Prone] condition. Failure or Success: Before or after using this Epic Action, [[lookup @name]] can move up to half his Fly Speed without provoking Opportunity Attacks.

Bloodmourne.name: Bloodmourne
Bloodmourne.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]], and the target has the &reference[bleeding] condition (4d4).

Bleeding (4d4).name: Bleeding (4d4)
Bleeding (4d4).description:
You're losing blood to an open wound.

  • Ongoing Damage: At the end of each of your turns, you lose [[/r 4d4]] Hit Points.

  • Regaining Hit Points: This condition ends if you regain any Hit Points.

  • Medical Treatment: You or another creature within 5 feet of you can spend an action and use a Healer's Kit to staunch the bleeding (no check required), ending the condition.

Regeneration.name: Regeneration
Regeneration.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] regains 10 Hit Points at the start of its turn as long as it is within the Deep Haze. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] dies only if it starts its turn with 0 Hit Points and doesn't regenerate.

Misty Camouflage.name: Misty Camouflage
Misty Camouflage.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has Advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks to hide in any area obscured by mist or fog, including the Deep Haze of Drakkenheim.

Hurl Delerium Chunk.name: Hurl Delerium Chunk
Hurl Delerium Chunk.description:
[[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]] and the target has the &reference[Prone] condition.

Hit or Miss: The delerium chunk explodes creating the following effect. Constitution Saving Throw: DC 20, the targeted creature and each creature within 10 feet of it. Failure: [[/damage average activity=Yc5wwd0HcJdBlG9a]] damage and gain one level of Contamination. Success: Half damage only. Failure or Success: An Arcane Anomaly occurs in the space where the delerium chunk exploded.

Healing Word.name: Healing Word
Healing Word.description: The missionary casts @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplHealingWor]{Healing Word} using their spellcasting ability.

Unshakeable Faith.name: Unshakeable Faith
Unshakeable Faith.description: When the [[lookup @name lowercase]] would fail a saving throw, it can reroll the save with Advantage. It must use the new roll.

Quarterstaff.name: Quarterstaff
Quarterstaff.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]], or [[/damage twoHanded average]] if wielded in two hands.

szDbaQyApM1sHz2U.name: Healing Word
szDbaQyApM1sHz2U.description:
A creature of your choice that you can see within range regains Hit Points equal to 2d4 plus your spellcasting ability modifier.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. The healing increases by 2d4 for each spell slot level above 1.

Light.name: Light
Light.description:
You touch one Large or smaller object that isn't being worn or carried by someone else. Until the spell ends, the object sheds Bright Light in a 20-foot radius and Dim Light for an additional 20 feet. The light can be colored as you like.

Covering the object with something opaque blocks the light. The spell ends if you cast it again.

Thaumaturgy.name: Thaumaturgy
Thaumaturgy.description:
You manifest a minor wonder within range. You create one of the effects below within range. If you cast this spell multiple times, you can have up to three of its 1-minute effects active at a time.

Altered Eyes. You alter the appearance of your eyes for 1 minute.

Booming Voice. Your voice booms up to three times as loud as normal for 1 minute. For the duration, you have Advantage on [[/check ability=cha skill=itm]] checks.

Fire Play. You cause flames to flicker, brighten, dim, or change color for 1 minute.

Invisible Hand. You instantaneously cause an unlocked door or window to fly open or slam shut.

Phantom Sound. You create an instantaneous sound that originates from a point of your choice within range, such as a rumble of thunder, the cry of a raven, or ominous whispers.

Tremors. You cause harmless tremors in the ground for 1 minute.

Bless.name: Bless
Bless.description:
You bless up to three creatures within range. Whenever a target makes an attack roll or a saving throw before the spell ends, the target adds 1d4 to the attack roll or save.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. You can target one additional creature for each spell slot level above 1.

Blessed.name: Blessed
Blessed.description: Whenever a target makes an attack roll or a saving throw before the spell ends, the target adds 1d4 to the attack roll or save.

Dispel Magic.name: 解除魔法
Dispel Magic.description:
在施法距离内指定一名生物、一个物件或一处魔法效应。所有影响该目标的三环或更低环阶法术即告终止。每个影响目标的四环或更高环阶法术都需要以你的施法属性进行一次属性检定（DC 10 + 目标法术环阶），检定成功时目标法术终止。

升环施法： 你直接终止影响目标的小于等于该施法环阶的法术效应。

Spirit Guardians.name: Spirit Guardians
Spirit Guardians.description:
Protective spirits flit around you in a 15-foot Emanation for the duration. If you are good or neutral, their spectral form appears angelic or fey (your choice). If you are evil, they appear fiendish.

When you cast this spell, you can designate creatures to be unaffected by it. Any other creature's Speed is halved in the Emanation, and whenever the Emanation enters a creature's space and whenever a creature enters the Emanation or ends its turn there, the creature must make a Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the creature takes 3d8 Radiant damage (if you are good or neutral) or 3d8 Necrotic damage (if you are evil). On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage. A creature makes this save only once per turn.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. The damage increases by 1d8 for each spell slot level above 3.

Half Speed.name: Half Speed
Half Speed.description: The creature's speed is halved while within the Emanation.

Regeneration.name: Regeneration
Regeneration.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] regains 10 Hit Points at the start of each of its turns. If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] takes Acid or Fire damage, this trait doesn’t function at the start of the hag’s next turn. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] dies only if it starts its turn with 0 Hit Points and doesn’t regenerate.

Fungal Staff.name: Fungal Staff
Fungal Staff.description: Intelligence Saving Throw: DC 14, one creature within 5 ft. Failure: [[/damage average]] damage and the target has the &reference[Addled] condition (save ends).

Fungal Staff.name: Fungal Staff
Fungal Staff.description: You are &reference[addled apply=false]. You can repeat your saving throw against this effect at the end of each of your turns, ending the effect on a success.

Slimeball.name: Slimeball
Slimeball.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]], and the target has the &reference[Burning] condition (3d10 Acid).

Burning (3d10 Acid).name: Burning (3d10 Acid)
Burning (3d10 Acid).description:
You are &reference[burning apply=false] from being covered in acid.

  • At the end of each of your turns, you take [[/damage average acid 3d10]] damage.

  • The condition ends if you or another creature within 5 feet of you spends an action to scrape off the acid or if some other effect removes it.

Spawn Troll.name: Spawn Troll
Spawn Troll.description: Trigger: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] takes damage. Response: Create one @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.kMue3OQFZtzXtzni] in an unoccupied space within 5 feet of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]. The fungal trolling acts immediately after the triggering creature’s turn, then after the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s turn on subsequent rounds.

summon.condition: When the troll hag takes damage.

Spore Step.name: Spore Step
Spore Step.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] magically teleports to an unoccupied space it can see within 60 feet of it.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes one [[/item 4PLjXWqatkjV3rCh]] attack and one [[/item lMYb2PxRZ35TpaMi]] attack. It can replace either attack with a use of Spellcasting.

Contact Other Plane.name: Contact Other Plane
Contact Other Plane.description:
You mentally contact a demigod, the spirit of a long-dead sage, or some other knowledgeable entity from another plane. Contacting this otherworldly intelligence can break your mind. When you cast this spell, make a DC 15 Intelligence saving throw. On a successful save, you can ask the entity up to five questions. You must ask your questions before the spell ends. The DM answers each question with one word, such as "yes," "no," "maybe," "never," "irrelevant," or "unclear" (if the entity doesn't know the answer to the question). If a one-word answer would be misleading, the DM might instead offer a short phrase as an answer.

On a failed save, you take 6d6 Psychic damage and have the &Reference[Incapacitated] condition until you finish a Long Rest. A @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplGreaterRes]{Greater Restoration} spell cast on you ends this effect.

Scrying.name: 探知术
Scrying.description:
你能看见和听见一个和你处于同一存在位面上的生物。目标生物必须进行一次感知豁免；该豁免的调整值与你对目标的了解程度有关（见下文），也与你和目标之间的物理联系程度有关。目标不知道它进行此豁免在对抗什么，只是会感觉不自在。

你对目标的了解有… 豁免调整值
二手信息（你曾经听说过目标） +5
直接信息（你曾经见过目标） +0
熟悉（你对目标很了解） −5
你持有目标的… 豁免调整值
肖像或其他图像 −2
衣物或其他物品 −4
身体部位如头发或指甲 −10

如果对方豁免成功，则目标不受该法术影响，并且在 24 小时内你不能尝试探知同一个目标。

如果对方豁免失败，则你在目标身边 10 尺内创造出一个隐形的传感器。通过传感器，你可以身临其境地看见和听见周围的环境。传感器会跟随目标移动，并在法术持续时间内始终保持在目标 10 尺之内。在能够看到传感器的生物眼中，你的传感器是一个拳头大小的光球。

除生物之外，你也可以选择一个你以前见过的地点作为该法术的目标。这种情况下，传感器会出现在目标地点且不会移动。

materials.value: 一个至少价值 1000GP 的法器，例如水晶球、银镜、圣水盆

affects.special: 与你处于同一位面的生物，或某个你曾见过的地点的生物
目标身边 10 尺内

Bestow Curse.name: Bestow Curse
Bestow Curse.description:
You touch a creature, which must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or become cursed for the duration. Until the curse ends, the target suffers one of the following effects of your choice:

  • Choose one ability. The target has Disadvantage on ability checks and saving throws made with that ability (Curse Ability activity).
  • The target has Disadvantage on attack rolls against you (Curse Attacks activity).
  • In combat, the target must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw at the start of each of its turns or be forced to take the &Reference[Dodge] action on that turn (Curse Actions activity).
  • If you deal damage to the target with an attack roll or a spell, the target takes an extra 1d8 Necrotic damage (Curse Resilience activity).

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. If you cast this spell using a level 4 spell slot, you can maintain Concentration on it for up to 10 minutes. If you use a level 5+ spell slot, the spell doesn't require Concentration, and the duration becomes 8 hours (level 5–6 slot) or 24 hours (level 7–8 slot). If you use a level 9 spell slot, the spell lasts until dispelled.

Cursed Charisma.name: Cursed Charisma
Cursed Charisma.description: The target has Disadvantage on ability checks and saving throws made with the chosen ability.

Cursed Constitution.name: Cursed Constitution
Cursed Constitution.description: The target has Disadvantage on ability checks and saving throws made with the chosen ability.

Cursed Dexterity.name: Cursed Dexterity
Cursed Dexterity.description: The target has Disadvantage on ability checks and saving throws made with the chosen ability.

Cursed Intelligence.name: Cursed Intelligence
Cursed Intelligence.description: The target has Disadvantage on ability checks and saving throws made with the chosen ability.

Cursed Strength.name: Cursed Strength
Cursed Strength.description: The target has Disadvantage on ability checks and saving throws made with the chosen ability.

Cursed Wisdom.name: Cursed Wisdom
Cursed Wisdom.description: The target has Disadvantage on ability checks and saving throws made with the chosen ability.

Cursed Attacks.name: Cursed Attacks
Cursed Attacks.description: The target has Disadvantage on attack rolls against you.

Cursed Actions.name: Cursed Actions
Cursed Actions.description: In combat, the target must succeed on a [[/save ability=wis dc=@attributes.spell.dc format=long]] at the start of each of its turns or be forced to take the &Reference[Dodge] action on that turn.

Cursed Resilience.name: Cursed Resilience
Cursed Resilience.description: If you deal damage to the target with an attack roll or a spell, the target takes an extra [[/damage 1d8 type=necrotic]] damage.

Plant Growth.name: Plant Growth
Plant Growth.description:
Casting Time: Action (Overgrowth) or 8 hours (Enrichment)

This spell channels vitality into plants. The casting time you use determines whether the spell has the Overgrowth or the Enrichment effect below.

Overgrowth. Choose a point within range. All normal plants in a 100-foot-radius Sphere centered on that point become thick and overgrown. A creature moving through that area must spend 4 feet of movement for every 1 foot it moves. You can exclude one or more areas of any size within the spell's area from being affected.

Enrichment. All plants in a half-mile radius centered on a point within range become enriched for 365 days. The plants yield twice the normal amount of food when harvested. They can benefit from only one Plant Growth per year.

Druidcraft.name: Druidcraft
Druidcraft.description:
Whispering to the spirits of nature, you create one of the following effects within range.

Weather Sensor. You create a Tiny, harmless sensory effect that predicts what the weather will be at your location for the next 24 hours. The effect might manifest as a golden orb for clear skies, a cloud for rain, falling snowflakes for snow, and so on. This effect persists for 1 round.

Bloom. You instantly make a flower blossom, a seed pod open, or a leaf bud bloom.

Sensory Effect. You create a harmless sensory effect, such as falling leaves, spectral dancing fairies, a gentle breeze, the sound of an animal, or the faint odor of skunk. The effect must fit in a 5-foot Cube.

Fire Play. You light or snuff out a candle, a torch, or a campfire.

Mage Hand.name: 法师之手
Mage Hand.description:
A spectral, floating hand appears at a point you choose within range. The hand lasts for the duration. The hand vanishes if it is ever more than 30 feet away from you or if you cast this spell again.

When you cast the spell, you can use the hand to manipulate an object, open an unlocked door or container, stow or retrieve an item from an open container, or pour the contents out of a vial.

As a Magic action on your later turns, you can control the hand thus again. As part of that action, you can move the hand up to 30 feet.

The hand can't attack, activate magic items, or carry more than 10 pounds.

Minor Illusion.name: Minor Illusion
Minor Illusion.description:
You create a sound or an image of an object within range that lasts for the duration. See the descriptions below for the effects of each. The illusion ends if you cast this spell again.

If a creature takes a Study action to examine the sound or image, the creature can determine that it is an illusion with a successful [[/check ability=int skill=inv dc=@attributes.spell.dc]] check against your spell save DC. If a creature discerns the illusion for what it is, the illusion becomes faint to the creature.

Sound. If you create a sound, its volume can range from a whisper to a scream. It can be your voice, someone else's voice, a lion's roar, a beating of drums, or any other sound you choose. The sound continues unabated throughout the duration, or you can make discrete sounds at different times before the spell ends.

Image. If you create an image of an object—such as a chair, muddy footprints, or a small chest—it must be no larger than a 5-foot Cube. The image can't create sound, light, smell, or any other sensory effect. Physical interaction with the image reveals it to be an illusion, since things can pass through it.

Coven Magic.name: Coven Magic
Coven Magic.description:
While within 30 feet of at least two hag allies, the troll hag can cast one of the following spells, requiring no Material components, using the spell's normal casting time, and using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 16, +8 to hit with spell attacks).

2/Day Each: @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplCounterspe]{Counterspell}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplRayofSickn]{Ray of Sickness}

1/Day: @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplCloudkill0]{Cloudkill}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplGreaterInv]{Greater Invisibility}

Counterspell.name: Counterspell
Counterspell.description: You attempt to interrupt a creature in the process of casting a spell. The creature makes a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the spell dissipates with no effect, and the action, Bonus Action, or Reaction used to cast it is wasted. If that spell was cast with a spell slot, the slot isn't expended.

activation.condition: 当你看见范围内一名生物施展一道法术时执行

Ray of Sickness.name: Ray of Sickness
Ray of Sickness.description:
You shoot a greenish ray at a creature within range. Make a ranged spell attack against the target. On a hit, the target takes 2d8 Poison damage and has the &Reference[poisoned] condition until the end of your next turn.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. The damage increases by 1d8 for each spell slot level above 1.

Cloudkill.name: Cloudkill
Cloudkill.description:
You create a 20-foot-radius Sphere of yellow-green fog centered on a point within range. The fog lasts for the duration or until strong wind (such as the one created by Gust of Wind) disperses it, ending the spell. Its area is Heavily Obscured.

Each creature in the Sphere makes a Constitution saving throw, taking 5d8 Poison damage on a failed save or half as much damage on a successful one. A creature must also make this save when the Sphere moves into its space and when it enters the Sphere or ends its turn there. A creature makes this save only once per turn.

The Sphere moves 10 feet away from you at the start of each of your turns.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. The damage increases by 1d8 for each spell slot level above 5.

Greater Invisibility.name: Greater Invisibility
Greater Invisibility.description: A creature you touch has the Invisible condition until the spell ends.

Fungal Aura.name: Fungal Aura
Fungal Aura.description:
The ground in a 10-foot radius of any of the three hags is &reference[difficultterrain] and grants the hags &reference[halfcover] as it is covered in constant fungal growths and clouds of spores unless the troll hag has the &reference[Incapacitated apply=false] condition.

Constitution Saving Throw: DC 16, any creature who ends its turn within the area. Failure: The target has the &reference[Staggered] and &reference[Bewildered] conditions (save ends).

Fungal Confusion.name: Fungal Confusion
Fungal Confusion.description: You are &reference[staggered apply=false] and &reference[bewildered apply=false]. You can repeat your saving throw against this effect at the end of each of your turns, ending the effect on a success.

Vexing Curse.name: Vexing Curse
Vexing Curse.description: Intelligence Saving Throw: DC 16. Failure: [[/damage average]] damage and the target has the &reference[Jinxed] (1d6) condition (save ends).

Jinxed (1d6).name: Jinxed (1d6)
Jinxed (1d6).description: You subtract 1d6 to your attack rolls and saving throws. You can repeat your saving throw against this effect at the end of each of your turns, ending the effect on a success.

Rapid Growth.name: Rapid Growth
Rapid Growth.description: If all three troll hags use their action to target the same @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.kMue3OQFZtzXtzni] within 60 feet of them with this ability, that trolling erupts in size and becomes a @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.DxRms9It18hCd2Ug]. While the troll hags are using this ability, they must maintain Concentration. If any of the troll hags lose Concentration before the third hag takes its action, the ability is not wasted but they must start over. While being targeted by Rapid Growth, the targeted fungal trolling has the &reference[Paralyzed] condition.

affects.special: A fungal trolling.

Garden of Fungal Delights.name: Garden of Fungal Delights
Garden of Fungal Delights.description: The coven pours their strange brew upon the mushroom patches around them, immediately spawning 7 (2d6) @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.kMue3OQFZtzXtzni]{Fungal Trollings}.

Tentacle.name: Tentacle
Tentacle.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]], and the target has the &reference[Dazed] condition until the end of its next turn.

Tentacle Daze.name: Tentacle Daze
Tentacle Daze.description: You are &reference[dazed apply=false] until the end of your next turn.

Contaminate.name: Contaminate
Contaminate.description: Constitution Saving Throw: DC 16, one creature within 120 feet of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]. Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target gains one &reference[drakkenheimContamination] level. Success: Half damage only.

Mind Scramble.name: Mind Scramble
Mind Scramble.description: Intelligence Saving Throw: DC 16, each creature in a 60-foot Cone (creatures maintaining Concentration have Disadvantage). Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, or [[/damage 48 psychic]] damage if the target was maintaining Concentration. Success: Half damage.

Vanish to the Space Between Worlds.name: Vanish to the Space Between Worlds
Vanish to the Space Between Worlds.description: Trigger: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] takes damage. Response: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] takes no damage and vanishes to the Space Between Worlds. At the start of its next turn, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] reappears in an unoccupied space of its choice within 60 feet of the space it left.

utility.condition: When the far dweller takes damage.

Pluck the Puppet Strings.name: Pluck the Puppet Strings
Pluck the Puppet Strings.description: Wisdom Saving Throw: DC 16, one creature within 60 feet of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]. Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target must immediately use its Reaction to move up to its Speed toward a creature of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s choice. If it ends this movement within reach of the creature, it must make a melee weapon attack against the creature with Advantage. Success: Half damage only.

Aberrant Traits.name: Aberrant Traits
Aberrant Traits.description:
Given the contamination and delerium present within the Space Between Worlds, all creatures who dwell there are the product of contamination and unaffected by the normal dangers of delerium. As an aberrant, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] has the following traits:

  • Fully Contaminated. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] is immune to &reference[drakkenheimContamination] and has Advantage on saving throws against contaminated spells. This creature may cast contaminated spells even though it does not gain Contamination levels.

  • Delerium Healing. As an action, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can touch a delerium shard to regain 10 (3d6) Hit Points. Once the [[lookup @name lowercase]] has used a delerium shard in this way, the shard can't be used in this manner again for 24 hours.

  • Alien Intellect. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] is immune to any effect that would sense its emotions or read its thoughts, as well as any divination spell that it refuses. Wisdom (Insight) checks made to ascertain the [[lookup @name lowercase]]s intentions or sincerity have Disadvantage.

affects.special: a delerium shard

Magic Missile.name: Magic Missile
Magic Missile.description:
You create three glowing darts of magical force. Each dart strikes a creature of your choice that you can see within range. A dart deals 1d4 + 1 Force damage to its target. The darts all strike simultaneously, and you can direct them to hit one creature or several.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. The spell creates one more dart for each spell slot level above 1.

[[2 + @item.level]]{Level [[lookup @item.level]] darts}

Detect Thoughts.name: 侦测思想
Detect Thoughts.description:
你激活下述效应之一。直到法术结束为止，你可以在你随后的回合用一个魔法动作以激活下述任意效应之一。

感知思想。 你感知距你 30 尺内，知晓语言或能够心灵感应的思想的存在。你并不会阅读这些思想，但你知道这里存在一名有理智的生物。

此法术会被 1 尺厚的岩石、泥土或木头，1 寸厚的金属，或薄薄一层铅阻隔。

阅读思想。 选择一名距你 30 尺内的可见生物，或一名距你 30 尺内被感知思想侦测到的生物。你了解到此时目标最关心的事情。如果目标不知晓任何语言也不会心灵感应，则你不能得到任何信息。

在你的下一回合，用一个魔法动作，你可以尝试深入目标的心灵。如果你选择这么做，目标进行一次感知豁免。豁免失败，则你了解到他的逻辑推理、情绪状态以及他头脑中的一些大事（比如忧虑、挚爱和仇恨的事物）。豁免成功，法术终止。无论哪种情况，目标都会知道你正在窥探其心灵，且直到你的注意力从它的心灵上移开为止，目标均可以在其回合内使用动作进行一次 [[/check ability=int skill=arc dc=@attributes.spelldc]] 检定，对抗你的法术豁免DC，目标胜出对抗时，法术终止。

Misty Step.name: Misty Step
Misty Step.description: Briefly surrounded by silvery mist, you teleport up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space you can see.

Hypnotic Pattern.name: Hypnotic Pattern
Hypnotic Pattern.description:
You create a twisting pattern of colors in a 30-foot Cube within range. The pattern appears for a moment and vanishes. Each creature in the area who can see the pattern must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or have the &Reference[charmed apply=false] condition for the duration. While Charmed, the creature has the &Reference[incapacitated apply=false] condition and a Speed of 0.

The spell ends for an affected creature if it takes any damage or if someone else uses an action to shake the creature out of its stupor.

Hypnotized.name: Hypnotized
Hypnotized.description:
While &Reference[charmed apply=false], the creature has the &Reference[incapacitated apply=false] condition and a Speed of 0.

The spell ends for an affected creature if it takes any damage or if someone else uses an action to shake the creature out of its stupor.

Maze.name: Maze
Maze.description:
You banish a creature that you can see within range into a labyrinthine demiplane. The target remains there for the duration or until it escapes the maze.

The target can take a Study action to try to escape. When it does so, it makes a DC 20 Intelligence (Investigation) check. If it succeeds, it escapes, and the spell ends.

When the spell ends, the target reappears in the space it left or, if that space is occupied, in the nearest unoccupied space.

Banished.name: Banished
Banished.description: The target can take a Study action to try to escape. When it does so, it makes a [[/check ability=int skill=inv dc=20]] check. If it succeeds, it escapes, and the spell ends.

Self Plane Shift.name: Self Plane Shift
Self Plane Shift.description:
You and up to eight willing creatures who link hands in a circle are transported to a different plane of existence. You can specify a target destination in general terms, such as the City of Brass on the Elemental Plane of Fire or the palace of Dispater on the second level of the Nine Hells, and you appear in or near that destination, as determined by the DM.

Alternatively, if you know the sigil sequence of a teleportation circle on another plane of existence, this spell can take you to that circle. If the teleportation circle is too small to hold all the creatures you transported, they appear in the closest unoccupied spaces next to the circle.

materials.value: a forked, metal rod worth 250+ GP and attuned to a plane of existence

Slow.name: Slow
Slow.description:
You alter time around up to six creatures of your choice in a 40-foot Cube within range. Each target must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or be affected by this spell for the duration.

An affected target's Speed is halved, it takes a −2 penalty to AC and Dexterity saving throws, and it can't take Reactions. On its turns, it can take either an action or a Bonus Action, not both, and it can make only one attack if it takes the Attack action. If it casts a spell with a Somatic component, there is a [[/r 1d100cs<=25#Slowed spell cast success]]{25 percent} chance the spell fails as a result of the target making the spell's gestures too slowly.

An affected target repeats the save at the end of each of its turns, ending the spell on itself on a success.

Foundry Note

The inline roll above will return 1 if it succeeded or 0 if it failed.

Slowed.name: Slowed
Slowed.description:
An affected target’s Speed is halved, it takes a −2 penalty to AC and Dexterity saving throws, and it can’t take Reactions. On its turns, it can take either an action or a Bonus Action, not both, and it can make only one attack if it takes the Attack action. If it casts a spell with a Somatic component, there is a [[/r 1d100cs>25#Slowed spell cast success]]{25 percent} chance the spell fails as a result of the target making the spell’s gestures too slowly.

An affected target repeats the [[/save ability=wis]] save at the end of each of its turns, ending the spell on itself on a success.

Telekinesis.name: 心灵遥控
Telekinesis.description:
You gain the ability to move or manipulate creatures or objects by thought. When you cast the spell and as a Magic action on your later turns before the spell ends, you can exert your will on one creature or object that you can see within range, causing the appropriate effect below. You can affect the same target round after round or choose a new one at any time. If you switch targets, the prior target is no longer affected by the spell.

Creature. You can try to move a Huge or smaller creature. The target must succeed on a Strength saving throw, or you move it up to 30 feet in any direction within the spell's range. Until the end of your next turn, the creature has the &Reference[Restrained] condition, and if you lift it into the air, it is suspended there. It falls at the end of your next turn unless you use this option on it again and it fails the save.

Object. You can try to move a Huge or smaller object. If the object isn't being worn or carried, you automatically move it up to 30 feet in any direction within the spell's range.

If the object is worn or carried by a creature, that creature must succeed on a Strength saving throw, or you pull the object away and move it up to 30 feet in any direction within the spell's range.

You can exert fine control on objects with your telekinetic grip, such as manipulating a simple tool, opening a door or a container, stowing or retrieving an item from an open container, or pouring the contents from a vial.

Nimble Escape.name: Nimble Escape
Nimble Escape.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] takes the Disengage or Hide action.

Aberrant Traits.name: Aberrant Traits
Aberrant Traits.description:
Given the contamination and delerium present within the Space Between Worlds, all creatures who dwell there are the product of contamination and unaffected by the normal dangers of delerium. As an aberrant, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] has the following traits:

  • Fully Contaminated. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] is immune to &reference[drakkenheimContamination] and has Advantage on saving throws against contaminated spells. This creature may cast contaminated spells even though it does not gain Contamination levels.

  • Delerium Healing. As an action, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can touch a delerium shard to regain 10 (3d6) Hit Points. Once the [[lookup @name lowercase]] has used a delerium shard in this way, the shard can't be used in this manner again for 24 hours.

  • Alien Intellect. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] is immune to any effect that would sense its emotions or read its thoughts, as well as any divination spell that it refuses. Wisdom (Insight) checks made to ascertain the [[lookup @name lowercase]]s intentions or sincerity have Disadvantage.

affects.special: a delerium shard

Psychic Blast.name: Psychic Blast
Psychic Blast.description: Intelligence Saving Throw: DC 16, each creature in a 60-foot Cone. Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target is &reference[Jinxed] 1d10 (save ends).

Jinxed (1d10).name: Jinxed (1d10)
Jinxed (1d10).description: You subtract 1d10 to your attack rolls and saving throws. You can repeat your saving throw against this effect at the end of each of your turns, ending the effect on a success.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The [[lookup @name]] makes two [[/item U7QCF3sdFycnsd0P]] attacks, then uses [[/item XH00ochTDBKWfodn]] or Spellcasting.

Tail Whip.name: Tail Whip
Tail Whip.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]]. Intelligence Saving Throw: DC 16. Failure: The target has the &reference[Dazed] and &reference[Slowed] conditions until the end of the [[lookup @name]]'s next turn.

Tail Whip.name: Tail Whip
Tail Whip.description: You are &reference[dazed apply=false] and &reference[slowed apply=false until the end of the Rat King's next turn.

Black Tentacles.name: Black Tentacles
Black Tentacles.description:
Squirming, ebony tentacles fill a 20-foot square on ground that you can see within range. For the duration, these tentacles turn the ground in that area into &Reference[DifficultTerrain].

Each creature in that area makes a Strength saving throw. On a failed save, it takes 3d6 Bludgeoning damage, and it has the &Reference[Restrained apply=false] condition until the spell ends. A creature also makes that save if it enters the area or ends it turn there. A creature makes that save only once per turn.

A Restrained creature can take an action to make a [[/check ability=str skill=ath dc=@attributes.spell.dc]] check against your spell save DC, ending the condition on itself on a success.

Restrained.name: Restrained
Restrained.description: A &Reference[Restrained apply=false] creature can take an action to make a [[/check ability=str skill=ath dc=@attributes.spell.dc]] check against your spell save DC, ending the condition on itself on a success.

Mage Hand.name: 法师之手
Mage Hand.description:
A spectral, floating hand appears at a point you choose within range. The hand lasts for the duration. The hand vanishes if it is ever more than 30 feet away from you or if you cast this spell again.

When you cast the spell, you can use the hand to manipulate an object, open an unlocked door or container, stow or retrieve an item from an open container, or pour the contents out of a vial.

As a Magic action on your later turns, you can control the hand thus again. As part of that action, you can move the hand up to 30 feet.

The hand can't attack, activate magic items, or carry more than 10 pounds.

Telekinesis.name: 心灵遥控
Telekinesis.description:
You gain the ability to move or manipulate creatures or objects by thought. When you cast the spell and as a Magic action on your later turns before the spell ends, you can exert your will on one creature or object that you can see within range, causing the appropriate effect below. You can affect the same target round after round or choose a new one at any time. If you switch targets, the prior target is no longer affected by the spell.

Creature. You can try to move a Huge or smaller creature. The target must succeed on a Strength saving throw, or you move it up to 30 feet in any direction within the spell's range. Until the end of your next turn, the creature has the &Reference[Restrained] condition, and if you lift it into the air, it is suspended there. It falls at the end of your next turn unless you use this option on it again and it fails the save.

Object. You can try to move a Huge or smaller object. If the object isn't being worn or carried, you automatically move it up to 30 feet in any direction within the spell's range.

If the object is worn or carried by a creature, that creature must succeed on a Strength saving throw, or you pull the object away and move it up to 30 feet in any direction within the spell's range.

You can exert fine control on objects with your telekinetic grip, such as manipulating a simple tool, opening a door or a container, stowing or retrieving an item from an open container, or pouring the contents from a vial.

Thaumaturgy.name: Thaumaturgy
Thaumaturgy.description:
You manifest a minor wonder within range. You create one of the effects below within range. If you cast this spell multiple times, you can have up to three of its 1-minute effects active at a time.

Altered Eyes. You alter the appearance of your eyes for 1 minute.

Booming Voice. Your voice booms up to three times as loud as normal for 1 minute. For the duration, you have Advantage on [[/check ability=cha skill=itm]] checks.

Fire Play. You cause flames to flicker, brighten, dim, or change color for 1 minute.

Invisible Hand. You instantaneously cause an unlocked door or window to fly open or slam shut.

Phantom Sound. You create an instantaneous sound that originates from a point of your choice within range, such as a rumble of thunder, the cry of a raven, or ominous whispers.

Tremors. You cause harmless tremors in the ground for 1 minute.

Illusory Thing with the Writhing Tail.name: Illusory Thing with the Writhing Tail
Illusory Thing with the Writhing Tail.tokenName: Illusory Thing with the Writhing Tail

Hellfire Chain.name: Hellfire Chain
Hellfire Chain.description: Strength Saving Throw: DC 17, one creature the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within 30 feet. Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target has the &reference[Restrained] condition. While Restrained, the target takes [[/damage average activity=MV4f3ME7pcxdXIs6]] damage at the start of each of its turns. At the end of each of its turns, the target makes a [[/check]] check, ending the effect on itself on a success.

affects.special: A creature restrained by the hellfire chains.
A creature restrained by the hellfire chains.

Hellfire Chains.name: Hellfire Chains
Hellfire Chains.description:
You are &reference[restrained apply=false] by chains of hellfire. While Restrained, you take [[/damage 3d6 fire average]] damage at the start of each of your turns.

At the end of each of your turns, you can make a [[/check 17 str]] check, ending the effect on yourself on a success.

Hellish Rebuke.name: Hellish Rebuke
Hellish Rebuke.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplHellishReb]{Hellish Rebuke} (DC 17, level 4 version) in response to that spell's trigger, using Charisma as the spellcasting ability.

ZKs6u6LAuUoh2eQk.condition: When the host takes damage from a creature that it can see within 60 feet.

Fiendish Agility.name: Fiendish Agility
Fiendish Agility.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] takes the Dash or Disengage action.

Thaumaturgy.name: Thaumaturgy
Thaumaturgy.description:
You manifest a minor wonder within range. You create one of the effects below within range. If you cast this spell multiple times, you can have up to three of its 1-minute effects active at a time.

Altered Eyes. You alter the appearance of your eyes for 1 minute.

Booming Voice. Your voice booms up to three times as loud as normal for 1 minute. For the duration, you have Advantage on [[/check ability=cha skill=itm]] checks.

Fire Play. You cause flames to flicker, brighten, dim, or change color for 1 minute.

Invisible Hand. You instantaneously cause an unlocked door or window to fly open or slam shut.

Phantom Sound. You create an instantaneous sound that originates from a point of your choice within range, such as a rumble of thunder, the cry of a raven, or ominous whispers.

Tremors. You cause harmless tremors in the ground for 1 minute.

Command.name: Command
Command.description:
You speak a one-word command to a creature you can see within range. The target must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or follow the command on its next turn. Choose the command from these options:

Approach. The target moves toward you by the shortest and most direct route, ending its turn if it moves within 5 feet of you.

Drop. The target drops whatever it is holding and then ends its turn.

Flee. The target spends its turn moving away from you by the fastest available means.

Grovel. The target has the Prone condition and then ends its turn.

Halt. On its turn, the target doesn't move and takes no action or Bonus Action.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. You can affect one additional creature for each spell slot level above 1.

Darkness.name: Darkness
Darkness.description:
For the duration, magical &Reference[darkness] spreads from a point within range and fills a 15-foot-radius Sphere. Darkvision can't see through it, and nonmagical light can't illuminate it.

Alternatively, you cast the spell on an object that isn't being worn or carried, causing the Darkness to fill a 15-foot Emanation originating from that object. Covering that object with something opaque, such as a bowl or helm, blocks the Darkness.

If any of this spell's area overlaps with an area of Bright Light or Dim Light created by a spell of level 2 or lower, that other spell is dispelled.

materials.value: bat fur and a piece of coal

egJcJ7RufncxdU7n.name: Hellish Rebuke
egJcJ7RufncxdU7n.description:
The creature that damaged you is momentarily surrounded by green flames. It makes a Dexterity saving throw, taking 2d10 Fire damage on a failed save or half as much damage on a successful one.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. The damage increases by 1d10 for each spell slot level above 1.

activation.condition: 当你受到来自 60 尺内你可见生物的伤害时执行

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes two [[/item uGWS25PDmHqGqKE3]] attacks and uses [[/item mOcPnQV8St1ToXEM]], if available.

Fiery Claws.name: Fiery Claws
Fiery Claws.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]], and the target has the &reference[Burning] condition (4d6 Fire).

Burning (4d6 Fire).name: Burning (4d6 Fire)
Burning (4d6 Fire).description:
You are &reference[burning apply=false] from being covered in fire.

  • At the end of each of your turns, you take [[/damage average fire 4d6]] damage.

  • The condition ends if you or another creature within 5 feet of you spends an action to douse the fire or if some other effect removes it such as submerging yourself in water.

Spider Climb.name: Spider Climb
Spider Climb.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

False Appearance.name: False Appearance
False Appearance.description: While the [[lookup @name lowercase]] remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from a normal animal corpse.

Sudden Death.name: Sudden Death
Sudden Death.description: Creatures that haven't yet taken a turn in combat are &reference[Helpless] against attacks made by the [[lookup @name lowercase]].

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes two attacks, using [[/item 89O2oa3zuTtatgQH]] or [[/item zROe2M9xRDJzRYV0]] in any combination.

Impaling Limbs.name: Impaling Limbs
Impaling Limbs.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]], and the target is &reference[bleeding] (2d6). While bleeding in this way, the target is also &reference[slowed].

Slowed & Bleeding (2d6).name: Slowed & Bleeding (2d6)
Slowed & Bleeding (2d6).description:
You're losing blood to an open wound.

  • Ongoing Damage: At the end of each of your turns, you lose [[/r 2d6]] Hit Points.

  • Regaining Hit Points: This condition ends if you regain any Hit Points.

  • Medical Treatment: You or another creature within 5 feet of you can spend an action and use a Healer's Kit to staunch the bleeding (no check required), ending the condition.

While bleeding in this way, you are &reference[slowed apply=false].

Corrosive Mucus.name: Corrosive Mucus
Corrosive Mucus.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]] and the target is &reference[burning] (2d4 Acid) While burning in this way, the target's AC becomes 10 + its Dexterity modifier.

Corroded & Burning (2d4 Acid).name: Corroded & Burning (2d4 Acid)
Corroded & Burning (2d4 Acid).description:
You are &reference[burning apply=false] from being covered in acid.

  • At the end of each of your turns, you take [[/damage average acid 2d4]] damage.

  • The condition ends if you or another creature within 5 feet of you spends an action to scrape off the acid or if some other effect removes it.

Burning burning in this way, your AC becomes 10 + your Dexterity modifier.

Dazzling Aura.name: Dazzling Aura
Dazzling Aura.description: The [[lookup @name]] sheds Bright Light in a 60-foot radius. A creature that starts its turn in the Bright Light takes [[/damage average]] damage.

Glide.name: Glide
Glide.description: The [[lookup @name]] moves up to its Speed without provoking Opportunity Attacks.

Sludge Column.name: Sludge Column
Sludge Column.description: Constitution Saving Throw: DC 18, each creature in a 10-foot radius, 60-foot tall Cylinder, centered on a point within 120 feet of the [[lookup @name ]]. Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target gains one Contamination level. Success: Half damage only.

Animate Walls.name: Animate Walls
Animate Walls.description: Dexterity Saving Throw: DC 18, each creature within 10 feet of any number of walls within 120 feet of the [[lookup @name]]. Failure: The target has the &reference[Grappled] condition (escape DC 18). The wall sprouts limbs to facilitate this grapple, which disappear when the condition ends.

affects.special: Each creature within 10 feet of any number of walls.

Epic Boss.name: Epic Boss
Epic Boss.description:
This creature is an Epic Boss, a unique foe designed to pose a solo threat to an entire adventuring party. As such, it has additional game rules that sets it apart from normal creatures:

[[lookup @name]] always takes their turn on Initiative count 20. On their turn, they can use their movement and interaction as normal. However, they does not take an action or Bonus Action on their turn unless forced to do so by a spell or other effect. Instead, [[lookup @name]] takes one of the following Epic Actions at the end of each player character's turn.

All this creature's actions are Epic Actions.

  • @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.LPB3YCeumvKMdpi2.Item.pjOCYH5H1FfOH5Y4]{Slam}

  • @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.LPB3YCeumvKMdpi2.Item.j1eIIOYDYdhUDlto]{Lantern Blast}

  • @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.LPB3YCeumvKMdpi2.Item.FeZJmBjqiKzxD2Ew]{Glide}

  • @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.LPB3YCeumvKMdpi2.Item.TKa3RBF5znrxw8fZ]{Animate Walls}

  • @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.LPB3YCeumvKMdpi2.Item.vA8FEqAcYZpd5auM]{Sludge Column}

  • @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.LPB3YCeumvKMdpi2.Item.QdG1JBIJH1zk24pR]{Epic Resistance}

Epic Resistance.name: Epic Resistance
Epic Resistance.description: [[lookup @name]] chooses one condition, spell, or other effect currently affecting them and rolls [[/r 1d20]]. On an 11 or higher, the effect ends on them. [[lookup @name]] can use this Epic Action even if they would otherwise be unable to take actions, their actions are being controlled by another creature, or if a spell or effect alters their game statistics.

Lantern Blast.name: Lantern Blast
Lantern Blast.description:
Magical octarine beams flash from one of the [[lookup @name]]'s many lanterns at one creature it can see within 120 feet that is not behind &reference[TotalCover], subjecting it to one of the following effects (the [[lookup @name]] can only use each blast once per round):

  1. Dispelling Blast. Intelligence Saving Throw: DC 18. Failure: 35 (10d6) Psychic damage. Any spell or magical effect on the target ends, and it has the &reference[Bewildered] condition (save ends). Success: Half damage only.

  2. Forceful Blast. Strength Saving Throw: DC 18. Failure: 35 (10d6) Force damage, and the target is pushed 20 feet away from the [[lookup @name]] and has the &reference[Prone] condition. Success: Half damage only.

  3. Blinding Blast. Constitution Saving Throw: DC 18. Failure: 35 (10d6) Radiant damage, and the target has the &reference[Blinded] condition (save ends). Success: Half damage only.

  4. Contaminating Blast. Constitution Saving Throw: DC 18. Failure: 35 (10d6) Necrotic damage, and the target gains one Contamination level. Success: Half damage only.

  5. Igniting Blast. Dexterity Saving Throw: DC 18. Failure: 35 (10d6) Fire damage, and the target has the &reference[Burning] condition (10d6 Fire). Success: Half damage only.

  6. Freezing Blast. Constitution Saving Throw: DC 18. Failure: 35 (10d6) Cold damage, and the target has the &reference[Frozen] condition (DC 18). Success: Half damage only.

Dispelling Blast.name: Dispelling Blast
Dispelling Blast.description: You are &reference[bewildered apply=false]. You can repeat your saving throw against this effect at the end of each of your turns, ending the effect on a success.

Blinding Blast.name: Blinding Blast
Blinding Blast.description: You are &reference[blinded apply=false]. You can repeat your saving throw against this effect at the end of each of your turns, ending the effect on a success.

Burning (10d6 Fire).name: Burning (10d6 Fire)
Burning (10d6 Fire).description:
You are &reference[burning apply=false] from being covered in fire.

  • At the end of each of your turns, you take [[/damage average fire 10d6]] damage.

  • The condition ends if you or another creature within 5 feet of you spends an action to douse the fire or if some other effect removes it such as submerging yourself in water.

Frozen (DC 18).name: Frozen (DC 18)
Frozen (DC 18).description:
You're partially encased in ice:

  • You are &reference[Immobilized apply=false] & &reference[Defenseless apply=false].

  • You're &reference[Helpless apply=false] against attacks made with a weapon that deals bludgeoning damage.

  • You or another creature can take an action to break the ice away. To do so, you must succeed on a [[/check 18 str ath]] check.

Healing Word.name: Healing Word
Healing Word.description: [[lookup @name]] casts @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplHealingWor]{Healing Word} using the spellcasting ability from Spellcasting.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: [[lookup @name]] makes two [[/item TFVdpdPsH3Xcm0gb]] attacks. She can replace one attack with a use of Spellcasting.

HZ9eH1OfJ7F3bvMg.name: Healing Word
HZ9eH1OfJ7F3bvMg.description:
A creature of your choice that you can see within range regains Hit Points equal to 2d4 plus your spellcasting ability modifier.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. The healing increases by 2d4 for each spell slot level above 1.

Banishment.name: Banishment
Banishment.description:
One creature that you can see within range must succeed on a Charisma saving throw or be transported to a harmless demiplane for the duration. While there, the target has the &Reference[Incapacitated apply=false] condition. When the spell ends, the target reappears in the space it left or in the nearest unoccupied space if that space is occupied.

If the target is an Aberration, a Celestial, an Elemental, a Fey, or a Fiend, the target doesn't return if the spell lasts for 1 minute. The target is instead transported to a random location on a plane (DM's choice) associated with its creature type.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. You can target one additional creature for each spell slot level above 4.

Banished.name: Banished
Banished.description:
While there, the target has the &Reference[Incapacitated apply=false] condition. When the spell ends, the target reappears in the space it left or in the nearest unoccupied space if that space is occupied.

If the target is an Aberration, a Celestial, an Elemental, a Fey, or a Fiend, the target doesn’t return if the spell lasts for 1 minute. The target is instead transported to a random location on a plane (DM’s choice) associated with its creature type.

Bless.name: Bless
Bless.description:
You bless up to three creatures within range. Whenever a target makes an attack roll or a saving throw before the spell ends, the target adds 1d4 to the attack roll or save.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. You can target one additional creature for each spell slot level above 1.

Blessed.name: Blessed
Blessed.description: Whenever a target makes an attack roll or a saving throw before the spell ends, the target adds 1d4 to the attack roll or save.

Dispel Magic.name: 解除魔法
Dispel Magic.description:
在施法距离内指定一名生物、一个物件或一处魔法效应。所有影响该目标的三环或更低环阶法术即告终止。每个影响目标的四环或更高环阶法术都需要以你的施法属性进行一次属性检定（DC 10 + 目标法术环阶），检定成功时目标法术终止。

升环施法： 你直接终止影响目标的小于等于该施法环阶的法术效应。

Flame Strike.name: Flame Strike
Flame Strike.description:
A vertical column of brilliant fire roars down from above. Each creature in a 10-foot-radius, 40-foot-high Cylinder centered on a point within range makes a Dexterity saving throw, taking 5d6 Fire damage and 5d6 Radiant damage on a failed save or half as much damage on a successful one.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. The Fire damage and the Radiant damage increase by 1d6 for each spell slot level above 5.

Greater Restoration.name: Greater Restoration
Greater Restoration.description:
You touch a creature and magically remove one of the following effects from it:

  • 1 &Reference[Exhaustion] level
  • The &Reference[Charmed] or &Reference[Petrified] condition
  • A curse, including the target's Attunement to a cursed magic item
  • Any reduction to one of the target's ability scores
  • Any reduction to the target's Hit Point maximum

materials.value: diamond dust worth 100+ GP, which the spell consumes

Mass Cure Wounds.name: Mass Cure Wounds
Mass Cure Wounds.description:
A wave of healing energy washes out from a point you can see within range. Choose up to six creatures in a 30-foot-radius Sphere centered on that point. Each target regains Hit Points equal to 5d8 plus your spellcasting ability modifier.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. The healing increases by 1d8 for each spell slot level above 5.

Heal.name: Heal
Heal.description:
Choose a creature that you can see within range. Positive energy washes through the target, restoring 70 Hit Points. This spell also ends the &Reference[Blinded], &Reference[Deafened], and &Reference[Poisoned] conditions on the target.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. The healing increases by 10 for each spell slot level above 6.

Raise Dead.name: Raise Dead
Raise Dead.description:
With a touch, you revive a dead creature if it has been dead no longer than 10 days and it wasn't Undead when it died.

The creature returns to life with 1 Hit Point. This spell also neutralizes any poisons that affected the creature at the time of death.

This spell closes all mortal wounds, but it doesn't restore missing body parts. If the creature is lacking body parts or organs integral for its survival—its head, for instance—the spell automatically fails.

Coming back from the dead is an ordeal. The target takes a −4 penalty to D20 Tests. Every time the target finishes a Long Rest, the penalty is reduced by 1 until it becomes 0.

materials.value: a diamond worth 500+ GP, which the spell consumes

affects.special: a dead creature

Resurrection Sickness (Day 1).name: Resurrection Sickness (Day 1)
Resurrection Sickness (Day 1).description: Coming back from the dead is an ordeal. The target takes a −4 penalty to D20 Tests. Every time the target finishes a Long Rest, the penalty is reduced by 1 until it becomes 0.

Resurrection Sickness (Day 2).name: Resurrection Sickness (Day 2)
Resurrection Sickness (Day 2).description: Coming back from the dead is an ordeal. The target takes a −4 penalty to D20 Tests. Every time the target finishes a Long Rest, the penalty is reduced by 1 until it becomes 0.

Resurrection Sickness (Day 4).name: Resurrection Sickness (Day 4)
Resurrection Sickness (Day 4).description: Coming back from the dead is an ordeal. The target takes a −4 penalty to D20 Tests. Every time the target finishes a Long Rest, the penalty is reduced by 1 until it becomes 0.

Resurrection Sickness (Day 3).name: Resurrection Sickness (Day 3)
Resurrection Sickness (Day 3).description: Coming back from the dead is an ordeal. The target takes a −4 penalty to D20 Tests. Every time the target finishes a Long Rest, the penalty is reduced by 1 until it becomes 0.

Sunbeam.name: Sunbeam
Sunbeam.description:
You launch a sunbeam in a 5-foot-wide, 60-foot-long Line. Each creature in the Line makes a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 6d8 Radiant damage and has the Blinded condition until the start of your next turn. On a successful save, it takes half as much damage only.

Until the spell ends, you can take a Magic action to create a new Line of radiance.

For the duration, a mote of brilliant radiance shines above you. It sheds Bright Light in a 30-foot radius and Dim Light for an additional 30 feet. This light is sunlight.

Blinded.name: Blinded
Blinded.description: The target has the &Reference[Blinded apply=false] condition until the start of your next turn.

Guidance.name: 神导术
Guidance.description: You touch a willing creature and choose a skill. Until the spell ends, the creature adds 1d4 to any ability check using the chosen skill.

Light.name: Light
Light.description:
You touch one Large or smaller object that isn't being worn or carried by someone else. Until the spell ends, the object sheds Bright Light in a 20-foot radius and Dim Light for an additional 20 feet. The light can be colored as you like.

Covering the object with something opaque blocks the light. The spell ends if you cast it again.

Thaumaturgy.name: Thaumaturgy
Thaumaturgy.description:
You manifest a minor wonder within range. You create one of the effects below within range. If you cast this spell multiple times, you can have up to three of its 1-minute effects active at a time.

Altered Eyes. You alter the appearance of your eyes for 1 minute.

Booming Voice. Your voice booms up to three times as loud as normal for 1 minute. For the duration, you have Advantage on [[/check ability=cha skill=itm]] checks.

Fire Play. You cause flames to flicker, brighten, dim, or change color for 1 minute.

Invisible Hand. You instantaneously cause an unlocked door or window to fly open or slam shut.

Phantom Sound. You create an instantaneous sound that originates from a point of your choice within range, such as a rumble of thunder, the cry of a raven, or ominous whispers.

Tremors. You cause harmless tremors in the ground for 1 minute.

Spare the Dying.name: 维生术
Spare the Dying.description:
Choose a creature within range that has 0 Hit Points and isn't dead. The creature becomes Stable.

Cantrip Upgrade. The range doubles when you reach levels 5 (30 feet), 11 (60 feet), and 17 (120 feet).

affects.special: 0 Hit Points and isn't dead

Shield.name: Shield
Shield.description: You gain the Armor Class benefit of a Shield only if you have training with it.

Regeneration.name: Regeneration
Regeneration.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] regains 10 Hit Points at the start of each of its turns. If the troll takes Fire damage, this trait doesn’t function at the start of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s next turn. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] dies only if it starts its turn with 0 Hit Points and doesn’t regenerate.

Freezing Breath.name: Freezing Breath
Freezing Breath.description: Constitution Saving Throw: DC 16, each creature in a 30-foot Cone. Failure: [[/damage average]] damage and has the &reference[Frozen] condition (escape DC 16). Success: Half damage only.

Frozen (DC 16).name: Frozen (DC 16)
Frozen (DC 16).description:
You're partially encased in ice:

  • You are &reference[Immobilized apply=false] & &reference[Defenseless apply=false].

  • You're &reference[Helpless apply=false] against attacks made with a weapon that deals bludgeoning damage.

  • You or another creature can take an action to break the ice away. To do so, you must succeed on a [[/check 16 str ath]] check.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes two [[/item Zw5fLBcRRIpSvppL]] attacks and one [[/item sDmvHQoFMiUNcsX4]] attack. It can replace its Bite attack with [[/item tDPhZ2bQkqri7B4H]], if available.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]], and target has the &reference[Slowed] condition until the end of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s next turn. Critical Hit: The target has the &reference[Frozen] condition (escape DC 16).

Slowing Bite.name: Slowing Bite
Slowing Bite.description: You are &reference[slowed apply=false] until the end of the winter troll's next turn.

Frozen (DC 16).name: Frozen (DC 16)
Frozen (DC 16).description:
You're partially encased in ice:

  • You are &reference[Immobilized apply=false] & &reference[Defenseless apply=false].

  • You're &reference[Helpless apply=false] against attacks made with a weapon that deals bludgeoning damage.

  • You or another creature can take an action to break the ice away. To do so, you must succeed on a [[/check 16 str ath]] check.

Unfathomable Presence..name: Unfathomable Presence.
Unfathomable Presence..description:
A creature that starts its turn within 120 feet of the [[lookup @name lowercase]] and can see it is subjected to the following effect. Intelligence Saving Throw: DC 15. Failure: The target has the &reference[Blinded] and &reference[Immobilized] conditions until the start of its next turn. Success: The target is immune to the Unfathomable Presence of all [[lookup @name lowercase]] for 24 hours.

Unless surprised, a creature can avert its eyes to avoid the saving throw at the start of its turn. If the creature does so, it has Disadvantage on attack rolls against the [[lookup @name lowercase]] until the start of its next turn. If the creature looks at the [[lookup @name lowercase]] in the meantime, that creature must immediately make the saving throw.

save.condition: When a creature starts its turn within 120 feet of the far dweller and can see it.

Unfathomable Presence.name: Unfathomable Presence
Unfathomable Presence.description: You are &reference[blinded apply=false] and &reference[immobilized apply=false] until the start of your next turn.

Mind Warp.name: Mind Warp
Mind Warp.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]], and the target must roll 1d4 and subtract the result from the next saving throw it makes before the end of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s next turn.

Mind Warp.name: Mind Warp
Mind Warp.description: You must subtract 1d4 from the next saving throw you make before the end of the far dweller's next turn.

Devour Thoughts.name: Devour Thoughts
Devour Thoughts.description:
Intelligence Saving Throw: DC 15, one creature within 30 feet of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]. Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target's Intelligence score is reduced by 1d4. If this effect reduces the target's Intelligence to 0, it has the &reference[Paralyzed] condition. The reduction lasts until the target finishes a Short or Long Rest.

Foundry Note

This feature has several different Active Effects to apply to a target when reducing their Intelligence score. Use the "Devour Thoughts" activity to roll the d4 and apply the correct variant of the Active Effect.

Intelligence Drain (-1).name: Intelligence Drain (-1)
Intelligence Drain (-1).description: You Intelligence score has been reduced by 1 until you finish a Short or Long Rest. If this reduces your Intelligence score to 0, you are &reference[paralyzed].

Intelligence Drain (-2).name: Intelligence Drain (-2)
Intelligence Drain (-2).description: You Intelligence score has been reduced by 2 until you finish a Short or Long Rest. If this reduces your Intelligence score to 0, you are &reference[paralyzed].

Intelligence Drain (-3).name: Intelligence Drain (-3)
Intelligence Drain (-3).description: You Intelligence score has been reduced by 3 until you finish a Short or Long Rest. If this reduces your Intelligence score to 0, you are &reference[paralyzed].

Intelligence Drain (-4).name: Intelligence Drain (-4)
Intelligence Drain (-4).description: You Intelligence score has been reduced by 4 until you finish a Short or Long Rest. If this reduces your Intelligence score to 0, you are &reference[paralyzed].

Abduct.name: Abduct
Abduct.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplPlaneShift] without components, targeting itself and each &reference[Incapacitated apply=false] creature within 10 feet of it.

affects.special: Each incapacitated creature.

Counterspell.name: Counterspell
Counterspell.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplCounterspe] in response to that spell's trigger, using Intelligence as their spellcasting ability.

G6wUakcCD7KyZxTX.condition: When the far dweller abductor sees a creature within range cast a spell with verbal, somatic, or material components.

Psychic Step.name: Psychic Step
Psychic Step.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] magically teleports to an unoccupied space it can see within 60 feet.

Plane Shift.name: Plane Shift
Plane Shift.description:
You and up to eight willing creatures who link hands in a circle are transported to a different plane of existence. You can specify a target destination in general terms, such as the City of Brass on the Elemental Plane of Fire or the palace of Dispater on the second level of the Nine Hells, and you appear in or near that destination, as determined by the DM.

Alternatively, if you know the sigil sequence of a teleportation circle on another plane of existence, this spell can take you to that circle. If the teleportation circle is too small to hold all the creatures you transported, they appear in the closest unoccupied spaces next to the circle.

materials.value: a forked, metal rod worth 250+ GP and attuned to a plane of existence

affects.special: you and up to eight willing creatures

Aberrant Traits.name: Aberrant Traits
Aberrant Traits.description:
Given the contamination and delerium present within the Space Between Worlds, all creatures who dwell there are the product of contamination and unaffected by the normal dangers of delerium. As an aberrant, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] has the following traits:

  • Fully Contaminated. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] is immune to &reference[drakkenheimContamination] and has Advantage on saving throws against contaminated spells. This creature may cast contaminated spells even though it does not gain Contamination levels.

  • Delerium Healing. As an action, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can touch a delerium shard to regain 10 (3d6) Hit Points. Once the [[lookup @name lowercase]] has used a delerium shard in this way, the shard can't be used in this manner again for 24 hours.

  • Alien Intellect. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] is immune to any effect that would sense its emotions or read its thoughts, as well as any divination spell that it refuses. Wisdom (Insight) checks made to ascertain the [[lookup @name lowercase]]s intentions or sincerity have Disadvantage.

affects.special: a delerium shard

XuAhBy15Ur7hhACp.name: Counterspell
XuAhBy15Ur7hhACp.description: You attempt to interrupt a creature in the process of casting a spell. The creature makes a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the spell dissipates with no effect, and the action, Bonus Action, or Reaction used to cast it is wasted. If that spell was cast with a spell slot, the slot isn't expended.

activation.condition: 当你看见范围内一名生物施展一道法术时执行

Dominate Person.name: Dominate Person
Dominate Person.description:
One Humanoid you can see within range must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or have the &Reference[Charmed apply=false] condition for the duration. The target has Advantage on the save if you or your allies are fighting it. Whenever the target takes damage, it repeats the save, ending the spell on itself on a success.

You have a telepathic link with the Charmed target while the two of you are on the same plane of existence. On your turn, you can use this link to issue commands to the target (no action required), such as "Attack that creature," "Move over there," or "Fetch that object."
