Scrying.description:
你能看见和听见一个和你处于同一存在位面上的生物。目标生物必须进行一次感知豁免；该豁免的调整值与你对目标的了解程度有关（见下文），也与你和目标之间的物理联系程度有关。目标不知道它进行此豁免在对抗什么，只是会感觉不自在。

你对目标的了解有… 豁免调整值
二手信息（你曾经听说过目标） +5
直接信息（你曾经见过目标） +0
熟悉（你对目标很了解） −5
你持有目标的… 豁免调整值
肖像或其他图像 −2
衣物或其他物品 −4
身体部位如头发或指甲 −10

如果对方豁免成功，则目标不受该法术影响，并且在 24 小时内你不能尝试探知同一个目标。

如果对方豁免失败，则你在目标身边 10 尺内创造出一个隐形的传感器。通过传感器，你可以身临其境地看见和听见周围的环境。传感器会跟随目标移动，并在法术持续时间内始终保持在目标 10 尺之内。在能够看到传感器的生物眼中，你的传感器是一个拳头大小的光球。

除生物之外，你也可以选择一个你以前见过的地点作为该法术的目标。这种情况下，传感器会出现在目标地点且不会移动。

materials.value: 一个至少价值 1000GP 的法器，例如水晶球、银镜、圣水盆

affects.special: 与你处于同一位面的生物，或某个你曾见过的地点的生物
目标身边 10 尺内

Slow.name: Slow
Slow.description:
You alter time around up to six creatures of your choice in a 40-foot Cube within range. Each target must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or be affected by this spell for the duration.

An affected target's Speed is halved, it takes a −2 penalty to AC and Dexterity saving throws, and it can't take Reactions. On its turns, it can take either an action or a Bonus Action, not both, and it can make only one attack if it takes the Attack action. If it casts a spell with a Somatic component, there is a [[/r 1d100cs<=25#Slowed spell cast success]]{25 percent} chance the spell fails as a result of the target making the spell's gestures too slowly.

An affected target repeats the save at the end of each of its turns, ending the spell on itself on a success.

Foundry Note

The inline roll above will return 1 if it succeeded or 0 if it failed.

Slowed.name: Slowed
Slowed.description:
An affected target’s Speed is halved, it takes a −2 penalty to AC and Dexterity saving throws, and it can’t take Reactions. On its turns, it can take either an action or a Bonus Action, not both, and it can make only one attack if it takes the Attack action. If it casts a spell with a Somatic component, there is a [[/r 1d100cs>25#Slowed spell cast success]]{25 percent} chance the spell fails as a result of the target making the spell’s gestures too slowly.

An affected target repeats the [[/save ability=wis]] save at the end of each of its turns, ending the spell on itself on a success.

Telekinesis.name: 心灵遥控
Telekinesis.description:
You gain the ability to move or manipulate creatures or objects by thought. When you cast the spell and as a Magic action on your later turns before the spell ends, you can exert your will on one creature or object that you can see within range, causing the appropriate effect below. You can affect the same target round after round or choose a new one at any time. If you switch targets, the prior target is no longer affected by the spell.

Creature. You can try to move a Huge or smaller creature. The target must succeed on a Strength saving throw, or you move it up to 30 feet in any direction within the spell's range. Until the end of your next turn, the creature has the &Reference[Restrained] condition, and if you lift it into the air, it is suspended there. It falls at the end of your next turn unless you use this option on it again and it fails the save.

Object. You can try to move a Huge or smaller object. If the object isn't being worn or carried, you automatically move it up to 30 feet in any direction within the spell's range.

If the object is worn or carried by a creature, that creature must succeed on a Strength saving throw, or you pull the object away and move it up to 30 feet in any direction within the spell's range.

You can exert fine control on objects with your telekinetic grip, such as manipulating a simple tool, opening a door or a container, stowing or retrieving an item from an open container, or pouring the contents from a vial.

Detect Thoughts.name: 侦测思想
Detect Thoughts.description:
你激活下述效应之一。直到法术结束为止，你可以在你随后的回合用一个魔法动作以激活下述任意效应之一。

感知思想。 你感知距你 30 尺内，知晓语言或能够心灵感应的思想的存在。你并不会阅读这些思想，但你知道这里存在一名有理智的生物。

此法术会被 1 尺厚的岩石、泥土或木头，1 寸厚的金属，或薄薄一层铅阻隔。

阅读思想。 选择一名距你 30 尺内的可见生物，或一名距你 30 尺内被感知思想侦测到的生物。你了解到此时目标最关心的事情。如果目标不知晓任何语言也不会心灵感应，则你不能得到任何信息。

在你的下一回合，用一个魔法动作，你可以尝试深入目标的心灵。如果你选择这么做，目标进行一次感知豁免。豁免失败，则你了解到他的逻辑推理、情绪状态以及他头脑中的一些大事（比如忧虑、挚爱和仇恨的事物）。豁免成功，法术终止。无论哪种情况，目标都会知道你正在窥探其心灵，且直到你的注意力从它的心灵上移开为止，目标均可以在其回合内使用动作进行一次 [[/check ability=int skill=arc dc=@attributes.spelldc]] 检定，对抗你的法术豁免DC，目标胜出对抗时，法术终止。

Magic Missile.name: Magic Missile
Magic Missile.description:
You create three glowing darts of magical force. Each dart strikes a creature of your choice that you can see within range. A dart deals 1d4 + 1 Force damage to its target. The darts all strike simultaneously, and you can direct them to hit one creature or several.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. The spell creates one more dart for each spell slot level above 1.

[[2 + @item.level]]{Level [[lookup @item.level]] darts}

Absorbing Flesh.name: Absorbing Flesh
Absorbing Flesh.description: A creature reduced to 0 Hit Points by the [[lookup @name lowercase]] is absorbed into its body and dies. When it absorbs a creature, the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s size increases by one category. If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] finishes a Long Rest and hasn't absorbed a body since its last Long Rest, its size decreases by one category.

Assimilating Pseudopod.name: Assimilating Pseudopod
Assimilating Pseudopod.description:
[[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]], and if the target is smaller than the [[lookup @name lowercase]], it is subjected to the following effect. Dexterity Saving Throw: DC 16. Failure: The target is swallowed by the [[lookup @name lowercase]]. A swallowed creature has the &reference[Blinded] and &reference[Restrained] conditions, has &reference[TotalCover] from attacks and effects outside the [[lookup @name lowercase]], and takes [[/damage average activity=NTmEt5kIAjdpRHYG]] damage and the start of each of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s turns. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] regains Hit Points equal to the amount of Necrotic damage dealt, and excess healing increases its Hit Point Maximum.

If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] takes 20 damage or more on a single turn from a creature inside it, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] must succeed on a [[/save activity=MnXSuE4tSwwaur9H]] saving throw at the end of that turn or regurgitate all swallowed creatures, which land with the &reference[Prone] condition in unoccupied spaces within 10 feet of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]. If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] dies, a swallowed creature no longer has the Restrained condition and can escape from the corpse using 20 feet of movement, exiting with the &reference[Prone] condition.

Regurgitate Save.name: Regurgitate Save
Regurgitate Save.condition: When the ravenous flora takes 20 damage or more on a single turn from a creature inside it.

affects.special: Creatures swallowed by the uncontained growth.

Swallowed.name: Swallowed
Swallowed.description:
You have been swallowed by the uncontained growth. While swallowed, you are &reference[blinded apply=false], &reference[restrained apply=false], and have &reference[totalcover] from effects originating from outside the uncontained growth.

You take [[/damage average necrotic 4d8]] damage at the start of each of the uncontained growth's turns.

Adaptable Flesh.name: Adaptable Flesh
Adaptable Flesh.description: Trigger: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] takes damage from a spell or attack. Response: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] halves the damage it takes from the triggering spell or attack.

utility.condition: When the uncontained growth takes damage from a spell or attack.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes a number of attacks based on its size: two (Medium), three (Large), four (Huge) or five (Gargantuan).

Reckless.name: Reckless
Reckless.description: At the start of its turn, this [[lookup @name lowercase]] can gain Advantage on all melee attack rolls until the start of its next turn, but attack rolls against it have Advantage during that time.

Reckless.name: Reckless
Reckless.description: The dreg has Advantage on all melee attack rolls until the start of its next turn, but attack rolls against it have advantage during that time.

Bounding Leap.name: Bounding Leap
Bounding Leap.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] jumps 20 feet. This movement does not count toward its total movement for the round.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes two attacks with its [[/item 5mE9PeFF8MbFG2NP]].

Claws.name: Claws
Claws.description:
[[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]].

Critical Hit: Constitution Saving Throw: DC 12. Failure: The target gains one level of Contamination.

save.condition: On Critical Hit

Blood Sacrifice.name: Blood Sacrifice
Blood Sacrifice.description: A creature with the &reference[Restrained apply=false] condition also has the &reference[Helpless] condition against the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s attacks.

Plasma Absorption.name: Plasma Absorption
Plasma Absorption.description: Each time a creature takes damage from the &reference[Bleeding apply=false] condition while within 30 feet of the [[lookup @name lowercase]], the [[lookup @name lowercase]] regains Hit Points equal to the damage dealt.

Bloodthorn Whip.name: Bloodthorn Whip
Bloodthorn Whip.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]], and the target has the &reference[Bleeding] condition (4d4).

Bleeding (4d4).name: Bleeding (4d4)
Bleeding (4d4).description:
You're losing blood to an open wound.

  • Ongoing Damage: At the end of each of your turns, you lose [[/r 4d4]] Hit Points.

  • Regaining Hit Points: This condition ends if you regain any Hit Points.

  • Medical Treatment: You or another creature within 5 feet of you can spend an action and use a Healer's Kit to staunch the bleeding (no check required), ending the condition.

Bloodroots.name: Bloodroots
Bloodroots.description: Dexterity Saving Throw: DC 17, each creature in a 30-foot Emanation originating from the [[lookup @name lowercase]]. Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target has the &reference[Restrained] condition (save ends). Success: Half damage only.

Bloodroots.name: Bloodroots
Bloodroots.description: You are &reference[restrained apply=false]. You can repeat your saving throw against this effect at the end of each of your turns, ending the effect on a success.

Claws.name: Claws
Claws.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]], and if the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it has the &reference[Grappled] condition (escape DC 15).

Draining Bite.name: Draining Bite
Draining Bite.description: Constitution Saving Throw: DC 17, one creature within 5 feet that is willing or has the &reference[Grappled apply=false], &reference[Incapacitated apply=false], or &reference[Restrained apply=false] condition. Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target has the &reference[weakened] condition (save ends).

affects.special: A creature that is willing or has the Grappled, Incapacitated, or Restrained condition.

Draining Bite.name: Draining Bite
Draining Bite.description: You are &reference[weakened apply=false]. You can repeat your saving throw against this effect at the end of each of your turns, ending the effect on a success.

Druidcraft.name: Druidcraft
Druidcraft.description:
Whispering to the spirits of nature, you create one of the following effects within range.

Weather Sensor. You create a Tiny, harmless sensory effect that predicts what the weather will be at your location for the next 24 hours. The effect might manifest as a golden orb for clear skies, a cloud for rain, falling snowflakes for snow, and so on. This effect persists for 1 round.

Bloom. You instantly make a flower blossom, a seed pod open, or a leaf bud bloom.

Sensory Effect. You create a harmless sensory effect, such as falling leaves, spectral dancing fairies, a gentle breeze, the sound of an animal, or the faint odor of skunk. The effect must fit in a 5-foot Cube.

Fire Play. You light or snuff out a candle, a torch, or a campfire.

Dispel Magic.name: 解除魔法
Dispel Magic.description:
在施法距离内指定一名生物、一个物件或一处魔法效应。所有影响该目标的三环或更低环阶法术即告终止。每个影响目标的四环或更高环阶法术都需要以你的施法属性进行一次属性检定（DC 10 + 目标法术环阶），检定成功时目标法术终止。

升环施法： 你直接终止影响目标的小于等于该施法环阶的法术效应。

Dominate Beast.name: Dominate Beast
Dominate Beast.description:
One Beast you can see within range must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or have the &Reference[Charmed apply=false] condition for the duration. The target has Advantage on the save if you or your allies are fighting it. Whenever the target takes damage, it repeats the save, ending the spell on itself on a success.

You have a telepathic link with the Charmed target while the two of you are on the same plane of existence. On your turn, you can use this link to issue commands to the target (no action required), such as "Attack that creature," "Move over there," or "Fetch that object." The target does its best to obey on its turn. If it completes an order and doesn't receive further direction from you, it acts and moves as it likes, focusing on protecting itself.

You can command the target to take a Reaction but must take your own Reaction to do so.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. Your Concentration can last longer with a spell slot of level 5 (up to 10 minutes), 6 (up to 1 hour), or 7+ (up to 8 hours).

Dominated.name: Dominated
Dominated.description: Whenever the &Reference[Charmed apply=false] target takes damage, it repeats the [[/save ability=wis]] save, ending the spell on itself on a success.

Entangle.name: 纠缠术
Entangle.description:
缠绕的植物在施法距离内从 20 尺方状区域地面中破土而出。在法术持续时间内，这片被植物覆盖的区域变为&Reference[difficultterrain]{困难地形}。法术结束时，这些植物会消失。

在你施展法术时，该区域内的生物（除你之外）必须成功于一次力量豁免，否则陷入&Reference[restrained]{束缚}状态，直到法术终止。一名因此被束缚的生物可以用其动作进行一次[[/check ability=str skill=ath dc=@attributes.spelldc]]检定对抗该法术的豁免 DC。检定成功则成功摆脱缠绕在其身上的藤蔓并不再被其束缚。

Restrained.name: 束缚
Restrained.description: 陷入束缚的生物可以用其动作进行一次 [[/check ability=str skill=ath dc=@attributes.spelldc]] 检定对抗该法术的豁免DC。检定成功则成功摆脱缠绕在其身上的藤蔓并不再被其束缚。

Faerie Fire.name: Faerie Fire
Faerie Fire.description:
Objects in a 20-foot Cube within range are outlined in blue, green, or violet light (your choice). Each creature in the Cube is also outlined if it fails a Dexterity saving throw. For the duration, objects and affected creatures shed &Reference[dimlight] in a 10-foot radius and can't benefit from the Invisible condition.

Attack rolls against an affected creature or object have Advantage if the attacker can see it.

Outlined.name: Outlined
Outlined.description:
For the duration, objects and affected creatures shed &Reference[dimlight] in a 10-foot radius and can’t benefit from the Invisible condition.

Attack rolls against an affected creature or object have Advantage if the attacker can see it.

Pass without Trace.name: Pass without Trace
Pass without Trace.description: You radiate a concealing aura in a 30-foot Emanation for the duration. While in the aura, you and each creature you choose have a +10 bonus to [[/check ability=dex skill=ste]] checks and leave no tracks.

Concealed.name: Concealed
Concealed.description: While in the aura, you and each creature you choose have a +10 bonus to [[/check ability=dex skill=ste]] checks and leave no tracks.

Spike Growth.name: Spike Growth
Spike Growth.description:
The ground in a 20-foot-radius Sphere centered on a point within range sprouts hard spikes and thorns. The area becomes Difficult Terrain for the duration. When a creature moves into or within the area, it takes [[/damage 2d4 type=piercing]] damage for every 5 feet it travels.

The transformation of the ground is camouflaged to look natural. Any creature that can't see the area when the spell is cast must take a Search action and succeed on a [[/check ability=wis skill=prc dc=@attributes.spell.dc]] or [[/check ability=wis skill=sur dc=@attributes.spell.dc]] check against your spell save DC to recognize the terrain as hazardous before entering it.

Antilife Shell.name: Antilife Shell
Antilife Shell.description:
An aura extends from you in a 10-foot Emanation for the duration. The aura prevents creatures other than Constructs and Undead from passing or reaching through it. An affected creature can cast spells or make attacks with Ranged or Reach weapons through the barrier.

If you move so that an affected creature is forced to pass through the barrier, the spell ends.

Contagion.name: Contagion
Contagion.description:
Your touch inflicts a magical contagion. The target must succeed on a Constitution saving throw or take 11d8 Necrotic damage and have the &Reference[Poisoned apply=false] condition. Also, choose one ability when you cast the spell. While Poisoned, the target has Disadvantage on saving throws made with the chosen ability.

The target must repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns until it gets three successes or failures. If the target succeeds on three of these saves, the spell ends on the target. If the target fails three of the saves, the spell lasts for 7 days on it.

Whenever the Poisoned target receives an effect that would end the Poisoned condition, the target must succeed on a [[/save ability=con dc=@attributes.spell.dc format=long]], or the Poisoned condition doesn't end on it.

Infected (Strength).name: Infected (Strength)
Infected (Strength).description:
• While &Reference[Poisoned apply=false], the target has Disadvantage on saving throws made with the chosen ability.

  • The target must repeat the [[/save ability=con format=long]] at the end of each of its turns until it gets three successes or failures.

  • Whenever the target receives an effect that would end the Poisoned condition, the target must succeed on a [[/save ability=con format=long]], or the condition doesn’t end on it.

Infected (Dexterity).name: Infected (Dexterity)
Infected (Dexterity).description:
• While &Reference[Poisoned apply=false], the target has Disadvantage on saving throws made with the chosen ability.

  • The target must repeat the [[/save ability=con format=long]] at the end of each of its turns until it gets three successes or failures.

  • Whenever the target receives an effect that would end the Poisoned condition, the target must succeed on a [[/save ability=con format=long]], or the condition doesn’t end on it.

Infected (Constitution).name: Infected (Constitution)
Infected (Constitution).description:
• While &Reference[Poisoned apply=false], the target has Disadvantage on saving throws made with the chosen ability.

  • The target must repeat the [[/save ability=con format=long]] at the end of each of its turns until it gets three successes or failures.

  • Whenever the target receives an effect that would end the Poisoned condition, the target must succeed on a [[/save ability=con format=long]], or the condition doesn’t end on it.

Infected (Intelligence).name: Infected (Intelligence)
Infected (Intelligence).description:
• While &Reference[Poisoned apply=false], the target has Disadvantage on saving throws made with the chosen ability.

  • The target must repeat the [[/save ability=con format=long]] at the end of each of its turns until it gets three successes or failures.

  • Whenever the target receives an effect that would end the Poisoned condition, the target must succeed on a [[/save ability=con format=long]], or the condition doesn’t end on it.

Infected (Wisdom).name: Infected (Wisdom)
Infected (Wisdom).description:
• While &Reference[Poisoned apply=false], the target has Disadvantage on saving throws made with the chosen ability.

  • The target must repeat the [[/save ability=con format=long]] at the end of each of its turns until it gets three successes or failures.

  • Whenever the target receives an effect that would end the Poisoned condition, the target must succeed on a [[/save ability=con format=long]], or the condition doesn’t end on it.

Infected (Charisma).name: Infected (Charisma)
Infected (Charisma).description:
• While &Reference[Poisoned apply=false], the target has Disadvantage on saving throws made with the chosen ability.

  • The target must repeat the [[/save ability=con format=long]] at the end of each of its turns until it gets three successes or failures.

  • Whenever the target receives an effect that would end the Poisoned condition, the target must succeed on a [[/save ability=con format=long]], or the condition doesn’t end on it.

Create Undead.name: Create Undead
Create Undead.description:
You can cast this spell only at night. Choose up to three corpses of Medium or Small Humanoids within range. Each one becomes a @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.monsters.Actor.OBujQLLPSmlJiZnL]{Ghoul} under your control (see the Monster Manual for its stat block).

As a Bonus Action on each of your turns, you can mentally command any creature you animated with this spell if the creature is within 120 feet of you (if you control multiple creatures, you can command any of them at the same time, issuing the same command to them). You decide what action the creature will take and where it will move on its next turn, or you can issue a general command, such as to guard a particular place. If you issue no commands, the creature takes the &Reference[Dodge] action and moves only to avoid harm. Once given an order, the creature continues to follow the order until its task is complete.

The creature is under your control for 24 hours, after which it stops obeying any command you've given it. To maintain control of the creature for another 24 hours, you must cast this spell on the creature before the current 24-hour period ends. This use of the spell reasserts your control over up to three creatures you have animated with this spell rather than animating new ones.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot.If you use a level 7 spell slot, you can animate or reassert control over four Ghouls. If you use a level 8 spell slot, you can animate or reassert control over five Ghouls or two @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.monsters.Actor.IyIybE5t2adMEVUM]{Ghasts} or @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.monsters.Actor.rbyp54px2D0ql4QK]{Wights}. If you use a level 9 spell slot, you can animate or reassert control over six Ghouls, three Ghasts or Wights, or two @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.monsters.Actor.t8WYD7ak07X7xpx8]{Mummies}. See the Monster Manual for these stat blocks.

materials.value: one 150+ GP black onyx stone for each corpse

affects.special: corpse of Medium or Small Humanoid or previously created undead

Insect Plague.name: Insect Plague
Insect Plague.description:
Swarming locusts fill a 20-foot-radius Sphere centered on a point you choose within range. The Sphere remains for the duration, and its area is &Reference[LightlyObscured] and &Reference[DifficultTerrain].

When the swarm appears, each creature in it makes a Constitution saving throw, taking 4d10 Piercing damage on a failed save or half as much damage on a successful one. A creature also makes this save when it enters the spell's area for the first time on a turn or ends its turn there. A creature makes this save only once per turn.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot.The damage increases by 1d10 for each spell slot level above 5.

Mass Suggestion.name: Mass Suggestion
Mass Suggestion.description:
You suggest a course of activity—described in no more than 25 words—to twelve or fewer creatures you can see within range that can hear and understand you. The suggestion must sound achievable and not involve anything that would obviously deal damage to any of the targets or their allies. For example, you could say, "Walk to the village down that road, and help the villagers there harvest crops until sunset." Or you could say, "Now is not the time for violence. Drop your weapons, and dance! Stop in an hour."

Each target must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or have the &Reference[Charmed apply=false] condition for the duration or until you or your allies deal damage to the target. Each Charmed target pursues the suggestion to the best of its ability. The suggested activity can continue for the entire duration, but if the suggested activity can be completed in a shorter time, the spell ends for a target upon completing it.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. The duration is longer with a spell slot of level 7 (10 days), 8 (30 days), or 9 (366 days).

Charmed.name: Charmed
Charmed.description: The target has the &Reference[Charmed apply=false] condition for the duration or until you or your allies deal damage to the target. Each Charmed target pursues the suggestion to the best of its ability.

Scrying.name: 探知术
Scrying.description:
你能看见和听见一个和你处于同一存在位面上的生物。目标生物必须进行一次感知豁免；该豁免的调整值与你对目标的了解程度有关（见下文），也与你和目标之间的物理联系程度有关。目标不知道它进行此豁免在对抗什么，只是会感觉不自在。

你对目标的了解有… 豁免调整值
二手信息（你曾经听说过目标） +5
直接信息（你曾经见过目标） +0
熟悉（你对目标很了解） −5
你持有目标的… 豁免调整值
肖像或其他图像 −2
衣物或其他物品 −4
身体部位如头发或指甲 −10

如果对方豁免成功，则目标不受该法术影响，并且在 24 小时内你不能尝试探知同一个目标。

如果对方豁免失败，则你在目标身边 10 尺内创造出一个隐形的传感器。通过传感器，你可以身临其境地看见和听见周围的环境。传感器会跟随目标移动，并在法术持续时间内始终保持在目标 10 尺之内。在能够看到传感器的生物眼中，你的传感器是一个拳头大小的光球。

除生物之外，你也可以选择一个你以前见过的地点作为该法术的目标。这种情况下，传感器会出现在目标地点且不会移动。

materials.value: 一个至少价值 1000GP 的法器，例如水晶球、银镜、圣水盆

affects.special: 与你处于同一位面的生物，或某个你曾见过的地点的生物
目标身边 10 尺内

Shield.name: Shield
Shield.description: You gain the Armor Class benefit of a Shield only if you have training with it.

Regeneration.name: Regeneration
Regeneration.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] regains 10 Hit Points at the start of its turn if it has at least 1 Hit Point and isn't in sunlight or running water. If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] takes Radiant damage or damage from holy water, this trait doesn't function at the start of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s next turn.

Swarm.name: Swarm
Swarm.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can move through any opening large enough for a Small ratling. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can't regain Hit Points or gain Temporary Hit Points.

Chittering Mass.name: Chittering Mass
Chittering Mass.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has Advantage on attack rolls against any creature in its space.

Scampering Survivors.name: Scampering Survivors
Scampering Survivors.description: When the [[lookup @name lowercase]] is reduced to 0 Hit Points, it leaves behind 1d4 @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.kJiRPjOEfAOB9wXz]{Ratling Warriors} in its space.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]] or [[/damage 4d6 piercing average]] damage if the [[lookup @name lowercase]] has the &reference[Bloodied] condition. If the target is a creature, it has the &reference[Grappled] condition (escape DC 14).

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes one [[/item hZPXmxea4t4cOyJD]] attack against each creature in its space.

Sanctified by Falling Fire.name: Sanctified by Falling Fire
Sanctified by Falling Fire.description: When the [[lookup @name lowercase]] dies, its soul is pulled into the delerium crystal embedded in its chest.

Unarmored Defense.name: Unarmored Defense
Unarmored Defense.description: While the [[lookup @name lowercase]] is wearing no armor and wielding no shield, its AC includes its Wisdom modifier (included above).

Flame Step.name: Flame Step
Flame Step.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] teleports to an unoccupied space it can see within 60 feet that is in Bright Light. It gains Advantage on its next melee attack.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes three [[/item .BJ1ndikq9g38611o]] attacks or five [[/item .wOAPB6FJe0Hejfg0]] attacks.

Anchored.name: Anchored
Anchored.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] is firmly anchored in place. It can't be forced to move or teleport unless it chooses to be.

Haze Aura.name: Haze Aura
Haze Aura.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] conjures Deep Haze in a 30-foot Emanation, which renders its area &reference[LightlyObscured]. A creature that starts its turn in the area is subjected to the following effect. Constitution Saving Throw: DC 10. Failure: The target gains one Contamination level. Failure or Success: [[/damage average]] damage.

Harden.name: Harden
Harden.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] regains 7 (2d6) Hit Points, gaining any excess healing as Temporary Hit Points.

Contaminated Touch.name: Contaminated Touch
Contaminated Touch.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]]. Constitution Saving Throw: DC 10. Failure: The target gains one &reference[drakkenheimContamination] level. If the target is &reference[Charmed apply=false] by the [[lookup @name lowercase]], it is hit automatically and has Disadvantage on its save.

Hypnotic Pollen.name: Hypnotic Pollen
Hypnotic Pollen.description: Wisdom Saving Throw: DC 10, each creature in a 30-foot Emanation originating from the [[lookup @name lowercase]]. Failure: The target has the &reference[Charmed] condition for 1 minute. While Charmed, the target has the &reference[Incapacitated] condition and must approach the [[lookup @name lowercase]] on its turns, taking the most direct path possible and moving through hazards. The effect ends early if a creature takes an action to shake the target out of its stupor.

Spell Reflection.name: Spell Reflection
Spell Reflection.description: Trigger: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] succeeds on its save against a spell that targets only the [[lookup @name lowercase]] and doesn't have an area of effect, or a spell attack misses the [[lookup @name lowercase]]. Response: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] chooses a creature it can see within 30 feet as the spell's new target (the original caster is a valid target). If the spell forces a saving throw, the new target makes its own save. If the spell has an attack roll, the original caster rerolls the attack against the new target.

utility.condition: When the eldritch blossom succeeds on its save against a spell that targets only the eldritch blossom and doesn't have area of affect, or a spell attack misses the eldritch blossom.

False Appearance.name: False Appearance
False Appearance.description: While the [[lookup @name lowercase]] remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from an ordinary flower.

Normal Semblance.name: Normal Semblance
Normal Semblance.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has Advantage on Charisma (Deception) and Dexterity (Stealth) checks to pass itself off as an ordinary Small Humanoid such as a Human urchin or a Halfling.

Syringe.name: Syringe
Syringe.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]]. Constitution Saving Throw: DC 11. Failure: [[/damage average]] damage. Success: Half damage. Failure or Success: If this Poison damage reduces the target to 0 Hit Points, it is stabilized but has the &Reference[Poisoned] condition for 1 hour, even if it regains Hit Points. While Poisoned, the target has the &reference[Paralyzed] condition.

Poison Syringe.name: Poison Syringe
Poison Syringe.description: For the next hour, you are Stable but &reference[poisoned apply=false]. While Poisoned in this way, you are &reference[Paralyzed apply=false].

Latch.name: Latch
Latch.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] moves up to its Speed. If it ends this movement within 5 feet of a Medium or larger creature, it can make one Surgical Claw attack against that creature. Hit: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] attaches to the target. While attached, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] has Advantage on attack rolls against the target.

The attached [[lookup @name lowercase]] moves with the target, using none of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s movement. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can detach itself by using 5 feet of movement on its turn. A creature within 5 feet, including the target, can take an action to detach the [[lookup @name lowercase]] with a successful [[/check]] check.

Cunning Action.name: Cunning Action
Cunning Action.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] takes the Dash, Disengage, or Hide action.

Surgical Claw.name: Surgical Claw
Surgical Claw.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]], and the target has the &reference[Bleeding] condition (2d4).

Bleeding (2d4).name: Bleeding (2d4)
Bleeding (2d4).description:
You're losing blood to an open wound.

  • Ongoing Damage: At the end of each of your turns, you lose [[/r 2d4]] Hit Points.

  • Regaining Hit Points: This condition ends if you regain any Hit Points.

  • Medical Treatment: You or another creature within 5 feet of you can spend an action and use a Healer's Kit to staunch the bleeding (no check required), ending the condition.

Keen Smell.name: Keen Smell
Keen Smell.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

Pack Tactics.name: Pack Tactics
Pack Tactics.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has Advantage on attack rolls against a creature if at least one of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally doesn't have the &reference[Incapacitated apply=false] condition.

Ratling Cunning.name: Ratling Cunning
Ratling Cunning.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] takes the Dash, Disengage, or Hide action.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]].

Bolts.name: Bolts
Bolts.description:
Storage: @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.equipment24.Item.phbagCaseCrossbo]{Case}

@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.equipment24.Item.phbagAmmunitionV]{Ammunition} is required by a weapon that has the Ammunition property. A weapon's description specifies the type of ammunition used by the weapon. The Ammunition table lists the different types and the amount you get when you buy them. The table also lists the item that is typically used to store each type; storage must be bought separately.

Contaminated Blade.name: Contaminated Blade
Contaminated Blade.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]]. Constitution Saving Throw: DC 10. Failure: [[/damage average]] damage. Failure by 5 or More: The target also gains one &reference[drakkenheimContamination] level. Success: Half damage only.

Mutated Strains.name: Mutated Strains
Mutated Strains.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s attacks and effects ignore the target's Resistance or Immunity to Poison damage and Immunity to the &reference[Poisoned apply=false] condition and disease.

Poison Needle.name: Poison Needle
Poison Needle.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]]. If this damage reduces the target to 0 Hit Points, it is stabilized and has the &reference[Poisoned] condition for 1 hour, even if it regains Hit Points. While Poisoned, the target has the &reference[Paralyzed] condition.

Poison Needle.name: Poison Needle
Poison Needle.description: While at 0 Hit Points, you are Stabilized, &reference[poisoned apply=false]. While Poisoned in this way, you are also &reference[paralyzed apply=false].

Pestilent Infection.name: Pestilent Infection
Pestilent Infection.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] infects one creature it can see within 30 feet with a magical disease. At the start of each of its turns, the target is subjected to the following effect. Constitution Saving Throw: DC 16. Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target gains one Exhaustion level. Third Success: The disease ends.

Pestilent Infection.name: Pestilent Infection
Pestilent Infection.description:
You have been infected with a magical disease. At the start of each of your turns, you must make a [[/save con 16]] saving throw or take [[/damage average necrotic 4d8]] damage and gain one Exhaustion level.

If you succeed your saving throw against this effect three times, the disease ends.

Plague Wind.name: Plague Wind
Plague Wind.description: Constitution Saving Throw: DC 16, each creature in a 60-foot Cone. Failure: [[/damage average]] damage. Success: Half damage. Failure or Success: If the target has 25 Hit Points or fewer after taking this damage, it dies and its flesh turns to ash, leaving a weathered skeleton.

Outbreak.name: Outbreak
Outbreak.description: Trigger: A creature the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see that is infected by its Pestilent Infection is reduced to 0 Hit Points or dies. Response: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] spreads the disease to another creature it can see within 30 feet of the infected creature.

utility.condition: When a creature the pathogenist can see that is infected  by its Pestilent Infection is reduced to 0 Hit Points or dies.

Heightened Tolerance.name: Heightened Tolerance
Heightened Tolerance.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] ends the &reference[Charmed apply=false] or &reference[Frightened apply=false] condition on itself.

Snail Trail.name: Snail Trail
Snail Trail.description: When the [[lookup @name lowercase]] moves through a space, it fills the space with contaminated mucus that remains for 10 minutes. A creature that ends its turn in the mucus is covered in goop and subjected to the following effect. Dexterity Saving Throw: DC 17. Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target has the &reference[Slowed] condition. Each time the creature ends its turn with the Slowed condition, it gains a Contamination level. A creature within 5 feet can take an action to clean away the goop, ending the Slowed condition.

Snail Trail.name: Snail Trail
Snail Trail.description: You are covered in goop and &reference[slowed apply=false]. While Slowed in this way, you gain a level of contamination at the end of each of your turns. You or a creature within 5 feet of you can take an action to clean away the goop, ending the Slowed condition on you.

Creep.name: Creep
Creep.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] moves up to its Speed, and can enter the spaces of Large or smaller creatures as it does. Each creature whose space it enters is subjected once to the following effect. Strength Saving Throw: DC 17. Success: The target is pushed 5 feet away from the [[lookup @name lowercase]] into a space of its choice. If the target chooses not to move, it suffers the effects of a failure. Failure: The target has the &reference[Prone] condition and is subjected to Snail Trail.

Shell Reflection.name: Shell Reflection
Shell Reflection.description: Trigger: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] takes damage from a spell or magical attack. Response: The attacker takes Radiant damage equal to the triggering damage and causes an Arcane Anomaly.

damage.condition: When the creature takes damage from a spell or magical attack.

Contaminated Regeneration.name: Contaminated Regeneration
Contaminated Regeneration.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] regains 10 Hit Points at the start of its turn as long as it is in contaminated water. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] dies only if it starts its turn with 0 Hit Points and doesn't regenerate.

Amphibious Lunge.name: Amphibious Lunge
Amphibious Lunge.description: If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] swims 20+ feet on its turn, it can long jump or high jump up to 60 feet. If it ends this jump within 5 feet of a creature, it has Advantage on its next [[/item 8TmQvDWlVkxThSep]] attack against that creature, and that attack deals an additional [[/damage average]] damage.

Predatory Stealth.name: Predatory Stealth
Predatory Stealth.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has Advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks to Hide in water.

Submerge.name: Submerge
Submerge.description: Trigger: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] takes damage while in water. Response: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] swims half its speed and takes the Hide action.

Hide.name: Hide
Hide.condition: When the sewer gator takes damage while in water.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes two attacks. It can't make both [[/item 8TmQvDWlVkxThSep]] and a [[/item Z4PBHwuBrSi9YGmW]] attack against the same target.

Crushing Bite.name: Crushing Bite
Crushing Bite.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]], and if the target is Large or smaller, it has the &reference[Grappled] condition (escape DC 19). While Grappled, the target has the &reference[Restrained] condition and the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can’t use Crushing Bite against another target.

Grappled by Crushing Bite.name: Grappled by Crushing Bite
Grappled by Crushing Bite.description: You are &reference[grappled apply=false] (escape DC 19). While grappled in this way, you are also &reference[restrained apply=false].

Tail Strike.name: Tail Strike
Tail Strike.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]], and the target is pushed 20 feet away from the [[lookup @name lowercase]] and has the &reference[Prone] condition.

Death Roll.name: Death Roll
Death Roll.description: Melee Attack Roll: +11, reach 15 ft., one creature &reference[Grappled apply=false] by the [[lookup @name lowercase]]. [[/damage extended]]. Strength Saving Throw: DC 19. Failure: The target has the &reference[Dazed] and &reference[Helpless] conditions until it escapes the [[lookup @name lowercase]] grapple.

Death Roll.name: Death Roll
Death Roll.description: You are &reference[dazed apply=false] and &reference[helpless apply=false] until you escape the sewer gator's grapple.

For the Flame!.name: For the Flame!
For the Flame!.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can take an additional [[/item 4ZQjN253Bib1nw8Y]] action on its turn.

Helping Hand.name: Helping Hand
Helping Hand.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] grants a creature within 5 feet of them &reference[Valor] (1d4) until the end of that creature's turn.

Valor (1d4).name: Valor (1d4)
Valor (1d4).description: You add 1d4 to your attack rolls and saving throws.

Look Out!.name: Look Out!
Look Out!.description: Trigger: An ally within 5 feet of the [[lookup @name lowercase]] is hit by an attack. Response: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] takes the attack's damage instead.

utility.condition: When an ally within 5 feet of the squire is hit y an attack.

Arrows.name: Arrows
Arrows.description:
Storage: @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.equipment24.Item.phbagQuiver00000]{Quiver}

@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.equipment24.Item.phbagAmmunitionV]{Ammunition} is required by a weapon that has the Ammunition property. A weapon's description specifies the type of ammunition used by the weapon. The Ammunition table lists the different types and the amount you get when you buy them. The table also lists the item that is typically used to store each type; storage must be bought separately.

Shield.name: Shield
Shield.description: You gain the Armor Class benefit of a Shield only if you have training with it.

Sanctified by Falling Fire.name: Sanctified by Falling Fire
Sanctified by Falling Fire.description: When the [[lookup @name lowercase]] dies, its soul is pulled into the delerium crystal embedded in its chest.

Longsword.name: Longsword
Longsword.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]], or [[/damage average twoHanded]] if wielded with two hands.

Deny the Witch.name: Deny the Witch
Deny the Witch.description: Trigger: A creature the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within 60 feet casts a spell. Response: If the spell is level 3 or lower, the spell fails, but no resources are wasted.

utility.condition: When a creature the paladin can see within 60 feet casts a spell.

Lay on Hands.name: Lay on Hands
Lay on Hands.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] touches another creature. The target regains 11 (2d8 + 2) Hit Points and is cured of one disease or the Poisoned condition.

Enraged.name: Enraged
Enraged.description: While &reference[Bloodied], the [[lookup @name lowercase]] gains Advantage on all attack rolls.

Plant Camouflage.name: Plant Camouflage
Plant Camouflage.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has Advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to Hide in forests.

Siege Monster.name: Siege Monster
Siege Monster.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] deals double damage to objects and structures.

Thwack.name: Thwack
Thwack.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]], and if the target is Large or smaller, it is pushed 10 feet and has the &reference[Prone] condition

Crushing Roots.name: Crushing Roots
Crushing Roots.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]], and if the target is Large or smaller, it has the &reference[Grappled] condition (escape DC 16). While Grappled, the target has the &reference[Restrained] condition. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can grapple up to four creatures at a time

Grappled by Crushing Roots.name: Grappled by Crushing Roots
Grappled by Crushing Roots.description: You are &reference[grappled apply=false] (escape DC 16). While grappled in this way, you are also &reference[restrained apply=false].

Delerium Fruit.name: Delerium Fruit
Delerium Fruit.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]]. Constitution Saving Throw: DC 18. Failure: The target gains one &reference[drakkenheimcontamination] level. Failure by 5 or More: The target triggers an Arcane Anomaly centered on itself.

Take Root.name: Take Root
Take Root.description: If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] has not moved this round, it can plant itself into the ground. It regains 18 (4d8) Hit Points and has the &reference[Immobilized] condition until the start of its next turn. While Immobilized, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] has Immunity to the &reference[Grappled apply=false], &reference[Prone apply=false], and &reference[Restrained apply=false] conditions, and its AC increases to 20. These benefits end early if the [[lookup @name lowercase]] takes Fire damage.

Shadow Bolt.name: Shadow Bolt
Shadow Bolt.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]], and the target can't regain Hit Points until the start of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s next turn.

Shadow Bolt.name: Shadow Bolt
Shadow Bolt.description: You cannot regain Hit Points until the start of the academy outcast's next turn.

Summon Demon.name: Summon Demon
Summon Demon.description: The outcast magically summons three @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.actors24.Actor.mmDretch00000000]{Dretches} or one @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.actors24.Actor.mmQuasit00000000]. The summoned creatures appear in an un occupied space within 60 feet of the outcast, whom they obey. They take their turns immediately after the outcast. The creatures remain for 1 hour, until the outcast dies, or until dismissed by the outcast as a Bonus Action.

Bestow Curse.name: Bestow Curse
Bestow Curse.description:
You touch a creature, which must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or become cursed for the duration. Until the curse ends, the target suffers one of the following effects of your choice:

  • Choose one ability. The target has Disadvantage on ability checks and saving throws made with that ability (Curse Ability activity).
  • The target has Disadvantage on attack rolls against you (Curse Attacks activity).
  • In combat, the target must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw at the start of each of its turns or be forced to take the &Reference[Dodge] action on that turn (Curse Actions activity).
  • If you deal damage to the target with an attack roll or a spell, the target takes an extra 1d8 Necrotic damage (Curse Resilience activity).

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. If you cast this spell using a level 4 spell slot, you can maintain Concentration on it for up to 10 minutes. If you use a level 5+ spell slot, the spell doesn't require Concentration, and the duration becomes 8 hours (level 5–6 slot) or 24 hours (level 7–8 slot). If you use a level 9 spell slot, the spell lasts until dispelled.

Cursed Charisma.name: Cursed Charisma
Cursed Charisma.description: The target has Disadvantage on ability checks and saving throws made with the chosen ability.

Cursed Constitution.name: Cursed Constitution
Cursed Constitution.description: The target has Disadvantage on ability checks and saving throws made with the chosen ability.

Cursed Dexterity.name: Cursed Dexterity
Cursed Dexterity.description: The target has Disadvantage on ability checks and saving throws made with the chosen ability.

Cursed Intelligence.name: Cursed Intelligence
Cursed Intelligence.description: The target has Disadvantage on ability checks and saving throws made with the chosen ability.

Cursed Strength.name: Cursed Strength
Cursed Strength.description: The target has Disadvantage on ability checks and saving throws made with the chosen ability.

Cursed Wisdom.name: Cursed Wisdom
Cursed Wisdom.description: The target has Disadvantage on ability checks and saving throws made with the chosen ability.

Cursed Attacks.name: Cursed Attacks
Cursed Attacks.description: The target has Disadvantage on attack rolls against you.

Cursed Actions.name: Cursed Actions
Cursed Actions.description: In combat, the target must succeed on a [[/save ability=wis dc=@attributes.spell.dc format=long]] at the start of each of its turns or be forced to take the &Reference[Dodge] action on that turn.

Cursed Resilience.name: Cursed Resilience
Cursed Resilience.description: If you deal damage to the target with an attack roll or a spell, the target takes an extra [[/damage 1d8 type=necrotic]] damage.

Dimension Door.name: Dimension Door
Dimension Door.description:
You teleport to a location within range. You arrive at exactly the spot desired. It can be a place you can see, one you can visualize, or one you can describe by stating distance and direction, such as "200 feet straight downward" or "300 feet upward to the northwest at a 45-degree angle."

You can also teleport one willing creature. The creature must be within 5 feet of you when you teleport, and it teleports to a space within 5 feet of your destination space.

If you, the other creature, or both would arrive in a space occupied by a creature or completely filled by one or more objects, you and any creature traveling with you each take 4d6 Force damage, and the teleportation fails.

Fear.name: Fear
Fear.description:
Each creature in a 30-foot Cone must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or drop whatever it is holding and have the &Reference[frightened apply=false] condition for the duration.

A Frightened creature takes the &Reference[dash] action and moves away from you by the safest route on each of its turns unless there is nowhere to move. If the creature ends its turn in a space where it doesn't have line of sight to you, the creature makes a Wisdom saving throw. On a successful save, the spell ends on that creature.

Fear.name: Fear
Fear.description: A &Reference[frightened apply=false] creature takes the &Reference[dash] action and moves away from you by the safest route on each of its turns unless there is nowhere to move. If the creature ends its turn in a space where it doesn’t have line of sight to you, the creature makes a [[/save ability=wis]] saving throw. On a successful save, the spell ends on that creature.

Lightning Bolt.name: Lightning Bolt
Lightning Bolt.description:
A stroke of lightning forming a 100-foot-long, 5-foot-wide Line blasts out from you in a direction you choose. Each creature in the Line makes a Dexterity saving throw, taking 8d6 Lightning damage on a failed save or half as much damage on a successful one.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. The damage increases by 1d6 for each spell slot level above 3.

materials.value: a bit of fur and a crystal rod

Web.name: Web
Web.description:
You conjure a mass of sticky webbing at a point within range. The webs fill a 20-foot Cube there for the duration. The webs are &Reference[difficultterrain], and the area within them is &Reference[lightlyobscured].

If the webs aren't anchored between two solid masses (such as walls or trees) or layered across a floor, wall, or ceiling, the web collapses on itself, and the spell ends at the start of your next turn. Webs layered over a flat surface have a depth of 5 feet.

The first time a creature enters the webs on a turn or starts its turn there, it must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw or have the &Reference[restrained] condition while in the webs or until it breaks free.

A creature Restrained by the webs can take an action to make a [[/check ability=str skill=ath dc=@attributes.spell.dc]] check against your spell save DC. If it succeeds, it is no longer Restrained.

The webs are flammable. Any 5-foot Cube of webs exposed to fire burns away in 1 round, dealing [[/damage 2d4 type=fire]] damage to any creature that starts its turn in the fire.

Darkness.name: Darkness
Darkness.description:
For the duration, magical &Reference[darkness] spreads from a point within range and fills a 15-foot-radius Sphere. Darkvision can't see through it, and nonmagical light can't illuminate it.

Alternatively, you cast the spell on an object that isn't being worn or carried, causing the Darkness to fill a 15-foot Emanation originating from that object. Covering that object with something opaque, such as a bowl or helm, blocks the Darkness.

If any of this spell's area overlaps with an area of Bright Light or Dim Light created by a spell of level 2 or lower, that other spell is dispelled.

materials.value: bat fur and a piece of coal

Disguise Self.name: Disguise Self
Disguise Self.description:
You make yourself—including your clothing, armor, weapons, and other belongings on your person—look different until the spell ends. You can seem 1 foot shorter or taller and can appear heavier or lighter. You must adopt a form that has the same basic arrangement of limbs as you have. Otherwise, the extent of the illusion is up to you.

The changes wrought by this spell fail to hold up to physical inspection. For example, if you use this spell to add a hat to your outfit, objects pass through the hat, and anyone who touches it would feel nothing.

To discern that you are disguised, a creature must take the Study action to inspect your appearance and succeed on an [[/check ability=int skill=inv dc=@attributes.spell.dc]] check against your spell save DC.

Disguised.name: Disguised
Disguised.description: To discern that you are disguised, a creature must take the Study action to inspect your appearance and succeed on an [[/check ability=int skill=inv]] check against your spell save DC.

Suggestion.name: Suggestion
Suggestion.description:
You suggest a course of activity—described in no more than 25 words—to one creature you can see within range that can hear and understand you. The suggestion must sound achievable and not involve anything that would obviously deal damage to the target or its allies. For example, you could say, "Fetch the key to the cult's treasure vault, and give the key to me." Or you could say, "Stop fighting, leave this library peacefully, and don't return."

The target must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or have the Charmed condition for the duration or until you or your allies deal damage to the target. The Charmed target pursues the suggestion to the best of its ability. The suggested activity can continue for the entire duration, but if the suggested activity can be completed in a shorter time, the spell ends for the target upon completing it.

Pursuing Suggestion.name: Pursuing Suggestion
Pursuing Suggestion.description: The Charmed target pursues the suggestion to the best of its ability. The suggested activity can continue for the entire duration, but if the suggested activity can be completed in a shorter time, the spell ends for the target upon completing it.

Mage Armor.name: Mage Armor
Mage Armor.description: You touch a willing creature who isn't wearing armor. Until the spell ends, the target's base AC becomes 13 plus its Dexterity modifier. The spell ends early if the target dons armor.

Mage Armor.name: Mage Armor
Mage Armor.description: The target's base AC becomes 13 + its Dexterity modifier.

Mage Hand.name: 法师之手
Mage Hand.description:
A spectral, floating hand appears at a point you choose within range. The hand lasts for the duration. The hand vanishes if it is ever more than 30 feet away from you or if you cast this spell again.

When you cast the spell, you can use the hand to manipulate an object, open an unlocked door or container, stow or retrieve an item from an open container, or pour the contents out of a vial.

As a Magic action on your later turns, you can control the hand thus again. As part of that action, you can move the hand up to 30 feet.

The hand can't attack, activate magic items, or carry more than 10 pounds.

Minor Illusion.name: Minor Illusion
Minor Illusion.description:
You create a sound or an image of an object within range that lasts for the duration. See the descriptions below for the effects of each. The illusion ends if you cast this spell again.

If a creature takes a Study action to examine the sound or image, the creature can determine that it is an illusion with a successful [[/check ability=int skill=inv dc=@attributes.spell.dc]] check against your spell save DC. If a creature discerns the illusion for what it is, the illusion becomes faint to the creature.

Sound. If you create a sound, its volume can range from a whisper to a scream. It can be your voice, someone else's voice, a lion's roar, a beating of drums, or any other sound you choose. The sound continues unabated throughout the duration, or you can make discrete sounds at different times before the spell ends.

Image. If you create an image of an object—such as a chair, muddy footprints, or a small chest—it must be no larger than a 5-foot Cube. The image can't create sound, light, smell, or any other sensory effect. Physical interaction with the image reveals it to be an illusion, since things can pass through it.

Mage Armor.name: Mage Armor
Mage Armor.description: The target's base AC becomes 13 + its Dexterity modifier.

Haze Aura.name: Haze Aura
Haze Aura.description: A creature starting its turn within 30 feet of Lenore is subjected to the following effect: Constitution Saving Throw: DC 19. Failure: The target gains a Contamination level. Failure or Success: [[/damage average]] damage.

Tendrils.name: Tendrils
Tendrils.description: [[lookup @name]]'s long hair can latch onto surfaces to pull her in any direction. She has a Flying Speed of 40 feet (included in Speed) but cannot move more than 30 feet from a solid surface, including walls and ceilings

Epic Boss.name: Epic Boss
Epic Boss.description:
This creature is an Epic Boss, a unique foe designed to pose a solo threat to an entire adventuring party. As such, it has additional game rules that sets it apart from normal creatures:

[[lookup @name]] always takes her turn on Initiative count 20. On her turn, she can use her movement and interaction as normal. However, she does not take an action or Bonus Action on his turn unless forced to do so by a spell or other effect. Instead, [[lookup @name]] takes one of the following Epic Actions at the end of each player character's turn.

All this creature's actions are Epic Actions.

  • @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.UKZ1Zuz7oHOu61GW.Item.LD71MLOAJxwZgQz6]{Tentacle Hair}

Grim Reveal.name: Grim Reveal
Grim Reveal.description: [[lookup @name]] removes her mask, revealing her horrific form. Wisdom Saving Throw: DC 19, creatures within 60 feet of her who can see her. Failure: The target has the &reference[Frightened] condition (save ends)

Grim Reveal.name: Grim Reveal
Grim Reveal.description: You are &reference[frightened apply=false] of Haze Regent Lenore von Kessel. At the end of each of your turns, you can repeat your saving throw against this effect, ending it on a success.

Octarine Wall.name: Octarine Wall
Octarine Wall.description:
Lenore summons a shimmering wall within 120 feet of her. The wall can be up to 90 feet long, 30 feet high, and 1 inch thick. Alternatively, she can shape the wall into a sphere up to 30 feet in diameter centered on a point she can see within range. The wall has three octarine layers. When a creature attempts to reach into or pass through the wall, it does so one layer at a time through all the wall's layers.

Constitution Saving Throw: DC 19. Failure:

  • Layer 1: [[/damage activity=B6kNTZrjT99X96jw average]] damage and the target gains one level of Contamination and has the &reference[Dazed] condition.

  • Layer 2: [[/damage activity=jwk26mxWJjAHsGlD average]] damage, and the target gains two levels of Contamination and has the &reference[Defenseless] condition.

  • Layer 3: [[/damage activity=weMFp68uxVq5ZZP6 average]] damage, and the target gains three levels of Contamination and the &reference[Helpless] condition.

Success: Half damage only. The wall can be destroyed by taking at least 100 Radiant or Force damage

Radiant Gaze.name: Radiant Gaze
Radiant Gaze.description: Constitution Saving Throw: DC 19, each creature in a 30-foot Cone. Failure: 44 (8d10) Radiant damage and the target gains one level of Contamination. Success: Half damage only. If Lenore sees her reflection within the Cone, she gains the &reference[Blinded] and &reference[Incapacitated] conditions for 1d6 hours and can't take the Epic Resistance Epic Action for the duration

Incapacitating Visage.name: Incapacitating Visage
Incapacitating Visage.description: Seeing her own reflection, Lenore is &reference[blinded apply=false] and &reference[incapacitated apply=false] for [[/r 1d6]] hours. For this duration, she can't take her Epic Resistance Epic Action.

Epic Resistance.name: Epic Resistance
Epic Resistance.description: [[lookup @name]] chooses one condition, spell, or other effect currently affecting her and rolls [[/r 1d20]]. On an 11 or higher, the effect ends on her. [[lookup @name]] can use this Epic Action even if she would otherwise be unable to take actions, her actions are being controlled by another creature, or if a spell or effect alters her game statistics.

Tentacle Hair.name: Tentacle Hair
Tentacle Hair.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]], and if the target is a creature it is subjected to the following effect. Constitution Saving Throw: DC 14. Failure: The target gains one level of Contamination.

Contaminated Eye Blast.name: Contaminated Eye Blast
Contaminated Eye Blast.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]], and if the target is a creature it is subjected to the following effect. Constitution Saving Throw: DC 19. Failure: The target gains one level of Contamination.

Skirmisher.name: Skirmisher
Skirmisher.description: Trigger: A hostile creature [[lookup @name]] can see ends its turn within 5 feet of her. Response: [[lookup @name lowercase]] moves up to her Speed without provoking Opportunity Attacks.

utility.condition: When a hostile creatures that Petra can see ends its turn within 5 feet of her.

Cunning Action.name: Cunning Action
Cunning Action.description: [[lookup @name]] takes the Dash, Disengage, or Hide action.

Arrows.name: Arrows
Arrows.description:
Storage: @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.equipment24.Item.phbagQuiver00000]{Quiver}

@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.equipment24.Item.phbagAmmunitionV]{Ammunition} is required by a weapon that has the Ammunition property. A weapon's description specifies the type of ammunition used by the weapon. The Ammunition table lists the different types and the amount you get when you buy them. The table also lists the item that is typically used to store each type; storage must be bought separately.

Longbow.name: Longbow
Longbow.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]], and the target has the &reference[slowed] condition until the end of [[lookup @name]]'s next turn.

Slowing Shot.name: Slowing Shot
Slowing Shot.description: You are &reference[slowed apply=false] until the end of the hooded lantern scout's next turn.

Relentless Endurance.name: Relentless Endurance
Relentless Endurance.description: If damage reduces the [[lookup @name lowercase]] to 0 Hit Points, it must make a Constitution saving throw with a DC of 5 plus the damage taken, unless the damage is from a Critical Hit. On a success, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] drops to 1 Hit Point instead.

save.condition: When damage other than from a Critical Hit reduces the creature to 0 hit point.

Standing Leap.name: Standing Leap
Standing Leap.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s Long Jump is up to 50 feet and its High Jump is up to 30 feet, with or without a running start.

Aggressive.name: Aggressive
Aggressive.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] moves up to its Speed toward a Hostile creature it can see. This movement doesn't provoke Opportunity Attacks.

Arm Blade.name: Arm Blade
Arm Blade.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]], and if the target is Large or smaller, it is pushed up to 5 feet away from the [[lookup @name lowercase]] and has the Prone condition.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The reautomata makes two [[/item rLEZqDk1gXgb96Tj]] attacks and one [[/item O9sv7Jb0ARilILw5]] attack.

Entrapping Rend.name: Entrapping Rend
Entrapping Rend.description: Melee Attack Roll: +9, reach 5 ft., one &reference[Prone apply=false] target. [[/damage extended]], and if the target is Large or smaller, it has the &reference[Grappled] condition (escape DC 17). While Grappled, the target has the &reference[Restrained] condition and the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can’t make Entrapping Rend attacks against another target.

affects.special: One prone target

Entrapping Rend.name: Entrapping Rend
Entrapping Rend.description: You are &reference[grappled apply=false] (escape DC 17). While grappled in this way, you are also &reference[restrained apply=false].

Spider Climb.name: Spider Climb
Spider Climb.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

Finger Jab.name: Finger Jab
Finger Jab.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]]. Constitution Saving Throw: DC 10. Failure: The target has the &reference[Blinded apply=false] condition until the end of its next turn.

Latch.name: Latch
Latch.description: [[/attack extended]]. Hit: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] attaches itself to the target. While latched, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] cannot attack. Instead, at the start of each of the hand's turns, the latched creature takes [[/damage average]] damage. A creature within 5 feet can take an action to detach the [[lookup @name lowercase]] with a successful [[/check DC 13 Strength]] check. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can also detach itself at any time during its turn (no action required).

Attached Hand.name: Attached Hand
Attached Hand.description: The hand has attached itself to you. While latched, the hand cannot attack. Instead, at the start of each of the hand’s turns, you takes [[/damage average 1d4 necrotic]] damage. A creature within 5 feet can take an action to de tach the hand with a successful [[/check 13 Strength]] check.

Displacement.name: Displacement
Displacement.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s form is constantly shifting and moving through reality in unnatural ways. Attack rolls against the [[lookup @name lowercase]] have Disadvantage. If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] takes damage, this trait ceases to function until the start of its next turn. This trait is suppressed while the [[lookup @name lowercase]] has the &reference[Incapacitated apply=false] or &reference[Restrained apply=false] conditions or is otherwise unable to move.

Displacement.name: Displacement
Displacement.description: Attacks rolls against the polyp have disadvantage. If the polyp takes damage, this trait ceases to function until the start of its next turn. This trait is suppressed while the polyp has the &reference[Incapacitated apply=false] or &reference[restrained apply=false] condition or is otherwise unable to move.

Slip Space.name: Slip Space
Slip Space.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] teleports to an unoccupied space it can see within 20 feet. Constitution Saving Throw: DC 15, each creature in a 10-foot Emanation originating from the [[lookup @name lowercase]] when it reappears. Failure: [[/damage average]] damage. Failure by 5 or More: The target triggers an Arcane Anomaly centered on itself. Success: Half damage only

Confused Realities.name: Confused Realities
Confused Realities.description: Trigger: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] takes damage from a creature it can see within 30 feet. Response: The triggering creature is teleported to an unoccupied space the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within 30 feet of its original space. The destination must be on a surface or liquid that can support the target without the target having to squeeze.

utility.condition: When the polyp takes damage form a creature it cans ee within 30 feet.

Shift Step.name: Shift Step
Shift Step.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] teleports to an unoccupied space it can see within 60 feet.

Mucus.name: Mucus
Mucus.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]], and a 5-foot radius centered on the target is covered in acidic slime for 1 minute. A creature other than the [[lookup @name lowercase]] that enters the area for the first time on a turn or starts its turn there is subjected to the following effect. Constitution Saving Throw: DC 15. Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target has the &reference[Burning] condition (3d6 Acid).

Burning (3d6 Acid).name: Burning (3d6 Acid)
Burning (3d6 Acid).description:
You are &reference[burning apply=false] from being covered in acid.

  • At the end of each of your turns, you take [[/damage average acid 3d6]] damage.

  • The condition ends if you or another creature within 5 feet of you spends an action to scrape off the acid or if some other effect removes it.

Magic Resistance.name: Magic Resistance
Magic Resistance.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Grasping Maw.name: Grasping Maw
Grasping Maw.description: Strength Saving Throw: DC 18, one Medium or smaller creature the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within 15 feet. Failure: The target is pulled into an unoccupied space within 5 feet of the [[lookup @name lowercase]].

Glob Launcher.name: Glob Launcher
Glob Launcher.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] coats a swallowed creature in acidic goo and launches it at a point within 120 feet of it. Dexterity Saving Throw: DC 15, each creature within 10 feet of the launched creature as it lands (the launched creature automatically fails). Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target has the &reference[Burning] condition (4d6 Acid). While Burning, the target has the &reference[Restrained] condition.

Restrained & Burning (4d6 Acid).name: Restrained & Burning (4d6 Acid)
Restrained & Burning (4d6 Acid).description:
You are &reference[burning apply=false] from being covered in acid.

  • At the end of each of your turns, you take [[/damage average acid 4d6]] damage.

  • The condition ends if you or another creature within 5 feet of you spends an action to scrape off the acid or if some other effect removes it.

While burning in this way, you are &reference[restrained apply=false]

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes one [[/item TBuqevqnGUfsj0Pb]] attack and three [[/item ynxaWEAgbWpVCyLI]] attacks, and it can use [[/item G5GQu5AGTHwda3qa]] or [[/item XzAP6xKN4l6Rso6T]].

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description:
[[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]], and if the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it is swallowed. A swallowed creature has the &reference[Blinded] and &reference[Restrained] conditions, and has &reference[TotalCover] from effects originating outside the [[lookup @name lowercase]]. At the start of each of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s turns, a swallowed creature takes [[/damage average activity=KSj68crI9uw00YG7]] damage and must succeed on a [[/save activity=KSj68crI9uw00YG7]] saving throw or gain one Contamination level.

The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can swallow up to three creatures at a time.

If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] takes 20+ damage in a single turn from a creature inside it, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] must succeed on a [[/save activity=0uIHdmmtb2iIJYik]] saving throw at the end of that turn or regurgitate all swallowed creatures, each of which land in spaces within 10 feet of the [[lookup @name lowercase]] with the &reference[Prone] condition. If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] dies, a swallowed creature no longer has the Restrained condition and can escape from the corpse using 10 feet of movement, exiting with the &reference[Prone] condition.

Swallowed.name: Swallowed
Swallowed.description:
You have been swallowed. While swallowed, you are &reference[blinded apply=false], &reference[restrained apply=false], and have &reference[totalcover] against effects originating from outside the maw vermin.

At the start of each of the maw vermin's turns, take [[/damage average 3d6 acid]] damage and must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw or gain one Contamination level.

Claw.name: Claw
Claw.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]], and if the target is Huge or smaller, it has the &reference[Grappled] condition (escape DC 16). Until the grapple ends, the maw vermin can’t use this Claw on another target. The maw vermin has three Claws.

Running Leap.name: Running Leap
Running Leap.description: As long as the [[lookup @name lowercase]] has moved 20+ feet this turn, it has a high jump and long jump of 30 feet.

Chitter.name: Chitter
Chitter.description: Wisdom Saving Throw: DC 13, each creature within 120 feet of the [[lookup @name lowercase]] that can hear it. Failure: The target has the &reference[Dazed] condition until the end of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s next turn.

affects.special: Creatures that can hear the chitter.

Slow Fall.name: Slow Fall
Slow Fall.description: Trigger: The chitter takes falling damage and doesn't have the &reference[Incapacitated apply=false] condition. Response: The triggering damage is reduced to 0.

utility.condition: The chitter takes falling damage and doesn't have the incapacitated condition.

Aggressive.name: Aggressive
Aggressive.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] moves up to its Speed toward a Hostile creature it can see. If it ends this movement adjacent to the creature, it gains Advantage on attack rolls against that creature until the end of its turn.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes two [[/item QlR1z63Th4PPXnj7]] attacks and one [[/item N1YAfJ2ZUzahzGRe]] attack. It can also use [[/item KTvcheedgOtxmhHA]], if available.

Balefire.name: Balefire
Balefire.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]], and the target has the &reference[Burning] condition (2d8 Necrotic).

Burning (2d8 Necrotic).name: Burning (2d8 Necrotic)
Burning (2d8 Necrotic).description:
You are &reference[burning apply=false] from being covered in balefire.

  • At the end of each of your turns, you take [[/damage average necrotic 2d8]] damage.

  • The condition ends if you or another creature within 5 feet of you spends an action to douse the fire or if some other effect removes it such as submerging yourself in water.

Conjure Swarms.name: Conjure Swarms
Conjure Swarms.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] conjures two @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.actors24.Actor.mmSwarmOfRats000]{Swarms of Rats}, which appear in unoccupied spaces within 60 feet. The swarms act immediately after the [[lookup @name lowercase]] in Initiative. The swarms remain for 1 minute or until destroyed.

Teleport.name: Teleport
Teleport.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] teleports to an unoccupied space it can see within 60 feet.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]].

Keen Smell.name: Keen Smell
Keen Smell.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

Mage Armor.name: Mage Armor
Mage Armor.description: You touch a willing creature who isn't wearing armor. Until the spell ends, the target's base AC becomes 13 plus its Dexterity modifier. The spell ends early if the target dons armor.

Mage Armor.name: Mage Armor
Mage Armor.description: The target's base AC becomes 13 + its Dexterity modifier.

Minor Illusion.name: Minor Illusion
Minor Illusion.description:
You create a sound or an image of an object within range that lasts for the duration. See the descriptions below for the effects of each. The illusion ends if you cast this spell again.

If a creature takes a Study action to examine the sound or image, the creature can determine that it is an illusion with a successful [[/check ability=int skill=inv dc=@attributes.spell.dc]] check against your spell save DC. If a creature discerns the illusion for what it is, the illusion becomes faint to the creature.

Sound. If you create a sound, its volume can range from a whisper to a scream. It can be your voice, someone else's voice, a lion's roar, a beating of drums, or any other sound you choose. The sound continues unabated throughout the duration, or you can make discrete sounds at different times before the spell ends.

Image. If you create an image of an object—such as a chair, muddy footprints, or a small chest—it must be no larger than a 5-foot Cube. The image can't create sound, light, smell, or any other sensory effect. Physical interaction with the image reveals it to be an illusion, since things can pass through it.

Thaumaturgy.name: Thaumaturgy
Thaumaturgy.description:
You manifest a minor wonder within range. You create one of the effects below within range. If you cast this spell multiple times, you can have up to three of its 1-minute effects active at a time.

Altered Eyes. You alter the appearance of your eyes for 1 minute.

Booming Voice. Your voice booms up to three times as loud as normal for 1 minute. For the duration, you have Advantage on [[/check ability=cha skill=itm]] checks.

Fire Play. You cause flames to flicker, brighten, dim, or change color for 1 minute.

Invisible Hand. You instantaneously cause an unlocked door or window to fly open or slam shut.

Phantom Sound. You create an instantaneous sound that originates from a point of your choice within range, such as a rumble of thunder, the cry of a raven, or ominous whispers.

Tremors. You cause harmless tremors in the ground for 1 minute.

Invisibility.name: Invisibility
Invisibility.description:
A creature you touch has the &Reference[invisible apply=false] condition until the spell ends. The spell ends early immediately after the target makes an attack roll, deals damage, or casts a spell.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. You can target one additional creature for each spell slot level above 2.

Invisible.name: 隐形
Invisible.description: 如果你进行攻击检定、造成伤害或施展法术，则该法术提前终止。

Augury.name: Augury
Augury.description:
You receive an omen from an otherworldly entity about the results of a course of action that you plan to take within the next 30 minutes. The DM chooses the omen from the Omens table.

OmenFor Results That Will Be …
WealGood
WoeBad
Weal and woeGood and bad
IndifferenceNeither good nor bad

The spell doesn't account for circumstances, such as other spells, that might change the results.

If you cast the spell more than once before finishing a Long Rest, there is a cumulative 25 percent chance for each casting after the first that you get no answer.

materials.value: specially marked sticks, bones, cards, or other divinatory tokens worth 25+ GP

Dispel Magic.name: 解除魔法
Dispel Magic.description:
在施法距离内指定一名生物、一个物件或一处魔法效应。所有影响该目标的三环或更低环阶法术即告终止。每个影响目标的四环或更高环阶法术都需要以你的施法属性进行一次属性检定（DC 10 + 目标法术环阶），检定成功时目标法术终止。

升环施法： 你直接终止影响目标的小于等于该施法环阶的法术效应。

Major Image.name: Major Image
Major Image.description:
You create the image of an object, a creature, or some other visible phenomenon that is no larger than a 20-foot Cube. The image appears at a spot that you can see within range and lasts for the duration.
