The [[lookup @name lowercase]] conjures a storm of acid rain in a 20-foot radius, 20-foot tall Cylinder centered on a point it can see within 120 feet. Exposed flames in the area are doused. Chemical pools accumulate in the area and emit thick fumes, rendering it &reference[DifficultTerrain] and &reference[LightlyObscured]. The storm and the pools evaporate after 1 minute.

A creature that enters the area for the first time on a turn or starts its turn there is subjected to the following effect. Dexterity Saving Throw: DC 17. Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target has the &reference[Prone] condition. Success: Half damage only.

Emergency Dose.name: Emergency Dose
Emergency Dose.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] administers a restorative poultice to itself or a creature it can see within 5 feet that isn't a Construct or Undead. The target regains 35 (10d6) Hit Points. Once a creature benefits from Emergency Dose, it can't do so again until it finishes a Short or Long Rest.

Caustic Grip.name: Caustic Grip
Caustic Grip.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]], and the target has the &reference[Grappled] condition (escape DC 17). Until the grapple ends, the target has the &reference[Restrained] condition and the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can’t use Caustic Grip against another target. At the end of each of its turns, the target takes [[/damage average]] damage.

Aura of Dread.name: Aura of Dread
Aura of Dread.description: A creature that starts its turn within 30 feet of [[lookup @name]] takes [[/damage average]] damage.

Reborn Transformation.name: Reborn Transformation
Reborn Transformation.description: When [[lookup @name]] consumes the blood of six living creatures of level or challenge rating 10 or higher, he transforms into @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.Cu1QeAtFRf90XGFr]{Reborn Vladimir von Drakken}. His Initiative doesn't change. If he is destroyed before he can feed sufficiently, he must begin the process again when he rejuvenates.

Regeneration.name: Regeneration
Regeneration.description: [[lookup @name]] regains 30 Hit Points at the start of his turn if he has at least 1 Hit Point remaining.

heal.condition: If Vladimir von Drakken has at least 1 hit point.

Rejuvenation.name: Rejuvenation
Rejuvenation.description: If Vladimir von Drakken is destroyed in his crypt-starved form, he crumbles into ash and reforms [[/r 1d10]] days later with all of his Hit Points. His new body appears within his crypt in the Brachenwald. Casting @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplHallow0000]{Hallow} on the druidic shrine prevents his new body from returning so long as the spell remains in effect.

Vampire Weaknesses.name: Vampire Weaknesses
Vampire Weaknesses.description:
As a vampire, [[lookup @name]] has the following weaknesses:

Forbiddance. The [[lookup @name]] can't enter a residence without an invitation from one of the occupants.

Harmed by Running Water. [[lookup @name]] takes [[/damage 20 acid]] damage when it ends its turn in running water.

Stake to the Heart. If a Piercing weapon made of wood is driven into [[lookup @name]]'s heart while he is &reference[Incapacitated apply=false] in its resting place, he is &reference[Paralyzed] until the stake is removed.

Sunlight Hypersensitivity. [[lookup @name]] takes [[/damage 20 radiant]] damage when it starts its turn in sunlight. While in sunlight, he has Disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks.

Running Water.name: Running Water
Running Water.condition: If the vampire ends their turn in running water.

Staked.name: Staked
Staked.description: The vampire is &reference[paralyzed apply=false] until the stake is removed.

Terrifying Glare.name: Terrifying Glare
Terrifying Glare.description: Wisdom Saving Throw: DC 18, one creature [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within 120 feet. Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target has the &reference[Frightened] condition until the end of its next turn. Failure by 5 or More: While Frightened, the target has the &reference[Paralyzed] condition.

Terrifying Glare.name: Terrifying Glare
Terrifying Glare.description: You are &reference[frightened apply=false] until the end of your next turn.

Paralyzing Glare.name: Paralyzing Glare
Paralyzing Glare.description: You are &reference[frightened apply=false] and &reference[paralyzed apply=false] until the end of your next turn.

Shadow Step.name: Shadow Step
Shadow Step.description: [[lookup @name]] teleports to an unoccupied space he can see within 60 feet that is in Dim Light or Darkness. He has Advantage on the next melee attack he makes before the end of this round.

Epic Boss.name: Epic Boss
Epic Boss.description:
This creature is an Epic Boss, a unique foe designed to pose a solo threat to an entire adventuring party. As such, it has additional game rules that sets it apart from normal creatures:

[[lookup @name]] always takes their turn on Initiative count 20. On their turn, they can use their movement and interaction as normal. However, they does not take an action or Bonus Action on their turn unless forced to do so by a spell or other effect. Instead, [[lookup @name]] takes one of the following Epic Actions at the end of each player character's turn.

All this creature's actions are Epic Actions.

  • @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.df9cj61NU2DssvIG.Item.9jBDXZVzD66Mh9ZY]{Bloodmourne}

  • @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.df9cj61NU2DssvIG.Item.H9c8rMwZgEC9C5JM]{Claws}

  • @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.df9cj61NU2DssvIG.Item.KnzucUrB7UcJv0Vv]{Bite}

  • @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.df9cj61NU2DssvIG.Item.Dj6ipdqoCBvT2rs4]{Terrifying Glare}

  • @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.df9cj61NU2DssvIG.Item.Fs8Car1AuyZCgSg8]{Shadow Step}

  • @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.df9cj61NU2DssvIG.Item.w0IJe8DfG3okrBHv]{Epic Resistance}

Epic Resistance.name: Epic Resistance
Epic Resistance.description: [[lookup @name]] chooses one condition, spell, or other effect currently affecting them and rolls [[/r 1d20]]. On an 11 or higher, the effect ends on them. [[lookup @name]] can use this Epic Action even if they would otherwise be unable to take actions, their actions are being controlled by another creature, or if a spell or effect alters their game statistics.

Bloodmourne.name: Bloodmourne
Bloodmourne.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]], and the target has the &reference[bleeding] condition (4d4).

Bleeding (4d4).name: Bleeding (4d4)
Bleeding (4d4).description:
You're losing blood to an open wound.

  • Ongoing Damage: At the end of each of your turns, you lose [[/r 4d4]] Hit Points.

  • Regaining Hit Points: This condition ends if you regain any Hit Points.

  • Medical Treatment: You or another creature within 5 feet of you can spend an action and use a Healer's Kit to staunch the bleeding (no check required), ending the condition.

Claws.name: Claws
Claws.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]], and if the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it has the &reference[grappled] condition (escape DC 18).

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: Constitution Saving Throw: DC 18, one creature within 5 feet that is willing or has the Grappled, Incapacitated, or Restrained condition. Failure: [[/damage average]] damage. The target's Hit Point Maximum decreases by an amount equal to the Necrotic damage taken, and [[lookup @name]] regains Hit Points equal to that amount. A Humanoid killed by this effect and then buried in the ground rises the following night as a @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.actors24.Actor.mmVampireSpawn00]{Vampire Spawn} under [[lookup @name]]'s control.

Duel to the Death.name: Duel to the Death
Duel to the Death.description: Once per turn, if the [[lookup @name lowercase]] is within 5 feet of an enemy, and no other creatures are within 5 feet of them, the [[lookup @nmae lowercase]] can deal an extra [[/damage average]] damage with their @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.dhrRtM7bIrXG11UU.Item.cbuhn2AHL9vSjaih]{Voidblade} attack.

Boltgun.name: Boltgun
Boltgun.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]]. On hit, the target has the &reference[Slowed] condition until the end of its next turn.

Slowing Shot.name: Slowing Shot
Slowing Shot.description: You are &reference[slowed apply=false] until the end of your next turn.

Bark Orders.name: Bark Orders
Bark Orders.description: One @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.lpVnUx38MFj4Tilk] within 60 feet of the void pirate can use its Reaction to move up to half its Speed or make an attack.

affects.special: A void pirate squib

Captain’s Orders.name: Captain’s Orders
Captain’s Orders.description: While within 60 feet of a @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.9tj31BF3CTZE84Ux], the [[lookup @name lowercase]] has Advantage on saving throws to avoid or end the &reference[Charmed apply=false] and &reference[Frightened apply=false] conditions.

From Another World.name: From Another World
From Another World.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] doesn’t have the standard Aberrant Traits other creatures in the Space Between Worlds have.

Powder Keg.name: Powder Keg
Powder Keg.description: If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] takes damage from a critical hit, it must succeed on a [[/save]] saving throw or the attack ruptures their alchemical supplies and gunpowder. Each creature within 15 feet of the [[lookup @name lowercase]] (including the [[lookup @name lowercase]]) is subjected to the following effect. Dexterity Saving Throw: DC 12. Failure: [[/damage average]] damage. Success: Half damage.

Set Trap.name: Set Trap
Set Trap.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] sets a trap in a space within 5 feet of it. A creature that moves within 5 feet of the trap immediately sets it off, affecting each creature in a 5-foot radius centered on the trap. The trap can be one of the options listed for the Trapper's Crossbow or one of the following additional options:

  • Fire Trap. Dexterity Saving Throw: DC 12. Failure: The target has the &reference[Burning] condition (1d8).

  • Shock Trap. Strength Saving Throw: DC 12. Failure: The target has the &reference[Shocked] condition until the end of its next turn.

  • Frost Trap. Constitution Saving Throw: DC 12. Failure: The target has the &reference[Frozen] condition (DC 10).

Burning (1d8 Fire).name: Burning (1d8 Fire)
Burning (1d8 Fire).description:
You are &reference[burning apply=false] from being covered in fire.

  • At the end of each of your turns, you take [[/damage average fire 1d8]] damage.

  • The condition ends if you or another creature within 5 feet of you spends an action to douse the fire or if some other effect removes it such as submerging yourself in water.

Shocked.name: Shocked
Shocked.description: You are &reference[shocked apply=false] until the end of your next turn.

Frozen (DC 12).name: Frozen (DC 12)
Frozen (DC 12).description:
You're partially encased in ice:

  • You are &reference[Immobilized apply=false] & &reference[Defenseless apply=false].

  • You're &reference[Helpless apply=false] against attacks made with a weapon that deals bludgeoning damage.

  • You or another creature can take an action to break the ice away. To do so, you must succeed on a [[/check 12 str ath]] check.

Smoke Bomb.name: Smoke Bomb
Smoke Bomb.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplFogCloud00]{Fog Cloud} without the need for components, using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability.

Trapper's Crossbow.name: Trapper's Crossbow
Trapper's Crossbow.description:
[[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]], and the target is subjected to one of the following effects of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s choice:

  • Bola Shot. Dexterity Saving Throw: DC 12. Failure: The target has the &reference[Prone] condition.

  • Tranquilizer Shot. Constitution Saving Throw: DC 12. Failure: The target has the &reference[Dazed] condition until the end of its next turn.

  • Net Shot (1 / Day). Strength Saving Throw: DC 12. Failure: The target has the &reference[Immobilized] condition (save ends).

Tranquilizer Shot.name: Tranquilizer Shot
Tranquilizer Shot.description: You are &reference[dazed apply=false] until the end of your next turn.

Net Shot.name: Net Shot
Net Shot.description: You are &reference[immobilized apply=false]. You can repeat your saving throw against this effect at the end of each of your turns, ending the effect on a success.

Fog Cloud.name: Fog Cloud
Fog Cloud.description:
You create a 20-foot-radius Sphere of fog centered on a point within range. The Sphere is &Reference[heavilyobscured]. It lasts for the duration or until a strong wind (such as one created by @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplGustofWind]{Gust of Wind}) disperses it.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. The fog's radius increases by 20 feet for each spell slot level above 1.

Noxious Blood.name: Noxious Blood
Noxious Blood.description: When a creature hits the [[lookup @name lowercase]] with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it, the creature takes [[/damage average]] damage.

Forced Mutation.name: Forced Mutation
Forced Mutation.description: Constitution Saving Throw: DC 15, one creature the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within 60 feet. Failure: [[/damage]] damage, and the target gains a randomly determined mutation. The mutation lasts for 1 minute, and afterwards, any lost body parts are restored. Success: Half damage only.

Transmogrifying Elixir.name: Transmogrifying Elixir
Transmogrifying Elixir.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] injects itself with a transmogrifying elixir. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] transforms, using the @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.IndT02HRnZvFSBHJ]{Grotesque Gargantuan} stat block for their altered form. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] reverts to its normal form after 1 hour or if its transmogrified form is reduced to 0 Hit Points.

Desperate Transformation.name: Desperate Transformation
Desperate Transformation.description: Trigger: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] is reduced to 0 Hit Points. Response: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] uses [[/item KFqLWu4lLbaFcVVJ]], if available.

utility.condition: When the mutagenist is reduced to 0 hit points.

Anatomical Precision.name: Anatomical Precision
Anatomical Precision.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] gains Advantage on Scalpel attacks until the start of its next turn, as long as it has not moved this turn. The [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s Speed becomes 0 until the start of its next turn.

Anatomical Precision.name: Anatomical Precision
Anatomical Precision.description: The mutagenist has advantage on Scalpel attacks until the start of its next turn, and their movement speed becomes 0.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes [[/item XS6AZ2vHKLEHi8gQ]] attacks and uses [[/item sncRUp3XXDJVQIeD]].

Scalpel.name: Scalpel
Scalpel.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]], and the target has the &reference[Bleeding] condition (4d6).

Alter Self.name: Alter Self
Alter Self.description:
You alter your physical form. Choose one of the following options. Its effects last for the duration, during which you can take a Magic action to replace the option you chose with a different one.

Aquatic Adaptation. You sprout gills and grow webs between your fingers. You can breathe underwater and gain a Swim Speed equal to your Speed.

Foundry Note

The Active Effect provided by the Aquatic Adaptation activity upgrades the character's Swim Speed to a value of "1" to indicate equivalence to (walk) Speed.

Change Appearance. You alter your appearance. You decide what you look like, including your height, weight, facial features, sound of your voice, hair length, coloration, and other distinguishing characteristics. You can make yourself appear as a member of another species, though none of your statistics change. You can't appear as a creature of a different size, and your basic shape stays the same; if you're bipedal, you can't use this spell to become quadrupedal, for instance. For the duration, you can take a Magic action to change your appearance in this way again.

Natural Weapons. You grow claws (Slashing), fangs (Piercing), horns (Piercing), or hooves (Bludgeoning). When you use your Unarmed Strike to deal damage with that new growth, it deals 1d6 damage of the type in parentheses instead of dealing the normal damage for your Unarmed Strike, and you use your spellcasting ability modifier for the attack and damage rolls rather than using Strength.

Aquatic Adaptation.name: Aquatic Adaptation
Aquatic Adaptation.description: You can breathe underwater and gain a Swim Speed equal to your Speed.

Natural Weapon.name: Natural Weapon
Natural Weapon.description: When you use your Unarmed Strike to deal damage with that new growth, it deals 1d6 damage of the type in parentheses instead of dealing the normal damage for your Unarmed Strike, and you use your spellcasting ability modifier for the attack and damage rolls rather than using Strength.

Enhance Ability.name: Enhance Ability
Enhance Ability.description:
You touch a creature and choose Strength, Dexterity, Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma. For the duration, the target has Advantage on ability checks using the chosen ability.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. You can target one additional creature for each spell slot level above 2. You can choose a different ability for each target.

Enhanced Strength.name: Enhanced Strength
Enhanced Strength.description: The target has Advantage on ability checks made with the chosen ability.

Enhanced Dexterity.name: Enhanced Dexterity
Enhanced Dexterity.description: The target has Advantage on ability checks made with the chosen ability.

Enhanced Intelligence.name: Enhanced Intelligence
Enhanced Intelligence.description: The target has Advantage on ability checks made with the chosen ability.

Enhanced Wisdom.name: Enhanced Wisdom
Enhanced Wisdom.description: The target has Advantage on ability checks made with the chosen ability.

Enhanced Charisma.name: Enhanced Charisma
Enhanced Charisma.description: The target has Advantage on ability checks made with the chosen ability.

Polymorph.name: Polymorph
Polymorph.description:
You attempt to transform a creature that you can see within range into a Beast. The target must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or shape-shift into a Beast form for the duration. That form can be any Beast you choose that has a Challenge Rating equal to or less than the target's (or the target's level if it doesn't have a Challenge Rating). The target's game statistics are replaced by the stat block of the chosen Beast, but the target retains its alignment, personality, creature type, Hit Points, and Hit Point Dice. See appendix B for a sample of Beast stat blocks.

The target gains a number of Temporary Hit Points equal to the Hit Points of the Beast form. These Temporary Hit Points vanish if any remain when the spell ends. The spell ends early on the target if it has no Temporary Hit Points left.

The target is limited in the actions it can perform by the anatomy of its new form, and it can't speak or cast spells.

The target's gear melds into the new form. The creature can't use or otherwise benefit from any of that equipment.

Parry.name: Parry
Parry.description: Trigger: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] is hit by a melee attack roll while holding a weapon. Response: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] adds 2 to its AC against that attack, possibly causing it to miss.

utility.condition: When the recruit is hit by a melee attack while holding a weapon.

For the Flame!.name: For the Flame!
For the Flame!.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can take an additional [[/item 4ZQjN253Bib1nw8Y]] action on its turn.

Shield Bash.name: Shield Bash
Shield Bash.description: [[/attack extended]]. The target is pushed 5 feet away from the [[lookup @name lowercase]] and has the &reference[staggered] condition (save ends).

Arrows.name: Arrows
Arrows.description:
Storage: @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.equipment24.Item.phbagQuiver00000]{Quiver}

@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.equipment24.Item.phbagAmmunitionV]{Ammunition} is required by a weapon that has the Ammunition property. A weapon's description specifies the type of ammunition used by the weapon. The Ammunition table lists the different types and the amount you get when you buy them. The table also lists the item that is typically used to store each type; storage must be bought separately.

Shield.name: Shield
Shield.description: You gain the Armor Class benefit of a Shield only if you have training with it.

Air Form.name: Air Form
Air Form.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can enter a Hostile creature's space and stop there. It can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch without squeezing.

Cyclonic Storm.name: Cyclonic Storm
Cyclonic Storm.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] emits a 120-foot Emanation of high winds that disperse gases and vapors and extinguish unprotected flames. Ranged attacks that pass through the area have Disadvantage. Objects that are not worn or carried are blown away [[/r 1d6*5]]{1d6 x 5} feet in a random direction. A creature that starts its turn in the Emanation is subjected to the following effect. Strength Saving Throw: DC 17 (flying creatures have Disadvantage). Failure: The target has the &reference[Slowed] condition until the start of its next turn. Failure by 5 or More: The target is flung [[/r 1d6*5]]{1d6 × 5} feet in a random direction, landing with the &reference[Prone] condition.

save.condition: When a creature starts their turn in the area of the Cyclonic Storm.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] uses [[/item .YfjlNabcW8xuJtld]] or [[/item .WLRCMLvnrKWcLJNv]], then uses Meteor Stike or [[/item .vA6wLw70LiNWvTEe]].

Chain Lightning.name: Chain Lightning
Chain Lightning.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]], and the target has the &reference[Shocked] condition until the end of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s next turn, and the lightning leaps to another creature of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s choice within 15 feet of the first target. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes a separate Chain Lightning attack against the target. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can make any number of Chain Lightning attacks in this way, but a creature can be targeted only once each time the [[lookup @name lowercase]] takes this action.

Shocked.name: Shocked
Shocked.description: You are &reference[shocked apply=false] until the end of the eldritch cataclysm's next turn.

Icy Bolt.name: Icy Bolt
Icy Bolt.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]]. Hit or Miss: The target and each creature within 5 feet of it are subjected to the following effect. Dexterity Saving Throw: DC 17. Failure: [[/damage average activity=xHEt7hK9XhrQCPTp]] damage, and the target has the &reference[Frozen] condition (DC 17).

affects.special: Each creature within 5 feet of the target of the Icy Bolt.

Frozen (DC 17).name: Frozen (DC 17)
Frozen (DC 17).description:
You're partially encased in ice:

  • You are &reference[Immobilized apply=false] & &reference[Defenseless apply=false].

  • You're &reference[Helpless apply=false] against attacks made with a weapon that deals bludgeoning damage.

  • You or another creature can take an action to break the ice away. To do so, you must succeed on a [[/check 17 str ath]] check.

Meteor Strike.name: Meteor Strike
Meteor Strike.description: Dexterity Saving Throw: DC 17, each creature in a 15-foot radius, 40-foot tall Cylinder centered on a point the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within 120 feet. Failure: [[/damage average]] damage.

Quake.name: Quake
Quake.description: Constitution Saving Throw: DC 17, each creature in a 30-foot Emanation originating from the [[lookup @name lowercase]]. Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target has the &reference[Prone] condition. Success: Half damage only.

Regeneration.name: Regeneration
Regeneration.description: The [[lookup @name]] regains 20 Hit Points at the start of its turn. If the [[lookup @name]] takes Necrotic damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of its next turn. The @name]] dies only if it starts its turn with 0 Hit Points and doesn't regenerate.

Standing Leap.name: Standing Leap
Standing Leap.description: The [[lookup @name]]'s Long Jump is up to 50 feet and its High Jump is up to 30 feet, with or without a running start.

Rapid Adaptation.name: Rapid Adaptation
Rapid Adaptation.description: Trigger: The [[lookup @name]] takes damage that isn't Necrotic or Psychic. Response: The [[lookup @name]] gains Immunity to that damage type until it is reduced to 0 Hit Points or finishes a Short or Long Rest.

Adapt.name: Adapt
Adapt.condition: When the Apex takes damage that isn't Necrotic or Psychic.

Rapid Adaptation: Acid.name: Rapid Adaptation: Acid
Rapid Adaptation: Acid.description: The Apex has immunity to Acid damage.

Rapid Adaptation: Cold.name: Rapid Adaptation: Cold
Rapid Adaptation: Cold.description: The Apex has immunity to Cold damage.

Rapid Adaptation: Fire.name: Rapid Adaptation: Fire
Rapid Adaptation: Fire.description: The Apex has immunity to Fire damage.

Rapid Adaptation: Force.name: Rapid Adaptation: Force
Rapid Adaptation: Force.description: The Apex has immunity to Force damage.

Rapid Adaptation: Lightning.name: Rapid Adaptation: Lightning
Rapid Adaptation: Lightning.description: The Apex has immunity to Lightning damage.

Rapid Adaptation: Poison.name: Rapid Adaptation: Poison
Rapid Adaptation: Poison.description: The Apex has immunity to Poison damage.

Rapid Adaptation: Piercing.name: Rapid Adaptation: Piercing
Rapid Adaptation: Piercing.description: The Apex has immunity to Piercing damage.

Rapid Adaptation: Bludgeoning.name: Rapid Adaptation: Bludgeoning
Rapid Adaptation: Bludgeoning.description: The Apex has immunity to Bludgeoning damage.

Rapid Adaptation: Slashing.name: Rapid Adaptation: Slashing
Rapid Adaptation: Slashing.description: The Apex has immunity to Slashing damage.

Rapid Adaptation: Thunder.name: Rapid Adaptation: Thunder
Rapid Adaptation: Thunder.description: The Apex has immunity to Thunder damage.

Rapid Adaptation: Radiant.name: Rapid Adaptation: Radiant
Rapid Adaptation: Radiant.description: The Apex has immunity to Radiant damage.

Fire Blast.name: Fire Blast
Fire Blast.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]]. On hit, the target and each creature within 10 feet of it is subjected to the following effect. Dexterity Saving Throw: DC 18. Failure: The target has the &reference[Burning] condition (4d8 Fire).

Burning (4d8 Fire).name: Burning (4d8 Fire)
Burning (4d8 Fire).description:
You are &reference[burning apply=false] from being covered in fire.

  • At the end of each of your turns, you take [[/damage average fire 4d8]] damage.

  • The condition ends if you or another creature within 5 feet of you spends an action to douse the fire or if some other effect removes it such as submerging yourself in water.

Lightning Bolt.name: Lightning Bolt
Lightning Bolt.description: Dexterity Saving Throw: DC 18, each creature in a 120-foot long, 5-foot wide Line. Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target has the &reference[Shocked] condition until the end of its next turn. Success: Half damage only.

Shocked.name: Shocked
Shocked.description: You are &reference[shocked apply=false] until the end of your next turn.

Cold Snap.name: Cold Snap
Cold Snap.description: Constitution Saving Throw: DC 18, one creature the [[lookup @name]] can see within 120 feet. Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target has the &reference[Frozen] condition (DC 18). Success: Half damage only.

Frozen (DC X).name: Frozen (DC X)
Frozen (DC X).description:
You're partially encased in ice:

  • You are &reference[Immobilized apply=false] & &reference[Defenseless apply=false].

  • You're &reference[Helpless apply=false] against attacks made with a weapon that deals bludgeoning damage.

  • You or another creature can take an action to break the ice away. To do so, you must succeed on a [[/check 13 str ath]] check.

Displacement.name: Displacement
Displacement.description: Attack rolls against the [[lookup @name lowercase]] have Disadvantage. If it is hit by an attack roll, this trait does not apply until the end of its next turn. This trait does not apply while the [[lookup @name lowercase]] has the &reference[Incapacitated apply=false] condition or has a Speed of 0.

Displacement.name: Displacement
Displacement.description: Attacks against the displacer dreg have disadvantage. If it is hit by an attack roll, this trait does not apply until the end of its next turn. This trait does not apply while the dreg has the &reference[Incapacitated apply=false] condition or has a Speed of 0.

Teleport.name: Teleport
Teleport.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] teleports up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space it can see. Before or after teleporting, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can make one melee attack. If this attack hits, it deals an extra [[/damage average]] damage.

River’s Contingency.name: River’s Contingency
River’s Contingency.description: Trigger: River becomes &reference[Bloodied]. Response: River casts @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplMislead000]{Mislead} and teleports to an unoccupied space she can see within 30 feet.

Misty Step.name: Misty Step
Misty Step.description: River casts @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplMistyStep0]{Misty Step} using Intelligence as their spellcasting ability.

oFv84x4cnxetppy2.name: Misty Step
oFv84x4cnxetppy2.description: Briefly surrounded by silvery mist, you teleport up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space you can see.

Academy Rings.name: Academy Rings
Academy Rings.description: River can cast a spell they know without expending a use of it.

Mislead.name: Mislead
Mislead.description:
You gain the &Reference[Invisible apply=false] condition at the same time that an illusory double of you appears where you are standing. The double lasts for the duration, but the invisibility ends immediately after you make an attack roll, deal damage, or cast a spell.

As a Magic action, you can move the illusory double up to twice your Speed and make it gesture, speak, and behave in whatever way you choose. It is intangible and invulnerable.

You can see through its eyes and hear through its ears as if you were located where it is.

Invisible.name: Invisible
Invisible.description: The &Reference[invisible apply=false] immediately after you make an attack roll, deals damage, or casts a spell.

Detect Magic.name: Detect Magic
Detect Magic.description:
For the duration, you sense the presence of magical effects within 30 feet of yourself. If you sense such effects, you can take the Magic action to see a faint aura around any visible creature or object in the area that bears the magic, and if an effect was created by a spell, you learn the spell's school of magic.

The spell is blocked by 1 foot of stone, dirt, or wood; 1 inch of metal; or a thin sheet of lead.

Find Familiar.name: Find Familiar
Find Familiar.description:
You gain the service of a familiar, a spirit that takes an animal form you choose: Bat, Cat, Frog, Hawk, Lizard, Octopus, Owl, Rat, Raven, Spider, Weasel, or another Beast that has a Challenge Rating of 0. Appearing in an unoccupied space within range, the familiar has the statistics of the chosen form (see appendix B), though it is a Celestial, Fey, or Fiend (your choice) instead of a Beast. Your familiar acts independently of you, but it obeys your commands.

Telepathic Connection. While your familiar is within 100 feet of you, you can communicate with it telepathically. Additionally, as a Bonus Action, you can see through the familiar's eyes and hear what it hears until the start of your next turn, gaining the benefits of any special senses it has.

Finally, when you cast a spell with a range of touch, your familiar can deliver the touch. Your familiar must be within 100 feet of you, and it must take a Reaction to deliver the touch when you cast the spell.

Combat. The familiar is an ally to you and your allies. It rolls its own Initiative and acts on its own turn. A familiar can't attack, but it can take other actions as normal.

Disappearance of the Familiar. When the familiar drops to 0 Hit Points, it disappears. It reappears after you cast this spell again. As a Magic action, you can temporarily dismiss the familiar to a pocket dimension. Alternatively, you can dismiss it forever. As a Magic action while it is temporarily dismissed, you can cause it to reappear in an unoccupied space within 30 feet of you. Whenever the familiar drops to 0 Hit Points or disappears into the pocket dimension, it leaves behind in its space anything it was wearing or carrying.

One Familiar Only. You can't have more than one familiar at a time. If you cast this spell while you have a familiar, you instead cause it to adopt a new eligible form.

materials.value: burning incense worth 10+ GP, which the spell consumes

Light.name: Light
Light.description:
You touch one Large or smaller object that isn't being worn or carried by someone else. Until the spell ends, the object sheds Bright Light in a 20-foot radius and Dim Light for an additional 20 feet. The light can be colored as you like.

Covering the object with something opaque blocks the light. The spell ends if you cast it again.

Mage Armor.name: Mage Armor
Mage Armor.description: You touch a willing creature who isn't wearing armor. Until the spell ends, the target's base AC becomes 13 plus its Dexterity modifier. The spell ends early if the target dons armor.

Mage Armor.name: Mage Armor
Mage Armor.description: The target's base AC becomes 13 + its Dexterity modifier.

Mage Hand.name: 法师之手
Mage Hand.description:
A spectral, floating hand appears at a point you choose within range. The hand lasts for the duration. The hand vanishes if it is ever more than 30 feet away from you or if you cast this spell again.

When you cast the spell, you can use the hand to manipulate an object, open an unlocked door or container, stow or retrieve an item from an open container, or pour the contents out of a vial.

As a Magic action on your later turns, you can control the hand thus again. As part of that action, you can move the hand up to 30 feet.

The hand can't attack, activate magic items, or carry more than 10 pounds.

Prestidigitation.name: 魔法伎俩
Prestidigitation.description:
你在施法距离内创造一个魔法效应。从下述效应中选择一项。如果你多次施展该法术，则可以同时维持至多三个不同的非即时效应。

感官效应。 你创造一个立即生效的，无害的感官效应，比如一束火花，一阵风，微弱音乐或古怪的臭味。

玩火。你立即点亮或熄灭一根蜡烛、一根火把或一处小篝火。

清洁或弄脏。 你立即清洁或弄脏一个不大于 1 立方尺的物件。

次级感官。 你使一个不大于 1 立方尺的无生命物质变冷、变暖或对其调味，持续 1 小时。

魔法印记。 你在一个物件或一个表面上创造一块色斑，一个小印记，或者一个徽记，持续 1 小时。

次级造物。 你创造出一个非魔法小饰品或一张虚幻图像，其大小不能超过你的手掌大小，它会持续存在至下个你的回合结束为止。一个小饰品不能造成伤害，也不值钱。

Detect Thoughts.name: 侦测思想
Detect Thoughts.description:
你激活下述效应之一。直到法术结束为止，你可以在你随后的回合用一个魔法动作以激活下述任意效应之一。

感知思想。 你感知距你 30 尺内，知晓语言或能够心灵感应的思想的存在。你并不会阅读这些思想，但你知道这里存在一名有理智的生物。

此法术会被 1 尺厚的岩石、泥土或木头，1 寸厚的金属，或薄薄一层铅阻隔。

阅读思想。 选择一名距你 30 尺内的可见生物，或一名距你 30 尺内被感知思想侦测到的生物。你了解到此时目标最关心的事情。如果目标不知晓任何语言也不会心灵感应，则你不能得到任何信息。

在你的下一回合，用一个魔法动作，你可以尝试深入目标的心灵。如果你选择这么做，目标进行一次感知豁免。豁免失败，则你了解到他的逻辑推理、情绪状态以及他头脑中的一些大事（比如忧虑、挚爱和仇恨的事物）。豁免成功，法术终止。无论哪种情况，目标都会知道你正在窥探其心灵，且直到你的注意力从它的心灵上移开为止，目标均可以在其回合内使用动作进行一次 [[/check ability=int skill=arc dc=@attributes.spelldc]] 检定，对抗你的法术豁免DC，目标胜出对抗时，法术终止。

Dimension Door.name: Dimension Door
Dimension Door.description:
You teleport to a location within range. You arrive at exactly the spot desired. It can be a place you can see, one you can visualize, or one you can describe by stating distance and direction, such as "200 feet straight downward" or "300 feet upward to the northwest at a 45-degree angle."

You can also teleport one willing creature. The creature must be within 5 feet of you when you teleport, and it teleports to a space within 5 feet of your destination space.

If you, the other creature, or both would arrive in a space occupied by a creature or completely filled by one or more objects, you and any creature traveling with you each take 4d6 Force damage, and the teleportation fails.

Dispel Magic.name: 解除魔法
Dispel Magic.description:
在施法距离内指定一名生物、一个物件或一处魔法效应。所有影响该目标的三环或更低环阶法术即告终止。每个影响目标的四环或更高环阶法术都需要以你的施法属性进行一次属性检定（DC 10 + 目标法术环阶），检定成功时目标法术终止。

升环施法： 你直接终止影响目标的小于等于该施法环阶的法术效应。

Identify.name: Identify
Identify.description:
You touch an object throughout the spell's casting. If the object is a magic item or some other magical object, you learn its properties and how to use them, whether it requires Attunement, and how many charges it has, if any. You learn whether any ongoing spells are affecting the item and what they are. If the item was created by a spell, you learn that spell's name.

If you instead touch a creature throughout the casting, you learn which ongoing spells, if any, are currently affecting it.

Invisibility.name: Invisibility
Invisibility.description:
A creature you touch has the &Reference[invisible apply=false] condition until the spell ends. The spell ends early immediately after the target makes an attack roll, deals damage, or casts a spell.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. You can target one additional creature for each spell slot level above 2.

Invisible.name: 隐形
Invisible.description: 如果你进行攻击检定、造成伤害或施展法术，则该法术提前终止。

Scrying.name: 探知术
Scrying.description:
你能看见和听见一个和你处于同一存在位面上的生物。目标生物必须进行一次感知豁免；该豁免的调整值与你对目标的了解程度有关（见下文），也与你和目标之间的物理联系程度有关。目标不知道它进行此豁免在对抗什么，只是会感觉不自在。

你对目标的了解有… 豁免调整值
二手信息（你曾经听说过目标） +5
直接信息（你曾经见过目标） +0
熟悉（你对目标很了解） −5
你持有目标的… 豁免调整值
肖像或其他图像 −2
衣物或其他物品 −4
身体部位如头发或指甲 −10

如果对方豁免成功，则目标不受该法术影响，并且在 24 小时内你不能尝试探知同一个目标。

如果对方豁免失败，则你在目标身边 10 尺内创造出一个隐形的传感器。通过传感器，你可以身临其境地看见和听见周围的环境。传感器会跟随目标移动，并在法术持续时间内始终保持在目标 10 尺之内。在能够看到传感器的生物眼中，你的传感器是一个拳头大小的光球。

除生物之外，你也可以选择一个你以前见过的地点作为该法术的目标。这种情况下，传感器会出现在目标地点且不会移动。

materials.value: 一个至少价值 1000GP 的法器，例如水晶球、银镜、圣水盆

affects.special: 与你处于同一位面的生物，或某个你曾见过的地点的生物
目标身边 10 尺内

Sending.name: 短讯术
Sending.description:
你向你所遇到过的或某人遇到过且向你描述的一个生物发送一小段二十五个词以内的信息。该生物将在心中听到你的信息，它可以认出你是发讯人（如果他认识你），还可以用同样的方式立即回复一条讯息。法术会让目标能够理解你短讯的信息。

你的传讯可以跨越任意长的距离，甚至能跨越位面。但如果目标和你不在同一个存在位面，则短讯术有 5% 的概率无法到达。如果法术没有到达，你会知晓。

在收到你的信息后，一个生物能够阻塞你在 8 小时内以这个法术对他发信的能力。如果你在这段时间内试图送出另一条信息，你会得知你的短讯被阻塞，并且法术失败。

Telepathic Bond.name: Telepathic Bond
Telepathic Bond.description:
You forge a telepathic link among up to eight willing creatures of your choice within range, psychically linking each creature to all the others for the duration. Creatures that can't communicate in any languages aren't affected by this spell.

Until the spell ends, the targets can communicate telepathically through the bond whether or not they share a language. The communication is possible over any distance, though it can't extend to other planes of existence.

Teleportation Circle.name: Teleportation Circle
Teleportation Circle.description:
As you cast the spell, you draw a 5-foot-radius circle on the ground inscribed with sigils that link your location to a permanent teleportation circle of your choice whose sigil sequence you know and that is on the same plane of existence as you. A shimmering portal opens within the circle you drew and remains open until the end of your next turn. Any creature that enters the portal instantly appears within 5 feet of the destination circle or in the nearest unoccupied space if that space is occupied.

Many major temples, guildhalls, and other important places have permanent teleportation circles. Each circle includes a unique sigil sequence—a string of runes arranged in a particular pattern.

When you first gain the ability to cast this spell, you learn the sigil sequences for two destinations on the Material Plane, determined by the DM. You might learn additional sigil sequences during your adventures. You can commit a new sigil sequence to memory after studying it for 1 minute.

You can create a permanent teleportation circle by casting this spell in the same location every day for 365 days.

materials.value: rare inks worth 50+ GP, which the spell consumes

Mage Armor.name: Mage Armor
Mage Armor.description: The target's base AC becomes 13 + its Dexterity modifier.

Haze Aura.name: Haze Aura
Haze Aura.description: A creature that starts its turn within 30 feet of [[lookup @name]] is subjected to the following effect. Constitution Saving Throw: DC 22. Failure: The target gains a Contamination level. Failure or Success: [[/damage average]] damage.

Siege Monster.name: Siege Monster
Siege Monster.description: [[lookup @name]] deals double damage to objects and structures.

Immutable Form.name: Immutable Form
Immutable Form.description: [[lookup @name]] has Immunity to any spell or effect that would alter her form.

Breathe Deep.name: Breathe Deep
Breathe Deep.description: [[lookup @name]]'s Breath Weapon recharges. [[lookup @name]] can only take this Epic Action as the first Epic Action she uses this round. After using this Epic Action, [[lookup @name]] can't take her Bite Epic Action until the start of the next round.

Breath Weapon.name: Breath Weapon
Breath Weapon.description: Dexterity Saving Throw: DC 22, each creature in a 60-foot long, 5-foot wide Line. Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target gains a Contamination level. Success: Half damage only.

Trampling Rampage.name: Trampling Rampage
Trampling Rampage.description:
Recharges when &reference[Bloodied].

[[lookup @name]] moves up to her Speed in a straight line, moving through the space of Large or smaller creatures in her path. She makes one [[/item IpCtyLfGCy4iXydL]] attack against each creature she moves through.

Teleport.name: Teleport
Teleport.description: [[lookup @name]] teleports up to 120 feet to an unoccupied space she can see within the Deep Haze.

Rejuvenation.name: Rejuvenation
Rejuvenation.description: If [[lookup @name]] is destroyed and her corpse is left within an area of the Deep Haze for 1 hour, she is revived with all of her Hit Points.

Regeneration.name: Regeneration
Regeneration.description: When [[lookup @name]] starts her turn in an area of the Deep Haze, she regains 10 Hit Points. [[lookup @name]] dies only if she starts her turn with 0 Hit Points and doesn't regenerate.

heal.condition: While in an area of Deep Haze.

Tail.name: Tail
Tail.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]], and if the target is Large or smaller, it is pushed 20 feet away from [[lookup @name]] and has the &reference[prone] condition.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]], and if the target is Medium or smaller, it has the &reference[Grappled] condition (escape DC 23). While Grappled, the target has the &reference[Restrained] condition and [[lookup @name]] can’t Bite another target.

Grappled by Bite.name: Grappled by Bite
Grappled by Bite.description: You are &reference[grappled apply=false] (escape DC 23). While grappled, you are also &reference[restrained apply=false].

Epic Resistance.name: Epic Resistance
Epic Resistance.description: [[lookup @name]] chooses one condition, spell, or other effect currently affecting them and rolls [[/r 1d20]]. On an 11 or higher, the effect ends on them. [[lookup @name]] can use this Epic Action even if they would otherwise be unable to take actions, their actions are being controlled by another creature, or if a spell or effect alters their game statistics.

Stomp.name: Stomp
Stomp.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]]. Constitution Saving Throw: DC 23. Failure: The target has the &reference[Staggered] condition (save ends).

Staggering Stomp.name: Staggering Stomp
Staggering Stomp.description: You are &reference[staggered apply=false]. You can repeat your saving throw against this effect at the end of each of your turns, ending the effect on a success.

Epic Boss.name: Epic Boss
Epic Boss.description:
This creature is an Epic Boss, a unique foe designed to pose a solo threat to an entire adventuring party. As such, it has additional game rules that sets it apart from normal creatures:

[[lookup @name]] always takes their turn on Initiative count 20. On their turn, they can use their movement and interaction as normal. However, they does not take an action or Bonus Action on their turn unless forced to do so by a spell or other effect. Instead, [[lookup @name]] takes one of the following Epic Actions at the end of each player character's turn.

All this creature's actions are Epic Actions.

  • @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.fKuKUeYl4Hm3uZb3.Item.UBizng7u6LmJQgHh]{Bite}

  • @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.fKuKUeYl4Hm3uZb3.Item.LolDbkUGp0MYkVvq]{Tail}

  • @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.fKuKUeYl4Hm3uZb3.Item.IpCtyLfGCy4iXydL]{Stomp}

  • @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.fKuKUeYl4Hm3uZb3.Item.TpBMJnjzjdLZXNU8]{Breathe Deep}

  • @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.fKuKUeYl4Hm3uZb3.Item.VgnttaT2PMYYeeFp]{Breath Weapon}

  • @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.fKuKUeYl4Hm3uZb3.Item.S4lWtZOktYVL5L0X]{Trampling Rampage}

  • @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.fKuKUeYl4Hm3uZb3.Item.WGi4xQuRH9hWB1EG]{Teleport}

  • @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.fKuKUeYl4Hm3uZb3.Item.bHog1Wn75oMFSjFi]{Epic Resistance}

Skilled Rider.name: Skilled Rider
Skilled Rider.description: While mounted, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can force an attack that targets its mount to target the cavalier instead.

Summon Steed.name: Summon Steed
Summon Steed.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] magically summons a @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.actors24.Actor.mmGriffon0000000]{Griffon}, which appears in an unoccupied space within 60 feet of the cavalier and obeys its commands. The steed takes its turn immediately before or after the [[lookup @name lowercase]]. It remains until it or the [[lookup @name lowercase]] dies, or the [[lookup @name lowercase]] dismisses it as a Bonus Action.

Holy Weapons.name: Holy Weapons
Holy Weapons.description: When the [[lookup @name lowercase]] hits with any weapon, the weapon deals an extra 9 (2d8) Radiant damage (included in the attack).

Shield.name: Shield
Shield.description: You gain the Armor Class benefit of a Shield only if you have training with it.

Avoidance.name: Avoidance
Avoidance.description: If the [[lookup @name]] is subjected to an effect that allows it to make a saving throw to take only half damage, it instead takes no damage if it succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if it fails.

Incorporeal Movement.name: Incorporeal Movement
Incorporeal Movement.description: The [[lookup @name]] can move through other creatures and objects as if they were &reference[DifficultTerrain]. It takes [[/damage average]] damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

Purring Aura.name: Purring Aura
Purring Aura.description: The [[lookup @name]] projects a 30-foot Emanation of madness and dread. A creature that ends its turn in the Emanation has the &reference[Frightened] condition for 1 hour. A creature can take an action to attempt to overcome its fear, making a [[/save]] saving throw. Failure: The target takes [[/damage average]] damage. Success: The Frightened condition ends for that creature, and it becomes immune to the [[lookup @item.name]] of the [[lookup @name]] for 24 hours.

Terrifying Purring.name: Terrifying Purring
Terrifying Purring.description:
You are &reference[frightened apply=false]. You can use an action to make a [[/save 25 wis]] saving throw and attempt to overcome your fear. On a failed save, you take [[/damage average psychic 5d10]] damage.

On a successful save, the this effect ends and you are immune to the Thing with the Writhing Tail's Purring Aura for 24 hours.

Quantum Displacement.name: Quantum Displacement
Quantum Displacement.description: The [[lookup @name]] shifts between realities and timelines. Attack rolls against it have Disadvantage, and it has Advantage on saving throws. If it is hit by an attack or fails a saving throw, this trait is disrupted until it uses Phase Displacement. This trait is also disrupted while the [[lookup @name]] has the &reference[Incapacitated apply=false] condition or a Speed of 0.

Quantum Displacement.name: Quantum Displacement
Quantum Displacement.description:
The Thing with the Writhing Tail shifts be tween realities and timelines. Attack rolls against it have Disadvantage, and it has Advantage on saving throws. If it is hit by an attack or fails a saving throw, this trait is disrupted until it uses Phase Displacement.

This trait is also disrupted while the Thing with the Writhing Tail has the &reference[Incapacitated apply=false] condition or a Speed of 0.

Tail Whip.name: Tail Whip
Tail Whip.description: Intelligence Saving Throw: DC 26, one creature the [[lookup @name]] can see within 30 feet. Failure: [[/damage average activity=pyh4X5Iv2cwcANFf]] damage, and the target has the &reference[Dazed] condition (save ends). Failure by 5 or More: [[/damage average activity=8iPs9halGN6i0LEI]] damage, and the target instead has the &reference[Stunned] condition (save ends). Success: Half damage only.

Tail Whip: Daze.name: Tail Whip: Daze
Tail Whip: Daze.description: You are &reference[dazed apply=false]. You can repeat your saving throw against this effect at the end of each of your turns, ending the effect on a success.

Tail Whip: Stunned.name: Tail Whip: Stunned
Tail Whip: Stunned.description: You are &reference[stunned apply=false]. You can repeat your saving throw against this effect at the end of each of your turns, ending the effect on a success.

Manifest Duplicate.name: Manifest Duplicate
Manifest Duplicate.description:
The [[lookup @name]] creates a perfect visual illusion of itself in an unoccupied space it can see within 300 feet. The illusion is intangible and doesn't occupy its space. The duplicate lasts for 1 minute, but it ends early if the [[lookup @name]] dismisses it (no action required) or has the &reference[Incapacitated apply=false] condition. The [[lookup @name]] can have a up to eight illusory duplicates at a time. While it has one or more duplicates, it has the following benefits:

  • Attacks and Spells. The [[lookup @name]] can cast spells, use @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.fWvI8wG54BQyuhyD.Item.qTducUZcXsaqBnKi]{Tail Whip}, and make @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.fWvI8wG54BQyuhyD.Item.slseZswKbzxXlfbj]{Claw} attacks as if was in an illusory duplicate's space.

  • Aura Expansion. Each illusory duplicate emanates a Purring Aura. The effects of multiple overlapping auras do not stack; a creature is only affected once by the @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.fWvI8wG54BQyuhyD.Item.bI8Cdv1BB1ZSVBMr]{Purring Aura} even if it is within range of multiple Emanations.

  • Move. Each time the [[lookup @name]] takes this Epic Action, it can move any number of illusions up to 60 feet to unoccupied spaces within 300 feet of itself.

  • Distract. When both the [[lookup @name]] and one of its illusory duplicates are within 10 feet of a creature that can see them, the [[lookup @name]] has Advantage on attack rolls against that creature.

  • Sense. The [[lookup @name]] can see and hear through each of its illusory duplicates.

Foundry Note

The "Manifest Duplicate" activity will summon a blank copy of the [[lookup @name]] in order to help represent the duplicates when using the different features and effects of this Epic Action.

Phase Displacement.name: Phase Displacement
Phase Displacement.description: The [[lookup @name]] teleports, swapping places with one of its illusory duplicates. If its @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.fWvI8wG54BQyuhyD.Item.pQYiel9yIRv1GxML]{Quantum Displacement} trait was disrupted, it is no longer disrupted.

Inscrutable.name: Inscrutable
Inscrutable.description: The [[lookup @name]] is immune to any effect that would sense their emotions or read their thoughts, as well as any divination spell that they refuse. Wisdom (Insight) checks made to ascertain the [[lookup @name]]'s intentions or sincerity have Disadvantage.

Epic Boss.name: Epic Boss
Epic Boss.description:
This creature is an Epic Boss, a unique foe designed to pose a solo threat to an entire adventuring party. As such, it has additional game rules that sets it apart from normal creatures:

The [[lookup @name]] always takes their turn on Initiative count 20. On their turn, they can use their movement and interaction as normal. However, they do not take an action or Bonus Action on their turn unless forced to do so by a spell or other effect. Instead, the [[lookup @name]] takes one of the following Epic Actions at the end of each player character's turn.

All this creature's actions are Epic Actions.

  • @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.fWvI8wG54BQyuhyD.Item.slseZswKbzxXlfbj]{Cosmic Claw}

  • @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.fWvI8wG54BQyuhyD.Item.qTducUZcXsaqBnKi]{Tail Whip}

  • @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.fWvI8wG54BQyuhyD.Item.wtWtHCL7qOlKaXTD]{Manifest Duplicate}

  • @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.fWvI8wG54BQyuhyD.Item.AUzKGgVxEWzZcduG]{Phase Displacement}

  • @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.fWvI8wG54BQyuhyD.Item.t98NYRGge1UbLtze]{Spellcasting (Psionics)}

  • @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.fWvI8wG54BQyuhyD.Item.T4PDXYXVIeafGtC1]{Epic Resistance}

Epic Boss.name: Epic Boss
Epic Boss.description:
This creature is an Epic Boss, a unique foe designed to pose a solo threat to an entire adventuring party. As such, it has additional game rules that sets it apart from normal creatures.

The creature always takes their turn on Initiative count 20. On their turn, they can use their movement and interaction as normal. However, they do not take an action or Bonus Action on their turn unless forced to do so by a spell or other effect. Instead, the creature takes one of the Epic Actions they have available.

Epic Resistance.name: Epic Resistance
Epic Resistance.description: The [[lookup @name]] chooses one condition, spell, or other effect currently affecting them and rolls [[/r 1d20]]. On an 11 or higher, the effect ends on them. The [[lookup @name]] can use this Epic Action even if they would otherwise be unable to take actions, their actions are being controlled by another creature, or if a spell or effect alters their game statistics.

Spellcasting (Psionics).name: Spellcasting (Psionics)
Spellcasting (Psionics).description: [[lookup @name]] casts one of the spells it knows, requiring no Material components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 26).

Wish.name: 祈愿术
Wish.description:
祈愿术是凡间生物所能施展的最强大法术。你只需要大声说出自己的愿望就能改变现实世界本身。

法术最基础的用法是用来模仿任意一个八环或更低环阶的法术。如果你以此种方式使用该法术，你不需要满足目标法术所需的任何前提条件（包括有价值的材料成分）就可以让该法术生效。

作为另一种方式，你也可以选择让法术创造下列效应之一：

创造物件。你创造出一个价值不超过 25000GP 的物件，令其出现在地面上你能看见的一处未占据空间中。该物件不能是魔法物品，其在任意方向上的长度都不能超过 300 尺。

即刻治疗。你让你自己和至多二十个你可见的生物恢复全部生命值，并且终止它们身上一切在@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplGreaterRes]{高等复原术}中列举过的所有效应。

伤害抗性。你让至多十个你能看见的生物获得你所指定的一种伤害类型的抗性。此抗性是永久存在的。

免疫法术。你让最多十个你能看见的生物免疫于某道法术或某种其他魔法效应，持续 8 小时。

突来学识。你将你的一个专长替换为符合条件的另一个专长。你失去旧专长带来的全部好处，并获得新专长的好处。你无法取代作为你其他专长或特性先决条件的专长。

重新掷骰。你改变一件刚刚发生的事件。重掷前一轮（包括你的上一个回合）到现在期间的任意一次掷骰，并让现实随着你的新掷骰结果改变。例如，祈愿术以撤销队友的失败豁免或敌人的重击。你可以迫使重新进行的掷骰具有优势或劣势 ，并且可以选择是使用重投后的结果还是使用原来的结果。

重塑现实。你可能会许愿一些没有包含在上述效应中的东西。为了做到这样的效果，请尽可能准确地向地下城主描述你的愿望。在这种情况下，地下城主有极高的自由来裁决究竟会发生什么。不过愿望越大，出错的概率就越大。法术可能会直接失败，也可能部分的达成你想要的结果，还有可能因表述愿望时措辞不当而遭到意想不到的结果。例如，许愿让一个坏人死去可能会让你穿越到多年后该人已死的一个时间段，使你相当于离开了游戏一样。此外，许愿获取一件传说中的魔法物品或神器可能会立即将你传送到该物品当前的持有者身边。如果你许的愿望太过庞大，其效应影响到了社群、区域或是世界，你可能会引来强大的敌人。如果你的愿望会影响神，这名神的神仆会立刻干涉，阻止它或是鼓励你以一种特殊的方式许愿。如果你的愿望将会撤销多元宇宙本身，或是威胁到了印记城，或是以某种方式影响到了痛苦女士，你的心灵中就会浮现出一段她的影像：她摇了摇自己的脑袋，然后你的愿望失效了。

除了模仿其他法术外，施展该法术以达成的任何其他目的都会使你的身躯承受极大的负担，令你变得无比虚弱。承受负担后，直到你完成长休之前，你每次施展法术时都将受到一定伤害（伤害数值取决于你施展的法术的环阶，每环阶 1d10 点的暗蚀伤害），此伤害无法被任何方式减免。此外，你的力量属性值将变为 3，持续 2d4 日。这段时间内，你每花一整日休息（不从事轻度活动以外的行为），恢复需要的日数就减少 2 日。最后，承受负担时，你将有 [[/r 1d3cs1]]{33%} 的概率永远也无法再次施放祈愿术。

Wish Stress.name: Wish Stress
Wish Stress.description: Each time you cast a spell until you finish a Long Rest, you take [[/damage 1d10 type=necrotic]] damage per level of that spell. This damage can’t be reduced or prevented in any way. In addition, your Strength score becomes 3 for [[/r 2d4]] days.

Gate.name: Gate
Gate.description:
You conjure a portal linking an unoccupied space you can see within range to a precise location on a different plane of existence. The portal is a circular opening, which you can make 5 to 20 feet in diameter. You can orient the portal in any direction you choose. The portal lasts for the duration, and the portal's destination is visible through it.

The portal has a front and a back on each plane where it appears. Travel through the portal is possible only by moving through its front. Anything that does so is instantly transported to the other plane, appearing in the unoccupied space nearest to the portal.

Deities and other planar rulers can prevent portals created by this spell from opening in their presence or anywhere within their domains.

When you cast this spell, you can speak the name of a specific creature (a pseudonym, title, or nickname doesn't work). If that creature is on a plane other than the one you are on, the portal opens next to the named creature and transports it to the nearest unoccupied space on your side of the portal. You gain no special power over the creature, and it is free to act as the DM deems appropriate. It might leave, attack you, or help you.

Teleport.name: Teleport
Teleport.description:
This spell instantly transports you and up to eight willing creatures that you can see within range, or a single object that you can see within range, to a destination you select. If you target an object, it must be Large or smaller, and it can't be held or carried by an unwilling creature.

The destination you choose must be known to you, and it must be on the same plane of existence as you. Your familiarity with the destination determines whether you arrive there successfully. The DM rolls [[/gmr 1d100]] and consults the Teleportation Outcome table and the explanations after it.

@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.tables24.RollTable.phbsplTeleportMi]{Teleportation Outcome}
FamiliarityMishapSimilar AreaOff TargetOn Target
Permanent circle———01–00
Linked object———01–00
Very familiar01–0506–1314–2425–00
Seen casually01–3334–4344–5354–00
Viewed once or described01–4344–5354–7374–00
False destination01–5051–00——

Familiarity. Here are the meanings of the terms in the table's Familiarity column:

  • "Permanent circle" means a permanent teleportation circle whose sigil sequence you know.
  • "Linked object" means you possess an object taken from the desired destination within the last six months, such as a book from a wizard's library.
  • "Very familiar" is a place you have visited often, a place you have carefully studied, or a place you can see when you cast the spell.
  • "Seen casually" is a place you have seen more than once but with which you aren't very familiar.
  • "Viewed once or described" is a place you have seen once, possibly using magic, or a place you know through someone else's description, perhaps from a map.
  • "False destination" is a place that doesn't exist. Perhaps you tried to scry an enemy's sanctum but instead viewed an illusion, or you are attempting to teleport to a location that no longer exists.

Mishap. The spell's unpredictable magic results in a difficult journey. Each teleporting creature (or the target object) takes [[/damage 3d10 type=force]] damage, and the DM rerolls on the table to see where you wind up (multiple mishaps can occur, dealing damage each time).

Similar Area. You and your group (or the target object) appear in a different area that's visually or thematically similar to the target area. You appear in the closest similar place. If you are heading for your home laboratory, for example, you might appear in another person's laboratory in the same city.

Off Target. You and your group (or the target object) appear [[/r 2d12]] miles away from the destination in a random direction. Roll [[/r 1d8]] for the direction: 1, east; 2, southeast; 3, south; 4, southwest; 5, west; 6, northwest; 7, north; or 8, northeast.

On Target. You and your group (or the target object) appear where you intended.

affects.special: you and up to eight creatures or one object

Project Image.name: 投影术
Project Image.description:
你创造一个自己的幻象分身，并使其在法术持续时间内维持存在。该分身可以出现在施法距离内你曾见过的任何地点，而不论中间是否存在障碍物。该幻象看起来和听起来都与你一样，只是没有现实形体。幻象受到伤害时会立即消失，法术终止。

你可以通过分身的眼睛视物，用分身的耳朵聆听，如同你处于它的位置一样。用一个&Reference[magic]{魔法}动作，你能使分身移动至多 60 尺，而其姿态、言语和行为均按照你的指定作表现。幻象可以完美地模仿你的举止。

由于东西可以穿过幻象，任何与该幻象进行的物理互动都会暴露其幻觉本质。一名生物可以采取&Reference[study]{研究}动作进行一次对抗你法术豁免 DC 的成功智力（[[/check ability=int skill=inv dc=@attributes.spelldc]]{调查}）检定以看穿幻象。辨出幻象的生物可以看穿该影像，其产生的声响对该生物而言显得虚假。

materials.value: 一尊价值 5GP+ 的自塑像

Maze.name: Maze
Maze.description:
You banish a creature that you can see within range into a labyrinthine demiplane. The target remains there for the duration or until it escapes the maze.

The target can take a Study action to try to escape. When it does so, it makes a DC 20 Intelligence (Investigation) check. If it succeeds, it escapes, and the spell ends.

When the spell ends, the target reappears in the space it left or, if that space is occupied, in the nearest unoccupied space.

Banished.name: Banished
Banished.description: The target can take a Study action to try to escape. When it does so, it makes a [[/check ability=int skill=inv dc=20]] check. If it succeeds, it escapes, and the spell ends.

Major Image.name: Major Image
Major Image.description:
You create the image of an object, a creature, or some other visible phenomenon that is no larger than a 20-foot Cube. The image appears at a spot that you can see within range and lasts for the duration. It seems real, including sounds, smells, and temperature appropriate to the thing depicted, but it can't deal damage or cause conditions.

If you are within range of the illusion, you can take a Magic action to cause the image to move to any other spot within range. As the image changes location, you can alter its appearance so that its movements appear natural for the image. For example, if you create an image of a creature and move it, you can alter the image so that it appears to be walking. Similarly, you can cause the illusion to make different sounds at different times, even making it carry on a conversation, for example.

Physical interaction with the image reveals it to be an illusion, for things can pass through it. A creature that takes a Study action to examine the image can determine that it is an illusion with a successful [[/check ability=int skill=inv dc=@attributes.spell.dc]] check against your spell save DC. If a creature discerns the illusion for what it is, the creature can see through the image, and its other sensory qualities become faint to the creature.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. The spell lasts until dispelled, without requiring Concentration, if cast with a level 4+ spell slot.

Telekinesis.name: 心灵遥控
Telekinesis.description:
You gain the ability to move or manipulate creatures or objects by thought. When you cast the spell and as a Magic action on your later turns before the spell ends, you can exert your will on one creature or object that you can see within range, causing the appropriate effect below. You can affect the same target round after round or choose a new one at any time. If you switch targets, the prior target is no longer affected by the spell.

Creature. You can try to move a Huge or smaller creature. The target must succeed on a Strength saving throw, or you move it up to 30 feet in any direction within the spell's range. Until the end of your next turn, the creature has the &Reference[Restrained] condition, and if you lift it into the air, it is suspended there. It falls at the end of your next turn unless you use this option on it again and it fails the save.

Object. You can try to move a Huge or smaller object. If the object isn't being worn or carried, you automatically move it up to 30 feet in any direction within the spell's range.

If the object is worn or carried by a creature, that creature must succeed on a Strength saving throw, or you pull the object away and move it up to 30 feet in any direction within the spell's range.

You can exert fine control on objects with your telekinetic grip, such as manipulating a simple tool, opening a door or a container, stowing or retrieving an item from an open container, or pouring the contents from a vial.

Greater Invisibility.name: Greater Invisibility
Greater Invisibility.description: A creature you touch has the Invisible condition until the spell ends.

Scrying.name: 探知术
Scrying.description:
你能看见和听见一个和你处于同一存在位面上的生物。目标生物必须进行一次感知豁免；该豁免的调整值与你对目标的了解程度有关（见下文），也与你和目标之间的物理联系程度有关。目标不知道它进行此豁免在对抗什么，只是会感觉不自在。

你对目标的了解有… 豁免调整值
二手信息（你曾经听说过目标） +5
直接信息（你曾经见过目标） +0
熟悉（你对目标很了解） −5
你持有目标的… 豁免调整值
肖像或其他图像 −2
衣物或其他物品 −4
身体部位如头发或指甲 −10

如果对方豁免成功，则目标不受该法术影响，并且在 24 小时内你不能尝试探知同一个目标。

如果对方豁免失败，则你在目标身边 10 尺内创造出一个隐形的传感器。通过传感器，你可以身临其境地看见和听见周围的环境。传感器会跟随目标移动，并在法术持续时间内始终保持在目标 10 尺之内。在能够看到传感器的生物眼中，你的传感器是一个拳头大小的光球。

除生物之外，你也可以选择一个你以前见过的地点作为该法术的目标。这种情况下，传感器会出现在目标地点且不会移动。

materials.value: 一个至少价值 1000GP 的法器，例如水晶球、银镜、圣水盆

affects.special: 与你处于同一位面的生物，或某个你曾见过的地点的生物
目标身边 10 尺内

Sending.name: 短讯术
Sending.description:
你向你所遇到过的或某人遇到过且向你描述的一个生物发送一小段二十五个词以内的信息。该生物将在心中听到你的信息，它可以认出你是发讯人（如果他认识你），还可以用同样的方式立即回复一条讯息。法术会让目标能够理解你短讯的信息。

你的传讯可以跨越任意长的距离，甚至能跨越位面。但如果目标和你不在同一个存在位面，则短讯术有 5% 的概率无法到达。如果法术没有到达，你会知晓。

在收到你的信息后，一个生物能够阻塞你在 8 小时内以这个法术对他发信的能力。如果你在这段时间内试图送出另一条信息，你会得知你的短讯被阻塞，并且法术失败。

Black Tentacles.name: Black Tentacles
Black Tentacles.description:
Squirming, ebony tentacles fill a 20-foot square on ground that you can see within range. For the duration, these tentacles turn the ground in that area into &Reference[DifficultTerrain].

Each creature in that area makes a Strength saving throw. On a failed save, it takes 3d6 Bludgeoning damage, and it has the &Reference[Restrained apply=false] condition until the spell ends. A creature also makes that save if it enters the area or ends it turn there. A creature makes that save only once per turn.

A Restrained creature can take an action to make a [[/check ability=str skill=ath dc=@attributes.spell.dc]] check against your spell save DC, ending the condition on itself on a success.

Restrained.name: Restrained
Restrained.description: A &Reference[Restrained apply=false] creature can take an action to make a [[/check ability=str skill=ath dc=@attributes.spell.dc]] check against your spell save DC, ending the condition on itself on a success.

Dream.name: Dream
Dream.description:
You target a creature you know on the same plane of existence. You or a willing creature you touch enters a trance state to act as a dream messenger. While in the trance, the messenger is &Reference[Incapacitated apply=false] and has a Speed of 0.

If the target is asleep, the messenger appears in the target's dreams and can converse with the target as long as it remains asleep, through the spell's duration. The messenger can also shape the dream's environment, creating landscapes, objects, and other images. The messenger can emerge from the trance at any time, ending the spell. The target recalls the dream perfectly upon waking.

If the target is awake when you cast the spell, the messenger knows it and can either end the trance (and the spell) or wait for the target to sleep, at which point the messenger enters its dreams.

You can make the messenger terrifying to the target. If you do so, the messenger can deliver a message of no more than ten words, and then the target makes a Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the target gains no benefit from its rest, and it takes 3d6 Psychic damage when it wakes up.

Trance State.name: Trance State
Trance State.description: While in the trance, the messenger is Incapacitated and has a Speed of 0.

Mirror Image.name: Mirror Image
Mirror Image.description:
Three illusory duplicates of yourself appear in your space. Until the spell ends, the duplicates move with you and mimic your actions, shifting position so it's impossible to track which image is real.

Each time a creature hits you with an attack roll during the spell's duration, roll a [[/r (@flags.dnd-players-handbook.mirrorImages)d6kh1cs>2#Duplicate destroyed]]{d6 for each} of your remaining duplicates. If any of the d6s rolls a 3 or higher, one of the duplicates is hit instead of you, and the duplicate is destroyed. The duplicates otherwise ignore all other damage and effects. The spell ends when all three duplicates are destroyed.

A creature is unaffected by this spell if it has the &Reference[blinded apply=false] condition, &Reference[blindsight], or &Reference[truesight].

Detect Thoughts.name: 侦测思想
Detect Thoughts.description:
你激活下述效应之一。直到法术结束为止，你可以在你随后的回合用一个魔法动作以激活下述任意效应之一。

感知思想。 你感知距你 30 尺内，知晓语言或能够心灵感应的思想的存在。你并不会阅读这些思想，但你知道这里存在一名有理智的生物。

此法术会被 1 尺厚的岩石、泥土或木头，1 寸厚的金属，或薄薄一层铅阻隔。

阅读思想。 选择一名距你 30 尺内的可见生物，或一名距你 30 尺内被感知思想侦测到的生物。你了解到此时目标最关心的事情。如果目标不知晓任何语言也不会心灵感应，则你不能得到任何信息。

在你的下一回合，用一个魔法动作，你可以尝试深入目标的心灵。如果你选择这么做，目标进行一次感知豁免。豁免失败，则你了解到他的逻辑推理、情绪状态以及他头脑中的一些大事（比如忧虑、挚爱和仇恨的事物）。豁免成功，法术终止。无论哪种情况，目标都会知道你正在窥探其心灵，且直到你的注意力从它的心灵上移开为止，目标均可以在其回合内使用动作进行一次 [[/check ability=int skill=arc dc=@attributes.spelldc]] 检定，对抗你的法术豁免DC，目标胜出对抗时，法术终止。

Dominate Beast.name: Dominate Beast
Dominate Beast.description:
One Beast you can see within range must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or have the &Reference[Charmed apply=false] condition for the duration. The target has Advantage on the save if you or your allies are fighting it. Whenever the target takes damage, it repeats the save, ending the spell on itself on a success.

You have a telepathic link with the Charmed target while the two of you are on the same plane of existence. On your turn, you can use this link to issue commands to the target (no action required), such as "Attack that creature," "Move over there," or "Fetch that object." The target does its best to obey on its turn. If it completes an order and doesn't receive further direction from you, it acts and moves as it likes, focusing on protecting itself.

You can command the target to take a Reaction but must take your own Reaction to do so.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. Your Concentration can last longer with a spell slot of level 5 (up to 10 minutes), 6 (up to 1 hour), or 7+ (up to 8 hours).

Dominated.name: Dominated
Dominated.description: Whenever the &Reference[Charmed apply=false] target takes damage, it repeats the [[/save ability=wis]] save, ending the spell on itself on a success.

Suggestion.name: Suggestion
Suggestion.description:
You suggest a course of activity—described in no more than 25 words—to one creature you can see within range that can hear and understand you. The suggestion must sound achievable and not involve anything that would obviously deal damage to the target or its allies. For example, you could say, "Fetch the key to the cult's treasure vault, and give the key to me." Or you could say, "Stop fighting, leave this library peacefully, and don't return."

The target must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or have the Charmed condition for the duration or until you or your allies deal damage to the target. The Charmed target pursues the suggestion to the best of its ability. The suggested activity can continue for the entire duration, but if the suggested activity can be completed in a shorter time, the spell ends for the target upon completing it.

Pursuing Suggestion.name: Pursuing Suggestion
Pursuing Suggestion.description: The Charmed target pursues the suggestion to the best of its ability. The suggested activity can continue for the entire duration, but if the suggested activity can be completed in a shorter time, the spell ends for the target upon completing it.

Digestive Enzymes.name: Digestive Enzymes
Digestive Enzymes.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has Advantage on attack rolls against a &reference[Burning apply=false] target.

Spider Climb.name: Spider Climb
Spider Climb.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

Acid Spray.name: Acid Spray
Acid Spray.description: Dexterity Saving Throw: DC 13, each creature in a 15-foot Cone. Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target has the &reference[Burning] condition (2d4 Acid). Success: Half damage only.

Bloat Burst.name: Bloat Burst
Bloat Burst.description: Trigger: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] is reduced to 0 Hit Points or takes damage from a Critical Hit. Response: Dexterity Saving Throw: DC 12, each creature in a 10-foot Emanation originating from the [[lookup @name lowercase]]. Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target has the &reference[Burning] condition (2d4 Acid).

save.condition: When the gag fly is reduced to 0 Hit Points or takes damage from a critical hit.

Synaptic Shock.name: Synaptic Shock
Synaptic Shock.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] unleashes a storm of psychic energy in a 10-foot-radius sphere centered on a point within 60 feet of it. Each creature in that area must make a [[/save]] saving throw or take [[/damage average]] damage and has the &reference[Dazed] condition (save ends)

Synaptic Shock.name: Synaptic Shock
Synaptic Shock.description: You are &reference[dazed apply=false]. You can repeat this save at the end of each of your turns, ending this effect on a success.

Hazewarp Hex.name: Hazewarp Hex
Hazewarp Hex.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] chooses a creature it can see within 60 feet of it and one of the following conditions: &reference[Addled], &reference[clumsy], &reference[Enfeebled], or &reference[Sickened]. Charisma Saving Throw: DC 13, the targeted creature. Failure: The target becomes cursed by the [[lookup @name lowercase]] for one minute or until the dreg dies or uses this ability again. While cursed in this manner, a creature becomes vulnerable to Psychic damage and gains the chosen condition (save ends). Success: The target is immune to the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s Hazewarp Hex for 24 hours.

Hazewarp Hex: Addled.name: Hazewarp Hex: Addled
Hazewarp Hex: Addled.description: You are cursed. While cursed in this way, you are &reference[addled apply=false] and have vulnerability to Psychic damage.

Hazewarp Hex: Enfeebled.name: Hazewarp Hex: Enfeebled
Hazewarp Hex: Enfeebled.description: You are cursed. While cursed in this way, you are &reference[enfeebled apply=false] and have vulnerability to Psychic damage.

Hazewarp Hex: Sickened.name: Hazewarp Hex: Sickened
Hazewarp Hex: Sickened.description: You are cursed. While cursed in this way, you are &reference[sickened apply=false] and have vulnerability to Psychic damage.

Hazewarp Hex: Clumsy.name: Hazewarp Hex: Clumsy
Hazewarp Hex: Clumsy.description: You are cursed. While cursed in this way, you are &reference[clumsy apply=false] and have vulnerability to Psychic damage.

Psychic Blast.name: Psychic Blast
Psychic Blast.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]], and the [[lookup @name lowercase]] pushes the target 10 feet straight away from itself.

Mage Armor.name: Mage Armor
Mage Armor.description: You touch a willing creature who isn't wearing armor. Until the spell ends, the target's base AC becomes 13 plus its Dexterity modifier. The spell ends early if the target dons armor.

Mage Armor.name: Mage Armor
Mage Armor.description: The target's base AC becomes 13 + its Dexterity modifier.

Mage Hand.name: 法师之手
Mage Hand.description:
A spectral, floating hand appears at a point you choose within range. The hand lasts for the duration. The hand vanishes if it is ever more than 30 feet away from you or if you cast this spell again.

When you cast the spell, you can use the hand to manipulate an object, open an unlocked door or container, stow or retrieve an item from an open container, or pour the contents out of a vial.

As a Magic action on your later turns, you can control the hand thus again. As part of that action, you can move the hand up to 30 feet.

The hand can't attack, activate magic items, or carry more than 10 pounds.

Levitate.name: Levitate
Levitate.description:
One creature or loose object of your choice that you can see within range rises vertically up to 20 feet and remains suspended there for the duration. The spell can levitate an object that weighs up to 500 pounds. An unwilling creature that succeeds on a Constitution saving throw is unaffected.

The target can move only by pushing or pulling against a fixed object or surface within reach (such as a wall or a ceiling), which allows it to move as if it were climbing. You can change the target's altitude by up to 20 feet in either direction on your turn. If you are the target, you can move up or down as part of your move. Otherwise, you can take a Magic action to move the target, which must remain within the spell's range.

When the spell ends, the target floats gently to the ground if it is still aloft.

Levitating.name: Levitating
Levitating.description: The target can move only by pushing or pulling against a fixed object or surface within reach (such as a wall or a ceiling), which allows it to move as if it were climbing.

Mage Armor.name: Mage Armor
Mage Armor.description: The target's base AC becomes 13 + its Dexterity modifier.

Instinctive Ambusher.name: Instinctive Ambusher
Instinctive Ambusher.description: At the start of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s first turn of each combat, if the sewer thing attacks a creature, it can make one additional Tendril Lash attack as part of its Multiattack action.

Poison Absorption.name: Poison Absorption
Poison Absorption.description: Whenever the [[lookup @name lowercase]] takes Poison damage, it takes no damage and regains a number of Hit Points equal to the Poison damage dealt.

Toxic Aura.name: Toxic Aura
Toxic Aura.description: A creature that starts its turn within 5 feet of the [[lookup @name lowercase]] is subjected to the following effect. Constitution Saving Throw: DC 12. Failure: [[/damage average]] damage.

Unexpected Appearance.name: Unexpected Appearance
Unexpected Appearance.description: If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] is motionless at the start of combat, it has Advantage on its Initiative roll. Additionally, if a creature hasn't observed the [[lookup @name lowercase]] move or act, that creature must succeed on a [[/check]] check to discern that the [[lookup @name lowercase]] is animate.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes two attacks and uses [[/item .UIDVTVG52WVxFxBy]].

Tendril Lash.name: Tendril Lash
Tendril Lash.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]], and the target has the &reference[Grappled] condition (escape DC 16)

Reel.name: Reel
Reel.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] pulls each creature &reference[Grappled apply=false] by it up to 20 feet straight toward it

Engulf.name: Engulf
Engulf.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] engulfs a Medium or smaller creature within 5 feet of it that is &reference[Grappled apply=false] by it. The grapple ends. The target has the &reference[Blinded] and &reference[Restrained] conditions, is &reference[suffocating], and is subjected to the following effect at the start of each of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s turns.
