Hallucinogenic Bioluminescence.name: Hallucinogenic Bioluminescence
Hallucinogenic Bioluminescence.description:
A creature that starts its turn within 60 feet of the [[lookup @name lowercase]] and can see it is subjected to the following effect unless the [[lookup @name lowercase]] chooses otherwise. Wisdom Saving Throw: DC 16. Failure: The target has the &reference[Charmed] condition (save ends). While Charmed, the target regards all other creatures as enemies except the [[lookup @name lowercase]], whom it regards as an ally.

Whenever the target makes an attack or casts a detrimental spell, it must choose its target at random from the creatures it can see within range. If a creature provokes an Opportunity Attack from the target, it must make the attack, if able. If the target ends its turn without taking an Attack or Magic action, it takes [[/damage average]] damage.

Unless &reference[surprise]{Surprised}, a creature can avert its eyes to avoid the saving throw at the start of its turn. If the creature does so, it has Disadvantage on attack rolls against the [[lookup @name lowercase]] until the start of its next turn. If the creature looks at the [[lookup @name lowercase]] in the meantime, that creature must immediately make the saving throw.

Hesitation Damage.name: Hesitation Damage
Hesitation Damage.condition: When a creature charmed by the cnidarian ends their turn without taking an Attack or Magic action.

save.condition: When a creature starts their turn within 60 feet of the cnidarian and can see it.

Neon Illumination.name: Neon Illumination
Neon Illumination.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] sheds Bright Light in a 30-foot radius and Dim Light for an additional 30 feet.

Tendrils.name: Tendrils
Tendrils.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]], or [[/damage 48 necrotic]] damage if the target is &reference[Charmed apply=false] by the [[lookup @name lowercase]].

Reflexive Flash.name: Reflexive Flash
Reflexive Flash.description: Trigger: A creature the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within 30 feet deals damage to it. Response: Constitution Saving Throw: DC 16, each creature in a 30-foot Emanation originating from the [[lookup @name lowercase]] that can see it. Failure: [[/damage average]] damage and the target has the &reference[Blinded] condition (save ends). Success: Half damage only.

save.condition: When a creature the cnidarian can see within 30 feet deals damage to it.

Reflexive Flash.name: Reflexive Flash
Reflexive Flash.description: You are &reference[blinded apply=false]. You can repeat your saving throw against this effect at the end of each of your turns, ending the effect on a success.

Absorption.name: Absorption
Absorption.description: When the [[lookup @name lowercase]] kills a creature that is neither a construct nor undead, it absorbs the corpse into its body and regains 20 Hit Points.

Amorphous.name: Amorphous
Amorphous.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without expending extra movement to do so.

Spider Climb.name: Spider Climb
Spider Climb.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can climb difficult surfaces, including along ceilings, without needing to make an ability check

Engulf.name: Engulf
Engulf.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] engulfs a Large or smaller creature &reference[Grappled apply=false] by it. Until the grapple ends the target has the &reference[Blinded] and &reference[Restrained] conditions, is suffocating, and has &reference[TotalCover] against attacks and other effects outside the [[lookup @name lowercase]. If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] moves, the engulfed target moves with it. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can have only one creature engulfed at a time. Constitution Saving Throw: DC 15. Failure: [[/damage average]] damage. The engulfed creature repeats the save at the start of each of the [[lookup @name lowercase]] turns Success: the target escapes and enters the nearest unoccupied space.

Start of Turn Damage.name: Start of Turn Damage
Start of Turn Damage.condition: At the start of each of the abomination's turns while a creature is inside of them.

affects.special: A grappled creature.

Engulfed.name: Engulfed
Engulfed.description:
You are &reference[blinded apply=false], &reference[restrained apply=false], suffocating, and have &reference[totalcover] against attacks and other effects outside the creature while engulfed by it. If the creature moves, you move with it.

At the start of each of the creature's turns, you must make a [[/save 15 con]] saving throw or take [[/damage average 3d8 + 5 bludgeoning]] damage. On a successful save, you escape the creature and enter the nearest unoccupied space.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes two [[/item rGQ5K5jFsQqgwRXZ]] attacks. If both attacks hit a Large or smaller creature, the target has the &reference[Grappled] condition (escape DC 16) and the abomination uses [[/item XAareYyDCcQNg3Bg]] on the Grappled creature.

Abyssal Aura.name: Abyssal Aura
Abyssal Aura.description: Allies within 30 feet who can see and hear the [[lookup @name lowercase]] have Advantage on saving throws to avoid or end the &reference[Charmed apply=false] and &reference[Frightened apply=false] conditions. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can't use this trait if it is &reference[Incapacitated apply=false].

Unwavering Sentinel.name: Unwavering Sentinel
Unwavering Sentinel.description: Creatures provoke Opportunity Attacks from the [[lookup @name lowercase]] even if they take the Disengage action before leaving its reach.

Shield Bash.name: Shield Bash
Shield Bash.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]], and if the target is a Huge or smaller creature, it is subjected to the following effect. Strength Saving Throw: DC 14. Failure: The target has the &reference[Prone] condition.

Amphibious.name: Amphibious
Amphibious.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can breathe air and water.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes one [[/item PoL1rROP1co7SpTi]] attack and one [[/item n1GFQMZjCcCHOWps]] attack.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]].

Harpoon.name: Harpoon
Harpoon.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]], and if the target is a Huge or smaller creature, it is subjected to the following effect. Strength Saving Throw: DC 14. Failure: The target is pulled up to 20 feet toward the [[lookup @name lowercase]].

Shield.name: Shield
Shield.description: You gain the Armor Class benefit of a Shield only if you have training with it.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]], and if the target is Medium or smaller, it has the &reference[Prone] condition.

Feast.name: Feast
Feast.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes a [[/item NU75YRszGL1KPm0F]] attack against a &reference[Bloodied] target.

Pack Tactics.name: Pack Tactics
Pack Tactics.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has Advantage on attack rolls against a creature if at least one of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally doesn't have the &reference[Incapacitated apply=false] condition.

Captain’s Orders.name: Captain’s Orders
Captain’s Orders.description: While within 60 feet of a @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.9tj31BF3CTZE84Ux], the [[lookup @name lowercase]] has Advantage on saving throws to avoid or end the &reference[Charmed apply=false] and &reference[Frightened apply=false] conditions.

From Another World.name: From Another World
From Another World.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] doesn’t have the standard Aberrant Traits other creatures in the Space Between Worlds have.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes two [[/item .gYm3Z88np1Hrb2oH]] attacks or uses its [[/item .LloS3Ae2AEX0rRl2]].

Sturdy Net.name: Sturdy Net
Sturdy Net.description: [[/attack extended]]. Hit: The target has the &reference[Restrained] and &reference[Defenseless] conditions. A creature can take an action to free itself or another creature in a net with a successful [[/check]] check. Dealing 10 Slashing damage to the net (AC 12) frees the target without harming it and destroys the net.

Ensnared in Sturdy Net.name: Ensnared in Sturdy Net
Ensnared in Sturdy Net.description:
You are &reference[restrained apply=false] and &reference[defenseless apply=false].

You or a creature can take an action to free you from the net with a successful [[/check 14 str]]. Dealing 10 Slashing damage to the net (AC 12) frees you without harming you and destroys the net.

Man the Cannons.name: Man the Cannons
Man the Cannons.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] loads an artillery weapon, such as a cannon or ballista.

Unshakeable Faith.name: Unshakeable Faith
Unshakeable Faith.description: When the [[lookup @name lowercase]] would fail a saving throw, it can reroll the save with Advantage. It must use the new roll.

Mutant Fortitude.name: Mutant Fortitude
Mutant Fortitude.description:
If damage reduces the [[lookup @name lowercase]] to 0 Hit Points, it makes a Constitution saving throw (DC 5 plus the damage taken) unless the damage is Radiant or from a Critical Hit. On a successful save, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] drops to 1 Hit Point instead.

Foundry Note

Input the amount of damage taken by the [[lookup @name lowercase]] into the scaling field when using this feature to automatically adjust the saving throw DC.

save.condition: When damage other than Radiant or from a Critical Hit reduces the creature to 0 hit point.

Trample.name: Trample
Trample.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] moves its speed. During this movement, it can move through the spaces of Medium and smaller creatures, as well as structures made of wood or stone that are less than 1 foot thick. When the [[lookup @name lowercase]] enters another creature's space for the first time during this movement, it can make one [[/item YrloWtzxdL2sGryF]] attack against that creature. If the target is a creature, it is subject to the following effect. Strength Saving Throw: DC 16. Failure: the targeted creature has the &reference[Prone] condition.

Slam Impact.name: Slam Impact
Slam Impact.condition: When the creature enters another creature's space for the first time during the trample.

Insectoid Limbs.name: Insectoid Limbs
Insectoid Limbs.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can climb difficult surfaces, including along ceilings, without needing to make an ability check. It ignores movement restrictions caused by webbing.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: Constitution Saving Throw: DC 12, one target within 5 ft. Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target gains one &reference[drakkenheimContamination] level. Success: Half damage only.

Contaminated Venom.name: Contaminated Venom
Contaminated Venom.description: Constitution Saving Throw: DC 12, one target within 40 feet. Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target gains one &reference[drakkenheimContamination] level. Success: Half damage only.

Fractured Reality.name: Fractured Reality
Fractured Reality.description: Trigger: A creature misses the [[lookup @name lowercase]] with an attack. Response: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] teleports to an unoccupied space it can see within 30 feet, briefly leaving behind a fractured image of itself being hit by the attack.

utility.condition: When a creature misses the eldritch crawler with an attack.

Void Walker.name: Void Walker
Void Walker.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] climbs through a tear in reality, traveling from the Material Plane to the Space Between Worlds or vice versa.

Aberrant Traits.name: Aberrant Traits
Aberrant Traits.description:
Given the contamination and delerium present within the Space Between Worlds, all creatures who dwell there are the product of contamination and unaffected by the normal dangers of delerium. As an aberrant, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] has the following traits:

  • Fully Contaminated. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] is immune to &reference[drakkenheimContamination] and has Advantage on saving throws against contaminated spells. This creature may cast contaminated spells even though it does not gain Contamination levels.

  • Delerium Healing. As an action, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can touch a delerium shard to regain 10 (3d6) Hit Points. Once the [[lookup @name lowercase]] has used a delerium shard in this way, the shard can't be used in this manner again for 24 hours.

  • Alien Intellect. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] is immune to any effect that would sense its emotions or read its thoughts, as well as any divination spell that it refuses. Wisdom (Insight) checks made to ascertain the [[lookup @name lowercase]]s intentions or sincerity have Disadvantage.

affects.special: a delerium shard

Malleable.name: Malleable
Malleable.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can move through a space as narrow as 6 inches wide without expending extra movement to do so.

Constricting Tentacle.name: Constricting Tentacle
Constricting Tentacle.description:
[[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]].

If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it has the &reference[Grappled] condition (escape DC 13). Until this grapple ends, the target has the &reference[Restrained] condition, takes [[/damage average activity=y0aZOSpxsgQwkYsT]] damage at the start of each of its turns, and the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can't make Constricting Tentacle attacks

Constricting Tentacle.name: Constricting Tentacle
Constricting Tentacle.description: You are &reference[grappled apply=false] (escape DC 13). While grappled, you are also &reference[restrained apply=false], and take [[/damage 2d6 + 3 bludgeoning & 2d6 necrotic average]] damage at the start of each of your turns.

Evasion.name: Evasion
Evasion.description: If [[lookup @name]] is subjected to an effect that allows him to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half damage, he instead takes no damage if he succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if he fails, provided he doesn't have the &reference[Incapacitated apply=false] condition.

Parry.name: Parry
Parry.description: Trigger: A creature [[lookup @name]] can see hits him with an attack. Response: [[lookup @name]] adds 3 to his AC against that attack, potentially causing it to miss.

utility.condition: When a creature Ansom can see hits him with an attack.

Longbow.name: Longbow
Longbow.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]], and the target has the &reference[slowed] condition until the end of [[lookup @name]]'s next turn.

Slowing Shot.name: Slowing Shot
Slowing Shot.description: You are &reference[slowed apply=false] until the end of the hooded lantern scout's next turn.

Arrows.name: Arrows
Arrows.description:
Storage: @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.equipment24.Item.phbagQuiver00000]{Quiver}

@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.equipment24.Item.phbagAmmunitionV]{Ammunition} is required by a weapon that has the Ammunition property. A weapon's description specifies the type of ammunition used by the weapon. The Ammunition table lists the different types and the amount you get when you buy them. The table also lists the item that is typically used to store each type; storage must be bought separately.

Clinging Shadows.name: Clinging Shadows
Clinging Shadows.description: A creature in &reference[DimLight] or &reference[Darkness] has Disadvantage on ability checks to escape the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s grapple. Each time a creature attempts to escape the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s grapple while it is in Dim Light or Darkness, the creature takes [[/damage average]] damage. If this Necrotic damage reduces the target to 0 Hit Points, the target is stabilized but has the &reference[Paralyzed] condition for 1 hour, even if it regains Hit Points.

Clinging Shadows.name: Clinging Shadows
Clinging Shadows.description: For the next hour while at 0 hit points, you are Stabilized and &reference[paralyzed apply=false, even if you regain hit points.

Sunlight Weakness.name: Sunlight Weakness
Sunlight Weakness.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] takes [[/damage average]] damage if it ends its turn in sunlight, and has Disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks while in sunlight.

Grabbing Hands.name: Grabbing Hands
Grabbing Hands.description: On hit, f the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it has the Grappled condition (escape DC 15). Until this grapple ends, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can't use this hand against another target. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has four hands, each of which can grapple one target.

Grappled by Grabbing Hands.name: Grappled by Grabbing Hands
Grappled by Grabbing Hands.description: You are &reference[grappled apply=false] (escape DC 15). Each time you attempt to escape the body snatcher’s grapple while it is in Dim Light or Darkness, you take [[/damage average 4d8 necrotic]] damage.

Shadow Teleport.name: Shadow Teleport
Shadow Teleport.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] teleports up to 120 feet to an un- occupied space that it can see that is in &reference[Dimlight] or &reference[Darkness]. It can bring any Medium or smaller creature it is grappling, teleporting that creature to an unoccupied space it can see within 5 feet of its destination that is also in Dim Light or Darkness. An unwilling creature can make a [[/save]] saving throw to resist being teleported. On a successful save, neither the creature nor the [[lookup @name lowercase]] teleport.

affects.special: And each creature grappled by the body snatcher.

Misty Camouflage.name: Misty Camouflage
Misty Camouflage.description: A [[lookup @name lowercase]] has Advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks when taking the Hide action in any area obscured by mist or fog, including the Haze.

Claws.name: Claws
Claws.description:
[[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]].

Critical Hit: Constitution Saving Throw: DC 10. Failure: The target gains one level of Contamination.

save.condition: On Critical Hit

Alluring Aura.name: Alluring Aura
Alluring Aura.description: [[lookup @name]] projects a 30-foot Emanation of beguiling enchantment. A creature that ends its turn in the Emanation has the &reference[Charmed] condition for 1 hour. Each time the creature takes damage other than Psychic damage, it makes a [[/save]] saving throw. On a success, the Charmed condition ends for that creature, and it is immune to the [[lookup @item.name]] of [[lookup @name]] for 24 hours.

Alluring Aura.name: Alluring Aura
Alluring Aura.description: You are &reference[charmed apply=false] for one hour. Each time you take damage other than Psychic damage, you make a [[/save 25 wisdom]] saving throw. On a success, the Charmed condition ends for you and you are immune to the Alluring Aura of The Whispered Promise for 24 hours.

Change Shape.name: Change Shape
Change Shape.description: [[lookup @name]] has no true form and chooses how they manifest to each creature (no action required). Their form can be anything they wish; they can appear like a creature, object, or even as a multisensory representation of an abstract concept. They can appear to be any form that is Large or smaller, but their game statistics are the same in each form.

Inscrutable.name: Inscrutable
Inscrutable.description: [[lookup @name]] is immune to any effect that would sense their emotions or read their thoughts, as well as any divination spell that they refuse. Wisdom (Insight) checks made to ascertain [[lookup @name]]'s intentions or sincerity have Disadvantage.

Glibness.name: Glibness
Glibness.description: When they make a Charisma (Deception) check, [[lookup @name]] treats any roll of 14 or less on the d20 as 15.

Glibness.name: Glibness
Glibness.description: When they make a Charisma (Deception) check, The Whispered Promise treats any roll of 14 or less on the d20 as 15.

Unravelling Resolve.name: Unravelling Resolve
Unravelling Resolve.description: Creatures grappled by [[lookup @name]] can't benefit from resistance and immunity to Psychic damage or the &reference[Charmed apply=false] condition.

Tendril.name: Tendril
Tendril.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]], and target has the &reference[Grappled] condition (escape DC 25). While Grappled, the target has the &reference[Restrained] condition.

Grappled by Tendril.name: Grappled by Tendril
Grappled by Tendril.description:
You are &reference[grappled apply=false] (escape DC 25). While grappled in this way, you are also &reference[restrained apply=false].

While grappled by The Whispered Promise, you cannot benefit from resistance and immunity to Psychic damage or the &reference[Charmed apply=false] condition.

Whispers.name: Whispers
Whispers.description: Intelligence Saving Throw: DC 25. one creature [[lookup @name]] can see within 300 feet. Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target is &reference[Dazed] (save ends). Success: Half damage. Failure by five or more: Double damage, and the target is &reference[Stunned] until the end of its next turn.

Whispers: Dazed.name: Whispers: Dazed
Whispers: Dazed.description: You are &reference[dazed apply=false]. You can repeat your saving throw against this effect at the end of each of your turns, ending the effect on a success.

Whispers: Stunned.name: Whispers: Stunned
Whispers: Stunned.description: You are &reference[stunned apply=false] until the end of your next turn.

Promises.name: Promises
Promises.description: Charisma Saving Throw: DC 25, one creature [[lookup @name]] can see within 300 feet. Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target is &reference[Jinxed] (1d10) (save ends). Success: Half damage. Failure by 5 or more: Double damage, and the target becomes cursed. While cursed, the target can't regain Hit Points and gains no benefits from taking a Short or Long Rest.

Jinxed (1d10).name: Jinxed (1d10)
Jinxed (1d10).description: You subtract 1d10 from your attack rolls and saving throws. You can repeat your saving throw against this effect at the end of each of your turns, ending the effect on a success.

Cursed Promise.name: Cursed Promise
Cursed Promise.description: You are Cursed. While cursed, you can't regain Hit Points and gain no benefit from taking a Short or Long Rest.

Unfettered Glide.name: Unfettered Glide
Unfettered Glide.description: [[lookup @name]] moves up to their Speed without provoking Opportunity Attacks.

Dominate.name: Dominate
Dominate.description: Wisdom Saving Throw: DC 25, one creature [[lookup @name]] can see within 300 feet. Failure: The creature has the &reference[Charmed] condition until the end of its next turn. While Charmed, the target obeys [[lookup @name]]'s commands and can't take Reactions. Failure by 5 or More: The Charmed condition instead lasts for 24 hours or until [[lookup @name]] is reduced to 0 Hit Points. Each time the target takes damage, it repeats the save, ending the effect on itself on a success. Success: The target has Disadvantage on its next attack roll against [[lookup @name]].

Dominated.name: Dominated
Dominated.description: You are &reference[charmed apply=false] until the end of your next turn. While Charmed, you obey the Whispered Promise's commands and can't take reactions.

Extended Domination.name: Extended Domination
Extended Domination.description:
You are &reference[charmed apply=false] for the next 24 hours. While Charmed, you obey the Whispered Promise's commands and can't take reactions.

You repeat your saving throw each time you take damage, ending the effect on yourself on a successful save.

Epic Boss.name: Epic Boss
Epic Boss.description:
This creature is an Epic Boss, a unique foe designed to pose a solo threat to an entire adventuring party. As such, it has additional game rules that sets it apart from normal creatures:

[[lookup @name]] always takes their turn on Initiative count 20. On their turn, they can use their movement and interaction as normal. However, they do not take an action or Bonus Action on their turn unless forced to do so by a spell or other effect. Instead, [[lookup @name]] takes one of the following Epic Actions at the end of each player character's turn.

All this creature's actions are Epic Actions.

  • @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.oYTuZQS8bgFAbirh.Item.kTaJNVuglID71MMD]{Tendril}

  • @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.oYTuZQS8bgFAbirh.Item.odQiZkb45F1tyqgz]{Whispers}

  • @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.oYTuZQS8bgFAbirh.Item.tpwu59FpDl7C4WD4]{Promises}

  • @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.oYTuZQS8bgFAbirh.Item.x3VA0NrDUTBt55PY]{Unfettered Glide}

  • @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.oYTuZQS8bgFAbirh.Item.gD0GAfkafHncnRl3]{Dominate}

  • @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.oYTuZQS8bgFAbirh.Item.c7shMLKEdr3CpoeN]{Spellcasting (Psionics)}

  • @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.oYTuZQS8bgFAbirh.Item.yK3idpZWT3c7O9Z1]{Epic Resistance}

Epic Boss.name: Epic Boss
Epic Boss.description:
This creature is an Epic Boss, a unique foe designed to pose a solo threat to an entire adventuring party. As such, it has additional game rules that sets it apart from normal creatures.

The creature always takes their turn on Initiative count 20. On their turn, they can use their movement and interaction as normal. However, they do not take an action or Bonus Action on their turn unless forced to do so by a spell or other effect. Instead, the creature takes one of the Epic Actions they have available.

Epic Resistance.name: Epic Resistance
Epic Resistance.description: [[lookup @name]] chooses one condition, spell, or other effect currently affecting them and rolls [[/r 1d20]]. On an 11 or higher, the effect ends on them. [[lookup @name]] can use this Epic Action even if they would otherwise be unable to take actions, their actions are being controlled by another creature, or if a spell or effect alters their game statistics.

Spellcasting (Psionics).name: Spellcasting (Psionics)
Spellcasting (Psionics).description: [[lookup @name]] casts one of the spells it knows, requiring no Material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 25).

Detect Thoughts.name: 侦测思想
Detect Thoughts.description:
你激活下述效应之一。直到法术结束为止，你可以在你随后的回合用一个魔法动作以激活下述任意效应之一。

感知思想。 你感知距你 30 尺内，知晓语言或能够心灵感应的思想的存在。你并不会阅读这些思想，但你知道这里存在一名有理智的生物。

此法术会被 1 尺厚的岩石、泥土或木头，1 寸厚的金属，或薄薄一层铅阻隔。

阅读思想。 选择一名距你 30 尺内的可见生物，或一名距你 30 尺内被感知思想侦测到的生物。你了解到此时目标最关心的事情。如果目标不知晓任何语言也不会心灵感应，则你不能得到任何信息。

在你的下一回合，用一个魔法动作，你可以尝试深入目标的心灵。如果你选择这么做，目标进行一次感知豁免。豁免失败，则你了解到他的逻辑推理、情绪状态以及他头脑中的一些大事（比如忧虑、挚爱和仇恨的事物）。豁免成功，法术终止。无论哪种情况，目标都会知道你正在窥探其心灵，且直到你的注意力从它的心灵上移开为止，目标均可以在其回合内使用动作进行一次 [[/check ability=int skill=arc dc=@attributes.spelldc]] 检定，对抗你的法术豁免DC，目标胜出对抗时，法术终止。

Suggestion.name: Suggestion
Suggestion.description:
You suggest a course of activity—described in no more than 25 words—to one creature you can see within range that can hear and understand you. The suggestion must sound achievable and not involve anything that would obviously deal damage to the target or its allies. For example, you could say, "Fetch the key to the cult's treasure vault, and give the key to me." Or you could say, "Stop fighting, leave this library peacefully, and don't return."

The target must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or have the Charmed condition for the duration or until you or your allies deal damage to the target. The Charmed target pursues the suggestion to the best of its ability. The suggested activity can continue for the entire duration, but if the suggested activity can be completed in a shorter time, the spell ends for the target upon completing it.

Pursuing Suggestion.name: Pursuing Suggestion
Pursuing Suggestion.description: The Charmed target pursues the suggestion to the best of its ability. The suggested activity can continue for the entire duration, but if the suggested activity can be completed in a shorter time, the spell ends for the target upon completing it.

Dimension Door.name: Dimension Door
Dimension Door.description:
You teleport to a location within range. You arrive at exactly the spot desired. It can be a place you can see, one you can visualize, or one you can describe by stating distance and direction, such as "200 feet straight downward" or "300 feet upward to the northwest at a 45-degree angle."

You can also teleport one willing creature. The creature must be within 5 feet of you when you teleport, and it teleports to a space within 5 feet of your destination space.

If you, the other creature, or both would arrive in a space occupied by a creature or completely filled by one or more objects, you and any creature traveling with you each take 4d6 Force damage, and the teleportation fails.

Dream.name: Dream
Dream.description:
You target a creature you know on the same plane of existence. You or a willing creature you touch enters a trance state to act as a dream messenger. While in the trance, the messenger is &Reference[Incapacitated apply=false] and has a Speed of 0.

If the target is asleep, the messenger appears in the target's dreams and can converse with the target as long as it remains asleep, through the spell's duration. The messenger can also shape the dream's environment, creating landscapes, objects, and other images. The messenger can emerge from the trance at any time, ending the spell. The target recalls the dream perfectly upon waking.

If the target is awake when you cast the spell, the messenger knows it and can either end the trance (and the spell) or wait for the target to sleep, at which point the messenger enters its dreams.

You can make the messenger terrifying to the target. If you do so, the messenger can deliver a message of no more than ten words, and then the target makes a Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the target gains no benefit from its rest, and it takes 3d6 Psychic damage when it wakes up.

Trance State.name: Trance State
Trance State.description: While in the trance, the messenger is Incapacitated and has a Speed of 0.

Invisibility.name: Invisibility
Invisibility.description:
A creature you touch has the &Reference[invisible apply=false] condition until the spell ends. The spell ends early immediately after the target makes an attack roll, deals damage, or casts a spell.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. You can target one additional creature for each spell slot level above 2.

Invisible.name: 隐形
Invisible.description: 如果你进行攻击检定、造成伤害或施展法术，则该法术提前终止。

Major Image.name: Major Image
Major Image.description:
You create the image of an object, a creature, or some other visible phenomenon that is no larger than a 20-foot Cube. The image appears at a spot that you can see within range and lasts for the duration. It seems real, including sounds, smells, and temperature appropriate to the thing depicted, but it can't deal damage or cause conditions.

If you are within range of the illusion, you can take a Magic action to cause the image to move to any other spot within range. As the image changes location, you can alter its appearance so that its movements appear natural for the image. For example, if you create an image of a creature and move it, you can alter the image so that it appears to be walking. Similarly, you can cause the illusion to make different sounds at different times, even making it carry on a conversation, for example.

Physical interaction with the image reveals it to be an illusion, for things can pass through it. A creature that takes a Study action to examine the image can determine that it is an illusion with a successful [[/check ability=int skill=inv dc=@attributes.spell.dc]] check against your spell save DC. If a creature discerns the illusion for what it is, the creature can see through the image, and its other sensory qualities become faint to the creature.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. The spell lasts until dispelled, without requiring Concentration, if cast with a level 4+ spell slot.

Sending.name: 短讯术
Sending.description:
你向你所遇到过的或某人遇到过且向你描述的一个生物发送一小段二十五个词以内的信息。该生物将在心中听到你的信息，它可以认出你是发讯人（如果他认识你），还可以用同样的方式立即回复一条讯息。法术会让目标能够理解你短讯的信息。

你的传讯可以跨越任意长的距离，甚至能跨越位面。但如果目标和你不在同一个存在位面，则短讯术有 5% 的概率无法到达。如果法术没有到达，你会知晓。

在收到你的信息后，一个生物能够阻塞你在 8 小时内以这个法术对他发信的能力。如果你在这段时间内试图送出另一条信息，你会得知你的短讯被阻塞，并且法术失败。

Dominate Monster.name: Dominate Monster
Dominate Monster.description:
One creature you can see within range must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or have the &Reference[Charmed apply=false] condition for the duration. The target has Advantage on the save if you or your allies are fighting it. Whenever the target takes damage, it repeats the save, ending the spell on itself on a success.

You have a telepathic link with the Charmed target while the two of you are on the same plane of existence. On your turn, you can use this link to issue commands to the target (no action required), such as "Attack that creature," "Move over there," or "Fetch that object." The target does its best to obey on its turn. If it completes an order and doesn't receive further direction from you, it acts and moves as it likes, focusing on protecting itself.

You can command the target to take a Reaction but must take your own Reaction to do so.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. Your Concentration can last longer with a level 9 spell slot (up to 8 hours).

Dominated.name: Dominated
Dominated.description: Whenever the target takes damage, it repeats the [[/save ability=wis]] save, ending the spell on itself on a success.

Mass Suggestion.name: Mass Suggestion
Mass Suggestion.description:
You suggest a course of activity—described in no more than 25 words—to twelve or fewer creatures you can see within range that can hear and understand you. The suggestion must sound achievable and not involve anything that would obviously deal damage to any of the targets or their allies. For example, you could say, "Walk to the village down that road, and help the villagers there harvest crops until sunset." Or you could say, "Now is not the time for violence. Drop your weapons, and dance! Stop in an hour."

Each target must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or have the &Reference[Charmed apply=false] condition for the duration or until you or your allies deal damage to the target. Each Charmed target pursues the suggestion to the best of its ability. The suggested activity can continue for the entire duration, but if the suggested activity can be completed in a shorter time, the spell ends for a target upon completing it.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. The duration is longer with a spell slot of level 7 (10 days), 8 (30 days), or 9 (366 days).

Charmed.name: Charmed
Charmed.description: The target has the &Reference[Charmed apply=false] condition for the duration or until you or your allies deal damage to the target. Each Charmed target pursues the suggestion to the best of its ability.

Project Image.name: 投影术
Project Image.description:
你创造一个自己的幻象分身，并使其在法术持续时间内维持存在。该分身可以出现在施法距离内你曾见过的任何地点，而不论中间是否存在障碍物。该幻象看起来和听起来都与你一样，只是没有现实形体。幻象受到伤害时会立即消失，法术终止。

你可以通过分身的眼睛视物，用分身的耳朵聆听，如同你处于它的位置一样。用一个&Reference[magic]{魔法}动作，你能使分身移动至多 60 尺，而其姿态、言语和行为均按照你的指定作表现。幻象可以完美地模仿你的举止。

由于东西可以穿过幻象，任何与该幻象进行的物理互动都会暴露其幻觉本质。一名生物可以采取&Reference[study]{研究}动作进行一次对抗你法术豁免 DC 的成功智力（[[/check ability=int skill=inv dc=@attributes.spelldc]]{调查}）检定以看穿幻象。辨出幻象的生物可以看穿该影像，其产生的声响对该生物而言显得虚假。

materials.value: 一尊价值 5GP+ 的自塑像

Scrying.name: 探知术
Scrying.description:
你能看见和听见一个和你处于同一存在位面上的生物。目标生物必须进行一次感知豁免；该豁免的调整值与你对目标的了解程度有关（见下文），也与你和目标之间的物理联系程度有关。目标不知道它进行此豁免在对抗什么，只是会感觉不自在。

你对目标的了解有… 豁免调整值
二手信息（你曾经听说过目标） +5
直接信息（你曾经见过目标） +0
熟悉（你对目标很了解） −5
你持有目标的… 豁免调整值
肖像或其他图像 −2
衣物或其他物品 −4
身体部位如头发或指甲 −10

如果对方豁免成功，则目标不受该法术影响，并且在 24 小时内你不能尝试探知同一个目标。

如果对方豁免失败，则你在目标身边 10 尺内创造出一个隐形的传感器。通过传感器，你可以身临其境地看见和听见周围的环境。传感器会跟随目标移动，并在法术持续时间内始终保持在目标 10 尺之内。在能够看到传感器的生物眼中，你的传感器是一个拳头大小的光球。

除生物之外，你也可以选择一个你以前见过的地点作为该法术的目标。这种情况下，传感器会出现在目标地点且不会移动。

materials.value: 一个至少价值 1000GP 的法器，例如水晶球、银镜、圣水盆

affects.special: 与你处于同一位面的生物，或某个你曾见过的地点的生物
目标身边 10 尺内

Wish.name: 祈愿术
Wish.description:
祈愿术是凡间生物所能施展的最强大法术。你只需要大声说出自己的愿望就能改变现实世界本身。

法术最基础的用法是用来模仿任意一个八环或更低环阶的法术。如果你以此种方式使用该法术，你不需要满足目标法术所需的任何前提条件（包括有价值的材料成分）就可以让该法术生效。

作为另一种方式，你也可以选择让法术创造下列效应之一：

创造物件。你创造出一个价值不超过 25000GP 的物件，令其出现在地面上你能看见的一处未占据空间中。该物件不能是魔法物品，其在任意方向上的长度都不能超过 300 尺。

即刻治疗。你让你自己和至多二十个你可见的生物恢复全部生命值，并且终止它们身上一切在@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplGreaterRes]{高等复原术}中列举过的所有效应。

伤害抗性。你让至多十个你能看见的生物获得你所指定的一种伤害类型的抗性。此抗性是永久存在的。

免疫法术。你让最多十个你能看见的生物免疫于某道法术或某种其他魔法效应，持续 8 小时。

突来学识。你将你的一个专长替换为符合条件的另一个专长。你失去旧专长带来的全部好处，并获得新专长的好处。你无法取代作为你其他专长或特性先决条件的专长。

重新掷骰。你改变一件刚刚发生的事件。重掷前一轮（包括你的上一个回合）到现在期间的任意一次掷骰，并让现实随着你的新掷骰结果改变。例如，祈愿术以撤销队友的失败豁免或敌人的重击。你可以迫使重新进行的掷骰具有优势或劣势 ，并且可以选择是使用重投后的结果还是使用原来的结果。

重塑现实。你可能会许愿一些没有包含在上述效应中的东西。为了做到这样的效果，请尽可能准确地向地下城主描述你的愿望。在这种情况下，地下城主有极高的自由来裁决究竟会发生什么。不过愿望越大，出错的概率就越大。法术可能会直接失败，也可能部分的达成你想要的结果，还有可能因表述愿望时措辞不当而遭到意想不到的结果。例如，许愿让一个坏人死去可能会让你穿越到多年后该人已死的一个时间段，使你相当于离开了游戏一样。此外，许愿获取一件传说中的魔法物品或神器可能会立即将你传送到该物品当前的持有者身边。如果你许的愿望太过庞大，其效应影响到了社群、区域或是世界，你可能会引来强大的敌人。如果你的愿望会影响神，这名神的神仆会立刻干涉，阻止它或是鼓励你以一种特殊的方式许愿。如果你的愿望将会撤销多元宇宙本身，或是威胁到了印记城，或是以某种方式影响到了痛苦女士，你的心灵中就会浮现出一段她的影像：她摇了摇自己的脑袋，然后你的愿望失效了。

除了模仿其他法术外，施展该法术以达成的任何其他目的都会使你的身躯承受极大的负担，令你变得无比虚弱。承受负担后，直到你完成长休之前，你每次施展法术时都将受到一定伤害（伤害数值取决于你施展的法术的环阶，每环阶 1d10 点的暗蚀伤害），此伤害无法被任何方式减免。此外，你的力量属性值将变为 3，持续 2d4 日。这段时间内，你每花一整日休息（不从事轻度活动以外的行为），恢复需要的日数就减少 2 日。最后，承受负担时，你将有 [[/r 1d3cs1]]{33%} 的概率永远也无法再次施放祈愿术。

Wish Stress.name: Wish Stress
Wish Stress.description: Each time you cast a spell until you finish a Long Rest, you take [[/damage 1d10 type=necrotic]] damage per level of that spell. This damage can’t be reduced or prevented in any way. In addition, your Strength score becomes 3 for [[/r 2d4]] days.

Refract Elements.name: Refract Elements
Refract Elements.description:
Trigger: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] takes Acid, Cold, Fire, or Lightning damage. Response: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] gains Resistance to the triggering damage type, including the triggering damage, until the end of its next turn, During its next turn, its [[/item bPiS4GhVSfZHtwyi]] attack deals damage of that damage type instead of Radiant damage.

Foundry Note

You can use the "Refract Elements" enchant activity on this feature to enchant the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s Refracted Beam attack, changing its damage type in the process.

Refract Elements.name: Refract Elements
Refract Elements.condition: When the dreg takes Acid, Cold, Fire, or Lightning damage.

Refracted Acid.name: Refracted Acid
Refracted Acid.description: The crystalline dreg has refracted Acid damage. It gains resistance to Acid damage and its Refracted Beam attack gains new effects.

Refracted Fire.name: Refracted Fire
Refracted Fire.description: The crystalline dreg has refracted Fire damage. It gains resistance to Fire damage and its Refracted Beam attack gains new effects.

Refracted Cold.name: Refracted Cold
Refracted Cold.description: The crystalline dreg has refracted Cold damage. It gains resistance to Cold damage and its Refracted Beam attack gains new effects.

Refracted Lightning.name: Refracted Lightning
Refracted Lightning.description: The crystalline dreg has refracted Lightning damage. It gains resistance to Lightning damage and its Refracted Beam attack gains new effects.

Refracted Beam.name: Refracted Beam
Refracted Beam.description:
[[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]], and the target has the &reference[Blinded] condition until the start of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s next turn. If this attack deals a different damage type due to Refract Elements, it has additional effects:

  • Acid or Fire: The target is also &reference[Burning] (2d6) of the corresponding damage type.

  • Cold: The target has the &reference[Frozen] Condition (DC 13).

  • Lightning: The target has the &reference[Shocked] Condition until the end of its next turn.

Refracted Beam.name: Refracted Beam
Refracted Beam.description: You are &reference[blinded apply=false] until the start of the crystalline dreg's next turn.

Burning (2d6 Fire).name: Burning (2d6 Fire)
Burning (2d6 Fire).description:
You are &reference[burning apply=false] from being covered in fire.

  • At the end of each of your turns, you take [[/damage average fire 2d6]] damage.

  • The condition ends if you or another creature within 5 feet of you spends an action to douse the fire or if some other effect removes it such as submerging yourself in water.

Burning (2d6 Acid).name: Burning (2d6 Acid)
Burning (2d6 Acid).description:
You are &reference[burning apply=false] from being covered in acid.

  • At the end of each of your turns, you take [[/damage average acid 2d6]] damage.

  • The condition ends if you or another creature within 5 feet of you spends an action to scrape off the acid or if some other effect removes it.

Frozen (DC 13).name: Frozen (DC 13)
Frozen (DC 13).description:
You're partially encased in ice:

  • You are &reference[Immobilized apply=false] & &reference[Defenseless apply=false].

  • You're &reference[Helpless apply=false] against attacks made with a weapon that deals bludgeoning damage.

  • You or another creature can take an action to break the ice away. To do so, you must succeed on a [[/check 13 str ath]] check.

Shocked.name: Shocked
Shocked.description:
You are &reference[dazed apply=false] and &reference[defenseless apply=false].

You drop whatever you're holding in your hands.

You must spend an action to draw, stow, or pick up an object.

Incorporeal Movement.name: Incorporeal Movement
Incorporeal Movement.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can move through other creatures and objects as if they were &reference[DifficultTerrain]. It takes [[/damage average]] damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

Psychic Scream.name: Psychic Scream
Psychic Scream.description: Intelligence Saving Throw: DC 13, each creature in a 30- foot Cone. Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target has the &reference[Frightened] condition (save ends).

Psychic Scream.name: Psychic Scream
Psychic Scream.description: You are &reference[frightened apply=false]. You can repeat your saving throw against this effect at the end of each of your turns, ending the effect on a success.

Possession.name: Possession
Possession.description:
Charisma Saving Throw: DC 13, one Humanoid the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within 5 feet. Failure: The target is possessed by the [[lookup @name lowercase]]. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] disappears, and the target has the &reference[Incapacitated] condition and loses control of its body. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] controls the target's body but doesn't deprive the target of awareness. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can't be targeted by any attack, spell, or other effect, except ones that turn undead. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] retains its alignment, Intelligence, Wisdom, Charisma, and Immunity to the Charmed and Frightened conditions. It otherwise uses the possessed target's game statistics, but doesn't gain access to the target's knowledge, class features, or proficiencies.

The possession lasts until the body drops to 0 Hit Points, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] ends it as a Bonus Action, or the [[lookup @name lowercase]] is turned or forced out by an effect like the @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplDispelEvil]{Dispel Evil and Good} spell. When the possession ends, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] reappears in an unoccupied space within 5 feet of the body. If the target succeeds on its save or the effect ends for it, it is immune to this [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s Possession for 24 hours.

Possessed.name: Possessed
Possessed.description: You have been possessed by the warp witch and are &reference[incapacitated apply=false].

Mutate Host.name: Mutate Host
Mutate Host.description: Charisma Saving Throw: DC 13, one creature the [[lookup @name lowercase]] is possessing. Failure: The target gains one Contamination level and a mutation.

affects.special: A creature that the warp witch is possessing.

Balefire Lantern.name: Balefire Lantern
Balefire Lantern.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]], and the target has the &reference[Slowed] condition until the end of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s next turn.

Slowed by Balefire.name: Slowed by Balefire
Slowed by Balefire.description: You are &reference[slowed apply=false] until the end of the warp witch's next turn.

Steady Aim.name: Steady Aim
Steady Aim.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] grants itself Advantage on its next ranged attack roll this turn. It can use this Bonus Action only if it hasn't moved during this turn, and after it uses this Bonus Action, its Speed becomes 0 and can't increase until the end of this turn.

Chillsteel Longbow.name: Chillsteel Longbow
Chillsteel Longbow.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]]. Critical Hit: The target has the &reference[Frozen] condition (DC 10).

Frozen (DC 10).name: Frozen (DC 10)
Frozen (DC 10).description:
You're partially encased in ice:

  • You are &reference[Immobilized apply=false] & &reference[Defenseless apply=false].

  • You're &reference[Helpless apply=false] against attacks made with a weapon that deals bludgeoning damage.

  • You or another creature can take an action to break the ice away. To do so, you must succeed on a [[/check 10 str ath]] check.

Arrows.name: Arrows
Arrows.description:
Storage: @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.equipment24.Item.phbagQuiver00000]{Quiver}

@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.equipment24.Item.phbagAmmunitionV]{Ammunition} is required by a weapon that has the Ammunition property. A weapon's description specifies the type of ammunition used by the weapon. The Ammunition table lists the different types and the amount you get when you buy them. The table also lists the item that is typically used to store each type; storage must be bought separately.

Aura of the Blood Moon.name: Aura of the Blood Moon
Aura of the Blood Moon.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] projects a 30-foot Emanation of carnage. Creatures have the &reference[Bloodied] condition while within the Emanation, even if they have more than half of their Hit Points remaining. This effect ends if the [[lookup @name lowercase]] is &reference[Incapacitated apply=false].

Pack Tactics.name: Pack Tactics
Pack Tactics.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has Advantage on attack rolls against a creature if at least one of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally doesn't have the &reference[Incapacitated apply=false] condition.

Feast.name: Feast
Feast.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes a [[/item mLE2Ic73R8LN3OHa]] attack against a &reference[Bloodied] target.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]].

Spear.name: Spear
Spear.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]] or [[/damage 1d8 + 3 piercing average]] damage if wielded with two hands to make a melee attack.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes three attacks. It can replace one attack with a use of Spellcasting.

Blood Call.name: Blood Call
Blood Call.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]], and the target has the &reference[Bleeding] condition (2d4).

Bleeding (2d4).name: Bleeding (2d4)
Bleeding (2d4).description:
You're losing blood to an open wound.

  • Ongoing Damage: At the end of each of your turns, you lose [[/r 2d4]] Hit Points.

  • Regaining Hit Points: This condition ends if you regain any Hit Points.

  • Medical Treatment: You or another creature within 5 feet of you can spend an action and use a Healer's Kit to staunch the bleeding (no check required), ending the condition.

Electric Jolt.name: Electric Jolt
Electric Jolt.description: On hit, the target has the Shocked condition until the end of the Reanimator's next turn.

Shocked.name: Shocked
Shocked.description: You are &reference[shocked apply=false] until the end of the reanimator's next turn.

Necrotic Blast.name: Necrotic Blast
Necrotic Blast.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]]. On hit, he target has the &reference[Weakened] condition until the end of the Reanimator's next turn.

Necrotic Blast.name: Necrotic Blast
Necrotic Blast.description: You are &reference[weakened apply=false] until the end of the reanimator's next turn.

Touch of Death.name: Touch of Death
Touch of Death.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]]. This damage ignores Resistance and Immunity to Poison damage and can't be reduced or prevented in any way. If the target is reduced to 0 Hit Points, it automatically fails death saving throws until it finishes a Long Rest. A @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplHeal000000]{Heal} or @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplGreaterRes]{Greater Restoration} spell ends this effect early.

Reanimate.name: Reanimate
Reanimate.description: The Reanimator targets the corpse of one of its destroyed creations it can see within 30 feet. The target returns to life with 45 (10d8) Hit Points. The target has Resistance to all damage and Advantage on saving throws until the end of its next turn.

affects.special: The corpse of one of its destroyed creations.

Reanimation Surge.name: Reanimation Surge
Reanimation Surge.description: The creature has advantage on all saving throws and resistance to all damage until the end of it's next turn.

Bodyguard.name: Bodyguard
Bodyguard.description: Trigger: A creature the Reanimator can see targets it with an attack or spell that targets only the reanimator. Response: The Reanimator chooses one of its creations within 10 feet and switches spaces with it. The creation becomes the target instead.

utility.condition: When a creature the Reanimator can see targets it with an attack or spell that targets only the reanimator.

Creator's Command.name: Creator's Command
Creator's Command.description: The Reanimator chooses a creature it can see that was reanimated or created by it. The target can use its Reaction to make an attack with Advantage or move up to its Speed without provoking Opportunity Attacks.

Writhing Aura.name: Writhing Aura
Writhing Aura.description: The ground within 30 feet of the [[lookup @name lowercase]] is filled with plant roots and becomes &reference[DifficultTerrain]. A creature that starts its turn in the aura takes [[/damage average]] damage.

Poison Ivy.name: Poison Ivy
Poison Ivy.description: If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] would take Poison damage, it instead takes no damage and regains Hit Points equal to the Poison damage it would have received.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]], and the target has the &reference[Grappled] condition (escape DC 15). Until this grapple ends, the target has the &reference[Restrained] condition and the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can't Bite another target.

Grappled by Bite.name: Grappled by Bite
Grappled by Bite.description: You are &reference[grappled apply=false] (escape DC 15). While grappled in this way, you are also &reference[restrained apply=false].

Spit Acid.name: Spit Acid
Spit Acid.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]]. On hit, the target has the &reference[Burning] condition (2d4 Acid). While Burning, the target has the &reference[Blinded] condition.

Burning (2d4 Acid).name: Burning (2d4 Acid)
Burning (2d4 Acid).description:
You are &reference[burning apply=false] from being covered in acid.

  • At the end of each of your turns, you take [[/damage average acid 2d4]] damage.

  • The condition ends if you or another creature within 5 feet of you spends an action to scrape off the acid or if some other effect removes it.

While Burning in this way, you are &reference[blinded apply=false]

Swallow.name: Swallow
Swallow.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes one Bite attack against a Medium or smaller target it has &reference[Grappled apply=false]. If the attack hits, the target is swallowed and the grapple ends. The swallowed target has the &reference[Blinded apply=false] and &reference[Restrained apply=false] conditions, has &reference[TotalCover] from attacks and effects outside the [[lookup @name lowercase]], and takes [[/damage average]] damage at the start of each of its turns. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can have up to four targets swallowed at a time.

If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] takes 15 damage or more on a single turn from a creature inside it, it must succeed on a [[/save]] saving throw at the end of that turn or regurgitate all swallowed creatures, which land with the &reference[Prone] condition in unoccupied spaces within 10 feet of it. If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] dies, a swallowed creature no longer has the Restrained condition and can escape from the corpse using 5 feet of movement, exiting with the &reference[Prone] condition.

affects.special: Creatures swallowed by the ravenous flora.

Regurgitate Save.name: Regurgitate Save
Regurgitate Save.condition: When the ravenous flora takes 15+ damage on a single turn from a creature inside it.

Swallowed.name: Swallowed
Swallowed.description:
You have been swallowed by the ravenous flora. While swallowed, you are &reference[blinded apply=false], &reference[restrained apply=false], and have &reference[totalcover] from effects originating from outside the ravenous flora.

You take [[/damage average acid 3d6]] damage at the start of each of the ravenous flora's turns.

Hypnotic Pollen.name: Hypnotic Pollen
Hypnotic Pollen.description: Wisdom Saving Throw: DC 16, each creature in a 60-foot Emanation originating from the [[lookup @name lowercase]]. Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target has the &reference[Weakened] condition (save ends). While Weakened, the target must spend all of its movement on each of its turns to move directly toward the [[lookup @name lowercase]]. During this movement, the target ignores &reference[DifficultTerrain] caused by the flora's @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.q32Lt79KLHKTLpxB.Item.Mp9bNtBayhk2lmP3]{Writhing Aura}.

Hypnotic Pollen.name: Hypnotic Pollen
Hypnotic Pollen.description:
You are &reference[weakened apply=false]. You can repeat your saving throw against this effect at the end of each of your turns, ending the effect on a success.

While Weakened in this way, you must spend all of your movement on each of your turns to move directly toward the ravenous flora. During this movement, you ignore &reference[DifficultTerrain] caused by the flora’s Writhing Aura.

Epic Boss.name: Epic Boss
Epic Boss.description:
This creature is an Epic Boss, a unique foe designed to pose a solo threat to an entire adventuring party. As such, it has additional game rules that sets it apart from normal creatures:

The [[lookup @name lowercase]] always takes their turn on Initiative count 20. On their turn, they can use their movement and interaction as normal. However, they do not take an action or Bonus Action on their turn unless forced to do so by a spell or other effect. Instead, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] takes one of the following Epic Actions at the end of each player character's turn.

All this creature's actions are Epic Actions.

  • @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.q32Lt79KLHKTLpxB.Item.8W881JgNkCpBZLhK]{Bite}

  • @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.q32Lt79KLHKTLpxB.Item.IXCa1wRtgaOc3Txu]{Spit Acid}

  • @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.q32Lt79KLHKTLpxB.Item.hFHlcp2xmAfu6mA6]{Swallow}

  • @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.q32Lt79KLHKTLpxB.Item.8hXYJTNuHoEzwF1p]{Hypnotic Pollen}

  • @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.q32Lt79KLHKTLpxB.Item.hlhpJe4xVJSrBcNf]{Epic Resistance}

Epic Resistance.name: Epic Resistance
Epic Resistance.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] chooses one condition, spell, or other effect currently affecting them and rolls [[/r 1d20]]. On an 11 or higher, the effect ends on them. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can use this Epic Action even if they would otherwise be unable to take actions, their actions are being controlled by another creature, or if a spell or effect alters their game statistics.

Fire Form.name: Fire Form
Fire Form.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch without squeezing.

Enduring Flame.name: Enduring Flame
Enduring Flame.description: Flames within 10 feet of the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can't be extinguished, and the &reference[Burning apply=false] condition can't end for creatures within 10 feet of the elemental.

Illumination.name: Illumination
Illumination.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] sheds Bright Light in a 30-foot radius and Dim Light in an additional 30 feet.

Dancing Flame.name: Dancing Flame
Dancing Flame.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended, and the target has the &reference[Burning] condition (3d6 Fire).

Burning (3d6 Fire).name: Burning (3d6 Fire)
Burning (3d6 Fire).description:
You are &reference[burning apply=false] from being covered in fire.

  • At the end of each of your turns, you take [[/damage average fire 3d6]] damage.

  • The condition ends if you or another creature within 5 feet of you spends an action to douse the fire or if some other effect removes it such as submerging yourself in water.

Flickerjump.name: Flickerjump
Flickerjump.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] teleports to an unoccupied space it can see within 60 feet.

Hold Still, Please.name: Hold Still, Please
Hold Still, Please.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has Advantage on attack rolls against a &reference[Grappled apply=false], &reference[Immobilized apply=false], or &reference[Slowed apply=false] creature.

Scissorhand.name: Scissorhand
Scissorhand.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]], and the target has the &reference[Bleeding] condition (4d4).

Bleeding (4d4).name: Bleeding (4d4)
Bleeding (4d4).description:
You're losing blood to an open wound.

  • Ongoing Damage: At the end of each of your turns, you lose [[/r 4d4]] Hit Points.

  • Regaining Hit Points: This condition ends if you regain any Hit Points.

  • Medical Treatment: You or another creature within 5 feet of you can spend an action and use a Healer's Kit to staunch the bleeding (no check required), ending the condition.

Sewing Needle.name: Sewing Needle
Sewing Needle.description:
[[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]]. Dexterity Saving Throw: DC 17. Failure: The target has a body part bound and sewn up ([[lookup @name lowercase]]'s choice):

  • Eyes. The target has the &reference[Blinded] condition.

  • Mouth. The target cannot speak and cannot cast spells with a verbal component.

  • Limbs. The target has the &reference[Restrained] condition.

A creature within 5 feet can take an action to remove the threads with a successful [[/check]] check, ending the effect. Failure: The threads are removed but the target takes [[/damage average]] damage. Failure by 5 or More: The target takes [[/damage average]] damage and the threads aren't removed.

Sewn Eyes.name: Sewn Eyes
Sewn Eyes.description:
Your eyes have been sewn shut. You are &reference[blinded apply=false].

A creature within 5 feet of you can take an action to remove the threads with a successful [[/check 17 wis med]] check. On a failed check, the threads are removed but you take [[/damage average 2d10 slashing]] damage.

If the check was failed by 5 or more, you take [[/damage average 2d10 slashing]] damage and the threads aren't removed.

Sewn Mouth.name: Sewn Mouth
Sewn Mouth.description:
You mouth has been sewn shut. You cannot speak and cannot cast spells with a verbal component.

A creature within 5 feet of you can take an action to remove the threads with a successful [[/check 17 wis med]] check. On a failed check, the threads are removed but you take [[/damage average 2d10 slashing]] damage.

If the check was failed by 5 or more, you take [[/damage average 2d10 slashing]] damage and the threads aren't removed.

Sewn Limbs.name: Sewn Limbs
Sewn Limbs.description:
You limbs have been sewn together. You are &reference[restrained apply=false].

A creature within 5 feet of you can take an action to remove the threads with a successful [[/check 17 wis med]] check. On a failed check, the threads are removed but you take [[/damage average 2d10 slashing]] damage.

If the check was failed by 5 or more, you take [[/damage average 2d10 slashing]] damage and the threads aren't removed.

Attach Limb.name: Attach Limb
Attach Limb.description:
Strength Saving Throw: DC 17, one creature the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within 10 feet (&reference[Grappled apply=false], &reference[Slowed apply=false], &reference[Restrained apply=false], &reference[Incapacitated apply=false], and &reference[Immobilized apply=false] creatures have Disadvantage). Failure: The target makes a [[/save]] saving throw at the start of each of its turns. On a success, it controls the limb until the start of its next turn. Otherwise, the limb is uncontrolled for the same duration. The target suffers one of the following effects depending on the attached limb:

  • Head. While controlled, the target has Advantage on Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma-based D20 Tests. While uncontrolled, the target can control its action or its movement on its turn, but the head controls the other. On a failure by 5 or more, the head chooses which to control instead of the target.

  • Arm. While controlled, the target can take an extra action on its turn, choosing from the Attack (one weapon attack only) or Utilize actions. While uncontrolled, the extra arm makes one melee weapon attack against the target at the start of its turn. The arm has a +9 attack bonus and deals 14 (3d6 + 4) Bludgeoning damage on a hit.

  • Leg. While controlled, the target can take an extra action on its turn, choosing from the Dash or Disengage actions. While uncontrolled, the leg forces the target to move up to its Speed in a random direction at the start of its turn. If this movement forces the target toward a hazard or precipice, the host can repeat the saving throw. On a successful save, it stops its movement and has the Prone condition before entering the hazard.

An attached limb can be attacked (AC 20, 20 Hit Points, Immunity to Poison and Psychic damage). A creature within 5 feet can take an action to remove the limb with a successful [[/check 17 wis med]] check or [[/check 15 str]] check. When removed by any means other than a successful Wisdom (Medicine) check, the target takes [[/damage average]] damage and has the &reference[Bleeding] condition (4d4).

Attached Head.name: Attached Head
Attached Head.description:
The stitcher has attached a head to your body. At start of each of your turns, you must make a [[/save int 17]] saving throw. On a success, you control the limb until the start of your next turn, otherwise the limb is uncontrolled for the same duration.

Controlled Head: While controlled, you have Advantage on Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma-based D20 Tests.

Uncontrolled Head: While uncontrolled, you can control your action or your movement on your turn, but the head controls the other. On a failure by 5 or more, the head chooses which to control instead of you.

An attached limb can be attacked (AC 20, 20 Hit Points, Immunity to Poison and Psychic damage). A creature within 5 feet can take an action to remove the limb with a successful [[/check 17 wis med]] check or [[/check 15 str]] check. When removed by any means other than a successful Wisdom (Medicine) check, you take [[/damage average 4d8 necrotic]] damage and have the Bleeding condition (4d4).

Attached Arm.name: Attached Arm
Attached Arm.description:
The stitcher has attached an arm to your body. At start of each of your turns, you must make a [[/save int 17]] saving throw. On a success, you control the limb until the start of your next turn, otherwise the limb is uncontrolled for the same duration.

Controlled Arm: While controlled, you can take an extra action on your turn, choosing from the Attack (one weapon attack only) or Utilize actions.

Uncontrolled Arm: While uncontrolled, the extra arm makes one melee weapon attack against you at the start of your turn. The arm has a [[/r 1d20 + 9]]{+9} attack bonus and deals [[/damage average 3d6 + 4 bludgeoning]] damage on a hit.

An attached limb can be attacked (AC 20, 20 Hit Points, Immunity to Poison and Psychic damage). A creature within 5 feet can take an action to remove the limb with a successful [[/check 17 wis med]] check or [[/check 15 str]] check. When removed by any means other than a successful Wisdom (Medicine) check, you take [[/damage average 4d8 necrotic]] damage and have the Bleeding condition (4d4).

Attached Leg.name: Attached Leg
Attached Leg.description:
The stitcher has attached a leg to your body. At start of each of your turns, you must make a [[/save int 17]] saving throw. On a success, you control the limb until the start of your next turn, otherwise the limb is uncontrolled for the same duration.

Controlled Leg: While controlled, you can take an extra action on your turn, choosing from the Dash or Disengage actions.

Uncontrolled Leg: While uncontrolled, the leg forces you to move up to your Speed in a random direction at the start of your turn. If this movement forces you toward a hazard or precipice, you can repeat the saving throw. On a successful save, you stop your movement and have the &reference[Prone apply=false] condition before entering the hazard.

An attached limb can be attacked (AC 20, 20 Hit Points, Immunity to Poison and Psychic damage). A creature within 5 feet can take an action to remove the limb with a successful [[/check 17 wis med]] check or [[/check 15 str]] check. When removed by any means other than a successful Wisdom (Medicine) check, you take [[/damage average 4d8 necrotic]] damage and have the Bleeding condition (4d4).

Bleeding (4d4).name: Bleeding (4d4)
Bleeding (4d4).description:
You're losing blood to an open wound.

  • Ongoing Damage: At the end of each of your turns, you lose [[/r 4d4]] Hit Points.

  • Regaining Hit Points: This condition ends if you regain any Hit Points.

  • Medical Treatment: You or another creature within 5 feet of you can spend an action and use a Healer's Kit to staunch the bleeding (no check required), ending the condition.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes two [[/item FwiPOZ8bTtDz8bdM]] attacks and one [[/item DC5cGQesY6OJBbPM]] attack. It can replace any of these attacks with [[/item UhnwABol1aOxYtOD]].

Shield Slam.name: Shield Slam
Shield Slam.description: Strength Saving Throw: DC 13, one creature within 5 feet of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]. Failure: The target is pushed 5 feet away from the [[lookup @name lowercase]] and has the &reference[Prone] condition.

Shield.name: Shield
Shield.description: You gain the Armor Class benefit of a Shield only if you have training with it.

No Escape.name: No Escape
No Escape.description: When the [[lookup @name lowercase]] hits a creature with an Opportunity Attack, that creature's Speed becomes 0 until the end of its turn.

Sentinel Strike.name: Sentinel Strike
Sentinel Strike.description: Trigger: A creature within 5 feet of the [[lookup @name lowercase]] takes the Disengage action or makes a melee attack roll against a target other than the [[lookup @name lowercase]]. Response: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes an Opportunity Attack against that creature.

utility.condition: When a creature within 5 feet of the dreg takes the Disengage action or makes a melee attack roll against a target other than the dreg.

Bone Blade.name: Bone Blade
Bone Blade.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]], and the target has Disadvantage on attack rolls against any creature other than the dreg until the end of its next turn.

Distracting Bone Blades.name: Distracting Bone Blades
Distracting Bone Blades.description: You have disadvantage on attack rolls against any creature other than the chitinous dreg until the end of your next turn.

Digestive Aura.name: Digestive Aura
Digestive Aura.description: A creature that starts its turn in the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s space takes [[/damage average]] damage. At the start of its turn, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] decides whether its Digestive Aura is active until the start of its next turn (no action required).

False Appearance.name: False Appearance
False Appearance.description: While the [[lookup @name lowercase]] remains motionless in its Structural Form, it is indistinguishable from an ordinary structure or vehicle, such as a house or a sailing ship

Structural Form.name: Structural Form
Structural Form.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can spend 10 minutes in Concentration to shape-shift into a Gargantuan structure or back into its true, amorphous form. Its game statistics are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed.

While in the form of a structure, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] takes up its entire space and creates floors, walls, doorways, and windows within its space which resemble and behave like normal structures, while leaving behind open space within it to create rooms. Creatures can pass through the open spaces and stop there as if moving through a normal structure.

The walls and floors of the living city can be damaged and thus breached. Each 5-foot-by-5-foot section has AC 15 and 30 Hit Points. Reducing a section to 0 Hit Points destroys it and deals 30 damage to the [[lookup @name lowercase]]. A [[lookup @name lowercase]] can only take this damage once per turn.

In addition, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] extrudes pieces of itself inside its space which resemble furnishings and everyday objects. The extrusions appear, feel, sound, and behave exactly like the mimicked objects. A thin, slimy tendril connects any furnishings or objects to the body of the living city. The tendril has AC 15 and 1 Hit Point. If the tether is severed or destroyed, the simulacra melts into goo, but does no harm to the [[lookup @name lowercase]].

No Exit.name: No Exit
No Exit.description:
When it rolls for Initiative, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] reflexively closes the windows, doors, and other egress points on the outside of its body, preventing creatures inside it from leaving its space.

A creature in the [[lookup @name lowercase]] space that attempts to leave its space using teleportation or planar travel is subjected to the following effect. Charisma Saving Throw: DC 20. Failure: [[/damage average]] damage. Failure or Success: The teleportation or planar travel fails.

Haunting Whispers.name: Haunting Whispers
Haunting Whispers.description: Intelligence Saving Throw: DC 15, one creature in the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s space. Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target has the &reference[Frightened] condition (save ends).

Haunting Whispers.name: Haunting Whispers
Haunting Whispers.description: You are &reference[frightened apply=false]. You can repeat your saving throw against this effect at the end of each of your turns, ending the effect on a success.

Shifting Form.name: Shifting Form
Shifting Form.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] alters the composition of a 10-foot-by-10- foot area inside it, creating walls, doors, windows, stairs, or furnishings. It can choose to make the area &reference[DifficultTerrain]. Creatures inside the [[lookup @name lowercase]] who are not directly observing the shift must succeed on a [[/check]] check to notice the change.

If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] creates a wall that cuts through another creature's space when it appears, the creature is pushed to one side of the wall (the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s choice). If a creature would be surrounded on all sides by the wall (or the wall and another solid surface), that creature can make a [[/save]] saving throw. On a success, it can use its Reaction to move up to its speed so that it is no longer enclosed by the wall.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]].

Grasping Tendril.name: Grasping Tendril
Grasping Tendril.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]], and the target is pushed or pulled 10 feet (the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s choice).

Epic Boss.name: Epic Boss
Epic Boss.description:
This creature is an Epic Boss, a unique foe designed to pose a solo threat to an entire adventuring party. As such, it has additional game rules that sets it apart from normal creatures:

The [[lookup @name lowercase]] always takes their turn on Initiative count 20. On their turn, they can use their movement and interaction as normal. However, they does not take an action or Bonus Action on their turn unless forced to do so by a spell or other effect. Instead, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] takes one of the following Epic Actions at the end of each player character's turn.

All this creature's actions are Epic Actions.

  • @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.rG34ltU37ci2TdO0.Item.bruTynqMK1Hd92om]{Bite}

  • @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.rG34ltU37ci2TdO0.Item.IbhwhZyCt5yJ6wDh]{Grasping Tendril}

  • @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.rG34ltU37ci2TdO0.Item.HCJeiFzGqeTTru71]{Haunting Whispers}

  • @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.rG34ltU37ci2TdO0.Item.29vhoxVOLsMbSTHP]{Shifting Form}

  • @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.rG34ltU37ci2TdO0.Item.5aDBHEjPJKw8HeWL]{Epic Resistance}

Epic Resistance.name: Epic Resistance
Epic Resistance.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] chooses one condition, spell, or other effect currently affecting them and rolls [[/r 1d20]]. On an 11 or higher, the effect ends on them. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can use this Epic Action even if they would otherwise be unable to take actions, their actions are being controlled by another creature, or if a spell or effect alters their game statistics.

Chemical Stench.name: Chemical Stench
Chemical Stench.description: A creature other than a Construct or Undead that starts its turn within 10 feet of the [[lookup @name lowercase]] is subjected to the following effect. Constitution Saving Throw: DC 15. Failure: The target has the &reference[Sickened] condition until the start of its next turn. Success: The target is immune to the Chemical Stench of all [[lookup @name lowercase]]s for 1 hour.

Chemical Stench.name: Chemical Stench
Chemical Stench.description: You are &reference[sickened apply=false] until the start of your next turn.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes [[/item nw10k0sxVlWT471T]] or [[/item vefDrdLCg1gkM60v]] attacks.

Chemical Spray.name: Chemical Spray
Chemical Spray.description:
Each creature in a 30-foot Cone is subjected to one of the following effects of the tanker’s choice:

  • Sulfuric Acid. Dexterity Saving Throw: DC 15. Failure: [[/damage average activity=wdeqojyX8H5QTJOj]] damage, and the target has the &reference[Burning] condition (4d4 Acid). Success: Half damage only.

  • Liquid Nitrogen. Constitution Saving Throw: DC 15. Failure: [[/damage average activity=TbSt190uXz5xFC3Q]] damage, and the target has the &reference[Frozen] condition (DC 14). Success: Half damage only.

  • Chlorine Gas. Constitution Saving Throw: DC 15. Failure: [[/damage average activity=ndCd495o1ovsBDXq]] damage, and the target has the &reference[Poisoned] condition (save ends). While Poisoned, the target has the &reference[Blinded] condition. Success: Half damage only.

Burning (4d4 Acid).name: Burning (4d4 Acid)
Burning (4d4 Acid).description:
You are &reference[burning apply=false] from being covered in acid.

  • At the end of each of your turns, you take [[/damage average acid 4d4]] damage.

  • The condition ends if you or another creature within 5 feet of you spends an action to scrape off the acid or if some other effect removes it.

Frozen (DC 14).name: Frozen (DC 14)
Frozen (DC 14).description:
You're partially encased in ice:

  • You are &reference[Immobilized apply=false] & &reference[Defenseless apply=false].

  • You're &reference[Helpless apply=false] against attacks made with a weapon that deals bludgeoning damage.

  • You or another creature can take an action to break the ice away. To do so, you must succeed on a [[/check 14 str ath]] check.

Chlorine Gas.name: Chlorine Gas
Chlorine Gas.description:
You are &reference[poisoned apply=false]. You can repeat your saving throw against this effect at the end of each of your turns, ending the effect on a success.

While Poisoned in this way, you are also &reference[blinded apply=false].

Flyby.name: Flyby
Flyby.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] doesn't provoke Opportunity Attacks when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

Keen Hearing.name: Keen Hearing
Keen Hearing.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has Advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing.

Sonic Blast.name: Sonic Blast
Sonic Blast.description: Constitution Saving Throw: DC 15, each creature in a 30-foot Emanation originating from the [[lookup @name lowercase]] that can hear it. Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target has the &reference[Weakened] condition (save ends). Success: Half damage only.

affects.special: Creatures that can hear the belfray.

Sonic Blast.name: Sonic Blast
Sonic Blast.description: You are &reference[weakened apply=false] by the belfray's sonic blast. You can repeat your saving throw against this effect at the end of each of your turns, ending the effect on a success.

Shadow Stealth.name: Shadow Stealth
Shadow Stealth.description: While in Dim Light or Darkness, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] takes the Hide action.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes [[/item Fe0Cb6CUcooE0YHT]] attacks and one [[/item eXCJDYwktHJBaJde]] attack. It can replace its Bite with [[/item Kpkc84LFSb2FUyce]], if available.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]], and the target has the &reference[Enfeebled] condition until the end of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s next turn. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] regains Hit Points equal to the damage dealt by its Bite.

Enfeebling Bite.name: Enfeebling Bite
Enfeebling Bite.description: You are &reference[enfeebled apply=false] until the end of the belfray's next turn.

Lie Detection.name: Lie Detection
Lie Detection.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] always knows if it hears a lie, and has Advantage on Wisdom (Insight) checks.

Unmatched Intellect.name: Unmatched Intellect
Unmatched Intellect.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] adds its Intelligence modifier to its Initiative rolls.

Mind Thrust.name: Mind Thrust
Mind Thrust.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]], and the target is pushed 10 feet in any horizontal direction.

Mass Manipulation.name: Mass Manipulation
Mass Manipulation.description: Intelligence Saving Throw: DC 16, up to six creatures within 60 feet of the [[lookup @name lowercase]] that can see and hear it. Failure: The target must use its Reaction to move up to its Speed and make a weapon attack or cast a cantrip. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] chooses the direction of the movement and the target of the attack or cantrip.

affects.special: That can both see and hear the alienist.

Nerve Gas.name: Nerve Gas
Nerve Gas.description:
