Blinded (Violet).description: The target has the &Reference[Blinded apply=false] condition and makes a [[/save ability=wis dc=@attributes.spell.dc format=long]] at the start of your next turn. On a successful save, the condition ends. On a failed save, the condition ends, and the creature teleports to another plane of existence (DM’s choice).

znESvMihyakiRY5g.name: Teleport
znESvMihyakiRY5g.description:
This spell instantly transports you and up to eight willing creatures that you can see within range, or a single object that you can see within range, to a destination you select. If you target an object, it must be Large or smaller, and it can't be held or carried by an unwilling creature.

The destination you choose must be known to you, and it must be on the same plane of existence as you. Your familiarity with the destination determines whether you arrive there successfully. The DM rolls [[/gmr 1d100]] and consults the Teleportation Outcome table and the explanations after it.

@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.tables24.RollTable.phbsplTeleportMi]{Teleportation Outcome}
FamiliarityMishapSimilar AreaOff TargetOn Target
Permanent circle———01–00
Linked object———01–00
Very familiar01–0506–1314–2425–00
Seen casually01–3334–4344–5354–00
Viewed once or described01–4344–5354–7374–00
False destination01–5051–00——

Familiarity. Here are the meanings of the terms in the table's Familiarity column:

  • "Permanent circle" means a permanent teleportation circle whose sigil sequence you know.
  • "Linked object" means you possess an object taken from the desired destination within the last six months, such as a book from a wizard's library.
  • "Very familiar" is a place you have visited often, a place you have carefully studied, or a place you can see when you cast the spell.
  • "Seen casually" is a place you have seen more than once but with which you aren't very familiar.
  • "Viewed once or described" is a place you have seen once, possibly using magic, or a place you know through someone else's description, perhaps from a map.
  • "False destination" is a place that doesn't exist. Perhaps you tried to scry an enemy's sanctum but instead viewed an illusion, or you are attempting to teleport to a location that no longer exists.

Mishap. The spell's unpredictable magic results in a difficult journey. Each teleporting creature (or the target object) takes [[/damage 3d10 type=force]] damage, and the DM rerolls on the table to see where you wind up (multiple mishaps can occur, dealing damage each time).

Similar Area. You and your group (or the target object) appear in a different area that's visually or thematically similar to the target area. You appear in the closest similar place. If you are heading for your home laboratory, for example, you might appear in another person's laboratory in the same city.

Off Target. You and your group (or the target object) appear [[/r 2d12]] miles away from the destination in a random direction. Roll [[/r 1d8]] for the direction: 1, east; 2, southeast; 3, south; 4, southwest; 5, west; 6, northwest; 7, north; or 8, northeast.

On Target. You and your group (or the target object) appear where you intended.

affects.special: you and up to eight creatures or one object

Arcane Hand.name: 毕格比之手
Arcane Hand.description:
You create a Large hand of shimmering magical energy in an unoccupied space that you can see within range. The hand lasts for the duration, and it moves at your command, mimicking the movements of your own hand.

The hand is an object that has AC 20 and Hit Points equal to your Hit Point maximum. If it drops to 0 Hit Points, the spell ends. The hand doesn't occupy its space.

When you cast the spell and as a Bonus Action on your later turns, you can move the hand up to 60 feet and then cause one of the following effects:

Clenched Fist @Embed[Compendium.dnd5e.actors24.Actor.phbsplBigbysHand.Item.phbaoiClenchedFi inline]

Forceful Hand @Embed[Compendium.dnd5e.actors24.Actor.phbsplBigbysHand.Item.phbaoiForcefulHa inline]

Grasping Hand @Embed[Compendium.dnd5e.actors24.Actor.phbsplBigbysHand.Item.phbaoiGraspingHa inline classes="no-secrets"]

Interposing Hand @Embed[Compendium.dnd5e.actors24.Actor.phbsplBigbysHand.Item.phbaoiInterposin inline]

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. The damage of the Clenched Fist increases by 2d8 and the damage of the Grasping Hand increases by 2d6 for each spell slot level above 5.

Foundry Note

[[lookup @name]] can use an Epic Action to to control the hand once per round.

Banishment.name: Banishment
Banishment.description:
One creature that you can see within range must succeed on a Charisma saving throw or be transported to a harmless demiplane for the duration. While there, the target has the &Reference[Incapacitated apply=false] condition. When the spell ends, the target reappears in the space it left or in the nearest unoccupied space if that space is occupied.

If the target is an Aberration, a Celestial, an Elemental, a Fey, or a Fiend, the target doesn't return if the spell lasts for 1 minute. The target is instead transported to a random location on a plane (DM's choice) associated with its creature type.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. You can target one additional creature for each spell slot level above 4.

Banished.name: Banished
Banished.description:
While there, the target has the &Reference[Incapacitated apply=false] condition. When the spell ends, the target reappears in the space it left or in the nearest unoccupied space if that space is occupied.

If the target is an Aberration, a Celestial, an Elemental, a Fey, or a Fiend, the target doesn’t return if the spell lasts for 1 minute. The target is instead transported to a random location on a plane (DM’s choice) associated with its creature type.

Dimension Door.name: Dimension Door
Dimension Door.description:
You teleport to a location within range. You arrive at exactly the spot desired. It can be a place you can see, one you can visualize, or one you can describe by stating distance and direction, such as "200 feet straight downward" or "300 feet upward to the northwest at a 45-degree angle."

You can also teleport one willing creature. The creature must be within 5 feet of you when you teleport, and it teleports to a space within 5 feet of your destination space.

If you, the other creature, or both would arrive in a space occupied by a creature or completely filled by one or more objects, you and any creature traveling with you each take 4d6 Force damage, and the teleportation fails.

Ice Storm.name: Ice Storm
Ice Storm.description:
Hail falls in a 20-foot-radius, 40-foot-high Cylinder centered on a point within range. Each creature in the Cylinder makes a Dexterity saving throw. A creature takes 2d10 Bludgeoning damage and 4d6 Cold damage on a failed save or half as much damage on a successful one.

Hailstones turn ground in the Cylinder into &Reference[DifficultTerrain] until the end of your next turn.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. The Bludgeoning damage increases by 1d10 for each spell slot level above 4.

qD6kBBK76kH3PxLK.name: Lightning Bolt
qD6kBBK76kH3PxLK.description:
A stroke of lightning forming a 100-foot-long, 5-foot-wide Line blasts out from you in a direction you choose. Each creature in the Line makes a Dexterity saving throw, taking 8d6 Lightning damage on a failed save or half as much damage on a successful one.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. The damage increases by 1d6 for each spell slot level above 3.

materials.value: a bit of fur and a crystal rod

Scrying.name: 探知术
Scrying.description:
你能看见和听见一个和你处于同一存在位面上的生物。目标生物必须进行一次感知豁免；该豁免的调整值与你对目标的了解程度有关（见下文），也与你和目标之间的物理联系程度有关。目标不知道它进行此豁免在对抗什么，只是会感觉不自在。

你对目标的了解有… 豁免调整值
二手信息（你曾经听说过目标） +5
直接信息（你曾经见过目标） +0
熟悉（你对目标很了解） −5
你持有目标的… 豁免调整值
肖像或其他图像 −2
衣物或其他物品 −4
身体部位如头发或指甲 −10

如果对方豁免成功，则目标不受该法术影响，并且在 24 小时内你不能尝试探知同一个目标。

如果对方豁免失败，则你在目标身边 10 尺内创造出一个隐形的传感器。通过传感器，你可以身临其境地看见和听见周围的环境。传感器会跟随目标移动，并在法术持续时间内始终保持在目标 10 尺之内。在能够看到传感器的生物眼中，你的传感器是一个拳头大小的光球。

除生物之外，你也可以选择一个你以前见过的地点作为该法术的目标。这种情况下，传感器会出现在目标地点且不会移动。

materials.value: 一个至少价值 1000GP 的法器，例如水晶球、银镜、圣水盆

affects.special: 与你处于同一位面的生物，或某个你曾见过的地点的生物
目标身边 10 尺内

fYdN2Xr7cSIK4hsk.name: Wall of Force
fYdN2Xr7cSIK4hsk.description:
An Invisible wall of force springs into existence at a point you choose within range. The wall appears in any orientation you choose, as a horizontal or vertical barrier or at an angle. It can be free floating or resting on a solid surface. You can form it into a hemispherical dome or a globe with a radius of up to 10 feet, or you can shape a flat surface made up of ten 10-foot-by-10-foot panels. Each panel must be contiguous with another panel. In any form, the wall is 1/4 inch thick and lasts for the duration. If the wall cuts through a creature's space when it appears, the creature is pushed to one side of the wall (you choose which side).

Nothing can physically pass through the wall. It is immune to all damage and can't be dispelled by @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplDispelMagi]{Dispel Magic}. A @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplDisintegra]{Disintegrate} spell destroys the wall instantly, however. The wall also extends into the Ethereal Plane and blocks ethereal travel through the wall.

Mage Armor.name: Mage Armor
Mage Armor.description: You touch a willing creature who isn't wearing armor. Until the spell ends, the target's base AC becomes 13 plus its Dexterity modifier. The spell ends early if the target dons armor.

Mage Armor.name: Mage Armor
Mage Armor.description: The target's base AC becomes 13 + its Dexterity modifier.

Mage Hand.name: 法师之手
Mage Hand.description:
A spectral, floating hand appears at a point you choose within range. The hand lasts for the duration. The hand vanishes if it is ever more than 30 feet away from you or if you cast this spell again.

When you cast the spell, you can use the hand to manipulate an object, open an unlocked door or container, stow or retrieve an item from an open container, or pour the contents out of a vial.

As a Magic action on your later turns, you can control the hand thus again. As part of that action, you can move the hand up to 30 feet.

The hand can't attack, activate magic items, or carry more than 10 pounds.

Sending.name: 短讯术
Sending.description:
你向你所遇到过的或某人遇到过且向你描述的一个生物发送一小段二十五个词以内的信息。该生物将在心中听到你的信息，它可以认出你是发讯人（如果他认识你），还可以用同样的方式立即回复一条讯息。法术会让目标能够理解你短讯的信息。

你的传讯可以跨越任意长的距离，甚至能跨越位面。但如果目标和你不在同一个存在位面，则短讯术有 5% 的概率无法到达。如果法术没有到达，你会知晓。

在收到你的信息后，一个生物能够阻塞你在 8 小时内以这个法术对他发信的能力。如果你在这段时间内试图送出另一条信息，你会得知你的短讯被阻塞，并且法术失败。

Epic Boss.name: Epic Boss
Epic Boss.description:
This creature is an Epic Boss, a unique foe designed to pose a solo threat to an entire adventuring party. As such, it has additional game rules that sets it apart from normal creatures:

[[lookup @name]] always takes their turn on Initiative count 20. On their turn, they can use their movement and interaction as normal. However, they do not take an action or Bonus Action on their turn unless forced to do so by a spell or other effect. Instead, [[lookup @name]] takes one of the following Epic Actions at the end of each player character's turn.

All this creature's actions are Epic Actions.

  • @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.ykDyDDqT5sQdaNWW.Item.VT3jXEj51gnY0mEk]{Prismatic Blast}

  • @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.ykDyDDqT5sQdaNWW.Item.8Eauqpv7n7KTeXLi]{Teleport}

  • @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.ykDyDDqT5sQdaNWW.Item.EzO1K4kUEXcUe5Bv]{Chain Lightning}

  • @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.ykDyDDqT5sQdaNWW.Item.YGwAfUPf3SRmqcTW]{Dispel Magic}

  • @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.ykDyDDqT5sQdaNWW.Item.w4WDDCtiLgaGmYeR]{Spellcasting}

  • @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.ykDyDDqT5sQdaNWW.Item.BgIDNjoKaWgbIyto]{Greater Spellcasting}

  • @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.ykDyDDqT5sQdaNWW.Item.UDlfqRaoBJPWNEf2]{Epic Resistance}

Epic Boss.name: Epic Boss
Epic Boss.description:
This creature is an Epic Boss, a unique foe designed to pose a solo threat to an entire adventuring party. As such, it has additional game rules that sets it apart from normal creatures.

The creature always takes their turn on Initiative count 20. On their turn, they can use their movement and interaction as normal. However, they do not take an action or Bonus Action on their turn unless forced to do so by a spell or other effect. Instead, the creature takes one of the Epic Actions they have available.

Epic Resistance.name: Epic Resistance
Epic Resistance.description: [[lookup @name]] chooses one condition, spell, or other effect currently affecting them and rolls [[/r 1d20]]. On an 11 or higher, the effect ends on them. [[lookup @name]] can use this Epic Action even if they would otherwise be unable to take actions, their actions are being controlled by another creature, or if a spell or effect alters their game statistics.

Aura of the Deep.name: Aura of the Deep
Aura of the Deep.description: A creature that starts its turn within 60 feet of [[lookup @name]] takes [[/damage average]] damage.

Delerium Healing.name: Delerium Healing
Delerium Healing.description: As an action, a creature can touch one of [[lookup @name]]'s Delerium shards to regain 10 (3d6) Hit Points. Once a Delerium shard restores Hit Points in this way, it can't do so again for 24 hours.

Fully Contaminated.name: Fully Contaminated
Fully Contaminated.description: [[lookup @name]] is immune to Contamination and has Advantage on saving throws against contaminated spells. [[lookup @name]] may cast contaminated spells even though it does not gain Contamination levels.

Magic Resistance.name: Magic Resistance
Magic Resistance.description: [[lookup @name]] has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Moisture Regeneration.name: Moisture Regeneration
Moisture Regeneration.description: [[lookup @name]] regains 20 Hit Points at the start of each of her turns if she is submerged at least partially in water. She dies only if she starts her turn at 0 Hit Points and does not regenerate.

Fling.name: Fling
Fling.description: One Large or smaller object held or creature &reference[Grappled apply=false] by [[lookup @name]] is thrown up to 60 feet in a direction of [[lookup @name]]'s choice and has the &reference[Prone] condition. If a thrown target strikes a solid surface, the target takes [[/damage average]] damage for every 10 feet it was thrown. If the target is thrown at another creature, that creature must succeed on a [[/save]] saving throw or take the same damage and have the &reference[Prone] condition.

affects.special: A creature hit by another creature flung by The Duchess.

Spellcasting (Psionics).name: Spellcasting (Psionics)
Spellcasting (Psionics).description: [[lookup @name]] casts one of the spells she knows, requiring no Material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 20).

Deep Domination.name: Deep Domination
Deep Domination.description:
Wisdom Saving Throw: DC 20, one creature [[lookup @name]] can see. Failure: The target has the &reference[Charmed] condition. The target is under [[lookup @name]]'s control and can't take Reactions. [[lookup @name]] and the target can communicate telepathically over any distance.

Whenever the target takes damage, it repeats the save, ending the effect on itself on a success. On a failure, it gains one Contamination level. Once every 24 hours, if the creature is at least 1 mile away from [[lookup @name]], it can repeat the saving throw.

If the target undergoes a Monstrous Transformation, it becomes a @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.dA9zcvxOSBENxH22]{Deep Dreg Warrior}, a @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.lIcf5wEO0JJbUcwl]{Deep Knight}, or a @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.Zpceu5nKCsR65SmP]{Deep Siren}, and is forever in thrall to [[lookup @name]].

Deep Domination.name: Deep Domination
Deep Domination.description:
You are &reference[charmed apply=false] and under The Duchess's control. You can't take reactions, and The Duchess and you can communicate telepathically over any distance.

Whenever you take damage, you can repeat your saving throw, ending this effect on yourself on a success. On a failure, you gain one Contamination level. Once every 24 hours, if you are at least 1 mile away from The Duchess, you can repeat your saving throw.

Call of the Deep.name: Call of the Deep
Call of the Deep.description: [[lookup @name]] calls forth up to five Deep Dregs or one @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.lIcf5wEO0JJbUcwl]{Deep Knight}. The creatures appear in unoccupied spaces within 30 feet of [[lookup @name]] and remain until destroyed. The creatures act after the [[lookup @name]] on the same Initiative count and are under her control.

Sacrificial Pawn.name: Sacrificial Pawn
Sacrificial Pawn.description: Trigger: [[lookup @name]] takes damage from an attack. Response: [[lookup @name]] chooses an ally or a creature &reference[Charmed apply=false]] by her to take the attack's damage instead.

utility.condition: When The Duchess takes damage.

affects.special: A creature charmed by The Duchess

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]].

Amphibious.name: Amphibious
Amphibious.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can breathe air and water.

Epic Resistance.name: Epic Resistance
Epic Resistance.description: [[lookup @name]] chooses one condition, spell, or other effect currently affecting them and rolls [[/r 1d20]]. On an 11 or higher, the effect ends on them. [[lookup @name]] can use this Epic Action even if they would otherwise be unable to take actions, their actions are being controlled by another creature, or if a spell or effect alters their game statistics.

Tentacle.name: Tentacle
Tentacle.description:
[[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]], and if the target is a Huge or smaller creature, it has the &reference[Grappled] condition (escape DC 20). [[lookup @name]] can have up to four creatures Grappled at a time.

At the start of each of its turns until the grapple ends, the target is subjected to the following effect. Constitution Saving Throw: DC 17. Failure: The target gains one Contamination level.

Grappled by Tentacle.name: Grappled by Tentacle
Grappled by Tentacle.description: You are &reference[grappled apply=false] (escape DC 20). At the start of each of your turns while grappled, you must make a [[/save 17 con]] or gain one Contamination level.

Epic Boss.name: Epic Boss
Epic Boss.description:
This creature is an Epic Boss, a unique foe designed to pose a solo threat to an entire adventuring party. As such, it has additional game rules that sets it apart from normal creatures:

[[lookup @name]] always takes their turn on Initiative count 20. On their turn, they can use their movement and interaction as normal. However, they does not take an action or Bonus Action on their turn unless forced to do so by a spell or other effect. Instead, [[lookup @name]] takes one of the following Epic Actions at the end of each player character's turn.

All this creature's actions are Epic Actions.

  • @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.z0iDtt74N5NdaiuJ.Item.wBfjMvRl5WDNHBJy]{Bite}

  • @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.z0iDtt74N5NdaiuJ.Item.EUwWL0sXcdbA6xPv]{Tentacle}

  • @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.z0iDtt74N5NdaiuJ.Item.AeKKQJiLyDxvHKI4]{Fling}

  • @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.z0iDtt74N5NdaiuJ.Item.7Gq0uOD500MV5a60]{Spellcasting (Psionics)}

  • @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.z0iDtt74N5NdaiuJ.Item.7Xps1Rox1splnNTs]{Deep Domination}

  • @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.z0iDtt74N5NdaiuJ.Item.yEUCxMqI1yU0Pyea]{Call of the Deep}

  • @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.z0iDtt74N5NdaiuJ.Item.4AflXwGKzywf0HKs]{Epic Resistance}

Additional Spells.name: Additional Spells
Additional Spells.description:
If you have access to Sebastian Crowe's Guide to Drakkenheim, [[lookup @name]] can use the following added spells with her Spellcasting.

  • 1/Day Each: Acid Rain, Biohazard, Controlled Mutation, Storm of Contamination, Weave the Elder Sign

Dispel Magic.name: 解除魔法
Dispel Magic.description:
在施法距离内指定一名生物、一个物件或一处魔法效应。所有影响该目标的三环或更低环阶法术即告终止。每个影响目标的四环或更高环阶法术都需要以你的施法属性进行一次属性检定（DC 10 + 目标法术环阶），检定成功时目标法术终止。

升环施法： 你直接终止影响目标的小于等于该施法环阶的法术效应。

Detect Thoughts.name: 侦测思想
Detect Thoughts.description:
你激活下述效应之一。直到法术结束为止，你可以在你随后的回合用一个魔法动作以激活下述任意效应之一。

感知思想。 你感知距你 30 尺内，知晓语言或能够心灵感应的思想的存在。你并不会阅读这些思想，但你知道这里存在一名有理智的生物。

此法术会被 1 尺厚的岩石、泥土或木头，1 寸厚的金属，或薄薄一层铅阻隔。

阅读思想。 选择一名距你 30 尺内的可见生物，或一名距你 30 尺内被感知思想侦测到的生物。你了解到此时目标最关心的事情。如果目标不知晓任何语言也不会心灵感应，则你不能得到任何信息。

在你的下一回合，用一个魔法动作，你可以尝试深入目标的心灵。如果你选择这么做，目标进行一次感知豁免。豁免失败，则你了解到他的逻辑推理、情绪状态以及他头脑中的一些大事（比如忧虑、挚爱和仇恨的事物）。豁免成功，法术终止。无论哪种情况，目标都会知道你正在窥探其心灵，且直到你的注意力从它的心灵上移开为止，目标均可以在其回合内使用动作进行一次 [[/check ability=int skill=arc dc=@attributes.spelldc]] 检定，对抗你的法术豁免DC，目标胜出对抗时，法术终止。

Dream.name: Dream
Dream.description:
You target a creature you know on the same plane of existence. You or a willing creature you touch enters a trance state to act as a dream messenger. While in the trance, the messenger is &Reference[Incapacitated apply=false] and has a Speed of 0.

If the target is asleep, the messenger appears in the target's dreams and can converse with the target as long as it remains asleep, through the spell's duration. The messenger can also shape the dream's environment, creating landscapes, objects, and other images. The messenger can emerge from the trance at any time, ending the spell. The target recalls the dream perfectly upon waking.

If the target is awake when you cast the spell, the messenger knows it and can either end the trance (and the spell) or wait for the target to sleep, at which point the messenger enters its dreams.

You can make the messenger terrifying to the target. If you do so, the messenger can deliver a message of no more than ten words, and then the target makes a Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the target gains no benefit from its rest, and it takes 3d6 Psychic damage when it wakes up.

Trance State.name: Trance State
Trance State.description: While in the trance, the messenger is Incapacitated and has a Speed of 0.

Polymorph.name: Polymorph
Polymorph.description:
You attempt to transform a creature that you can see within range into a Beast. The target must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or shape-shift into a Beast form for the duration. That form can be any Beast you choose that has a Challenge Rating equal to or less than the target's (or the target's level if it doesn't have a Challenge Rating). The target's game statistics are replaced by the stat block of the chosen Beast, but the target retains its alignment, personality, creature type, Hit Points, and Hit Point Dice. See appendix B for a sample of Beast stat blocks.

The target gains a number of Temporary Hit Points equal to the Hit Points of the Beast form. These Temporary Hit Points vanish if any remain when the spell ends. The spell ends early on the target if it has no Temporary Hit Points left.

The target is limited in the actions it can perform by the anatomy of its new form, and it can't speak or cast spells.

The target's gear melds into the new form. The creature can't use or otherwise benefit from any of that equipment.

Sending.name: 短讯术
Sending.description:
你向你所遇到过的或某人遇到过且向你描述的一个生物发送一小段二十五个词以内的信息。该生物将在心中听到你的信息，它可以认出你是发讯人（如果他认识你），还可以用同样的方式立即回复一条讯息。法术会让目标能够理解你短讯的信息。

你的传讯可以跨越任意长的距离，甚至能跨越位面。但如果目标和你不在同一个存在位面，则短讯术有 5% 的概率无法到达。如果法术没有到达，你会知晓。

在收到你的信息后，一个生物能够阻塞你在 8 小时内以这个法术对他发信的能力。如果你在这段时间内试图送出另一条信息，你会得知你的短讯被阻塞，并且法术失败。

Chain Lightning.name: Chain Lightning
Chain Lightning.description:
You launch a lightning bolt toward a target you can see within range. Three bolts then leap from that target to as many as three other targets of your choice, each of which must be within 30 feet of the first target. A target can be a creature or an object and can be targeted by only one of the bolts.

Each target makes a Dexterity saving throw, taking 10d8 Lightning damage on a failed save or half as much damage on a successful one.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. One additional bolt leaps from the first target to another target for each spell slot level above 6.

affects.special: secondary targets must be within 30 feet of initial target

Control Water.name: Control Water
Control Water.description:
Until the spell ends, you control any water inside an area you choose that is a Cube up to 100 feet on a side, using one of the following effects. As a Magic action on your later turns, you can repeat the same effect or choose a different one.

Flood. You cause the water level of all standing water in the area to rise by as much as 20 feet. If you choose an area in a large body of water, you instead create a 20-foot tall wave that travels from one side of the area to the other and then crashes. Any Huge or smaller vehicles in the wave's path are carried with it to the other side. Any Huge or smaller vehicles struck by the wave have a [[/r 1d100cs<26#Vehicle is capsized]]{25 percent} chance of capsizing.

The water level remains elevated until the spell ends or you choose a different effect. If this effect produced a wave, the wave repeats on the start of your next turn while the flood effect lasts.

Part Water. You part water in the area and create a trench. The trench extends across the spell's area, and the separated water forms a wall to either side. The trench remains until the spell ends or you choose a different effect. The water then slowly fills in the trench over the course of the next round until the normal water level is restored.

Redirect Flow. You cause flowing water in the area to move in a direction you choose, even if the water has to flow over obstacles, up walls, or in other unlikely directions. The water in the area moves as you direct it, but once it moves beyond the spell's area, it resumes its flow based on the terrain. The water continues to move in the direction you chose until the spell ends or you choose a different effect.

Whirlpool. You cause a whirlpool to form in the center of the area, which must be at least 50 feet square and 25 feet deep. The whirlpool lasts until you choose a different effect or the spell ends. The whirlpool is 5 feet wide at the base, up to 50 feet wide at the top, and 25 feet tall. Any creature in the water and within 25 feet of the whirlpool is pulled 10 feet toward it. When a creature enters the whirlpool for the first time on a turn or ends its turn there, it makes a Strength saving throw. On a failed save, the creature takes 2d8 Bludgeoning damage. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage. A creature can swim away from the whirlpool only if it first takes an action to pull away and succeeds on a [[/check ability=str skill=ath dc=@attributes.spell.dc]] check against your spell save DC.

materials.value: a mixture of water and dust

Hypnotic Pattern.name: Hypnotic Pattern
Hypnotic Pattern.description:
You create a twisting pattern of colors in a 30-foot Cube within range. The pattern appears for a moment and vanishes. Each creature in the area who can see the pattern must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or have the &Reference[charmed apply=false] condition for the duration. While Charmed, the creature has the &Reference[incapacitated apply=false] condition and a Speed of 0.

The spell ends for an affected creature if it takes any damage or if someone else uses an action to shake the creature out of its stupor.

Hypnotized.name: Hypnotized
Hypnotized.description:
While &Reference[charmed apply=false], the creature has the &Reference[incapacitated apply=false] condition and a Speed of 0.

The spell ends for an affected creature if it takes any damage or if someone else uses an action to shake the creature out of its stupor.

Project Image.name: 投影术
Project Image.description:
你创造一个自己的幻象分身，并使其在法术持续时间内维持存在。该分身可以出现在施法距离内你曾见过的任何地点，而不论中间是否存在障碍物。该幻象看起来和听起来都与你一样，只是没有现实形体。幻象受到伤害时会立即消失，法术终止。

你可以通过分身的眼睛视物，用分身的耳朵聆听，如同你处于它的位置一样。用一个&Reference[magic]{魔法}动作，你能使分身移动至多 60 尺，而其姿态、言语和行为均按照你的指定作表现。幻象可以完美地模仿你的举止。

由于东西可以穿过幻象，任何与该幻象进行的物理互动都会暴露其幻觉本质。一名生物可以采取&Reference[study]{研究}动作进行一次对抗你法术豁免 DC 的成功智力（[[/check ability=int skill=inv dc=@attributes.spelldc]]{调查}）检定以看穿幻象。辨出幻象的生物可以看穿该影像，其产生的声响对该生物而言显得虚假。

materials.value: 一尊价值 5GP+ 的自塑像

Scrying.name: 探知术
Scrying.description:
你能看见和听见一个和你处于同一存在位面上的生物。目标生物必须进行一次感知豁免；该豁免的调整值与你对目标的了解程度有关（见下文），也与你和目标之间的物理联系程度有关。目标不知道它进行此豁免在对抗什么，只是会感觉不自在。

你对目标的了解有… 豁免调整值
二手信息（你曾经听说过目标） +5
直接信息（你曾经见过目标） +0
熟悉（你对目标很了解） −5
你持有目标的… 豁免调整值
肖像或其他图像 −2
衣物或其他物品 −4
身体部位如头发或指甲 −10

如果对方豁免成功，则目标不受该法术影响，并且在 24 小时内你不能尝试探知同一个目标。

如果对方豁免失败，则你在目标身边 10 尺内创造出一个隐形的传感器。通过传感器，你可以身临其境地看见和听见周围的环境。传感器会跟随目标移动，并在法术持续时间内始终保持在目标 10 尺之内。在能够看到传感器的生物眼中，你的传感器是一个拳头大小的光球。

除生物之外，你也可以选择一个你以前见过的地点作为该法术的目标。这种情况下，传感器会出现在目标地点且不会移动。

materials.value: 一个至少价值 1000GP 的法器，例如水晶球、银镜、圣水盆

affects.special: 与你处于同一位面的生物，或某个你曾见过的地点的生物
目标身边 10 尺内

Telekinesis.name: 心灵遥控
Telekinesis.description:
You gain the ability to move or manipulate creatures or objects by thought. When you cast the spell and as a Magic action on your later turns before the spell ends, you can exert your will on one creature or object that you can see within range, causing the appropriate effect below. You can affect the same target round after round or choose a new one at any time. If you switch targets, the prior target is no longer affected by the spell.

Creature. You can try to move a Huge or smaller creature. The target must succeed on a Strength saving throw, or you move it up to 30 feet in any direction within the spell's range. Until the end of your next turn, the creature has the &Reference[Restrained] condition, and if you lift it into the air, it is suspended there. It falls at the end of your next turn unless you use this option on it again and it fails the save.

Object. You can try to move a Huge or smaller object. If the object isn't being worn or carried, you automatically move it up to 30 feet in any direction within the spell's range.

If the object is worn or carried by a creature, that creature must succeed on a Strength saving throw, or you pull the object away and move it up to 30 feet in any direction within the spell's range.

You can exert fine control on objects with your telekinetic grip, such as manipulating a simple tool, opening a door or a container, stowing or retrieving an item from an open container, or pouring the contents from a vial.

Scent of Blood.name: Scent of Blood
Scent of Blood.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s melee attacks deal an extra [[/damage average]] damage to a &reference[Bloodied] creature.

affects.special: A bloodied creature.

Howl.name: Howl
Howl.description: Wisdom Saving Throw: DC 16, each Hostile creature in a 30-foot Emanation originating from the [[lookup @name lowercase]] that can hear it. Failure: The target has the &reference[Frightened] condition (save ends).

Garmyr Howl.name: Garmyr Howl
Garmyr Howl.description: You are &reference[frightened apply=false]. You can repeat your saving throw against this effect at the end of each of your turns, ending the effect on a success.

Retaliate.name: Retaliate
Retaliate.description: Trigger: A creature hits the [[lookup @name lowercase]] with a melee attack. Response: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes a [[/item NwVsVHsx8p88y5Ze]] attack against that creature.

utility.condition: When a creature hits the garmyr with a melee attack.

Aggressive.name: Aggressive
Aggressive.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] takes the Dash action to move toward a Hostile creature it can see.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes three [[/item NwVsVHsx8p88y5Ze]] attacks. It can also [[/item unTn3sMSdBfpquCk]], if available.

Battleaxe.name: Battleaxe
Battleaxe.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]], and if the target is Large or smaller, it is pushed up to 10 feet straight away from the [[lookup @name lowercase]]. Critical Hit: The target has the &reference[Prone] condition.

Reckless.name: Reckless
Reckless.description: At the start of its turn, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can gain Advantage on all melee attack rolls that turn, but attack rolls against it have Advantage until the start of its next turn..

Reckless.name: Reckless
Reckless.description: The garmyr has Advantage on all melee attack rolls until the start of its next turn, but attack rolls against it have Advantage.

Conditioned Obedience.name: Conditioned Obedience
Conditioned Obedience.description: While the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see its creator, it has Advantage on Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma saving throws.

Protective Impulse.name: Protective Impulse
Protective Impulse.description: Trigger: The [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s creator is targeted by an attack or spell, and the [[lookup @name lowercase]] is within 10 feet of it. Response: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] switches spaces with its creator and becomes the target instead.

utility.condition: When the wretched patient's creator is targeted by an attack or spell and the wretched patient is within 10 feet of it.

affects.special: The patient's creator.

Aura of Hunger.name: Aura of Hunger
Aura of Hunger.description: A creature that starts its turn within 30 feet of the [[lookup @name lowercase]] takes [[/damage average]] damage.

Close-Quarters Hunter.name: Close-Quarters Hunter
Close-Quarters Hunter.description: Being within 5 feet of a Hostile creature doesn't impose Disadvantage on the [[lookup @name]]'s ranged attack rolls.

Hunter's Sense.name: Hunter's Sense
Hunter's Sense.description: The [[lookup @name]] has Advantage on attack rolls against a &reference[Bloodied] creature.

Predatory Senses.name: Predatory Senses
Predatory Senses.description: The [[lookup @name]] has Advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks. He can pinpoint the position of any creature within 120 feet of him with the &reference[Invisible apply=false] condition.

Regeneration.name: Regeneration
Regeneration.description: The [[lookup @name]] regains 20 Hit Points at the start of his turn if he has at least 1 Hit Point remaining.

Reposition.name: Reposition
Reposition.description: The [[lookup @name]] moves up to his Speed without provoking Opportunity Attacks.

Call of the Hunt.name: Call of the Hunt
Call of the Hunt.description: The [[lookup @name]] releases a blood-curdling howl that can be heard all across Drakkenheim. All garmyr in the city heed this call and rush towards the [[lookup @name]]'s current position. Each garmyr within 60 feet who can see and hear the [[lookup @name]] can use its Reaction to move up to half its Speed and make one melee or ranged attack with Advantage.

affects.special: Garmyr

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]]. Constitution Saving Throw: DC 17. Failure: The target gains one Contamination level.

Epic Boss.name: Epic Boss
Epic Boss.description:
This creature is an Epic Boss, a unique foe designed to pose a solo threat to an entire adventuring party. As such, it has additional game rules that sets it apart from normal creatures:

[[lookup @name]] always takes their turn on Initiative count 20. On their turn, they can use their movement and interaction as normal. However, they do not take an action or Bonus Action on their turn unless forced to do so by a spell or other effect. Instead, [[lookup @name]] takes one of the following Epic Actions at the end of each player character's turn.

All this creature's actions are Epic Actions.

  • @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.zUM1BFxKQVMPf5k5.Item.LV5MD43a4k4wTixZ]{Bite}

  • @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.zUM1BFxKQVMPf5k5.Item.bYmQzr1Pk0La21E0]{Claws}

  • @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.zUM1BFxKQVMPf5k5.Item.qZz8d9Zmu0cqdJqZ]{Poison Arrow}

  • @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.zUM1BFxKQVMPf5k5.Item.YfV0xMCzQVgmORFU]{Ensnaring Arrow}

  • @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.zUM1BFxKQVMPf5k5.Item.6EY755YWr4hv0WX7]{Harpoon Arrow}

  • @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.zUM1BFxKQVMPf5k5.Item.GOtUzf2tMh86iZ4I]{Reposition}

  • @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.zUM1BFxKQVMPf5k5.Item.vkO0VpiFswgbtcZ5]{Call of the Hunt}

  • @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.zUM1BFxKQVMPf5k5.Item.JO5CHTEM1Sk4Qf0C]{Epic Resistance}

Epic Resistance.name: Epic Resistance
Epic Resistance.description: [[lookup @name]] chooses one condition, spell, or other effect currently affecting them and rolls [[/r 1d20]]. On an 11 or higher, the effect ends on them. [[lookup @name]] can use this Epic Action even if they would otherwise be unable to take actions, their actions are being controlled by another creature, or if a spell or effect alters their game statistics.

Claws.name: Claws
Claws.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]], and the target has the &reference[Bleeding] condition (4d4).

Bleeding (4d4).name: Bleeding (4d4)
Bleeding (4d4).description:
You're losing blood to an open wound.

  • Ongoing Damage: At the end of each of your turns, you lose [[/r 4d4]] Hit Points.

  • Regaining Hit Points: This condition ends if you regain any Hit Points.

  • Medical Treatment: You or another creature within 5 feet of you can spend an action and use a Healer's Kit to staunch the bleeding (no check required), ending the condition.

Poison Arrow.name: Poison Arrow
Poison Arrow.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]]. Constitution Saving Throw: DC 17. Failure: The target has the &reference[Poisoned] condition (save ends).

Poison Arrow.name: Poison Arrow
Poison Arrow.description: You are &reference[poisoned apply=false]. You can repeat your saving throw against this effect at the end of each of your turns, ending the effect on a success.

Ensnaring Arrow.name: Ensnaring Arrow
Ensnaring Arrow.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]], and the target has the &reference[Restrained] condition ([[/save activity=5z1mjaSYP9cOe2gY]] saving throw ends).

Ensnaring Arrow.name: Ensnaring Arrow
Ensnaring Arrow.description: You are &reference[restrained apply=false]. At the end of each of your turns, you can attempt to end this this effect by succeeding on a [[/save 17 dex]] saving throw.

Harpoon Arrow.name: Harpoon Arrow
Harpoon Arrow.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]], and if the target is Huge or smaller, it is pulled up to 20 feet toward the [[lookup @name]].

Regenerate.name: Regenerate
Regenerate.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] regains 10 Hit Points at the start of its turn. If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] takes Acid or Cold damage, this trait doesn't function on the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s next turn. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] dies only if it starts its turn with 0 Hit Points and doesn't regenerate.

Out of My Way.name: Out of My Way
Out of My Way.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] moves more than 10 feet in a straight line. Dexterity Saving Throw: DC 17, each creature within 5 feet of its path. Failure: The target is pushed 5 feet away from the [[lookup @name lowercase]] and has the &reference[Prone] condition.

save.condition: When the hulk moves more than 10 feet in a straight line.

Whirlwind.name: Whirlwind
Whirlwind.description: The hulk twirls its blades around it in a violent, heavy swing. Strength Saving Throw: DC 17, each creature within 10 feet of the hulk. Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target has the &reference[Prone] condition. Success: Half damage only

Rip and Tear.name: Rip and Tear
Rip and Tear.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes one [[/item hk1xCxgiKNQgKIer]] attack against a Prone creature.

affects.special: A prone creature.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes two [[/item hk1xCxgiKNQgKIer]] attacks. It can replace one Rusty Blade attack with [[/item E3u0lh4dB4dG2Qbe]] if available.

Rusty Blade.name: Rusty Blade
Rusty Blade.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]] and the creature gains the &reference[Bleeding] (2d6) condition.

Bleeding (2d6).name: Bleeding (2d6)
Bleeding (2d6).description:
You're losing blood to an open wound.

  • Ongoing Damage: At the end of each of your turns, you lose [[/r 2d6]] Hit Points.

  • Regaining Hit Points: This condition ends if you regain any Hit Points.

  • Medical Treatment: You or another creature within 5 feet of you can spend an action and use a Healer's Kit to staunch the bleeding (no check required), ending the condition.

Additional Spells.name: Additional Spells
Additional Spells.description:
If you have access to Dungeons of Drakkenheim or Sebastian Crowe's Guide to Drakkenheim, the [[lookup @name]] has the following spells added to his spellbook.

Dungeons of Drakkenheim:

  • At Will: Delerium Orb, Purge Contamination, Warp Bolt

  • 2/Day Each: Conjure the Deep Haze, Delerium Blast, Forced Evolution

  • 1/Day Each: Octarine Spray, Siphon Contamination

Sebastian Crowe's Guide to Drakkenheim:

  • At Will: Bacterial Barrage, Caustic Grip, Infect

  • 2/Day Each: Blood Worm, Septic Shock, Venomous Aura

  • 1/Day Each: Grievous Wounds, Vile Necrosis

Insect Body.name: Insect Body
Insect Body.description: The [[lookup @name]] can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the [[lookup @name]] can move through any opening large enough for a Tiny insect.

Crawling Flesh.name: Crawling Flesh
Crawling Flesh.description: When the [[lookup @name]] is reduced to 0 Hit Points, he breaks apart into a @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.vV9jVbMm9oNpzDfo] in the same space. Unless the swarm is destroyed, the [[lookup @name]]'s swarm returns to its cocoon and reforms into the [[lookup @name]] [[/r 1d6]] days later.

Aura of Fleshy Insects.name: Aura of Fleshy Insects
Aura of Fleshy Insects.description: Constitution Saving Throw: DC 18, each creature of the [[lookup @name]]'s choosing who starts its turn within 60 feet of the [[lookup @name]]. Failure: [[/damage average]] damage and the target gains one level of Contamination.

Spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
Spellcasting.description: The [[lookup @name]] casts a spell he knows, requiring no Material components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 18, +10 to hit with spell attacks).

Forced Mutation.name: Forced Mutation
Forced Mutation.description: The [[lookup @name]] targets a creature within 60 feet who has one or more mutations and magically alters the mutation. The [[lookup @name]] chooses one of the target's existing mutations to remove and replaces it with a different one of his choice.

affects.special: A creature that has one or more mutations.

Infest the Flesh.name: Infest the Flesh
Infest the Flesh.description: Dexterity Saving Throw: DC 16, each creature in a 30-foot Emanation from the [[lookup @name]]. Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target gains the &reference[Burning] (3d8 Necrotic) condition. A target also has the &reference[Dazed] condition while it is burning in this way. Failure by 5 or more: The target also has the &reference[Restrained] condition (save ends) due to masses of swarming fleshy bugs. Success: Half damage.

Burning Daze (3d8 Necrotic).name: Burning Daze (3d8 Necrotic)
Burning Daze (3d8 Necrotic).description:
You are &reference[burning apply=false] from being covered in insects.

  • At the end of each of your turns, you take [[/damage average necrotic 3d8]] damage.

  • The condition ends if you or another creature within 5 feet of you spends an action to scrape off the insects or if some other effect removes them.

While burning in this way, you are also &reference[dazed apply=false].

Burning Restraints (3d8 Necrotic).name: Burning Restraints (3d8 Necrotic)
Burning Restraints (3d8 Necrotic).description:
You are &reference[burning apply=false] from being covered in insects.

  • At the end of each of your turns, you take [[/damage average necrotic 3d8]] damage.

  • The condition ends if you or another creature within 5 feet of you spends an action to scrape off the insects or if some other effect removes them.

While burning in this way, you are also &reference[dazed apply=false] and &reference[restrained apply=false].

Contaminate.name: Contaminate
Contaminate.description: Constitution Saving Throw: DC 16, each creature &reference[Restrained apply=false] by the [[lookup @name]]'s @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.zoQPGz7IH5LbMwUm.Item.LtGpVWU9ifyHxNS1]{Infest the Flesh} action. Failure: The target gains one level of Contamination.

affects.special: Each creature restrained by the Pale Man's Infest the Flesh action.

Abrupt Contaminant.name: Abrupt Contaminant
Abrupt Contaminant.description: The [[lookup @name]] targets a creature within 60 feet who has one or more levels of Contamination. That creature takes [[/damage average]] damage for each level of Contamination it has.

Inflict Wounds.name: Inflict Wounds
Inflict Wounds.description:
A creature you touch makes a Constitution saving throw, taking 2d10 Necrotic damage on a failed save or half as much damage on a successful one.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. The damage increases by 1d10 for each spell slot level above 1.

Mage Armor.name: Mage Armor
Mage Armor.description: You touch a willing creature who isn't wearing armor. Until the spell ends, the target's base AC becomes 13 plus its Dexterity modifier. The spell ends early if the target dons armor.

Mage Armor.name: Mage Armor
Mage Armor.description: The target's base AC becomes 13 + its Dexterity modifier.

Magic Missile.name: Magic Missile
Magic Missile.description:
You create three glowing darts of magical force. Each dart strikes a creature of your choice that you can see within range. A dart deals 1d4 + 1 Force damage to its target. The darts all strike simultaneously, and you can direct them to hit one creature or several.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. The spell creates one more dart for each spell slot level above 1.

[[2 + @item.level]]{Level [[lookup @item.level]] darts}

Shield.name: Shield
Shield.description: An imperceptible barrier of magical force protects you. Until the start of your next turn, you have a +5 bonus to AC, including against the triggering attack, and you take no damage from @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplMagicMissi]{Magic Missile}.

activation.condition: 当你被攻击命中或被作为魔法飞弹法术的目标时执行

Imperceptible Barrier.name: Imperceptible Barrier
Imperceptible Barrier.description: Until the start of your next turn, you have a +5 bonus to AC, including against the triggering attack, and you take no damage from Magic Missile.

Bestow Curse.name: Bestow Curse
Bestow Curse.description:
You touch a creature, which must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or become cursed for the duration. Until the curse ends, the target suffers one of the following effects of your choice:

  • Choose one ability. The target has Disadvantage on ability checks and saving throws made with that ability (Curse Ability activity).
  • The target has Disadvantage on attack rolls against you (Curse Attacks activity).
  • In combat, the target must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw at the start of each of its turns or be forced to take the &Reference[Dodge] action on that turn (Curse Actions activity).
  • If you deal damage to the target with an attack roll or a spell, the target takes an extra 1d8 Necrotic damage (Curse Resilience activity).

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. If you cast this spell using a level 4 spell slot, you can maintain Concentration on it for up to 10 minutes. If you use a level 5+ spell slot, the spell doesn't require Concentration, and the duration becomes 8 hours (level 5–6 slot) or 24 hours (level 7–8 slot). If you use a level 9 spell slot, the spell lasts until dispelled.

Cursed Charisma.name: Cursed Charisma
Cursed Charisma.description: The target has Disadvantage on ability checks and saving throws made with the chosen ability.

Cursed Constitution.name: Cursed Constitution
Cursed Constitution.description: The target has Disadvantage on ability checks and saving throws made with the chosen ability.

Cursed Dexterity.name: Cursed Dexterity
Cursed Dexterity.description: The target has Disadvantage on ability checks and saving throws made with the chosen ability.

Cursed Intelligence.name: Cursed Intelligence
Cursed Intelligence.description: The target has Disadvantage on ability checks and saving throws made with the chosen ability.

Cursed Strength.name: Cursed Strength
Cursed Strength.description: The target has Disadvantage on ability checks and saving throws made with the chosen ability.

Cursed Wisdom.name: Cursed Wisdom
Cursed Wisdom.description: The target has Disadvantage on ability checks and saving throws made with the chosen ability.

Cursed Attacks.name: Cursed Attacks
Cursed Attacks.description: The target has Disadvantage on attack rolls against you.

Cursed Actions.name: Cursed Actions
Cursed Actions.description: In combat, the target must succeed on a [[/save ability=wis dc=@attributes.spell.dc format=long]] at the start of each of its turns or be forced to take the &Reference[Dodge] action on that turn.

Cursed Resilience.name: Cursed Resilience
Cursed Resilience.description: If you deal damage to the target with an attack roll or a spell, the target takes an extra [[/damage 1d8 type=necrotic]] damage.

Black Tentacles.name: Black Tentacles
Black Tentacles.description:
Squirming, ebony tentacles fill a 20-foot square on ground that you can see within range. For the duration, these tentacles turn the ground in that area into &Reference[DifficultTerrain].

Each creature in that area makes a Strength saving throw. On a failed save, it takes 3d6 Bludgeoning damage, and it has the &Reference[Restrained apply=false] condition until the spell ends. A creature also makes that save if it enters the area or ends it turn there. A creature makes that save only once per turn.

A Restrained creature can take an action to make a [[/check ability=str skill=ath dc=@attributes.spell.dc]] check against your spell save DC, ending the condition on itself on a success.

Restrained.name: Restrained
Restrained.description: A &Reference[Restrained apply=false] creature can take an action to make a [[/check ability=str skill=ath dc=@attributes.spell.dc]] check against your spell save DC, ending the condition on itself on a success.

Hold Person.name: Hold Person
Hold Person.description:
Choose a Humanoid that you can see within range. The target must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or have the &Reference[paralyzed apply=false] condition for the duration. At the end of each of its turns, the target repeats the save, ending the spell on itself on a success.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. You can target one additional Humanoid for each spell slot level above 2.

Paralyzed.name: Paralyzed
Paralyzed.description: At the end of each of its turns, the target repeats the [[/save ability=wis]] save, ending the spell on itself on a success.

Web.name: Web
Web.description:
You conjure a mass of sticky webbing at a point within range. The webs fill a 20-foot Cube there for the duration. The webs are &Reference[difficultterrain], and the area within them is &Reference[lightlyobscured].

If the webs aren't anchored between two solid masses (such as walls or trees) or layered across a floor, wall, or ceiling, the web collapses on itself, and the spell ends at the start of your next turn. Webs layered over a flat surface have a depth of 5 feet.

The first time a creature enters the webs on a turn or starts its turn there, it must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw or have the &Reference[restrained] condition while in the webs or until it breaks free.

A creature Restrained by the webs can take an action to make a [[/check ability=str skill=ath dc=@attributes.spell.dc]] check against your spell save DC. If it succeeds, it is no longer Restrained.

The webs are flammable. Any 5-foot Cube of webs exposed to fire burns away in 1 round, dealing [[/damage 2d4 type=fire]] damage to any creature that starts its turn in the fire.

Antimagic Field.name: Antimagic Field
Antimagic Field.description:
An aura of antimagic surrounds you in 10-foot Emanation. No one can cast spells, take Magic actions, or create other magical effects inside the aura, and those things can't target or otherwise affect anything inside it. Magical properties of magic items don't work inside the aura or on anything inside it.

Areas of effect created by spells or other magic can't extend into the aura, and no one can teleport into or out of it or use planar travel there. Portals close temporarily while in the aura.

Ongoing spells, except those cast by an Artifact or a deity, are suppressed in the area. While an effect is suppressed, it doesn't function, but the time it spends suppressed counts against its duration.

@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplDispelMagi]{Dispel Magic} has no effect on the aura, and the auras created by different Antimagic Field spells don't nullify each other.

Blight.name: Blight
Blight.description:
A creature that you can see within range makes a Constitution saving throw, taking 8d8 Necrotic damage on a failed save or half as much damage on a successful one. A Plant creature automatically fails the save.

Alternatively, target a nonmagical plant that isn't a creature, such as a tree or shrub. It doesn't make a save; it simply withers and dies.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. The damage increases by 1d8 for each spell slot level above 4.

Chain Lightning.name: Chain Lightning
Chain Lightning.description:
You launch a lightning bolt toward a target you can see within range. Three bolts then leap from that target to as many as three other targets of your choice, each of which must be within 30 feet of the first target. A target can be a creature or an object and can be targeted by only one of the bolts.

Each target makes a Dexterity saving throw, taking 10d8 Lightning damage on a failed save or half as much damage on a successful one.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. One additional bolt leaps from the first target to another target for each spell slot level above 6.

affects.special: secondary targets must be within 30 feet of initial target

Giant Insect.name: Giant Insect
Giant Insect.description:
You summon a giant centipede, spider, or wasp (chosen when you cast the spell). It manifests in an unoccupied space you can see within range and uses the @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.actors24.Actor.phbmobGiantInsec]{Giant Insect} stat block. The form you choose determines certain details in its stat block. The creature disappears when it drops to 0 Hit Points or when the spell ends.

The creature is an ally to you and your allies. In combat, the creature shares your Initiative count, but it takes its turn immediately after yours. It obeys your verbal commands (no action required by you). If you don't issue any, it takes the &Reference[Dodge] action and uses its movement to avoid danger.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. Use the spell slot's level for the spell's level in the stat block.

In addition to the noted usage of the spell's level in the insect's Traits and Actions, the following attributes are also affected.

Giant Insect
AC11 + the spell's level
HP30 + 10 for each spell level above 4
Speed40 ft., Climb 40 ft., Fly 40 ft. (Wasp only)
PBequals your Proficiency Bonus

Invisibility.name: Invisibility
Invisibility.description:
A creature you touch has the &Reference[invisible apply=false] condition until the spell ends. The spell ends early immediately after the target makes an attack roll, deals damage, or casts a spell.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. You can target one additional creature for each spell slot level above 2.

Invisible.name: 隐形
Invisible.description: 如果你进行攻击检定、造成伤害或施展法术，则该法术提前终止。

Slow.name: Slow
Slow.description:
You alter time around up to six creatures of your choice in a 40-foot Cube within range. Each target must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or be affected by this spell for the duration.

An affected target's Speed is halved, it takes a −2 penalty to AC and Dexterity saving throws, and it can't take Reactions. On its turns, it can take either an action or a Bonus Action, not both, and it can make only one attack if it takes the Attack action. If it casts a spell with a Somatic component, there is a [[/r 1d100cs<=25#Slowed spell cast success]]{25 percent} chance the spell fails as a result of the target making the spell's gestures too slowly.

An affected target repeats the save at the end of each of its turns, ending the spell on itself on a success.

Foundry Note

The inline roll above will return 1 if it succeeded or 0 if it failed.

Slowed.name: Slowed
Slowed.description:
An affected target’s Speed is halved, it takes a −2 penalty to AC and Dexterity saving throws, and it can’t take Reactions. On its turns, it can take either an action or a Bonus Action, not both, and it can make only one attack if it takes the Attack action. If it casts a spell with a Somatic component, there is a [[/r 1d100cs>25#Slowed spell cast success]]{25 percent} chance the spell fails as a result of the target making the spell’s gestures too slowly.

An affected target repeats the [[/save ability=wis]] save at the end of each of its turns, ending the spell on itself on a success.

Epic Boss.name: Epic Boss
Epic Boss.description:
This creature is an Epic Boss, a unique foe designed to pose a solo threat to an entire adventuring party. As such, it has additional game rules that sets it apart from normal creatures:

The [[lookup @name]] always takes his turn on Initiative count 20. On his turn, he can use his movement and interaction as normal. However, he does not take an action or Bonus Action on his turn unless forced to do so by a spell or other effect. Instead, [[lookup @name]] takes one of the following Epic Actions at the end of each player character's turn.

All this creature's actions are Epic Actions.

  • @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.zoQPGz7IH5LbMwUm.Item.lE4kqaB5c9zVGXwn]{Contaminating Touch}

  • @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.zoQPGz7IH5LbMwUm.Item.kaxhxusg9PNURIoe]{Spellcasting}

  • @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.zoQPGz7IH5LbMwUm.Item.Nxp3aSyuLttIuYF8]{Forced Mutation}

  • @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.zoQPGz7IH5LbMwUm.Item.LtGpVWU9ifyHxNS1]{Infest the Flesh}

  • @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.zoQPGz7IH5LbMwUm.Item.HEkV2271SpYuN32j]{Contaminate}

  • @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.zoQPGz7IH5LbMwUm.Item.LwjGaSiZY2Ynlu7r]{Abrupt Contaminant}

  • @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.zoQPGz7IH5LbMwUm.Item.QJeBFD1dpIN0dSor]{Epic Resistance}

Epic Resistance.name: Epic Resistance
Epic Resistance.description: [[lookup @name]] chooses one condition, spell, or other effect currently affecting her and rolls [[/r 1d20]]. On an 11 or higher, the effect ends on her. [[lookup @name]] can use this Epic Action even if she would otherwise be unable to take actions, her actions are being controlled by another creature, or if a spell or effect alters her game statistics.

Contaminating Touch.name: Contaminating Touch
Contaminating Touch.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]], it is subjected to the following effect. Constitution Saving Throw: DC 18. Failure: The target gains one level of Contamination.

Mage Armor.name: Mage Armor
Mage Armor.description: The target's base AC becomes 13 + its Dexterity modifier.
